p.seg: "ku yi abin da ya ke daidai, amma kuma kun kasa yin daidai"
Paul Roberts wani tsohon mawaki kuma kafinta ya zama mai kirkirar manhaja a Hukumar Kula da Sarayin Samaniya ta Amurka NASA.

Shi da matarsa, wata tsohuwar Nas wacce ta yi ritaya daga Asibitin Methodist, da ke kiran kanta "wacce tara take ba ta cika goma ba". Na yin wata mujalla a yanar gizo, suna kuma halarta tarukan shirin ban dariya na Comic Con a shekarun da suka gabata.
Suna haduwa tare da 'ya 'yansu mata biyu da surukinsu da kuma jikansu dan shekara 7 a kowanne mako suna wasan jigsaw da kuma ludo na cikin nishadi.
"mutane ne masu abin ta'ajibi" a cewar misisi Roman yar shekara 38, game da iyayenta.
Sheryl Roberts 'yar shekara 65, ta fahimci hadarin da ke tattare da wannan annobar-tana da ciwon sugar, da Asma, da kuma ciwon zuciya wanda ka iya jefata cikin hadari babba.
Mijinta yana da ciwon huhu mai tsanani yana kuma dauke da wani abu da aka sa mi shi da zai bude hanyar jinin da suka toshe.
"Muna ta taka tsantsan, da matukar kiyayewa da kuma kauracewa jama'a" in ji Misisi Roberts.
Mijinta ya soma aikia daga gida da bazara a lokacin da jihar Washington da New York da kuma wasu sauran wuraren da ke kasar suka shiga wani hali mai wuya.

Mista Roberts a wani lokaci ya kan je siyayya a babban kantin sayar da kaya a wata sa a da aka ware na "dattawa" abin da za iya cewa shine "abin a zo a gani" na ma'aurata a 'yan watannin nan. Misisi Roberts tana mai cewa, shine mu zauna daga mota mu rika kallon fulawoyin da suka fito a filin Allah.
'Yar karamar 'yarsu ta na da kwazo sosai ita ma.
Amma daga ranar da ta dawo gida daga aiki tana attishawa wata rana a tsakiyar watan Yuni zuwa Yuni ana tunanin kan jiki ne.
Sai kuma ta soma tari, da zazzabi, da ciwon kai, da gudawa, ta kuma daina jin dandano da wari ko kamshi, wasu alamu na kamuwa da cutar Koronabirus.
"Ta fada min cewa, "ban san abin da ke faruwa ba mama, kuma ina sa takunkumi, ina sa safar hannu, ina kuma wanke hannuna""Misisi Roberts ta ce.
"Kana yin duk abinda ya dace, kuma sai da ka kamu da ita."
Elaine Roberts, wacce gwajin da aka yi mata ya nuna ta kamu da cutar Korona birus, ba ta kamu da mummunan rashin lafiya ba.
Amma ga iyayenta hakan sai ya fi tabarbarewa.
Mista Roberts da matarsa suna soma yin attishawa, sannnan sai tari, kamar dai yadda 'yar su ta yi, sai kuma ta soma zazzabia da kuma jiwon jiki.
Sannan sai ya "kwanta rashin lafiya cikin gaggawa" Sheryl Roberyts na iya tunawa.
Sai ya dimauce a ranar 22 ga watan Yuni.
Cikin tashin hankali, sai ta gwada karfin shakar iskar Oxygen din sa.
Gejin ya yi kasa, sai ta kira babbar 'yar ta na mai ba ta umarnin ta kai shi Cibiyar kula na gaggawa, ziyara ta biyu a cikin kwanakin biyu.
"You Do the Right Things, and Still You Get It"
Paul Roberts, a former musician and carpenter turned computer programmer for NASA, now works at a software company.
He and his wife, a retired Methodist Hospital nurse who calls herself a "glass half full person," ran an online fanzine and attended Comic Con events years ago.
They gather weekly with their two daughters, son-in-law and 7-year-old grandson for jigsaw puzzles and fierce games of Uno.
"They are amazing nerds," Ms. Roman, 38, said of her parents.
Sheryl Roberts, 65, understood the perils of the pandemic - she had diabetes, asthma and heart disease, which could put her at higher risk.
Her husband had chronic lung disease and a stent to open a blocked coronary artery.
"We have been so careful, so very careful, and stayed away from people," Ms. Roberts said.
Her husband began working from home in the spring when Washington State, New York and then other areas around the country were hit hard.
Mr. Roberts occasionally made a supermarket run during "senior" hour; the couple's only "big, hot date" in recent months, Ms. Roberts said, was to view wildflowers from their car.
Their younger daughter was diligent as well.
But then she came back from work sneezing one day in mid-June and thought it was allergies.
Soon she had a cough, fever, headaches and diarrhea, and lost her senses of taste and smell, telltale symptoms of the coronavirus.
"She told me, "I don't know what's going on, Mom, but I wore a mask, I wore gloves, I washed my hands,"" Ms. Roberts said.
"You do the right things, and still you get it."
Elaine Roberts, who tested positive for the coronavirus, did not become seriously ill.
But for her parents, it would be much worse.
Mr. Roberts and his wife started sneezing, then coughing, just like their daughter, and developed fevers and severe body aches.
Then he got "awfully sick, awfully quickly," Sheryl Roberts recalled.
He became confused on June 22.
Alarmed, she tested his oxygen level.
It was low, and she called her older daughter to take him to an emergency care center, the second visit in two days.
An bayyana dalilin hatsarin da helikwafta ya yi dauke da Osinbajo.
An bayyana dalilin da ya sa helikwafta dauke da Mataimakin Shugaban Kasa, Yemi Osinbajo ya yi hatsari a garin Kabba, Jihar Kogi.
Helikwaftan ya yi hatsarin ne a ranar 2 Ga Fabrairu a garin Kabba, dauke da Osinbajo da wasu mukarraban sa su takwas.
Shugaban Hukumar Bibiyar Hadurra ta Kasa (AIB), Akin Olateru, ya ce direban jirgin ne ya yi amfani da salon sauka wanda ba daidai ba ne ya yi amfani da shi.
Sannan kuma ya ce direban bai bi ka'idar da tsarin sauka kasa da jirgi mai saukar ungulu da kamfanin da ke da jirgin ya gindaya ba.
Jirgin mai lamba AW 139, samfurin Agusta Westland, ya yi saukar gaggawa ne a cikin wani filin kwallo.
Direban jirgin ya isa garin Kabba lokacin gari ya yi biji-,biji da hazo, shi kuma sai ya rika gani garara-gagara.
Yayin da ya zo sauka, sai ya nufi filin kwallo a sukwane, tsakanin sa da filin da zai yi saukar-ungulun.
Bayan jirgin ya karci kasa ya gargara kasa, ya tsaya bayan ya hantsila bangaren dama.
Amma Mataimakin Buhari da sauran ƴan rakiyar takwas, babu wanda ya ji ciwo a jikin sa.
Cikin wadanda ke tare da Osinbajo a cikin jirgin, har da Mashawarcin Buhari a Lamurran iyasa, Babafemi Ujudu.
The cause of the helicopter crash carrying Osinbajo was explained.
The cause of the helicopter crash carrying Vice President Yemi Osinbajo in Kabba, Kogi State was explained.
The helicopter crashed on February 2 in Kabba, carrying Osinbajo and his eight aides.
The chairman of the National Accident Investigation Board (AIB), Akin Olateru, said the pilot had used the wrong landing gear.
He also said that the driver did not follow the rules and regulations of the helicopter set by the airline.
The plane, an AW 139, a model by Agusta Westland, made an emergency landing at a football field.
The pilot of the helicopter arrived in Kabba in hazy weather condition and he was unable to see clearly.
When he was about to land, he headed for the soccer field, between him and the stadium for an emergency landing.
After crashing into the ground, it dragged then stopped after it toppled on its right side.
As for Deputy Buhari and his eight companions, no one was injured.
Among those on board with Osinbajo, includes Buhari's Adviser on political Affairs, Babafemi Ujudu.
Rancen Kudin Da Sin Ta Samar Wa Nijeriya Ya Inganta Bunkasuwar Tattalin Arzikinta - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Kwanan baya, jaridar Vanguard ta kasar Nijeriya ta wallafa wani sharhin edita mai taken "rancen kudi na Sin da ƴancin kasarmu, inda ta bayyana cewa, majalisar dokokin kasar Nijeriya ta zartas da yarjejeniyoyin rancen kudi na kasar Sin, kuma, muradun jarjejeniyoyin sun dace ka'idojin kasa da kasa.
Rancen kudin da kasar Sin ta samar wa kasar Nijeriya sun taimakawa Nijeriya wajen bunkasa tattalin arziki da raya harkokin zamani, hakika kasar Nijeriya ta karu.
Sharhin ya kuma bayyana cewa, kwanan baya, wasu ƴan Nijeriya sun yi zargin cewa, wasu tanade-tanade da ke cikin yarjejeniyoyin rancen kudi sun raunata ƴancin kasar Nijeriya.

A hakika, wannan zargi ba shi da tushe, muradin yin watsi da ikon "kiyaye ƴancin kan kasa" da kasar Nijeriya ta ambata alkawari ne na biyan bashinta, bai shafi batun ƴancin kasa ba, kuma bai bata ƴancin kasar Nijeriya ko kadan ba.
Kasar Sin ta samar da rancen kudi bisa ka'idojin yarjejeniyar kasuwancin kasa da kasa.

Bayanai na nuna cewa, Sin ta samar da rancen kudi na dallar Amurka miliyan 3,121 ga kasar Nijeriya, adadin da ya kai 3.94% na dukkanin bashin kasar Nijeriya, kuma darajin kudin ruwan da za ta biya a ko wace shekara shi ne 2.5%, kuma za a biya bashin ne cikin dogon lokaci.

An yi amfani da dukkanin rancen kudin da kasar Sin ta samar wa kasar Nijeriya wajen samar da ayyukan gina ababen more rayuwa, kamar layin dogo dake tsakanin Abuja da Kaduna, da layin dogo a cikin birnin Abuja, da layin dogo tsakanin Lagos da Ibadan, da hanyoyin mota na Keffi, da kuma shirin inganta filayen jiragen sama na kasar da dai sauransu, dukkansu sun samar da guraben ayyukan yi a kasar Nijeriya, da ba da muhimmiyar gudummawa ga bunkasuwar tattalin arzikin kasar Nijeriya.
China's Credit to Nigeria's Improves its Economic Growth - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Recently, Nigeria's Vanguard newspaper published an editorial commentary entitled "China Borrowing and Our country's Independence, stating that the Nigerian parliament has approved China's loan agreements, and, the terms of the agreements complies with International guidelines.
Chinese loans to Nigeria have helped Nigeria grow economically and structurally, Nigeria has certainly benefitted.
The editorial also stated that some Nigerians had in the past alleged that certain provisions in the loan agreements had undermined Nigeria's sovereignty.

In fact, this allegation is baseless, the desire to disregard the "protection of the sovereignty" power that Nigeria has mentioned as a pledge of allegiance, does not affect the issue of national sovereignty, and does not undermine Nigeria's sovereignty at all.
China provides loans in accordance with the terms of international trade agreements.
China has provided $ 3,121 million in loans to Nigeria, accounting for 3.94% of Nigeria's total debt, and an annual interest rate of 2.5%. The loan will be repaid in the long run.

All loans provided by China to Nigeria have been used for infrastructure projects, such as the Abuja-Kaduna railway line, the Abuja railway line, the Lagos-Ibadan rail line, and Keffi Highways, as well as the country's airport upgrades, among others, have created jobs in Nigeria, making a significant contribution to the economic development of Nigeria.
Kwamitin yakin neman zabe ya ki ya yi hira da gidan talbijin na Fox News a shirinsa na Sunday Interview, mako 1 bayan zaman dirshan na Chris Wallace kan shugaba Trump
A hirarsa da Chris Wallace a makon jiya, shugaba Trump ya tambayi shin ko dan takarar shugaban kasa a jam'iyya Democrat Joe Biden zai iya da irin jerin tambayoyin da Wallace ke yiwa shugaba Trump.
Amsar wannan tambaya dai - a halin yanzu dai- ba za mu san amsar ba tukunna.
A ranar Lahadi Wallace ya sanar da masu kallonsa cewa, kwamitin yakin neman zabe na Joe Biden ya fadawa Fox News cewa " ba zai samu damar halartar" shirin hira da shi ba.

"A hirar da mu ka yi da shugaba Trump a makon da ya wuce, ya tambayi cewa shin ko cewa dan takarar shugabancin kasa da na jam'iyyar Democrat abokin adawarsa, zai iya da irin wannan tambayoyi na kawkwa", A cewar Walace.
"wannan mako, mun tuntubi kwamitin yakin neman zaben Joe Biden don yin hira ta musamman sai suka ce tsohon mataimakin shugaban kasa ba zai samu halarta ba."
Sannan ya kara da cewa, " Za mu ci gaba da tambayarsa a ko wane mako."

'Yan kwamitin yakin neman sake zaben shugaba Trump ya caccaki Biden har na tsawon watanni saboda gujewa taron gangamin yakin neman zabe da kuma tarukan 'yan jaridu a yayin da su, suka cigaba da yin hira da 'yan jaridu ana tsakiyar fama da annobar Koronabiarus.
Yayin da Biden a baya-bayan nan, ya koma na kashin baya, Trump shi da abokansa sun cigaba da yiwa tsohon mataimakin shugaban kasa zambo da cewa "ya buya" a gidansa na da ke can Delaware.

Sai dai Hakurin Biden na kin tararrukan jama'a babu wata illa ta ku zo ku gani da hakan ya yiwa farain jininsa, kamar yadda wani sakamakon jin ra'ayin jama 'a ya nuna cewa a tsanake Biden ya ba shugaba Trump tazaraa matain kasa baki daya da kuma wasu muhimman jihohi da suka zama filin daga.

Alkaluman sakamakon binciken da ke nuna farin jinin dan siyasa na ya nuna karara cewa Shugaba Trump yi kasa da maki 7 jihar Florida, a Pennsylvania ya yi kasa da maki 6.7, a Michigan 8.2, a kuma Wisconsin ya yi kasa da maki 6.4.
Trump da kyar ya ci wadannan jihohi hudu a shekarar 2016, ya karkata akalarsu daga launin shudi zuwa Ja, yayijn da ya ci zaben zuwa fadar White House.
Labaran gidan talbijin na Fox na baya-bayan nan ya ce Biden na kan gaba a Minnesto da MIchigan, da kuma Pennsylvania wandan da suka yi fintinkau.
Sakamakon zaben ya nuna cewa Biden yana kan gaba kadan a Ohio da North Carolina da Arizona kuma wasu muhimman jihohi guda uku da suka yi kunnen doki a wannan zagaye.
Haka kuma wani bincike ya nuna cewa a baya wasu jihohin 'yan gani kashenin jami'iyya mai launi ja kamar Texas da Georgia yanzu duk tarwatsu a tsakanin Trump da kuma tsohon mataimakin shugaban kasa.

A zaben shugaban kasar da shugaban kasa mai ci ke takara ta komawa karagar mulki a karo na biyu a fadar White House ana kallonsa a wani lokaci kamar wani ma'auni na farin jini shugaban ne,- haka kuma ake kallon wannan fafatawa a wannan zabe na shekarar 2020 tsakanin Trump da Biden.
Muhimman batutuwa sune cutar Koronabirus da kuma tattalin arzikin kasa wacce annobar ta yiwa mummunan illa da kuma irin matakin da shugaban ya dauka na magance su.
Biden campaign declines 'Fox News Sunday' interview, 1 week after Chris Wallace's Trump sitdown

During his interview with Chris Wallace last week, President Trump questioned whether the Democrats' presumptive presidential nominee, Joe Biden, could handle the barrage of questioning that Wallace posed to Trump.
The answer to that question - at least for now - we may never know.
Wallace on Sunday informed viewers that the Biden campaign told Fox News he was "not available" for an interview.
"In our interview last week with President Trump, he questioned whether his Democratic opponent, Joe Biden, could handle a similar encounter," Wallace said.
"This week, we asked the Biden campaign for an interview and they said the former vice president was not available."
He added, "We'll keep asking every week."
The Trump campaign has hit Biden for months for abstaining from holding rallies and news conferences while continuing to do interviews amid the coronavirus pandemic.
While Biden recently has returned to the stump, Trump and his allies continued to mock the former vice president for "hiding" in his home in Delaware.
Biden's reticence to do public events, however, has done little to hurt his candidacy as the latest polls had Biden comfortably ahead of Trump both nationally and in key battleground states.
Real Clear Politics averages indicated the president was down 7 points in Florida, 6.7 points in Pennsylvania, 8.2 points in Michigan and 6.4 points in Wisconsin.
Trump narrowly won all four states in 2016, flipping them from blue to red as he won the White House.
The latest Fox News Polls put Biden ahead in Minnesota, Michigan and Pennsylvania, with leads all outside the margin of error.
Polling also suggested Biden had a slight edge in Ohio, North Carolina and Arizona, three other important swing states this cycle.
And, surveys indicated that once reliably red states such as Texas and Georgia were all knotted up between Trump and the former vice president.

Presidential elections in which an incumbent is running for a second term in the White House are often a referendum on that president - and that's seen as being the case right now in the 2020 showdown between Trump and Biden.
The top issues have been the coronavirus and an economy flattened by the pandemic - and the president's performance and record on both issues.
Yan bindiga sun yi awon gaba da dalibai masu zana jarabawa a Kaduna.
Rahotanni daga jihar Kaduna a Najeriya sun ce ƴan bindiga sun farmaki wata makaranta tare da yin awon gaba da da dalibai 7 da malama guda baya da kashe wani magidanci.

Majiyar da ke sanar da batun ta ce da misalin karfe 8 na safiyar jiya litinin ne ƴan bindigar suka farmaki makarantar mai suna Prince Academy a kauyen Damba-Kasaya cikin karamar hukumar Chikun na jihar Kadunan lokacin da dalibai ƴan aji 3 ke gab da fara zana jarabawa.
Jaridun Najeriya sun ruwaito cewa daliban na cikin wadanda gwamnatin Najeriya ta yi umarnin su koma makarantu domin zana jarabawa.
Jaridun sun bayyana sunan malamar da ƴan bindigar suka yi garkuwa da ita a matsayin Christianah Madugu inda a bangare guda aka bayyana waɗanda ƴan bindigar suka kashe a matsayin Benjamin Auta.
Wani matashi Akila Barde da ke shaidawa manema labarai yadda lamarin ya wakana ya ce ƴan bindigar sun shiga kauyen ne haye a babura.
Bayanai sun ce ilahirin daliban shekarunsu ya fara daga 12 zuwa sama yayinda suka kunshi mata da maza.
Gunmen abduct students sitting for exams in Kaduna.
Reports from Kaduna State, Nigeria, say gunmen have attacked a school and abducted seven students, one female teacher and killing a man.

The source said the gunmen attacked Prince Academy in Damba-Kasaya village in Chikun Local Government Area of ​​Kaduna State yesterday Monday around 8am as the 3rd grade students were about to sit for their exams.
Nigerian newspapers have reported that the students are among those ordered by the Nigerian government to return to school to sit for the exams.
The newspapers named the teacher abducted by the gunmen as Christianah Madugu while on the other hand the man killed by the gunmen was identified as Benjamin Auta.
Akila Barde, a young man who told reporters how the incident took place, said the gunmen entered the village on motorcycles.
Records show that all students range in age from 12 years to above and they include both boys and girls.
Donald Trump ya bayyana cewa wani lokacin yana nadamar sunbatun da ya ke yi a shafinsa dandalin sada zumunta na Tuwita
Donald Trump ya bayyana cewa a wasu lokutan ya na nadamar irin sunbatun da ya ke yi da ke janyo cece-kuce a shafinsa na dandalin sada zumunta na Twita.

Shugaban na Amurka ya furta hakan ne a yayin da ya ke jawabi a wani shirin wasannin na Bartool a ranar Juma'a, Shugaban ya ce sakonnin da ya ke aikawa na rashin mafadi - wadanda cike har da na nuna goyon bayan fararen fata 'yan wariyar launin fata - su suka fi jefa shi cikin tsaka mai wuya.
Da wani dan jarida Dave Portnoy ya tambaye shi ko ya yi nadamar irin wadannan zantuka da ya ke sakawa a shafin nasa, sai Trump ya masa da cewa: "a wasu lokutan, a wasu lokutan a kai-akai.
Ba kamar a da ba, yadda za ka rubuta wasika bayan ka yi nazari sai ka cewa kanka wannan wasika ta girma matuka.
Sai bayan ka bar ta a kan teburinka idan ka sake komawa washe gari sai ka ce da kana "kai gaskiya gwanda da Allah Ya sa ban aika da ita ba," haka ne?
Amma yanzu hakan ba zai yiwu da wannan Tuwitar ba, haka ne?
Nan da nan mu ke sakinta, muna jin cewa mun yi abin kirki, sai kuma ka soma jin kiraye-kiraye a na tambata ka - "Anya kai ne ka fadi haka kuwa?"
Sai ni kuma in ce, " toh sai me in nine?" sai kuma wasu abubuwa su yi ta fitowa."

A watan da jiya, sai da Trump ya janyo cece-ku-ce bayan da ya sake aikawa da wani sako a shafinsa na Tuwita na wa ni hoton bidiyo da na magoya bayansa a wani kauye a jihar Florida tare da wasu tsofaffi mata da miji suna jinjina tare da ihun "Allah Ka daukaki farar fata!"
Haka kuma in shekarar 2017, Trump ya sake aikawa ta shafinsa na Twita, wani sako har guda uku wani sako na kin jinin Musulmai wacce Jayda Fransen, shugabar jam'iyar far-right fringe ta Biritaniya.
Shugaban ya fadawa Portnoy cewa wadannan sakonnin da ta sake aika su a shafinsa sun fi saka shi cikin rikici

Shugaba Trump ya ce: "yayin da ka ga wani abin da ya burgeka kuma ba ka bincike shi ba, ba ka kuma san manufar abin ba, ko kuma dawar garin ba, sai ka zuguguta shin, sai cibi ya zama kari, a wadansu lokuta- na gano cewa kusan a ma fi yawa a kowanne lokaci sakonnin da na sake aikawa daga wasu wuraren, su suke sa janyo min rigima."
Shugaban wani lokacin ya kan yada sakon da ya yabi kansa, ya saki baki kan abokan adawa da kuma zagin makarkashiya ga sama da mutane sama da miliyan 80 da ke bin shafinsa.
Trump yana mai cewa Tuwita ta taimaka masa wajen maganin abin da ya kira "labaran karya" rahotannin gidajen talbijin da shafukan Jaridu da ya ke ce suna cike ne da labarun karya.
Sai dai karerayin Shugaban a yawanacin lokuta a na nazarinsu ne, Dandalin na Tuwita kuwa a bisa hakan ya taimaka wajen yiwa shugaban tsirara a iria furucin nasa.
Donald Trump admits he often regrets his Twitter rants
Donald Trump has admitted he frequently regrets the incendiary posts he makes on Twitter.
Speaking to Barstool Sports Friday, the President of the United States admitted that his unchecked retweets - which have included pro-white supremacist material - get him in the most trouble.
Asked by journalist Dave Portnoy if he regretted his posts, Trump answered: "Often, too often.
It used to be in the old days before this, you'd write a letter and you'd say this letter is very big.
You put it on your desk and then you go back tomorrow and you say, "Oh, I'm glad I didn't send it," right?
But we don't do that with Twitter, right?
We put it out instantaneously, we feel great, and then you start getting phone calls - "Did you really say this?"
I say, "What's wrong with that?" and you find out a lot of things."

Last month, Trump sparked fury after retweeting (sharing content from another account) a video of his supporters in The Villages area of Florida, with the elderly pair filmed exclaiming "White power!"
And in 2017, Trump retweeted three anti-Muslim tweets posted by Jayda Fransen, leader of far-right fringe political party Britain First.
The president told Portnoy that the retweets that got him in the most trouble

Trump said: "You see something that looks good and you don't investigate it and you don't know what's on the helmet exactly, right, which is a miniature and you don't blow it up, it sometimes - I have found that almost always it's the retweets that get you in trouble."
The president often shares praise for himself, rants about his rivals and conspiracy theories with his 80 million Twitter followers.
Trump says Twitter helps him cut through so-called "fake news" reports on TV shows and newspapers he claims are riddled with falsehoods.
But the president's own lies have frequently come under the microscope, with Twitter now flagging up Trump tweets that are inaccurate.
Za A Yi Zaman Makokin Mutum 17 Da Suka Rasu A Hatsarin Mota A Zamfara - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
Gwamnatin jihar Zamfara ta ayyana zaman makoki na kwana uku sakamakon mutuwar wasu mutum 17 a hatsarin mota, kamar yadda rundunar ƴan sandan jihar ta tabbatar.
A jiya Laraba ne matasan suka yi wani mummunan hatsarin mota a kan hanyarsu ta zuwa tarbar gwamnan jihar bayan komawarsa daga Abuja.

Wani hadimin gwamnan a fannin yada labarai, Zailani Bappa ya shaida wa manema labarai cewa: A jiya Laraba bayan isowarmu da gwamnan, su wadannan matasa sun tarbe mu a garin Tsafe, to wucewar mu ke da wuya muna wajen Kwatarkwashi sai muka sami labarin cewa sun yi hatsari bayan barin mu wajen.
Mourning For 17 Dead In Car Accidents in Zamfara - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
The Zamfara State Government has declared three days of mourning over the death of 17 people in a car accident, the state police command has confirmed.
The youths were involved in a tragic car accident yesterday Wednesday, on their way to welcome the state governor on his return from Abuja.

The governor's media officer, Zailani Bappa, told reporters: Yesterday, Wednesday, when we arrived with the governor, we were being welcome by the youths in Tsafe, when we are at Kwatarkwashi we got the news that they had an accident not long after we left.
JARABAWAR SAKANDARE: Najeriya za ta yi amfani da sakamakon GCE madadin WASSCE a 2020.

Gwamnatin Tarayya ta bayyana cewa mai yiwuwa ta ce dalibai su rubuta jarabawar GCE a cikin watan Nuwamba, matsawar aka kasa kammala shirye-shiryen rubuta jarabawar WASSCE, ta Afrika ta Yamma cikin lokacin da aka tsaida.
GCE jarabawa ce ta daban, wadda ake rubutawa cikin watan Nuwamba kuma a fito da sakamakon ta cikin watan Disamba.
Karamin Ministan Harkokin Ilmi, Emeka Nwajuiba ne ya bayyana haka a taron manema labarai na mako bib-biyu a kan halin da ake ciki dangane da cutar Coronavirus a kasar nan.
Minista ya ce wannan canji ya zama tilas ganin cewa babu wani dalilin da zai sa a kara wa'adin lokacin rubuta jarabawar WASSCE.
PREMIUM TIMES ta bada labarin yadda gwamnatin tarayya ta bayyana fasa komawar dalibai makarantu, bayan da ta rigaya ta aza ranar komawa.
Sannan ta ce babu wata makarantar sakandare a Najeriya da za ta bude har dalibai su rubuta jarabawar WASSCE tsakanin 5 Ga Augusta zuwa 5 Ga Satumba.
An cimma wannan matsaya ce domin kauce wa yiwuwar kamuwa da cutar Coronavirus ga dalibai saboda cunkoso a dakunan rubuta jarabawa.
Sannan kuma Najeriya, Ghana, Sierra Leone, da Gambia su na kokarin shawo kan lamarin yiwuwar dage ranar fara jarabawar.
Minista ya ce ci gaba da fantsamar cutar Coronavirus bagatatan ya sa har yanzu jihohi ba su shirya komawar dalibai makarantu ba.
SECONDARY TEST: Nigeria will use GCE results instead of WASSCE in 2020.
The federal government has said it may ask students to sit for the GCE exam in November, if preparations for the West African WASSCE exam have failed to be completed by the deadline.
The GCE is a separate exam which is written in November and the results are released in December.
The Minister of State for Education, Emeka Nwajuiba, made the announcement at a two-weekly press conference on the situation of coronavirus in the country.
The minister said the change was necessary as there was no reason to extend the deadline for writing the WASSCE exam.
PREMIUM TIMES reports that the federal government has announced a cancellation of student's return to school, after setting a resumption.
And also said no secondary school in Nigeria would reopen that students will sat for the WASSCE exam between August 5 and September 5.
This step was taken to avoid the possibility of Coronavirus infection for students due to overcrowding in test rooms.
And also Nigeria, Ghana, Sierra Leone, and Gambia are also trying to resolve the possibility of postponing the exam.
The minister said the continued spread of coronavirus in the country meant that states were not yet ready to send students back to school.
MOPPAN Ta Jaddada Korar Rahama Sadau.
Hukumar Tace Finafinan Kano Ce Ta Dawo da Ita, In Ji Ƴan Fim Din.

Hadaddiyar Kungiyar Masu Shirya Finafinai a Kannywood, wato The Motion Picture Practitioners Association of Nigeria, wacce a ka fi sani da MOPPAN, ta sake jaddada matsayinta na korar daya daga cikin fitattun jaruman masana'antar finafinan Hausa, Rahama Sadau, bayan da wani ya ci zarafin Manzon Allah (SAW) sakamakon zargin sanya hoton tsiraici da jarumar ta yi a yayin da ya ke yi ma ta sharhi.

Idan dai za a iya tunawa, Jaruma Rahama Sadau ta fuskanci tsinuwa da alkaba'i daga al'ummar Musulmi da Hausawa har ma da abokan sana'arta da dama sakamakon sanya hoton da ya nuna gadon bayanta tsirara a Tiwita, lamarin da ya janyo a ka samu kace-nace tsakanin mabiya addinai daban-daban, bayan da wani mai sharhi, wanda a ke zargin ba Musulmi ba ne, ya ci zarafin Manzon Allah.

Hakan ya sanya a ka samu wani lakani mai taken "Assistant Allah", wanda a ke zargin ita jarumar ce ta fara ambaton kalmomin a kokarinta na nuna rashin jin dadinta da shagube kan yadda wasu su ka dame ta da suka bisa sanya hoton, su na masu nuna cewa, hakan ya saba da koyarwar addinin Musulunci, wanda shi ta ke bi.

Bayan da wanda a ke zargi da cin zarafin Manzo din ya yi sharhin nasa kuma hakan ya janyo wa hatta masu sana'ar shirin fim a Arewacin Nijeriya suka, sai uwar kungiyar ƴan fim din ta fito ta nesanta kanta da jarumar.

A sanarwar kungiyar daga Shugabanta na Kasa, Dr. Ahmad Sarari, mai dauke da sa hannun Jami'in Hulda da Jama'a na kungiyar, Al-Amin Ciroma, a jiya, ta yi tir da abinda Rahama ta yi, ta na mai cewa, da ma jarumar korarriya ce a kungiyar, illa dai kawai Hukumar Tace Finafinai ta Jihar Kano (KSCB) a karkashin jagorancin Isma'il Na'abba Afakallahu ce ta dawo da ita.
Kungiyar ta tunatar da cewa, tun a 2016 ta kori jarumar daga masana'antar bisa karya dokokin kungiyar na rashin ɗa'a bayan da ta fita a wata da Mawaki Classic su na rungumar juna.

Sanarwar ta ce, "Uwar kungiyar masana'antar ƴan fim a Arewacin Nijeriya, MOPPAN, wacce a ka kira da Kannywood, ta na mai nuna takaicinta bisa sanya hoton da fitacciyar jarumar, Rahama Sadau, ta yi a kafar sadarwar zamani", hoton da ke faman yaduwa a kafafen.
Hoton ya janwo suka mai yawan gaske, wanda har ya kai ga cin zarafin Manzon Allah Muhammad (SAW) a Tiwita da sauran kafafen sadarwa na zamani.
Wannan aika-aika abin tir da Allah wadai ne a wajen ƙungiyar ta MOPPAN.

Idan dai za a iya tunawa, kimanin shekaru hudu da su ka gabata, a ranar 2 ga Okotoba, 2016, uwar kungiyar ta kori Sadau daga masana'antar, amma bayan kusan shekara biyu Hukumar KSCB ta ce ta yafe ma ta, duk da kasancewar Kano ce babbar cibiyar shirya finafinan Hausa a duniya.
MOPPAN ta ce, "bayan shekara biyu da korar, sai Hukumar Tace Finafinai ta Jihar Kano (KSCB) ta hannun shugabanta, Malam Isma'il Na'Abba Afakkallah".

A ranar 8 ga Janairu, 2018, ƙungiyar ta yafe wa Rahama dukkan aika-aikar da a ke zargin ta da tafkawa, kuma ta ba ta damar sake tsomo kafa a Kannywood, matakin da Reshen MOPPAN na Jihar Kano ya kalubalanta a ranar 15 ga Janairu, 2018, karkashin jagorancin shugaban reshen, Malam Kabiru Maikaba.

Sanarwar ta cigaba da cewa, "bisa halin da a ke ciki a yanzu, MOPPAN ta na mai sake jaddada matsayinta tun na asali kan Rahama Sadau tare da kira ga dukkan kungiyoyin Kannywood da su tabbatar da aiki da umarnin".

Daga nan sai MOPPAN ta yi kira ga dukkan masu sana'a a Kannywood da sauran al'ummar Hausawa da ke gida da wajen kasar, da su ankara da cewa, tuni kungiyar ta nesanta kanta da Rahama Sadau da duk wata aika-aika da za ta iya tafkawa a yanzu ko nan gaba.
Mutane sun sake jin zafin yadda jarumar ta ki cire sakon nata da hotunan har sai bayan kusan kwanaki.

To, sai dai kuma bayan da abubuwa su ka yi zafi, jarumar ta cire kuma a jiya da rana ta fito a kafafen sadarwar zamani ta hanyar rubutu da hoton bidiyo ta na mai nesanta kanta da sharhin cin zarafin Annabi (SAW) da wancan mai sakon ya yi ma ta, duk da cewa, a na ganin Sadau ba ta fito karara ta amsa cewa, laifi ne sanya hoton tun farko ba.
MOPPAN has reiterates the expulsion Of Rahama Sadau.
She was brought back by the Kano Film Censorship Board, according to the filmmakers.

The Kannywood Motion Picture Practitioners Association of Nigeria, better known as MOPPAN, has reiterated its decision to expel one of the most iconic figures in the Hausa film industry, Rahama Sadau as a result of an insult against the Prophet by someone when the film star posted her bare all pictures and he commented.

It will be recalled that, the Actress Rahama Sadau has faced criticism from both Muslim and Hausa communities as well as many of her colleagues for posting a half-nude photos of herself on Twitter, an action that generated controversy and verbal fights between followers of different religions, after a commentator, allegedly a non-Muslim, insulted the holy Prophet.

The nickname "Assistant Allah", which is alleged to have been made by the actress, was the first to mention the words in an attempt to express her displeasure and sarcasm at the way she was harassed by others when she posted the picture. Those who say that this is contrary to the teachings of Islam, which she follows.

After the person that made the alleged derisive remarks on the Prophet made his comments, and it drew criticism from filmmakers in Northern Nigeria, the association of the filmmakers came out and distanced itself from the actress.

In a statement from the National Chairman, Dr. Ahmad Sarari, the organization's public relations officer, Al-Amin Ciroma, yesterday condemned Rahama's actions, saying she was a "disgraceful hero". She was just brought back by the Kano State Film Censorship Board (KSCB) under the leadership of Ismail Na'abba Afakallahu.

The association recalled that since 2016, the actress has been expelled from the industry for violating the association's code of conduct after she featured in a video song with a Musician named classic in an uncompromising dance moves.

The statement continued that, "The umbrella body of all the Northern Nigerian Film Industry Association, MOPPAN, also known as Kannywood, has expressed her displeasure over the posting of the photos by the actress Rahama Sadau on social media," which is trending in the media.
The image has drawn a lot of criticism, which has led to the insult on the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) on Twitter and other social media. Platforms.
This is a heinous crime and is condemned by MOPPAN.

It may be recalled that about four years ago, on October 2, 2016, the association expelled Sadau from the film industry, but almost two years later the KSCB said it had pardoned her, despite the fact that Kano is the largest Hausa film production center in the world.
MOPPAN says, "Two years after the expulsion, the Kano State Film Censorship Board (KSCB) through its chairman, Mallam Isma'il Na'Abba Afakkallah".

On January 8, 2018, the association pardoned Rahama for all alleged misconduct and allowed her to re-enter Kannywood, a move challenged by the Kano State MOPPAN Branch on January 15, 2018, under the leadership of the branch chair, Malam Kabiru Maikaba.
The statement added that, "Given the current situation, MOPPAN reaffirms its original position on Rahama Sadau and calls on all Kannywood organizations to abide by this decision and enforce it".

MOPPAN then called on all professionals in Kannywood and the Hausa community at home and abroad to be aware that the group has already distanced itself from Rahama Sadau and any wrongdoing she may do now or in the future.
People were once again pained that the film star has refused to remove her post and photos for days.

Well, but after things escalated, the film star removed the controversial photos and yesterday afternoon she appeared on social media with a text and video distancing herself from the insulative comments and the person that made it, although Sadau did not appear to answer that it was wrong to post the pictures in the first place.
Dan Evans ya doke Andrey Rubley a Tennis Open - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Dan wasan kasar Burtaniya na daya a gasar kwallon Tennis, Dan Evans ya samu nasarar zuwa wasan kusa da na karshe a gasar kwallon Tennis ta Western & Southern Open bayan ya doke dan wasa na 17 a Duniya, Andrey Rublev a gasar.
Dan Evens ya doke Rublev a gasar da ci 7-5 da 3-6 da kuma 6-2 wanda hakan ya ba shi damar zuwa wasan na kusa dana karshe.
Yayin fafatawar an tsaya hutu sau shida a wasan.
Kuma wannan ne karo na 12 da Dan Evens da ya buga wasa a birnin New York.
Dan Evans beat Andrey Rubley in Tennis Open Championship - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Britain's number one tennis player Dan Evans has advanced to the semi-finals of the Western & Southern Open tennis tournament after beating 17th World Player of the Year Andrey Rublev in the championship
Dan Evens beat Rublev 7-5, 3-6, 6-2 to advance to the semi-finals.
A short break was observed six times during the match.
And this is the 12th time Dan Evens has played in New York City.
Jamus: An rufe gidan gona saboda Corona.
Hukumomi a nan Jamus sun rufe wani gidan gona a kudancin kasar bayan da aka gano akalla ma'aikata masu girbin amfani gona su 174 sun kamu da cutar corona.
A halin da ake ciki an killace dukkan ma'aikata 480 har da manajan gidan gonan dake yankin Landau a jihar Bavaria inda ake kula da su don kare yaduwar cutar.
An kuma kara jami'an tsaro domin tabbatar da cewa ma'aikatan sun kasance a wurin da aka killace su.
Germany: A farm was closed because of the Corona.
Authorities here in Germany have closed a farm in the south of the country after at least 174 harvest workers were diagnosed with coronavirus.
Meanwhile, all 480 workers, including the manager of a farm in Landau, Bavaria, had been isolated and monitored to prevent the spread of the disease.
More security forces had been deployed to ensure the staff are in a confined space.
Ministocin kudancin Najeriya sun bukaci bincike kan zargin kisa a Lekki.

Ministocin Najeriya da suka fito daga yankin kudu maso yamma sun bukaci gudanar da bincike kan zargin da ake yiwa sojoji na harbi a hanyar Lekki lokacin zanga zangar adawa da zargin cin zarafin da ake yiwa jami'an Yan Sanda.
Ministan ayyuka da gidaje Babatunde Fashola ya bayyana haka a madadin ministocin da suka fito daga yankin bayan wani taro a fadar shugaban kasa.

Fashola ya ce bayan ziyarar yankunan su da su ka yi kamar yadda shugaban kasa ya bukata domin ganawa da jama'a sun amince da bukatar gudanar da binciken domin shaidawa al'ummar kasa gaskiyar abinda ya faru kan lamarin.

Ministan ya kuma ce sun bukaci karfafa rundunar ƴan sanda da jami'an ta wajen ganin sun sauke nauyin da ke kan su na kare lafiya da dukiyoyin jama'a ta hanyar kula da lafiyar su da kuma basu kayan aikin zamani.
Ministocin da suka fito daga yankin sun hada da Otunba Adeniyi Adebayo da Olamilekan Adegbite da Sunday Dare da Omotayo Alasoadura da Adeleke Mamora.
Southern Nigerian ministers have called for an investigation into alleged killings in Lekki.
Nigerian ministers from the southwest have called for an investigation into allegations that soldiers shot at Lekki Road during protests against alleged abuse of police officers.
Minister of Works and Housing Babatunde Fashola made the announcement on behalf of ministers from the region after a meeting at the presidential palace.

Fashola said after visiting their respective constituencies as requested by the president to meet with the public, they agreed to the need for an investigation to tell the public the truth about the incident.
He said they needed to strengthen the police force by discharging their responsibility to protect public property by taking care of their health and providing them with modern equipment.
Ministers from the region include Otunba Adeniyi Adebayo, Olamilekan Adegbite, Sunday Dare, Omotayo Alasoadura and Adeleke Mamora.
Bibiya Kan Mutunta Juna Tsakanin Ma'aurata-Kashi Na Daya-Nuwamba,05, 2020.
Batun cin zarafin iyali wani lamari ne da yake faruwa ta fannoni daban daban wanda kuma yake iya shafar namiji ko mace, babba ko yaro.
Galibin a tsakanin ma'aurata, mata sukan fi fuskantar wannan matsala yayinda tsakanin ƴaƴa agola suka fi samun kansu a cikin wannan halin.
A cikin ƴan shekarun nan an sami yanayi inda wadansu dalilai suka sa ko dai iyaye su gallazawa ƴaƴan cikinsu ko kuma ma'aurata su ci zarafin abokan zamansu.
A yau shirin Domin Iyali ya gayyato wasu masu sa ido da kuma kula da lamura domin neman mafita.

Bakin da shirin ya tattauna da su, su ne, Muhammad Hadi Musa mai ilimin halayyar dan adam kuma kwararre a fannin harkokin iyali, da Barrista Amina Umar Hussain sakatariyar kungiyar lauyoyi mata ta duniya reshen jihar Kano, da kuma Mal Abdulra'uf Magidanci kuma mai kula da lamura.
Follow up on the cordial relationship between married couples - Part One -November, 05, 2020.
Domestic violence is a multi-faceted issue that can affect a man or a woman, adult or child.
It happens between most couples, and women are more likely to have this problem while children from previous marriage are more likely to find themselves in this situation.
In recent years there have been cases in some circumstances which either parents abuse their children or spouses abuse their partners.
In the 'For the Family' program today we have invites some observers and social commentators in the for solutions.

The panelists included Muhammad Hadi Musa, an anthropologist and family expert, Barrista Amina Umar Hussain, Secretary of the Kano State International Women Lawyers Association, and Mal Abdulra'uf Magidanci, a lecturer and social commentator.
'Yan majalisa daga jam'iyyar masu ra'ayin rikau na zargin shugabannin kungiyoyin kwadago da cewa suna so ne ma'aikata da su 'zauna a gida hara abada'

'Yan jam'iyyar masu ra'ayin rikau a majalisar dokokin Brutaniya na zargin shugabannin kungiyoyin kwadago da son ma'aikata da su 'zauna a gida na hara abada' bayan sun bijirewa kiran Boris Johnson na cewa su koma bakin aikinsu

Shugabannin kwadagon a daren jiya an zargesu da cewa suna so ma'aikata so "zauna a gida na har abada" bayan da ma'aikatan suka yi kunnen uwar shegu da kiran da Boris Johnson yayi musu na ma'aikatan su koma bakin aikinsu.

'Yan Majalisara daga jam'iyyara 'yan mazan jiya sun mayar da maratani ne cikin fushi bayan da shugabannin kungiyar ma'aikatan kula da harkokin kasuwanci na jama'a suka umarci 'ya'yan kungiyar da su kalubalanci shugabanninsu a wurin aiki da suka umarce su da su dawo bakin aiki.

Tsohon Minista Andrew Percy na cewa "ba za mu amince da wannan ba" wannan bangare ba jama'a mai matukar muhimmanci da ke gudanar ayyuka kamar bayar da Fasfo na tafiye-tafiye a daina bayan ma'aikata kamfanoni masu zaman kansu na faman sahan wahalar ciyar da kasar gaba a lokacin da ake tsaka da fama da cutar Koronabirus.

"Ba zamu amince da rashin komawarsu bakin aiki ba a yayin da wuraren da ake rarraba abinci da kuma masana'antu na cigaba da aiki domin ciyar da ma'aikatan gwamnati a wannan a hali da ake ciki" yana mai cewa.

"Yawancin wadannan ma'aikata za kuka suce daga bayab suna bukatar su tafi hutu kuma ba za a basu ba saboda kin komawa bakin aikin da suka yi wanda kuma za su iya yin haka ba tare da jefa kansu cikin hadari ba.

" Shgabannin kwadago ba za su fito da wannan tsirfa ta a cigaba da zama a gida ba na har abada - ba dai a yanzu ba da musamman mu ka san cewa ma'aikata za su iaya komawa bakin aikinsu lafiya ba tare da fuskantara wani hadari ba."

Bayana kiran da Shugaba na Britaniya ya yi, Alex Chisholm ssabon shugaban ma'aikata na kasar a makon jiya ya fadawa duk ma'akatun gwamanati cewa "yanzu lokacin ne da za a sauya daga yadda aka saba na ma'aikata su rika aiki daga gida, su yi gaggawan komawa ofisoshinsu daga 1 watan Agusta."

Sai da kungiyar kwadagon ya ma'aikaytan da ke kula da kasuwanci da al'amura na jama'a ta fadawa 'ya'yanta da suka kai 200,000 da cewa su ba sua amince da wannan umarni ba, kungiyar na mai ikirarin cewa wanann batu ne na siyasa.

Wani mai magana da yawun PC, wata kungiyar kwadago ta ma'aikatan gwamanati wacce ita ce mafi girma a Britaniya na cewa, "wannan kira na a koma aiki a ofisoshi "bai yi la'akari da lafiyar 'ya 'yanmu ba" da kawara da su daga shiaga hadari da kuma taimakawa tattalin arzikin kasa.

Wannan kira an dora shi ne kacokan a kan matsin lamba na siyasa da 'a majalisa 'yan jam'iyyar masu ra'ayin rikau wadanda ke da bukatar ganin cewa sun yi amfani da ma'aikatan gwamnati a matsayin misali domin su sa kowa ya koma da ayyukansa ofis.
"shawararmu ga 'yan kungiya a bayyane ya ke: duk lokacin da ka ke aikinka daga gida kuma wani ya tunkare ka daga wurin aikinka da maganar cewa ka koma gida, kar ma ka saurare shi"

Wannan takaddama na zuwa ne yayin da ake tsaka damuwa mai karuwa kan jinkirin da ake samu na fasfon tafiye-tafiye sakamakon halin aiki daga gida da ake yi. Sama da mutane 400,000 ne da suka cika takardun neman fasfon ke jira a ba su.

Ma'aikatar da harkokin cikin gida ta kasar yanzu ta ce za ta san yadda "gaggauta" duba takardun neman fasfon daga 'yan asalinn kasar wadanda suke shirin yin tafiya a cikin kwanaki 14 kuma suna kan jira a duba bukatun nasu a ofishin bayar da fasfo din har tsawon sama da makwannni huɗu.

Kungiyar kwadagon ta PC ta yarda da cewa wasu mutanen sun mika bukatunsu na fasfo din har na tsawon kwanaki 143, amma kuma ta dage cewa "kananan ofisoshi da wasu lokutun ke fama da cikowa" na hana a nisantar juna kamar yadda ya kamata ga ma'aikatan ofishin su 4,000.

Wani tsohon minista a gwamnatin kasar David Davis ya yi kira ga shugabannin kungiyar kwadago da su yi rika "sara suna duba bakin gatari" tare da hada hannu da gwamnati don yin aiki tare don samo yadda za a gano hanyar da mutane za su koma bakin aikinsu.
Sannan ya kuma kara da cewa da ina cikin gwamnati, tambayar shugabannin 'yan kwadagon zai yi:"mecece shawararku? Na ku zauna [a gida] duk tsawon lokacin hunturu?"
Sai dai kiran da Mista Johnson ya yi na ma'aikata su koma ofisoshinsu bai sa wasu manya-manyan kamfanoni na kasar ta Brtianiya sun yi aiki da shi ba.
Wani nazari da aka yi na kamfanonin da suke da yawan ma'aikata 40,000 a tskaninsu an gano cewa ma'aikata 400,000 ne kawai suka koma bakin aikinsu.
Tory MPs accuse union chiefs of wanting civil servants to 'stay at home forever'
Tory MPs accuse union chiefs of wanting civil servants to 'stay at home forever' after defying Boris Johnson's call for them to get back into the office
Union chiefs were last night accused of wanting staff to "stay at home forever" after defying Boris Johnson's clarion call for workers to get back to the office.
Tory MPs reacted with anger after the Public and Commercial Services Union told their members to challenge bosses who ordered them back to their desks.

Former Minister Andrew Percy said it was "unacceptable" that vital public-sector work such as issuing passports was going undone while private employees had toiled to keep the country going during the coronavirus crisis.

"It's unacceptable for them to refuse to come back to work while people in distribution centres and factories around the country have continued to go to work to feed civil servants during this period," he said.
"Many of those workers would now like a holiday and can't have one because of this refusal to go back to work in offices which can be achieved safely.
"The union chiefs cannot have a policy of stay at home forever - especially not now that we know people can return to work safely."

Following the Prime Minister's call, Alex Chisholm, the Civil Service's new chief operating officer, last week told all ministries that it was time to "change the default that civil servants should work from home and accelerate the return to the workplace from August 1."
But the Public and Commercial Services Union told its 200,000 members they did not have to accept that guidance, claiming it was a political issue.
A spokesman for the PCS, Britain's largest civil service union, said the back-to-the-office demand "is not based on our members" health and safety, or on helping our economy.
It is based entirely on political pressure being exerted by some Tory MPs who are demanding that the Civil Service is used as an example to get everybody back to work.
"Our advice to members is clear: if you are working from home and you get approached by anyone in your department asking you to now go back to work, don't just accept that's what you have to do."
The dispute comes amid growing concerns over delays to passports caused by home-working, with more than 400,000 people now said to be waiting for their applications to be processed.
The Home Office has now said it will "seek to expedite" applications from Britons due to travel within the next 14 days and who have been waiting on the Passport Office for more than four weeks.

The PCS has admitted that some people are having to wait for as long as 143 days for passports but insists that "small and often cramped offices" make social distancing difficult for the Passport Office's 4,000 staff.
Former Cabinet Minister David Davis urged civil service union chiefs to "behave responsibly" and work with the Government to find way of getting people back to their workplaces.
He added that if he was in Government, he would be asking union leaders: "What are you suggesting? That you stay [at home] all summer?"
However, Mr Johnson's plea to get people back to their offices has also gone unheeded by some of Britain's top firms.
A study of big employers with a total of 400,000 staff between them found that only about 40,000 of them have returned to the workplace.
Labarin Yarima Harry: Abokin mai sarautar Duke ya mayar da martani mai zafi kan wasu ikirari masu ta da hankali game mai sarautar a wani sabon littafi

Mista Stott ya fadawa shirin labarai na gidan Talbijin na SKY cewa abin da ke cikin littafin game da yarima Harry da kuma Meghan Markle ba shi da wani banbancin da abin da ke cikin jaridun labaran karin gishiri.
Tsoho sojin ya yi kira da cewa kamata ya yi a mayar da hankali kan abubuwan alheri da ma'auratan ke yi wanda ya hada da ayyukan da su ke yi na taimakon al'umma.
Mista Stott ya na mai cewa: "ina ganin abin da mu ke karantawa a nan ba shi da banbanci da abin da mu ke karantawa a shafukan jaridun labaran karin gishiri da kawai a ka mayar da shi littafi."
"Akwai ra'ayin marubuci kan yadda ya ke kallon mutum a nan, wannan abin da ya rubuta babu tabbacin cewa daga garesu ya ke"
"Ni dai ina ganin wannan kawai wani sabon hari ne kamar yadda sauran jaridun masu labaran karin gishiri ke kokarin yanke hukunci a kan su."

"Na fahimci cewa hankalin jama'a yanzu ya na kansu kuma mutane su na so su ji abin da suke yi, amma da zan so a ce an mayar da hankali ne kan irin abubuwan alheri da suke yi da ayyukan taimakon jama'a, a maimakon wanni abin da ya shafi rayuwarsu ta kashin kansu"
"amma saboda kawai suna kan wannan matsayi shikenan ba za su tsira daga sa ido ba."

A ranar Asabar ne wani mai bibiyar tarihin gidan sarautan ya ke fadin cewa mai Yariman mai rike da sarautar Duke na Susssex da kuma matarsa da ke rakiyar Sarauniya, sun "shugaban" sauran 'ya'yan gidan sarautar.
Dakta Williams ta fadawa shirin labarai na gidan talbijin na Sky cewa 'ya 'yan gidan sarautar sun kasa cin gajiyar irin baiwar ta farin jinin Yarima Harry da Meghan Markle ke da shi.
Mai sharhi a kan al'amuran gidan sarauta ta kara da cewa gidana sarautar na da wani tsari na fifiko, amma hankalin jama'a dangane da abin da suke so ba za a iya yi masa shamaki ko dakile shi ba.

Ta kuma cigaba da cewa: "gaskiyar mangana shine duk abin da suka yi don tallafawa saraunniya sai hakan ya dankwafar da abubuwan da sauran 'ya 'yan gidan sarautar ke yi, hakan kuma sai a rika ganinsa a matsayin wata matsala."
"Suna da wannan gagarimin farin jini."
"Sun bikin aurenu na rufin asiri babu wata kasaiata kasa da sauran 'ya 'yan gidan sarautar da suke matsayi daya, Andrew yayi ksauataccen biki, Anne ta yi kasaitaccen biki a aurenta."

"Sun yi dan kwarya-kwaryar biki amma duk da haka irin yadda aka yayata bikin Harray da Meghan duk da cewa bai kai na sauran William da Kate kasaita ba, amma saboda sun dauki hankalin duniya sai ya samu yayatarwa da na sauran ya samu."
Prince Harry news: Duke of Sussex's friend lashes out at explosive claims in new book
Mr Stott told Sky News that Prince Harry and Meghan Markle that the content within the book was no different to that in tabloids other than it was in a hardback.
The former soldier called for more focus on the good the couple do including their charity work.
Mr Stott said: "I think what we are reading here is no different from what we have read in the tabloids it is now just on a hardback."
"You have got an author's persona, it is still not guaranteed that it has come from them."
"I just think it is another sort of attack like the tabloids trying to persecute them."
"I understand they are in the public eye and people wish to know what they are doing but I wish the focus was more on the good that they do and the charity work rather than their intimate privacies."
"But because of who they are they will never get away from that of course."
On Saturday a royal historian also stated that the Duke and Duchess of Sussex supporting the Queen "overshadowed" other members of the Royal Family.
Dr Kate Williams told Sky News that the Royal Family were unable to harness Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's star power.
The royal commentator added that the Royal Family has a strict hierarchy but that public interest cannot be directed or controlled.
She continued: "The fact is that whatever they did to support the Queen would often overshadow other members of the Royal Family and that was seen as a problem."
"They have this huge star power."
"They had a small wedding than most siblings in the same position, Andrew had a huge wedding, Anne had a huge wedding."
"They had a small wedding but still the coverage of Harry and Meghan's wedding even though it was smaller was still as big as William's and Kate's because there is a worldwide fascination with them."
Zulum ya kulla yarjejeniya da jami'ar Al-Azhar don ci gaban Barno.
Gwamnatin jihar Barno a Najeriya ta kulla yarjejeniya da wasu jami'oin kasar Masar domin bunkasa harkokin kiwon lafiya a Jahar da kuma horas da dilibai.

Yarjejeniyar ta samo asali yayin wata ziyarar da gwamnan jihar Farfesa Babagana Umaru Zulum ya kai birnin Alkahiran Masar, inda ya ziyarci kungiyar tsoffin daliban jami'ar Al-Azhar na duniya ranar Laraba.
Gwamna Zulum ya bukaci hadin gwiwa domin horar da malamai a manyan makarantun jihar Barno da masu wa'azi.
Gwamnan ya kuma bukaci bude Cibiyar Al-Azhar a Maiduguri shalkwatar jihar, wato sashin koyan harshen Larabci da kafa reshen kungiyar tsoffin daliban na Al-Azhar a jihar.

Zulum ya kuma ziyarci Jami'ar Ain Shams, ita ma a Alkahira, inda ya gana da Shugaban Jami'ar, kuma suka tattauna batutuwa da dama da suka ta'allaka kan hadin gwiwa tsakanin Jami'ar da jihar Borno a fannin nazarin likitanci, a kokarin sa na samar da asibitin koyarwa na Jami'ar jihar ta Borno.
Farfesa Babagana Zulum, ya tattauna kan yiwuwar tura daliban koyan aikin likita zuwa kasar Masar, domin kwasa-kwasan da za su bada damar kwarewa a fannoni daban-daban na kiwon lafiya.

Bayan taron ganawar, an zagaya da gwamnan sashin horar da aikin likitanci da na kimiyya na jami'ar, inda ya samu cikakken bayanai game da shirye-shiryen da aka gabatar, wanda Zulum ya gamsu da fatan karfafa shirinsa na inganta Jami'ar jihar ta Borno.
Zulum has signed an agreement with Al-Azhar University for the development of Borno.
Borno State government in Nigeria has signed an agreement with some Egyptian universities to improve health services in the state and train students.
The agreement was reached during a visit by the state governor, Prof. Babagana Umaru Zulum, to Cairo, Egypt, where he visited the Al-Azhar University Alumni Association on Wednesday.
Governor Zulum called for co-operation to train teachers in Borno State high schools and preachers.

The governor also called for the opening of the Al-Azhar Center in Maiduguri, the state capital, the Arabic language center, and the establishment of the branch of the Al-Azhar Alumni Association in the state.

Zulum also visited Ain Shams University, also in Cairo, where he met with the Chancellor of the University, and discussed a wide range of issues related to co operation with the University and Borno State in the areas of medical research. in its efforts to establish a teaching hospital of Borno State University.
Professor Babagana Zulum, discussed the possibility of sending medical students to Egypt, for courses that will provide expertise in various fields of health.

Following the meeting, the governor was given a tour of the medical and scientific training department of the university, where he was briefed on the programs presented, which Zulum was satisfied with and hoped to strengthen his plan to improve the State University. Borno.
An Kama Uba da dansa da tabar Heroin da darajarsu ta kai Rs 1.54 a Mizoram
Tabar Heroin, wacce darajarta ta kai Rs 1.55 a cikin kasuwar cikin gida, an yi sumoga dinta ne daga Myanmar: Cops
An kama wani mutum da dansa da tabar heroin mai nauyin kilogiram 1.9 a gundumar Hnahthial da ke Mizoram kusa da kan iyakar Myanmar, in ji ‘yan sanda ranar Lahadi.
Tabar ta heroin din, ta kai kimanin Rs 1.55 a kasuwar cikin gida, an shigo da ita ne daga Myanmar, in ji su.
'Yan sanda sun ce an kama Duhkima (62) da dansa Remthangpuia (33) tare da tabar a daren Juma'a daga kauyen Ngharchhip.
Jami'ai sun ce sun kuma yar da kimanin giram 280 na tabar, wanda ya kai Rs 15 dubu daria, yayin da suke iyo a cikin kogi yayin da suke kokarin tserewa daga 'yan sanda.
A cewar 'yan sanda, wannan kamun ta yi amannar cewa shine babbar wanda kuma ba a taba irinsa ba a kamen da ake yi a jihar.
Za a tuhumi wadanda ake zargin ne a karkashin sassan Dokar Abubuwan sa maye da kuma abubuwa masu gusar da hankali (NDPS) ta shekarar 1985.

Duk da cewa iyakokin tsakanin jihohin da wanda ke Myanmar sun kasance a kulle sakamakon barkewar annobar kwayar coronavirus, an ci gaba da shigo da muggan kwayoyi da sauran haramtattun kayayyaki ba kakkautawa, in ji majiyar ‘yan sanda.
A kwanan nan ne kungiyar tsaro ta Assam Riffles suka kama wasu manyan motoci guda 25 cike da goro, wadanda darajarsu ta kai Rs 4, ana fasa kwabrinsu daga Myanmar, in ji su.
Father-Son Arrested With Heroin Worth Rs 1.54 Crore In Mizoram
The heroin, worth around Rs 1.55 crore in the local market, was smuggled from Myanmar: Cops
A man and his son were arrested with 1.9 kg heroin in Mizoram's Hnahthial district near the Myanmar border, the police said on Sunday.
The heroin, worth around Rs 1.55 crore in the local market, was smuggled from Myanmar, they said.
Duhkima (62) and his son Remthangpuia (33) were arrested with the drugs on Friday night from Ngharchhip village, the police said.
They also dropped about Rs 280 grams of heroin, worth Rs 15 lakh, while swimming across a river as they tried to flee from the police, officials said.
According to police, the seizure was believed to be the biggest heroin haul in the state.
The accused were charged under the relevant sections of the Narcotic Drugs & Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act, 1985.
Even as the inter-state borders and the one with Myanmar remained sealed in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak, smuggling of drugs and other contrabands continued unabated, the police sources said.
The Assam Rifles recently seized 25 trucks loaded with betel nuts, valued at Rs 4 crore, being smuggled from Myanmar, they said.
Gwamnatin Najeriya ta ce "tsimin Madagascar" ba ya warkar da coronavirus.
Gwamnatin Najeriya ta ce babu alamun tsimin da aka karbo daga kasar Madagascar zai warkar da cutar coronavirus kamar yadda aka yi ikirari.

Ministan lafiya na kasar, Osagie Ehanire, ne ya sanar da haka, yana mai cewa cibiyar binciken magunguna ta kasar ta bayyana rahoton binciken da ta yi, inda ta ce maganin na Madagascar na da sinadaran da za su iya rage yawan tari ne amma ba waraka ce ga cutar Covid 19 ba.
A watan Afrilu ne shugaban kasar Madagascar Andry Rajoelina ya kaddamar da wannan tsimi, da ya yi ikirarin yana warkar da cutar coronavirus.
Hukumar lafiya ta duniya ta yi kashedi a kan shan maganin da Madagascar ta samar ba tare da sa idon likita ba.
Kasar Madagascar da ke tsibirin tekun India, ta baiwa kasashen Afrika wannan magani da ta ce yana kawo waraka ga cutar coronavirus.
A farkon wannan wata, Madagascar ta sake kakaba dokar takaita zirga zirga a yankin Analamanga sakamakon karuwar wadanda cutar coronavirus ta harba.
Ta kuma bude karin cibiyoyin jinyar cutar da ke ci gaba da yaduwa a sassan duniya.
The Nigerian government says the "Madagascar mixture" does not cure coronavirus.
The Nigerian government says there is no indication that a mixture imported from Madagascar will cure coronavirus infection as claimed.

The announcement was made by the country's Minister of Health, Osagie Ehanire, who said that the country's medical research center had released its research report, saying that Madagascar medicine contains ingredients that can reduce the incidence of cough but not a cure for Covid 19 disease.
Madagascar's President Andry Rajoelina unveiled the mixture in April, claiming it cures coronavirus.
The World Health Organization has warned against taking Madagascar-made drugs without medical supervision.
Madagascar, an island nation in the Indian Ocean, has given African countries the drug, which it says cures coronavirus.
Earlier this month, Madagascar re-imposed traffic restrictions in the Analamanga region due to an increase in coronavirus infections.
It has also opened more clinics that continue to spread in parts of the world.
Bikin Baje Kolin CIIE Ya Shaida Karfin Sin Na Ci Gaba Da Aiwatar Da Manufofin Ci Gaba.
Ga duk mai bibiyar kafofin watsa labarai, ba zai rasa ganin yadda aka bude bikin baje kolin hajojin da ake shigowa da su kasar Sin ko CIIE karo na uku a birnin Shanghai ba.

Idan mun lura da jawabin shugaban kasar Sin Xi Jinping, yayin bikin bude baje kolin, za mu iya lura da yadda ya bayyana sabbin matakai da kasarsa za ta aiwatar a fannin bude kofa ga kasashen waje daga dukkanin fannoni, a wani mataki na "A gudu tare a tsira tare".

Baya ga batun bude kofa, akwai sauran muhimman kudurorin raya kasa da mahukuntan na Sin suka ayyana aiwatarwa, ciki hadda ci gaba da kyautatawa yanayin zuba jarin waje a cikin kasar, da fannin cinikayyar hidimomi na kasa da kasa, da raya tattalin arziki ta amfani da fasahohin zamani na yanar gizo, da zurfafa sauye-sauye, da kirkire-kirkire a fannin cinikayya da zuba jari, da sakarwa kasuwa mara, da sai sauran su.
Idan mun lura da kyau, wannan bai je koli na CIIE ba, zai ba da wata dama ta tabbatarwa dukkanin duniya cewa, manufofin ci gaban tattalin arziki na kasar Sin ba za su sauya ba.
kuma tarin kalubale da kasar, da ma sauran sassan duniya ke fuskanta masu nasaba da yaki da cutar COVID-19, ba za su zamewa kasar Sin birki, na dakatar da ci gaban ta ba.

Hasali ma, mun ga yadda bikin na bana, ya samu karin mahalarta daga kamfanoni, masana'antu, "yan kasuwa da wakilan gwamnatoci, ciki hadda na nahiyar Afirka, wadanda suka jinjinawa kwazon Sin na rungumar kasashen duniya, a kokarin da ake yi na cimma nasara tare.

A jumlace, muna iya cewa, shawo kan cutar COVID-19 da kasar Sin ta yi, da kokarinta na tabbatar da ci gaban tattalin arziki a cikin gida, da yunkurinta na kara bude kofa ga waje, da gudanar da wannan baje koli na CIIE a wannan gaba da duniya ke fuskantar manyan kalubale, alamu ne da ke tabbatar da cewa, tana da karfin ikon ci gaba da aiwatar da manufofinta na ci gaba kamar yadda aka tsara.
CIIE Trade Exhibition Demonstrates China's Strength in Implementing Development Policy
For any media follower, he will not miss seeing the opening of the third China Import or Export Exhibition or CIIE in the city of Shanghai.

If we look at the speech of Chinese President Xi Jinping during the opening ceremony, we can see how he outlined the new steps his country will take in opening up to the outside world in all fields, in a step of "Run. together to survive together ".

In addition to opening up, there are other important development initiatives outlined by the Chinese authorities, including the improvement of the country's foreign investment environment, the international services trade, and the development of the economy through modern web technologies, deepening transformation, innovation in trade and investment, free marketplace marketing, and more.
If we look closely, this CIIE exhibition summit will provide an opportunity to assure the whole world that China's economic development policy will not change.
and the challenges facing the country, as well as other parts of the world in the fight against COVID-19, will not stop China from halting its development.

In fact, we have seen how this year's event attract more participants from companies, industries, "business people and government representatives, including from Africa, who have praised China's efforts to embrace the international community in its efforts to achieve success together.

In a nutshell, China's efforts to curb COVID-19, its efforts to ensure domestic economic growth, its efforts to open more doors to the outside world, and the conduct of the CIIE in This challenge facing the world is a testament to its ability to continue to pursue its development goals as planned.
Dogara ya gana da Buhari bayan komawarsa APC.
Tsohon Kakakin Majalisar Wakilan Najeriya, Yakubu Dogara ya koma Jam'iyyar APC mai mulki, yayin da ya gana shugaba Muhammadu Buhari a fadarsa da ke birnin Abuja.
Gwamnan Yobe kuma Shugaban Riko na Kwamitin Amintattun Jam'iyyar APC, Mai Mala Buni ya tabbatar da sauyin shekar Dogara a yayin zantawa da manema labarai a birnn Abuja.
Buni ya ce, kar ƴan Najeriya su yi mamakin sauyin shekar saboda tsohon shugaban Majalisar Wakilan, mamba ne na jam'iyyar APC, kuma a yanzu an magance dalilin da ya sa ya fice daga cikinta a can baya.
A ranar 29 ga watan Janairun 2019 ne, Dogara ya sanar da sauyin shekarsa zuwa PDP a hukumance.
Bayan komawarsa PDP ne, Dogara ya samu tikitin sake tsayawa takarar neman kuejrar majalisar wakilai, inda mutanen mazabar Bogoro da Dassa da Tafabalewa da ke jihar Bauchi suka sake zaben sa.
Dogara met with Buhari after his defection to the APC.
Former Speaker of the House of Representative in Nigeria, Yakubu Dogara has defected to the ruling APC party during a meeting with President Buhari at the Presidential Villa in Abuja.
The Governor of Yobe State and Acting Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC) Board of Trustees, Mai Mala Buni, confirmed the defection during a press conference in Abuja.

Buni said Nigerians should not be surprised by the defection because the former Speaker of the House of Representatives, a member of the All Progressives Congress (APC), has now been asked why he left the party in the past.
On January 29, 2019, Dogara officially announced his transition to the PDP.
After returning to the PDP, Dogara won a re-election bid for the House of Representatives, where he was re-elected by the people of Bogoro, Dassa and Tafabalewa constituencies in Bauchi State.
'Yar Majalisar Wakilai Val Demings ta yi magana kan takarar mataimakin shugabana kasa, ta kuma caccaki Trunp kan batun gafartawa masu laifi

'Yar majalisar Wakilai Val Demings (Gundumar Florida) ba ta yi kasa a gwiwa ba wajen nuna aniyarta ta zama 'yar takarar neman kujerar mataimakiyar Shugaban kasa a karkashin Joe Biden, ta kuma tsaya tsayin daka na neman hakan.

A wata hira da a ka yi da BlackPressUSA a cikin wani kamfe da ta ke yi da ta yiwa lakabi da #FIYAH! A wani jerin bayanai na kai-tsaye, fitacciyar 'yar majalisar kuma 'yar kungiyar 'yan majalisa bakar fata, ta bayyana tarihin rayuwarta da kuma ayyukanta da ta yi na sadaukarwa da suka kawo ta wannan matsayi, tana mai cewa "duk kun san tarihi na". Ni ubana mai aikin share-share da goge-goge ne uwata kuma aikin boyi-boyi ta ke yi a Jacksonville da ke Florida."
Demings na daya daga cikin 'yan kwamitin mutum bakwai na majalisar dattawa a Janairu kan batun tsige Donald Trump.
Duk da cewa Majalisar Dattawa ta wanke shi, tarihi ba zai taba mantawa da cewa shugaban na Amurka shine na hudu a jerin wadanda aka yi yunkurin tsigewa ba.

Tsohuwar shugabar kwamitin tsige shugaban kasa, a wata hira da ta yi da NPR a ofishinta na Capitol Hill a watan Fabarairu na cewa, "shin kwalliya ta biya kudin sabulu kuwa? " A kowacce rana kwalliya na biyan kudin sabulu"
Bugu da kari, duk da cewa sakamakon ba yadda aka so ba ne, 'yan jam'iyyar Democrats na da damar da bin kadin batun ba tare da la'akari sakamakon ba.

A yayin hirar da ita, Demings ta fito karara ta bayyana cewa ba ta goyon bayan matakin da Shugaba Trump ya dauka na canzawa Roger Stone hukuncin da kotu ta yi na yin karya a gaban majalisar dattawa (cikin daya daga sauran shaidar zur da ya yi) da kuma yafewa sauran wadanda suka aikata laifin tare, sannan ta ci gaba da cewa, "wannan tsaurin ido da rashin hankali na yafewa abokanka, wadanda suka yi karya suka kuma yi shaidar zur don kawai su yi rufa-rufar barnar da ka ke yi."

Demings ce ke kan gaba a jerin wadanda Biden dauka a matsayin abokiyar takararsa, sauran sune shugaban CBC Kren Bass (Gundumar Califnia), tsohon dan majalisa mai wakiltar Geogia, Stacey Admas,Sanata Kamarla Harris (gudumar Califonia) da kuma Tammya Duckworth (gundumar Illinios), da Magajin garin AtlantaKeisha Lance Bottms, da tsohon jakadan Amurka Ambasada Susan Rice da kuma arin wasu mutanen.
Daga karshe ta na mai cewa, duk dai mutum daya ne kadai zai zartar da wanda zai marawa Joe Biden baya a wannan takara.
Wannan mutumun kuwa shine Joe Biden
Sannna, tana dariya sai ta kai hannunta zuwa bakinta cikin raha wai tana rada, ga maus kallon hira kai-tsaye, tana mai cewa "idan kun ga za ku kira shi don kamun kafa... sai ku yi"
Babu makawa dai, ko ma ina mutum ya karkata a siyasa, tarihi ba zai manta da wannan lokaci ba a matsayin wani yanayi na sauyi a siyasar Amurka da kuma fahimtar inda aka sa gaba.
Ana ganin tasirin hakan a kan Demnings.

Ta ce samun mata da yawa su firo takarar Mataimakin dan takarar shugaban kasa na nuni ne ga cewa wata dama ce ta kunno kai don ratsa shigen da ya rage - musamman kan batun mata Amurkawa 'yan asalin Africa.

" wadannan su ne damarmakin da na dade ina hari a rayuwata, watau in samar da wata dama ga matasa maza da mata wadanda a ka dade ana fada musu cewa ba irin launin fatar ikin da ake bukata ba ne, ko ba ku da kudi, ko kuma ku ba irin jinsin da ake so bane." tana mai cewa.

'yar majalisar ta yi alkawarin cewa za ta tabbatar da cewa 'yan kwamitin Jam'iyyar Democrat na kasa da kuma kwamitin yakin nema zaben Biden su yayata sun kuma amince da su yi aiki da kungiyar 'yan jarida bakar fata ta Amurka don ta yadda za a samu mutne da yawa su fita su kada kuri'arsu.
"Zan kirra ta wayar tarho ga [Shugaban kwamintin jami'yya] Tom Perez kuma ba wannan muhimmanci matuka," Demings ta alkawari.
Ta kuma yarda da cewa wannan wani abu ne da ya kamata a yi shi yanzu, a maimakon a a bari sai zuwa wani lokaci tsakiyar yakin neman zabe.

A martaninta ga tsohurwar sakatariyar kula da harkokin kasar waje Hillary Clinton cikin wata shawara da ta bayar da cewa, Trump zai iya kin barin fadar gwamnati na Whte House idan ya sha kaye a zabe, haka kuma a wani sharhi jaridar ba ke cewa Shugaban kasa na dabarun yadda zai yafewa kansa, Demings ta harzuka tana mai cewa" "a ma yi tunaninncewa zai gafartawa kansa, hakan ya sa ni tsanarsa matuka"
"Amma in ban da Trump, waye zai taba tunanin yin hakan?
Ina tunanin dai yana aikin ne kamar an sa shi tilas.
Domin wannan ba aikin da za a sa maka ido kawai ka rika karya doka yadda ka ga dama, ka kuma yi watsi da tsarin mulki.
Ina ganin dai dan dole ya ke aikin nan, amma ba ya son ya fadi zabe.
Daga dukkannin alamu wannan shugabana kasa ba ya so barin fadar White House, amma mun san yadda za mu yi maganinsa, ina ma za a sani a cikin 'yan kwaitin da za su yi haka"
Rep. Val Demings talks VP candidacy, blasts Trump for pardons

Congresswoman Val Demings (D-Fla.) was not shy about her willingness to serve as vice president under a potential Joe Biden administration as well as her sincere appreciation for being considered for the role.

In a live interview with BlackPressUSA as part of its #FIYAH! Live series, the esteemed member of the Congressional Black Caucus shared her history and the work ethic and commitment that has brought her to this point, stating, "You all know my history. I grew up the daughter of a maid and a janitor in Jacksonville, Florida."
Demings served as one of seven House Impeachment Managers during the January trial of President Donald Trump in the Senate.
Regardless of the Senate acquittal, history will forever note that he is the fourth commander-in-chief to be impeached.
The former House Impeachment Manager, replied in a February interview with NPR from her Capitol Hill office, "Was it worth it? Every day it has been worth it."
Adding, while the verdict was disappointing, Democrats had an obligation to pursue the case regardless of outcome.

During the interview, Demings made it clear that she objects to Trump commuting the prison sentence of Roger Stone, who was convicted of lying to Congress (among other felonies) as well as his pardoning of other felons convicted of similar crimes, stating, "The gall of pardoning your friends, those who lied and cheated to cover up for your wrongdoings."

Demings heads Biden's list of potential running mates along with CBC Chair Karen Bass (D-Calif.), former Georgia State Rep. Stacey Abrams, Sens. Kamala Harris (D-Calif.) and Tammy Duckworth (D-Illinois), Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms, former U.S. Ambassador Susan Rice and a few others.
She noted however, that just one person will decide who will run alongside Joe Biden this fall.
"That's Joe Biden."
Then, while laughing, she raised her hand to her lips in a mock whisper to those viewing the livestream, adding, "If y'all want to make a call... go ahead."
There's no doubt that regardless of one's political leanings, history will look back on this period as a season of evolution in American politics and perceptions.
This fact was not lost on Demings.

She noted that having so any women in consideration for vice presidential candidacy represents an opportunity to break through what remains of the glass ceiling - particularly when it comes to African American women.

"These are the exact opportunities that I work hard for all of my life to create for young boys and girls who may have been told they're the wrong color, don't have enough money, or are the wrong gender," she said.
The congresswoman pledged to make sure that the Democratic National Committee and the Biden campaign advertise and to work with the Black Press of America to get as many as possible out to vote.
"I will make a call to [DNC Head] Tom Perez and I will put this on the top of my list," Demings promised.
She agreed it should be done now, rather than later in the campaign.

Responding to former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's suggestion that Trump might refuse to leave the White House if defeated, and a separate editorial stating that the president is positioning to pardon himself, Demings became animated, "To even suggest pardoning himself made me sick to my stomach."
"But who would ever do that other than Trump?
I think he hates the job.
It's not a job where you should be allowed to break the law and ignore the Constitution.
I think he hates the job, but he hates to lose.
I can see this president not wanting to leave the White House, but we have a way of taking care of that, and if that happens, I just want to be on the team that makes it happen."
Gwamnatin Kwara da gidauniyar Dangote za su tallafawa mata 15,000 a jihar.
Gwamnatin jihar Kwara tare da hadin gwiwar gidauniyar Dangote za su raba wa mata 15,000 naira miliyan 150 tallafi domin su fara sana'a a kauyukan jihar.
Mai taimakawa gwamnan jihar AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq kan harkokin inganta al'umma Kayode Oyin-Zubair ya sanar da haka a garin Ilorin ranar Talata.
Oyin-Zubair ya ce za a baiwa kowace mace Naira 10,000 kafin karshen shekarar 2020.
Ya ce gwamnati ta yi haka ne domin inganta rayuwar mazauna karkara domin rage yawan cinkoson mutane a birane suma a can su kama sana'a ba sai sun yi tururuwa zuwa cikin birane ba.
Bayan haka gwamnati za ta hada hannu da hukumar "Forestry Research Institute of Nigeria (FRIN) " domin samar wa mata irin kalwa domin suma a rika fafatawa da su wajen noma.
Ya ce gwamnati za ta shirya da gwamnatin kasar Kenya domin yin kasuwancin kalwan a kasuwannin kasar da wasu kasashe.

A ranar 28 ga Oktoba PREMIUM TIMES ta buga labarin cewa gwamnatin Tarayya ta ba matan karkara 2,800 agajin kudi N20,000 kowaccen su a Jihar Zamfara a Shirin Bada Tallafin Kudi ga Matan Karkara, wato "Grant Project for Rural Women".

Ministar Harkokin Jinkai, Agaji da Inganta Rayuwa, Hajiya Sadiya Umar Farouq, ta sanar da haka tana mai cewa rabon kudin wani ɓangare ne na kokarin da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya ke yi na cika alkawarin gwamnatin sa na magance matsalolin rayuwar jama'a.
The Kwara government and Dangote Foundation will support 15,000 women in the state.
The Kwara State Government in collaboration with the Dangote Foundation will provide N15,000 women 150 million to start business in the rural areas of the state.
The Deputy Governor of the state AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq on community development Kayode Oyin-Zubair made the announcement in Ilorin on Tuesday.
Oyin-Zubair said each woman would be given N10,000 by the end of 2020.

He said the government was doing this to improve the living conditions of the rural people in order to reduce the congestion in the cities as well as to engage in business instead of flocking to the cities.
The government will then work with the Forestry Research Institute of Nigeria (FRIN) to provide women with the skills to compete in agriculture.
He said the government would work with the Kenyan government to trade kalwan in the country's and other markets.
On October 28, PREMIUM TIMES reported that the Federal Government had provided N20,000 in grants to 2,800 rural women each in Zamfara State through the Grant Project for Rural Women.

The Minister of Welfare, Relief and Livelihood Development, Hajiya Sadiya Umar Farouq, made the announcement, saying the allocation was part of President Muhammadu Buhari's efforts to deliver on his government's promise to address the plight of the people.
Jihohin da suke iƙirarin ƙirƙiro da ƴan sandan jihohi basa iya albashi - Buhari - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Fadar shugaban ƙasa ta ce da yawa daga cikin jihohin da ke iƙirarin neman basu damar ƙirƙiro da ƴan sandan jihohi ba sa ma iya biyan albashi na ma'aikatan da su ke da shi a wannan lokaci.
Babban mataimaki na musamman ga shugaban ƙasa kan harkokin yaƙa labarai Garba Shehu ne ya bayyana haka yayin zantawa da gidan talabijin na Channels.
Malam Garba Shehu ya ce ya kan yi mamaki idan ya ji jihohin da ma'aikatansu ke binsu tarin albashi na watanni masu yawa amma suna ƙorafin cewa sai an basu dama sun samar da ƴan sanda.
Yace gwamnatin tarayya tana iya ƙoƙarinta wajen ganin ta daƙile ayyukan ɓatagari a kowane sassa na ƙasar nan.
Malam Garba Shehu ya kuma ce wannan dalili ne ya sanya gwamnati ta ke ƙoƙarin ganin an samar da ƴan sandan al'umma wanda zai taimaka gaya wajen magance matsalolin tsaro.
States claiming to create state police cannot pay salary - Buhari - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
The presidency says many of the states that claim to be denied access to state police are not even able to pay the salaries of their current staff.
The Special Assistant to the President on Media, Garba Shehu, made this known in an interview with a TV station, Channels.
Malam Garba Shehu said he was surprised to hear that states whose workers were owed salaries for several months but complained that they were not allowed to form the police.
He said the federal government was doing anything possible to curb illegal activities in all parts of the country.
Malam Garba Shehu also said that this was the reason why the government was trying to create a community police force that would help address security concerns.
Kotu ta dage sauraran karar Abba Kabir kan zargin Ganduje da saida kadarorin gwamnati.

Babbar kotu a jihar Kano ta dage ci gaba da saurarar karar da dan takarar gwamnan jihar Kano Abba Kabir Yusuf ya shigar ya na kalubalantar gwamnan Kano Abdullaji Umar Ganduje kan sayar da wasu daga cikin kadarorin gwamnati.
Wakilin Yusuf Nadabo Isam'il ya ruwaito cewa, A yayin zaman kotun na yau, mai shari'a Nura Sagir ya dage saurar karar, har zuwa ranar 29 ga watan Oktobar shekarar da muke ciki.
Lauyan Abba Kabir Yusuf, wato Bashir Yusuf Tudun Wuzirici ya ce matakin da gwamnan jihar Kano ya dauka na saida kadarorin gwamnatin ya sabawa dokar tasarafi da filaye ta jihar Kano.
Yayin da lauyan gwamnatin Kwmishinan shari'ar Barrista Musa Abdullahi Lawal ya ce korafin bashi da tushe ballantana makama.
The court adjourned the hearing of Abba Kabir's case against Ganduje for allegedly selling government assets.

The Kano State High Court has adjourned the hearing of a case filed by Kano State governorship candidate Abba Kabir Yusuf challenging Kano State Governor Abdullaji Umar Ganduje's sale of some government assets.
