Yusuf Nadabo Isam'il's lawyer reported that during today's hearing, Judge Nura Sagir adjourned the case to October 29 this year.
Abba Kabir Yusuf's lawyer, Bashir Yusuf Tudun Wuzirici, said the decision by the Kano State governor to sell government assets was against the Kano State Property Management Act.
Barrista Musa Abdullahi Lawal, a lawyer for the state commissioner of justice, said the complaint was baseless.
Kungiyar yaki da yunwa ta fatattaki Yoho bayan lamarin da ya faru a Capitol

WASHINGTON (AP) - Wata kungiya Kiristoci marasa nuna bangaranci da ke kokarin kawo karshen yunwa ta ce a ranar Asabar, ta nema ta kuma karbi takardar barin aikin dan majalisa Ted Yoho daga hukumar daraktocinsa bayan wani abin da ta kira "zagin cin mutunci" da ya yiwa 'yar majalisa Alexandria Ocasio -Cortez.

Ocasio - Cortez, daga gundumar New York, ta zargi Yohi mai wakiltar Florida a majalisar, da amfani da kakkausar kalamai da kuma na isakanci na batanci a gareta a yayin da suke cece-ku-ce a ranar Litinin da ta gabata a kan matakalar zuwa zauren majalisar na Capitol.
Yoho ya musanta yin amafani da kalaman da ta fada, duk da cewa wani dan jarida wanda aka yi abin a gabansa ya tabbatar da cewa ya yi amfani da mummunan kalamai kamar yadda ta bayyana.

A sanarwar da ta fitar, Kungiyar burodi ga duniya ta ce hukumar daraktocinta sun gana a ranar Juma'a da Yoho sun kuma bukaci da ya mika takardarsa ta barin kujerar hukumar "domin wannan ya zama mataki da ke dada tabbatar da aniyarmu ta tafiya mata tare da kuma duk wasu al'umma na launin fata, da kasa daban-daban yayin da suke kokarin jagorantarmu zuwa samun yanayi na duniya daya alumma daya."
A shafin kungiyar na yanar gizo, kungiyar ta ciyar da burodi ga duniya ta ce " hadaddiyar muryar kiristoci" mai zawarcin majalisa da kuma gwamnati kan yaki da yunwa a kasa da kuma duniya baki daya.

"kungiyar kiristoci mai goyon bayan jam'iyyun siyasa da ta mayar da hankali wajen yadda za a kawo karshen yunwa da talauci ta hanyar ingantaccen tsare-tsaren da manufofin jama'a, kungiyar da na mutunta akidu da mutumta, gami da tausayi irin wanda Yesu ya yi kira gare mu da mu yi a yayin da muke tattaunawa da masu rike da ragamar mulki daga kowacce jam'iyya", Sanarwa ta ce.

"Mun yi amanna da cewa abin da danmajalisa Ted Yoho ya aikata da kuma kalamansa kamar yadda aka bayar da rahoto a kafofin yada labarai, ba sa nuni da kima da kuma da'ar da muke so 'ya 'yan wannan hukumar Daraktoci su nuna."
Mai magana da yawun Yoho bai ce komai ba da aka bukaci jin ta bakinsa ta email.

A wani jawabi na ban mamaki a ranar Alhamin a majalisa, Ocsio-Cartez da ta bayar da bayanin abin da ya faru a cikin wani lamari na ban mamaki tare da fadada da a bayanan nata na irin cin zarafi da abin da kira fifikon jinsi na dabi'a "da tursasa mata karbar zalunci da bakaken kalaman zalunci ga mata"
'Yan uwanta 'ya majalisa sama da sha biyu ne suka goya mata baya wajen yin Allah wadai da kuma cewa wannan bisa yawancin halayya ce ta kusan kowanne namiji.
Yoho ya bayyana abin da ya faru da cewa wata 'yar tattaunawa ce kan manufofi sannan ya kuma kara da cewa "babu wani wanda aka yiwa barazana, ko ciwa mutunci ko kai wa hari."
Ya kuma yi nadamar nuna "saurin fushinsa."
Ocasio-Cortez 'yar shekara 30 sabuwar shiga majalisa mai ra'ayin 'yan gaba dai-gaba dai wacce ta samu yabo da kuma suka saboda fito-na fiton da ta ke yi.
Yoho dan shakara 65 na daya daga cikin mafi ra'ayin rikau a majalisar, yana dab da yin ritaya a karshen wa'adin zamansa na majalisa karo na hudu.
Hunger organization pushes out Yoho after Capitol incident

WASHINGTON (AP) - A nonpartisan Christian organization that seeks to end hunger said Saturday it asked for and received the resignation of Rep. Ted Yoho from its board of directors following what it called his "verbal attack" on Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., accused Yoho, R-Fla., of using a vulgar and sexist insult while upbraiding her during a confrontation last Monday on the steps of the Capitol.
Yoho maintained he did not use the words cited, though a reporter who witnessed the incident confirmed the language as she described it.

In a statement, Bread for the World said its board met Friday with Yoho and sought his resignation "as an action that reaffirms our commitment to coming alongside women and people of color, nationally and globally, as they continue to lead us to a more racially inclusive and equitable world."
On its website, Bread for the World says its "collective Christian voice" lobbies Congress and the administration on ending hunger nationally and worldwide.

"As a bipartisan Christian organization committed to alleviating hunger and poverty through sound public policies, Bread for the World upholds the values of respect, dignity, and compassion that Jesus calls us to when engaging decision makers from across the political spectrum," the statement said.
"We believe that Rep. Ted Yoho's recent actions and words as reported in the media are not reflective of the ethical standards expected of members of our Board of Directors."
A spokesman for Yoho did not immediately respond to an email seeking comment.

In an extraordinary speech Thursday in the House, Ocasio-Cortez offered a dramatic account of the incident and broadened her remarks to assail what she called a sexist culture of "accepting violence and violent language against women."
More than a dozen colleagues joined her in casting the incident as all-too-common male behavior.
Yoho has described the encounter as a brief policy discussion and said that "no one was accosted, bullied, or attacked."
He expressed regret for his "abrupt manner."
Ocasio-Cortez, 30, is a freshman progressive who has gained praise and criticism for her outspokenness.
Yoho, 65, one of the most conservative members of the House, is retiring at the end of his fourth term.
Wani jami'in hukiumar kashe gobara ta birnin New York FDNY, ya ce'babu makawa' daidai ne a cire ma'aikacin kashe gobara farar fata daga faretin gabatar da laumin hukumar

Jami'an kula da banbancin na hukumar kasha gobara ta birnin New York FDNY ya ce tabbas hakkan daidaine a cire mai aikin kashe gobara farar fata daga faretin bikin gabatar da launukan hukumar don kawai a bar bakaken fata zalla ma'aikata don gudabar da faretin, a cewar wani sabon rahoto.

A wani ma'aikacin kashe gobara farar fata mai suna Laftanar Daniel Mc Williams ya shigar da kara a kotu a inda ya kalubalanatar wannan nunin wariyar launin fata bayan an cire shi daga bikin faretin tutocin hukumar a watan Nuwamba shekarar 2017 a wani bikin na tunawa da wadanda suka rasa ransu 'yan kungiyar Vulcan ta 'yan kashe gabara bakar fata zalla.

Hakan kuma jami'in kula da banbance-banbance da samar da daidaito, kuma lauya Cecila Loving, ta kare wannan mataki da a wata shari'ar da a ke yi a bangarren kula da hakkin bil adama na yankin jiha a birnin New York, a a wani rahoton da jaridar New York Post ta yi.

Mc Williams na daya daga cikin masu aikin kashe gobara uku a FDNY a wani hoto na tarihi da suke rike da tutar Amurka a inda so dogayen binayen nan suka ruguje bayan harin ta'addanci da ka kai na 9/11.

A cewar takaradar koken da Mc Willaims ya shigar, ya ce ya na daga cikin wadanda bangaren sshiryta bukukuwa na hukumar kashe gibara ta FDNY ta zaba da za su rike tita a bikin faretin gabatar da launukanta a bikin tunawa da wadanda su ka mutu.
Kasancewa daya daga cikin wadanda ke rike da tuta a wurin bikin 'bakaramin abin alfahari ba ne' ga Mc Williams, a cikin karar da ya shigar, kamar yadda gidan talbijin na CNN ta ba da labari.

A lokacin da ya zo wurin bikin, Sai a ka hana Mc Willaims shiga bikin faretin gabatar da launuka wanda tsohon shugaban Vulcan din Regina Wilson ta yi, saboda ta bukaci bakaken fata ne zalla su kasance masu dauke da tutocin a faretin tunawa da wadanda suka mutu din.
Sannan sai ta tambayi McWilliams dan shekara 29 da haihuwa tsohom ma'aikacin FDNY da je ya taimaka mata wani aikin da daban.'
Cikina ayyukan da ta ya ce ta sa shi shine matsara da farar huka daga in da suke a wurin bikin da kuma shirya 'yan uwansa maus damara da cikin tsarin da ya dace kuma a nrsa daga wurin bikin.
MC Willams ya kuma e a cikin takaradar karara da ya shigar aya akotu ya tambaye ta ko ceacire shin da aka yi daga cikin maus fareti na da alaka da kasancerwarsa shi baki ne.
Jami'ar ta amsa da cewa Eh, haka ne. A cewar sa.

Wani mai suna Wilson dan shekara 21 da haihuwa kuma mai aikin kashe gobara wanda shi ma da shi aka fafafata a ceton masifar da ta faru na 9/11, shi ya samar da wanda ya canji Mc wiliams daga cikin 'ya 'yan kungiyar sauran mazan jiya na Vulcan.

Mc Willams ya kuma ce ta bar wurin bikin ne saboda ya kasa jure wannan wulkancin da cin zarafi da kum cin mutunci' Saboda duk sa-in-sar da suka yi a wurin 'yan uwa da sauran abokan aiki duk suna ji, arahoton JaridarNew York Daily News.

A yayin zamana sauraron karar, Lauyar wanda ya shigarv kara Mc Willaims Keith Sullivan, ta tambayi Lovin - shin wanene bakar fata - don haka shin bukatar da a yi fareti da bakaken fata zalla ba nuna wariya ba ne?'
'A'a ba haka ba ne, Lovon ta ce, a wani rahoto na jaridar New York Post.
Sullivan ta kuma tambayi Loving shin ko yayi daidai da a samar da farenti na bakaken fata zalla bukatar da ta ce 'kwarai da aniya'

A cikin bayaninta, Loving ta ce ba laifi bane a sauya farara fata da bakar fata don kawai a fito da martabar banbance-bancenmu da kuma harsunanmu na asali don kawai a samar da yarda da junma da kawaciyara hankali da kuma taimakon juna a unguwanninmu'
Mc Williams ya dai shigar da kokensa ne kan nuna wariyar da aka yi masa a FDNY ne a cikin watan Janairun 2018.
Daga baya kuma ya shigar da karar Wilsos da kuma Hkumara FDNY da Hukumar kula da birnin New York da kuwa wasu mutanen da ba a bayyana ba a watan Mayu na 2019.
Bayan shigar da koken na sa ne, Sullivan ya ce Mc Willaims ya soma fuskantar barazana da kuma takura daga magoya bayan Wilson.
Har sai da kai a wani lokaci daya daga cikin magoya bayana Wilson ya daga kafadar Mv Willaims ya na mai ce masa 'na samu larin game da kai, na kuma abinda ka aikata, yanzu dai ka shida ni.'
A cikin jawabinsa na shigara da kara Mc Williams ya rubuta cewa, cire shi da aka yi daga faretin abin 'kyama ne' kuma wata alama ce ta munafirci a wannan hukumar kashe gobara.
' Idan kai bakar fata ne ka kuma nuna wariya ga fara fata a wurin aiki, tsananin abin da za a yi maka shi ne a dan zungure a hannu.' haka Sullivan ya rabuta.
Wilson a cewar takardara shigar da karar, 'an zaunar da iita an bata shawarwari na awa guda' kan irin abin da ta yiwa Mc Williams.
A daya bangaren kuma, idan farar fata ne ya nunawa bakara fatar wariyar launin fata 'a kan ja masa kunne, da kuma horo da ladabtarwa mai tsanani' a cewar Sullivan a rubutun da ya yi.

'HukumarFDNY ta kirkirarawa kanta wani tsarin karkatar da doka tare da bayar da uzururruka marasa tushe wajen kawar da kai ga irin abin da 'yan kungiyar Vulcan-wdanda ke aikata wasu aiyyuka na nuna wariyar launin fata, kuma dole ne a taka mu us birki haka', Sullivan ya kuma rubuta.
FDNY diversity official says 'most definitely' OK to exclude white firefighter from color guard
An FDNY diversity official has said that it's 'most definitely' acceptable to keep a white firefighter off a ceremonial color guard so the flag bearers could all be black, according to a new report.

White firefighter Lt. Daniel McWilliams filed a lawsuit claiming racial bias after he was removed from a flag-bearing unit at a November 2017 memorial mass honoring deceased members of the Vulcan Society, a fraternal society of black firefighters.
And FDNY's chief diversity and inclusion officer, lawyer Cecilia Loving, has defended the decision at a New York state Division of Human Rights trial, The New York Post reports.
McWilliams was one of the three FDNY firefighters seen in an iconic photo as they hoist the American flag at Ground Zero in the days after the 9/11 attacks.
According to McWilliams' complaint, he been selected by the FDNY Ceremonial Unit to serve as one of the flag bearers in the color guard at the memorial service.
Being a flag bearer at the event was an 'esteemed honor and privilege' for McWilliams, according to his lawsuit, CNN reported.

Upon his arrival at the event, however, McWilliams was barred from participating in the color guard by then-Vulcan Society president Regina Wilson because she allegedly had asked for an all-black color guard at the mass.
She then asked McWilliams - a 29-year FDNY veteran - to 'help in a different capacity.'
Among those duties was allegedly asking him to escort civilians and muster uniformed officers into formation away from the mass.
McWilliams claimed in his suit that he asked Wilson if she was removing him from the color guard because he's not black.
She confirmed that was the case, he said.
Wilson, a 21-year FDNY veteran who was also part of the 9/11 rescue efforts, apparently replaced McWilliams with one of the members of the Vulcan Society.

McWilliams claimed he left the memorial 'to save himself from further shame, humiliation and embarrassment,' as their exchange was overheard by friends and colleagues, the New York Daily News reported.
During her trial testimony, McWilliams' lawyer, Keith Sullivan, asked Loving - who is black - 'So, a request for an all-black color guard is not discriminatory?'
'No, it isn't,' Loving said, according to the New York Post.
Sullivan also asked Loving if it's OK to request an all-black color guard, to which she was quoted as saying, 'Most definitely.'

By way of explanation, Loving said that it was OK to swap out a white person for a black person to 'uplift our identities and our separate ethnicities in order to instill a sense of pride and community and support for one another.'
McWilliams first filed his racial bias complaint with the FDNY in January 2018.
He then filed a lawsuit against Wilson, the FDNY, the city of New York and unnamed individuals in May 2019.
After filing his complaint, Sullivan said that McWilliams was retaliated against and intimidated by Wilson's supporters.
At one point, one of her supporters allegedly laid hands on McWilliams and said: 'I've heard about you, they told me you'd act this way, and now you know me.'
In a brief, Sullivan wrote that rejecting McWilliams from the mass' color guard position was 'deplorable' and a sign of double standards in the fire department.
'If you're black and you discriminate against a white person in the workplace, you get a slap on the wrist at best,' Sullivan wrote.
Wilson, according to the lawsuit, received 'one hour of counseling' over her treatment of McWilliams.
Meanwhile, a white person who discriminates against a person of color receives 'heavy-handed discipline and punishment,' Sullivan wrote.

'The FDNY has created a policy and procedure for bending over backwards, coming up with excuses and accommodating members of the Vulcan Society ... who commit racist acts, and it has to stop,' Sullivan also wrote.
Abin ba karamin fito-na fito ba ne!
Coleen Rooney ya dau hayar Lauyan Johnny Depp a fafatawar da ke yi tasakaninta da Rabekah-Vardy kan Wagatha Christie
Uwaragida Rooney ta sa David Sherborne shigar da kara kan bata sunan da Madam Vardy ta yi mata
Bayan duk wani kokarin sasantasu ya gagara, 'yan gazagani na sa ran a yi kare-jini, birin jini na ban mamaki
Coleen Rooney ta dau hayar wani fitataccen Lauyan jarumin fina finai Johnny Depp da ya ke tsaya masa a shari'arsa. Shine zai tasya mata a shari'ar da ta ke na "Wagatha Chritie" da Rabekah Vardy.

Jaridar The Mail mai fitowa ranakun Lahadi ta fahimci cewa Madam Rooney ta umarci David Sherborne da ya shigar kara kan zargin bata sunan da Misisi Vardy ta yi mata na tsegunta wasu bayanai daga sahafinta na sada zumunta na Instagram ga wata jarida.

Wannan labari na zuwa ne bayan wasu 'yan kwanaki da aka mika wasu takardun shigar da kara a wata babbar kotu a inda ake zargin cewa uwargida Vardy, wacce ke auren dan wasan kwallon kafa ta kungiyar Leicester City Jamie Vardy, ta cutu a jiki da kuma kwakwalwa sakamakon azabtarwar da ta samu daga zarge-zargen da Misisi Rooney ta yi mata.

Takardun sun kuma ce 'yar 38 da haihuwa kuma uwar 'ya 'ya biyar "ta samu cutuwa daga tsananin azaba da tashin hankali wanda ya hakan ya bayyana ta yadda ta ke tsoron barin gida". Ta na mai karawa da cewa Varday, wacce ta ke dauke da ciki wata bakwai a lokacin. "an kai ta asibiti sau ukku... tana fama da cutar damuwaa sakamakon bayanan da aka saka da kuma abubuwan da suka biyo baya."

Da kuma wakiltar Depp a kararsa da ya kai jaridar The Sun kan zarginsa da ta yi na cewa jarumin fina finan mai duka mata ne, Mista Sherborne, dan shekara 50 na wakiltar mai sarautar gargajiya na Duke da matarsa Duchess na garin Sussex a karar da suka shigar a keta musu haddi kan kamfanin Associated Newspapers. Masu wallafa jaridar The Mail mai fitowa kowacce ranar Lahadi.
Bayan tattaunawar samun masalaha tsakanin ma karayan biyu,'yan gaza gani sun sa ran ganin tirka-tirka na ban mamaki a kotu a yayin shari'ar.
"Idan ma kana tunanin wannan Sharai'ar da jarumin fina finai wani shirin fim ne, to ka gyara zama ka saha kallon", a cewar wata majiya.
"Lallai danbarwara da ba karama ba ce. Coleen ba za ta hakura ba, haka ita ma Becky. Shari'ar za ta ja hankali sosai."
Rooneey ta na zargin cewa wani ya yi amfani da shafin sada zumunta na Instagram na misisi Vardy ya tseguntawa wata jarida wasu labaran karya dangane da ita.

An yi mata lakabi da "Wagatha Christe ne" fbayan ta yi bayanin yadda sanu a hankali ta shafe wata biyar tana rage yawan mutane da ke bibiyarta a shafin sada zumunta na Instagram har ya rage Misisi Vardy ce kadai ta rage.
Misis Rooney sannan ta yi ikirarin cewa, at saka wani labarin karya a shafin nata na sada zumunta na Instagram, wanda kuma labarin ya bayyana a shafin wata fitacciyar jarida.

A na ta karriyar a gaban shari'a. Misisi Vardy wacce ta musanta zargin, ta ce "an dora mata laifukan wasu ne da bada hakkinta ba, bayan da Misisi Rooney ta ce ta yada zarge-zargen ne da gangangan da kuma aniyar cutar da ita, cuta mai tsanani da kuma sa ta cikin tashin hankali"
Amma lauyoyin Misisi Rooney suka kalubalanaci wannan ikirari, suna mai zargin cewa bayanan irirn halin da ta shiga, "wasan kwaikwayo ne kawai" da ka iya dauke hankali daga ainihin gaskiyar lamari.
Wata majiya tna cewa, "takardun da Becky ta shigar a gaban kotu shirme ne, duk ba su da makama."
Rooney wacce ke auren tsohon fitaccen dan wasa kallon kafa Wayne Rooney - Lauya Paul Lunt ne ke wakiltarta a kotu, daga ofishin lauyoyi da ke Liverpool mai suna Brabners.
Vardy kuwa tana tere da Kingsley Napley na wania Kamfani a London, amma har yanzu ba a sani ba ko ta dauki lauya.
Mai magana da yawon Rooney ya ki ya ce komai.
It's really war!
Coleen Rooney hires Johnny Depp's barrister for her Wagatha Christie battle with Rebekah Vardy
Mrs Rooney has asked David Sherborne to fight claims she defamed Mrs Vardy
After talks between WAGs failed, insiders are expecting dramatic showdown
Coleen Rooney has hired the celebrity barrister acting for Johnny Depp in his blockbuster libel case to represent her in the "Wagatha Christie" legal battle with Rebekah Vardy.

The Mail on Sunday understands that Mrs Rooney has instructed David Sherborne to fight claims she defamed Mrs Vardy with allegations that personal information was leaked from her private Instagram account to a newspaper.

The news comes days after documents submitted to the High Court claimed that Mrs Vardy, who is married to Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy, suffered physical and mental anguish as a result of Mrs Rooney's allegations.

The papers say the 38-year-old mother of five "suffered from severe panic attacks and anxiety which manifested in being scared to leave the house," adding that Mrs Vardy, who was seven months pregnant at the time, "was taken to hospital three times... as she suffered anxiety attacks as a result of the post and the repercussions of it."

As well as representing Depp in his libel action against The Sun over allegations the actor was a wife-beater, Mr Sherborne, 50, is acting for the Duke and Duchess of Sussex in their privacy claim against Associated Newspapers, publishers of The Mail on Sunday.
After mediation talks between the two WAGs failed, insiders are now expecting a dramatic courtroom showdown.
"If you thought the Depp trial was box office, don't underestimate this forthcoming WAG war," said a source.
"It really is war now. Coleen will not back down, neither will Becky. It will be sensational stuff."
Mrs Rooney claimed that someone using Mrs Vardy's Instagram account had leaked fake stories about her to a newspaper.

She was nicknamed "Wagatha Christie" after revealing how she had she spent five months slowly limiting the number of friends who could see her updates on Instagram stories until only Mrs Vardy's account remained.
Mrs Rooney claims she then posted a fake story on Instagram, which was later published in a red-top newspaper.

In her legal submission, Mrs Vardy, who has denied involvement, alleges that she was made to feel like a "scapegoat" after Mrs Rooney posted the allegations "in a calculated and deliberate manner that was designed to cause very serious harm and enormous distress."
But Mrs Rooney's team has challenged the claim, alleging that details of her anguish are a "PR exercise" that distracts from the facts.
A source said: "Becky's papers are a sideshow, it is all so spurious."
Mrs Rooney - who has four sons with former England star Wayne Rooney - is being represented by lawyer Paul Lunt, of Liverpool-based legal firm Brabners.
Mrs Vardy is with London company Kingsley Napley, but it is unclear if she has yet instructed a barrister.
A spokesman for Mrs Rooney declined to comment.
.Muna tattauna hanyoyin magance matsalar tsaro a Mali - ECOWAS - Freedom Radio Nigeria

Shugabannin kasashen Kungiyar bunkasa tattalin arzikin yammacin Afrika ta ECOWAS sun ce za su ci gaba da tattaunawa kan matakan dakile tashe-tashe hankula da ke tunkarar kasar Mali a Litinin din makon gobe.
Babban mai baiwa shugaban kasa shawara kan kafafen yada labarai Femi Adesina ne ya shaidawa manema labarai hakan a jiya Juma'a.

Rahotanni na nuni da cewa, Shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya isa birnin Bamako na kasar Mali a wani mataki na tattaunawa da takwarorinsa da ke kokarin shawo kan matsalar rashin zaman lafiya da ake fuskanta a kasar ta Mali.
Adesina ta cikin sanarwar da ya fitar na cewa, zaman shugabannin na ranar Litinin na da matukar muhimmancin gaske.
Saboda za su fito da matakai da za su taimaka wajen kawo karshen matsalolin da suka ki-ci suka ki-cinyewa.

Cikin sanarwar dai, shugaban kungiyar bunkasa tattalin arzikin yammacin Afrika ta ECOWAS kuma shugaban kasar Niger Muhammadou Issoufou na cewa, hadakar shugabannin za su yi dukkan mai yiwuwa wajen sanya matakan da za su kawo zaman lafiya a daukacin kasar ta Mali.
.We discussed solutions to the security crisis in Mali - ECOWAS - Freedom Radio Nigeria
Leaders of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) have said they will continue to discuss measures to end violence in Mali on Monday next week.
Senior media adviser to the president, Femi Adesina, told reporters on Friday yesterday.
According to reports, President Muhammadu Buhari has arrived in Bamako of Mali, in a bid of dialogue with his counterparts trying to overcome the instability that Mali is facing.
Adesina said in a statement he released, that Monday's leaders summit was very important.
Because they will come up with steps that will help them to over come the problems.
In the same statement, ECOWAS President and Nigerien President Muhammadou Issoufou said the coalition would do everything possible to impose the steps that will bring peace in the whole of Mali.
WHO ce jigon yaki da cutar Shan Inna a Najeriya.
Shugaban hukumar cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya a matakin farko ta kasa, NPHCDA, Faisal Shuaib ya bayyana cewa kungiyar kiwon lafiya ta duniya WHO ita ce jigon yaki da cutar Shan-Inna a Najeriya.
Shuaib ya fadi haka da yake karbar bakuntar wakilin hukumar wakilin WHO a Najeriya a ofishin sa ranar Litinin.
Ya ce Najeriya za ta samu shaidar rabuwa kwata-kwata da cutar shan-inna a Nahiyar Afrika a watan Agusta daga kungiyar WHO.

Hakan ya biyo bayan gamsuwa da Hukumar Yaki da Cutar Shan-Inna (POLIO) na kasashen Afrika (ARCC) ta yi game da kokarin kawar da cutar da gwamnatin kasar nan ta yi na shaidar rabuwa kwata-kwata da cutar shan-inna a Nahiyar Afrika.
Idan ba a manta a watan Agusta 2016 ne cutar Shan Inna ta bullo a Najeriya bayan shekaru uku rabon da cutar ta bullo a kasar nan.
Bullowar cutar a shekarar 2016 ne ya hana Najeriya da Nahiyar Afrika samun shaidar rabuwa da cutar shan-inna.
Bayan haka Shuaib ya ce gwamnati ba za ta Yi kasa kasa ba wajen ganin ta kawar da cututtukan dake kama yara kanana musamman wadanda za a iya kawar da su ta hanyar yin rigakafi.
Mulombo ya jinjina kokarin da gwamnati ke yi wajen inganta fannin kiwon lafiya musamman cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya na matakin farko a kasar nan.
WHO is at the forefront of the fight against polio in Nigeria.

Faisal Shuaib, the chairman of the National Primary Health Care Development Authority (NPHCDA), has said that the World Health Organization (WHO) is at the forefront of the fight against polio in Nigeria.
Shuaib made the remarks while receiving the WHO Representative in Nigeria at his office on Monday.
He said Nigeria would receive a certificate of complete eradication of polio in Africa in August from the World Health Organization.
This follows the satisfaction of the African Polio Eradication Commission (ARCC) on the government's efforts to eradicate polio eradication in Africa.
It will be recalled that in August 2016, polio first appeared in Nigeria three years after the outbreak.
The outbreak in 2016 has prevented Nigeria and Africa from gaining evidence of polio eradication.
Shuaib further said that the government will do its utmost to eradicate diseases that affect young children, especially those that can be eradicated through immunization.
Mulombo lauded the government's efforts to improve the health sector, especially primary health care in the country.
Hadarin jirgin sama na Utah: wani jariri da wasu magidanta 2 sun rasa ransu a bayan gidansu

Hadarin ya faru ne a ranar Asabar bayan azahar yayin da wani jirgin sama kirar PA-32 mai dauke da mutane shida ya rikito a bayan wani gida a birnin Jordan ta yamma, wani mai magana da yawun hukumar kula da zirga-zirgan jiragen sama ta kasa da kasa, Allen Kenitszer ya na mai cewa.

Mutame uku da ke cikin jirgen sun mutu ciki har da matukin jirgin wanda 'yan sanda suka gano da cewa sunansa Lee Wyckloff ne dan shekara 43 da 'yarsa mai watanni 9 da haihuwa da Mlda Shbonis mai shekaru 36 da haihuwa a cewar 'yan sandan yammacin Jordan.
Matar matukin jirgin na cikin halin rai kwakwai-mutu kwakwai da kuma wani yaro dan shekara 2 wanda ya kone sosai.

An ba wani dan shekara 12 magani a wani asibiti na unguwa an kuma sallame shi, wata mai magana da yawun 'yan sanda birnin yammacin Jordan mai suna Jennifer Worthen ta fadawa gidan Talbijin na CNN ranar Lahadi.

Wata mata 'yar shekara 72 wacce ta ke gidan a lokacin da jirgin saman ya rikito a kai nma cikin wani mummnuna hali a asibiti a cewar wani sako da hukumar 'yan sanda ta sa dandalin sada zumunta na Tuwita a ranar Lahadi.
Jirgin da ta fado ya kuma lalata wasu gidaje guda uku, a cewar Tim baker mai magana da yawun rundunar 'yan sandan birni yammacin Jordan .
Ba a san dai musabbabin hadarin jirgin ba.
Hukumar kula da zirga-zirgan jirgen sama ta kasa da kuma hukumar kula da kiyaye hadarin ababen hawa ta kasa na bincike.
Utah plane crash: A baby and 2 adults are killed in a backyard crash

The crash happened Saturday afternoon when a Piper PA-32 aircraft carrying six people crashed into a backyard in the city of West Jordan, Federal Aviation Administration spokesman Allen Kenitzer said.
Three people aboard the plane were killed, including the pilot, identified by police as 43-year-old Lee Wyckoff, his 9-month-old baby, and Milda Shibonis, 36, West Jordan police said.
The pilot's wife is in critical condition, and a 2-year-old child has critical burns.
A 12-year-old girl was treated at a local hospital and released, West Jordan Police spokeswoman Jennifer Worthen told CNN on Sunday.
A 72-year-old woman who was in a house struck by the plane is in critical condition, according to a tweet Sunday from the police department.
The crash also damaged three homes, West Jordan city spokesperson Tauni Barker said.
The cause of the crash has not been determined.
The FAA and National Transportation Safety Board are investigating.
An kori malaman firamare da na sakandare 71 a makarantar Hukumar SSS.
Akalla malaman firamare da na sakandare 71 ne aka yi wa korar-ba zata a sakandaren Community Staff School, mallakar Jami'an SSS a Abuja.
Sallamar ta su ta biyo bayan kukan da su ka yi na neman inganta kula da su, wanda a lokacin da su ka fito nuna damuwar ta su, har tarwatsa su aka yi, ta hanyar dankara harbi a sama domin a razana su.
Takardar sallamar da aka raba wa kowane malamin mai dauke da ranar 2 Ga Nuwamba, ta fado kan teburin PREMIUM TIMES.
Da farko kafin a sallame su, an umarci iyayen dalibai cewa kowane yaro ya zauna a gida tsawon makonni biyu, domin a samu damar yi wa makarantar gyare-gyare.
Sai dai kuma abin da ya biyo bayan wannan, shi ne sanarwar sallamar dukkan malaman makarantar, na firamare daga hedimasta zuwa kowa da kowa.
An kuma koma bangaren sakandare aka sallami tun daga shugaban makarantar har zuwa mai aiki a dakin gwaji.
Shugaban Hukumar SSS ya ba ni umarnin sanar da sallamar su daga aiki.
Wannan ya faru ne saboda matsalar kuncin tattalin arziki da ya faru saboda korona.
Sanarwar ta umarci duk mai wani abu mallakin makarantar, ya gaggauta damkawa ga hukumar makarantar.
Malaman sun dade su na kokawa kan rashin kula.
Sannan su kuma iyayen yara sun koka saboda duk da halin da ake ciki, an yi karin kudin makaranta daga naira 70,000 zuwa naira 90,000.
Su kuma malamai sun ce an zaftare masu albashi da wasu hakkokin da su ka nema aka yi masu.
71 primary and secondary school teachers were expelled from the SSS school.
At least 71 primary and secondary school teachers have been fired unexpectedly at the Community Staff School, owned by SSS officers in Abuja.
Their dismissal followed their cries for improved welfare, which when they came out to show their concern, they were dispersed, by firing shots in the air to intimidate them.
The dismissal letter distributed to each teacher on November 2, fell on the PREMIUM TIMES desk.
Initially before they were dismissed, the parents of the students were instructed that each child stay at home for two weeks, so that the school could make renovation.
Following this, there was the announcement of the dismissal of all teachers, from primary school headmaster to the rest of the teachers.
At the secondary school all the staff were dismissed from the principal to the laboratory worker.
The Director General of the SSS ordered me to announce their dismissal.
This is due to the economic crisis caused by the corona pandemic.
The notice instructed anyone who has anything belonging to the school in his possession to immediately return it to the school board.
Teachers have long been complaining on lack of care.
Parents also complained that despite the situation, school fees had been increased from N70,000 to N90,000.
Teachers say they suffered salary cuts and other rights have been violated.
Dalilin Korar Jami'inmu Mai Wasaso - Shugaban NSCDC.

Shugaban Ƴan Civil Defence na Kasa, Muhammad Gana Abdullahi, ya bayyana dalilin da ya sa hukumar tasa ta kori jami'in nan nata, da a ka nuna a bidiyo ya na daukar kayan wawaso da a ka yi lokacin zanga-zangar EndSARS a Gwagalada da ke Babban Birnin Tarayyar Nijeriya, Abuja, kwanakin baya.

Gana ya bayyana dalilin hukumar ne a zantarwarsa da LEADERSHIP A YAU a hedikwatar hukumar ta kasa da ke Abuja, ya na mai cewa, kula da da'ar ma'aikata hukumar ne ya sanya hukumominta su ka yanke shawarar korar jami'in daga aiki baki daya.

A yayin da ya ke yin bayanin yadda lamarin ya kasance, Gana ya ce, "kai da a ka tura ka, domin ka bayar da tsaro... sun kira ni sun ce su da su ka je wurin su 16 ne, amma mutanen da su ke wajen sun fi 500, kuma ni ma na sami labarin hakan, har ma wasu jami'an tsaro sun gudu, sai na ce to ku ja da baya kada ku dauki mataki mai karfi.
To, kai da a ka tura ka, don bayar da tsaro a wajen, me zai sa ka je ka na daukar kayan da a ka haramta dauka, har a na daukar ka?
Ai ba dadi!
Don haka nan take na kira management dinmu, mu ka zauna mu ka yanke hukunci mu ka sallame shi daga aiki.
Wannan zai koya wa sauran hankali cewa, a Civil Defence ba za mu yarda da rashin da'a ba.
A yayin da LEADERSHIP A YAU ta nusar da shi cewa, akwai jami'an wasu hukumomin tsaron da a ka dauki bidiyonsu su na yin wawason, amma ba a samu labarin shugabanninsu sun kore su ba.
sai ya ce, "mu dai a Civil Defence mun dauki matakin da ya kamata, su kuma sauran hukumomi abinsu su ya shafa".

Daga na sai ya yi kira ga matasan Nijeriya da su rika nesanta kansu daga shiga irin wannan barnar, domin wawason dukiyar kasa a irin haka, barna ce, wacce za ta iya haifar da matsaloli ga makomar matasan.
Don haka sai ya yi kira da su guji zuga daga wasu batagari.
The reason why we expelled our greedy staff - NSCDC chairman.

The chairman of the National Civil Defense, Muhammad Gana Abdullahi, explained why his commission dismissed its officer, who was showed in a video illegally carrying palliatives during the EndSARS protests in Gwagalada, Federal Capital Territory, Abuja, sometime a go.

Gana explained the reason for the commission in an interview with LEADERSHIP TODAY at the commission's headquarters in Abuja, saying that the decision was reached in order to maintain discipline of the staff of the commission.

While explaining the situation, Ghana said, "You have been sent to provide security... they called me and said they were 16 at the place, but the people who went there, were more than 500 and I also heard that information, and even some of the security personnel had ran away. I told them to fall back and not to use any force.
So, you who have been sent, to provide security there, why do you resort to engage in the scramble and picking up of the forbidden goods, and your video was taken?
That is not good!
I therefore, immediately called our management, we sat down and we reached the decision to dismiss him.
This will be a lesson to the rest of the staff that we will not tolerate misconduct in the Civil Defence.
LEADERSHIP TODAY pointed out that some security officials were also videotaped taking the forbidden goods but there were no reports of their bosses firing them.
"We at Civil Defense have taken the necessary steps, and for the rest of the agencies that is their concern," he said.
He then called on the Nigerian youth to refrain from engaging in acts of violence, as the destruction of national resources is a catastrophe that could jeopardize their future.
He therefore called on them to refrain from bad friends that incite others.
Jama'ar unguwa na gina wa kansu kwalbati ta kusan N5m a Kano.
Al'ummar wasu unguwanni a nan birnin Kano sun yi haɗin gwiwa wajen sake sabinta kwalbatin da ta haɗa yankunansu.
Unguwannin sun haɗar da Darma da Dukawa da Zangon bare-bari da kuma wani ɓangare na unguwar Sharifai.
A ziyarar da Freedom Radio ta kai unguwannin ta iske yadda aikin ya yi nisa.
Malam Mubarak Abba na cikin matasan unguwar da suka assasa gudanar da wannan aiki, ya ce daga yanzu sun daina jiran gwamnati ta yi musu irin wadannan aikace-aikace.
Nawa za a kashe wajen kammala aikin?
Mubarak Abba yace, sun gudanar da ayyukan ci gaban unguwa da dama amma wannan shi ne mafi girma da suke yi.
Ana sa ran aikin zai lashe kuɗi har kimanin miliyan biyar.
Yadda ake samar da kuɗin aikin Mutanen yankunan na tattara kuɗi-kuɗi a tsakaninsu inda kowa ke bada abin da Allah ya hore masa domin gudanar da wannan aikin.
A cewar Muhsin Aminu Dukawa wanda ke tattara kudin aikin.
Iyaye mata na bada tasu gudummuwar.
Iyaye mata ma ba a barsu a baya ba, wajen bada tasu gudummuwar.
Hajiya Fadima Danbalarabe wadda aka fi sani da Niniya tana cikin iyaye mata a yankin.
Ta ce, su na bayar da abinci ga masu aikin da sabulan wanke jiki da duk wani abu da Allah ya hore musu.
Yaya manyan unguwannin suka karɓi aikin?
Matasan da suka jagoranci aikin sun ce wannan aiki bai samu ba sai da gudummuwar masu unguwanni da dattijan yankin.
Alhaji Lamin Isah na cikin dattawan unguwannin yace wannan kwalabati ta daɗe tana ci musu tuwo a kwarya, amma yanzu ƴaƴansu sun tasamma magance musu matsalar ta.
Malaman Addini sun shigo cikin aikin Da yake unguwannin sun yi shura da al'amuran addini, haka ya sanya matasan suka sanya malaman addinin yankin kan gaba wajen gudanar da shi.
Gwani Hadi Sadisu Zangon Bare-bari fitaccen malamin alkur'ani ne a nan Kano wanda ke cikin wannan aiki.
Ya ce, yana farin ciki sosai yadda matasan unguwar suka neme shi matsayin mai bada shawarwari kan gudanar da aikin.
Yaya al'umma ke kallon aikin?
Masu kishin al'umma dai na cewa wannan shi ne abin da ya kamata al'umma su rika yi domin kawo ci gaba a yankunansu.
Alhaji Abubakar Ibrahim da aka fi sani da Gwamnati Ikon Allah ɗaya ne cikin masu kishin al'umma a Kano.
Muna kira ga sauran matasa da su yi koyi da waɗannan unguwanni saboda in an tsaya jiran gwamnati za a jima gyaran bai samu ba.

Masu sharhi kan al'amuran yau da kullum dai sun jima suna kalubalantar gwamnati kan yadda kusan kowacce unguwa ke fama da irin wannan matsaloli, kuma gwamnati ta kasa gyarawa har ta kai ga al'umma sun fara daukar irin wannan mataki na gyarawa da kansu.
Communities are building a N5m Culverts for themselves in Kano.
The people of some neighborhoods here in Kano have teamed up to renovate culverts that connects their areas.
The wards include Darma, Dukawa, Zangon bare-bari and part of Sharifai.
During a visit to the neighborhoods, Freedom Radio seeing for it self the progress of the projects.
Mubarak Abba, one of the youth founders of the project, said they no longer had to wait for the government to provide such services.
How much will it cost to complete the project?
Mubarak Abba said they have carried out a number of community development projects but this is their biggest achievement.
The project is expected to cost around five million Naira.
How to fund the work The people of the area collect money from each other where everyone donates his widow's mite in order to carry out this work.
According to Muhsin Aminu Dukawa who is raising the money for the project.
Women as parents also contribute to the project.
Women as parents are not left behind, they also contribute in their own way.
Hajia Fadima Danbalarabe popularly known as Niniya is one of such mothers in the area.
She said they provide food for the workers and soap to wash themselves after the work and anything else that God provides them with.
How did community elders accept the project?
The youths who led the project said the project was only possible with the help of local ward heads and community elders.
Alhaji Lamin Isah, one of the elders in the area, said the culvert has been an issue for a long time, but now their children are tackling the menace and are able to solve it.
Religious leaders have been involved in the work. As the wards are involved in religious affairs, the youths have put religious leaders in the area in the forefront.
Gwani Hadi Sadisu Zangon Bare-bari is a renowned Qur'anic scholar here in Kano who is involved in this work.
He said he is very happy that the youths of the area had approached him and asked him to advice them on the project
How does the community view the project?
Patriots say this is what every society should do to bring development to their areas.
Alhaji Abubakar Ibrahim popularly known as the Gwamnati Ikon Allah is one of the most patriotic people in Kano.
We call on other youths to follow the example of these neighborhoods because if we wait for the government to do this to us, we will continue to wait endlessly and the work may not be done.

Current affairs commentators have long challenged the government on how almost every neighborhood suffers from such problems, and the government has failed to address them to the point where the public has begun to take similar remedial measures on their own.
'Yan sanada masu binciken laifi na farautar wasu gungun matasa bayan da suka kai wani 'mummunan' hari a Edingburgh
An jiwa wani mutum mummunan rauni da ka iaya nakastashi bayan da wasu su uku suka afka mi a Edingburgh.
Mutumin dan shekara 29 an ji masa mummuman rauni ne a kan titin Drum da ke unguwar Gilmaton a tsakani karfe 11:00 zuwa 11:30 na daren Asabar.
'Yan sandan Scotland sun ce an kai mutumin asibitin City Riyal Infimary da munanan raunuka.
Det Con Miles jami'in da ke jagorantar binciken ya ce "wannan mummunam hari an yi shi ne cikin ruwan sanyi ba tare da wata tsokana ba."
Wandanda ake zargi sun ranta a kare ta wajen layin Newtoft.
An kwantanta kamanninn daya da cewa dan shakaru 30 ne, mai tsawon kafa 6 kakkaura.
Yana da gashin kai maras yawa, yana sanye da farar riga da bakin wando da kuma bakin takalmi.
Det Con Miles ya kuma da kara da cewa:' " ina kira ga duk wanda ke yankin a kima lokacin da abin ya faru, ya kuma ga wani abin da bai yarada da shi ba ya zo ya yi mana bayani."
Detectives hunt gang after 'violent' street attack in Edinburgh
A man has been left with potentially life-changing injuries after he was attacked by three others in Edinburgh.
The 29-year-old victim was seriously assaulted in Drum Street, in the Gilmerton area, between 23:00 and 23:30 on Saturday.
Police Scotland said he was taken to the city's Royal Infirmary with serious injuries.
Det Con Dale Miles, the officer leading the investigation, said: "This was a violent and unprovoked attack."
The suspects fled in the direction of Newtoft Street.
One was described as being in his 30s, 6ft and of muscular build.
He had short, dark hair and was wearing a white top, dark trousers and dark shoes.
Det Con Miles added: "I am appealing to anyone who was in the area around the time of the incident and saw anything suspicious to come forward."
Buhari ya gana da shugabanin kasashen Afrika ta kafar Internet.
Shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya bi sawun takwarorin shugabanin kasashen Afrika ta yamma kan tattaunawa wajen warware rikicin siyasa da ya dabaibaye kasar Mali ta kafar Internet.

A yau litinin ne dai shugabannin kasashen suka ci gaba da tattaunawa a babban birnin kasar ta Mali wato Bamako tare da bangarorin masu rikicin a teburin sulhu wanda aka fara tun a ranar Alhamis din makon da ya gabata.
Idan za a iya tunawa dai tun a ranar alhamis din da ta gaba ne aka cimma matsaya da niyyar za a ci gaba da tattaunawar a yau Litinin.

Tun a ranar Alhamis din kuma shugaban kasar Niger wanda shi ne shugaban kungiyar raya tattalin arzikin yammacin Afrika ta "ECOWAS" Mahamadou Issoufou ya bayyana cewa akwai bukatar kungiyoyin kasar su yi duk mai yiwuwa wajen kawo karshen rikice-rikien da ya adabi kasar.
Shugabannin kasashen yammacin Afrika da suka hadar da shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari da shugaban kasar Mali Ibrahim Boubacar Keita da kuma shugaban kasar Senegal Machy Sall

Sauran su ne, Nana Akufo-Addo na kasar Ghana sai kuma shugaban kasar Cote d'Ivoire Alassane Ouattara wadanda suka ziyarci kasar ta Mali domin tattauna batun rikicin siyasa da ya addabi kasar, yayin da wakilan kungiyoyin rikicin da kungiyoyin cikin gida suka bayyana matsayar su akan rikicin.

Tun da fari dai tsohon shugaban kasar nan Goodluck Jonathan wanda kuma shi ne jagoran kwamitin sulhu na kasar ta Mali ya kai ziyara kasar makwannin biyun da suka gabata inda ya bukaci masu gudanar da zanga -zanga a kasar da su dakatar tare da yi alkawarin cimma matsaya.
Buhari meets with African leaders online.
President Muhammadu Buhari has followed in the footsteps of West African leaders for talks on resolving the political crisis in Mali online.
The two leaders resumed talks in the Malian capital, Bamako, today, Monday with the parties of the conflict to resolve the issues which began on Thursday last week.
As far as can be recalled, the agreement was reached last Thursday with the intention of resuming talks today, Monday.

Since Thursday, Mahamadou Issoufou, President of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS), said there is a needed for the country's parties to do everything possible to end the crisis in the country.
West African leaders including President Muhammadu Buhari, Malian President Ibrahim Boubacar Keita and Senegalese President Machy Sall

The rest are, Ghana's Nana Akufo-Addo and Cote d'Ivoire's President Alassane Ouattara are among those visiting Mali to discuss the country's political crisis, while representatives of violence groups and local groups have stated their positions on the crisis.

Earlier, former President of this country, Goodluck Jonathan, who is also the chairman of Mali's Security Council, visited the country two weeks ago and called on protesters to stop and promised to reach a settlement.

Wani mai gabatar da shirye -shirye a radiyo a birnin Seattle wanda ya yiwa shugaba Trump zanbo kan martanin da ya yi ga masu zanga-zanga, yanzu ya dawoa ya na mai cewa ina da bukatar a bani bindiga bayan da aka yi raga-raga da kantin sah shayi na Starbucks da ke karrkashin benen inda ya ke

Paul Gallanta na yiwa mummunan zanga-zangar da aka yi a Seattle wani irin kallo bayan yiwa Domald Trump zambo a watan Yuni a inda ya ke cewa 'yan ta da zaune tsaye na kone-kone da kwasar ganima a birnin Seattle.
Ba a dade ba, masu tarzoma su ka iso kusa da gidan mai gabatar da shirin radiyon.

" Sai na ji ina da bukatar in mallaki bindiga saboda wannan ya nuna karara cewa haka wannan abin zai yi ta faruwa" Gallant ya fadi haka ne a shafinsa na sada zumunta na Twitter a ranar Asabar da dare bayan da ya dawo gida ya taras da wani kantin shan shayi na Starbucks da ke kasan gidansa an yi "raga-raga" da shi. Aikin wasu masu barna.
"Abin ya isa haka. Sai abin ya zama min kamar wani wurin da aka yi taron sharholiya na 'yan unguwa bayan taro ya watse. Yanzu haka ina cikin fushi."
Wannan martani sai ya fito da cikin hannun riga karara a inda a watan jiya Trump ya koka da cewa Magajin garin Seattle ya kau da kai masu zanga -zanga cikin tashin hankali na kokarin kwace garin.
Yana mai cewa. "Wadannan masu sassaucin ra'ayi ba su san abin da suke yi ba".
" Wadannan 'yan ta'addan na kone-kone da kwasar ganimar kayan mutane a biranenmu, sun dauka hakan daidaine ko a cikin kabarinsu"

Gallant wanda ke gabatar da shirin Danny & Galant a tashar Radiyo ta Seattle ESPN, ya mayar da martani a shafinsa na Twitter yana mai cewa: "Na zagaya yawon gani da ido da kafa jiya da dare, nidai ban ga inda aka yi kon-kone, ko barnata kayan jama'a, ko kuma rasa rai ba. A yi Kurum."
"Yan sanda sun gargadi Galant da ya kuracewa gidansa saboda gudun cewa watakila an dasa nakiya a kantin shayin Starbucks na kasansa da aka yiwa raga-raga.
Gallant ya aika hotunan barnar da 'yan zanga-zanga su kayi, yana mai cewa "aiki ya yi kyau a - sai dai" sannan ya ci gaba da fadin cewa, ya ga wuta na ci a wani nesa da shi kadan.
" ban san abinda ke faruwa ba, amma za mu je sansane-sansane irirn na mage don gano abin da ke faruwa."

Wannan saurin juya akala da Gallant yayii ashe shuka ne a idon makwarwa, 'yan jamiyyar conservatives sun rika tsokanar Gallant kan abin da ya fada a baya, aika sakwanni ta Twitter irinsu "a yi kurum" da kuma "huh, watakila fa Trump na ya yi gaskiya."
Jason Rants, wani mai gabatar da shirye-shirye a radiyo a Seattle ya na mai cewa, "Daga dukkan alammu daga karshe dai zamu dan je kewaya da muka tattauna."
Gallant ya gane raha ya na mai mayar da maratani: " Yau na farka da wasu jerin sakonni na Tuwita daga wasu jama'u a da ke ce min 'asha kuruminka kawai' gare ni. Dariya na ke ta yi."

Ya ce, yana kan bakansa dangane da abin da ya fada, kamar yadda ya yi dan tattaki a yanki mai cin gashin kansa ta da 'yan tayar da kayar baya suka kikira bayan sun ankara sun kuma gano cewa bai kai yadda suke zato ba.
" sai ga a shi an barke da kone-kone da kuma kwasar ganima," yace. "Kasaitacce"
Seattle radio host who mocked Trump's reaction to protests now says he needs a gun after Starbucks below his apartment is trashed - RT USA News
Paul Gallant has a new perspective on violent protests after mocking President Donald Trump in June for saying anarchists were burning and pillaging Seattle.
All it took was for the mayhem to come near the talk show host's home.

"I feel like I need to buy a firearm because this is clearly going to keep happening," Gallant said Saturday night on Twitter after coming home to see the Starbucks coffeeshop below his apartment complex "destroyed" by vandals.
"Enough is enough. It looks like a block party down the street from me. Really angry right now."
The reaction stood in stark contrast to last month, when Trump complained that Seattle's mayor was allowing violent protesters to take over the city.
"These liberal Dems don't have a clue," the president said.
"The terrorists burn and pillage our cities, and they think it's just wonderful, even the death."

Gallant, who co-hosts the 'Danny & Gallant'show on Seattle's ESPN radio affiliate, tweeted in response: "Walked through it last night out of curiosity and saw no burning, pillaging or deaths. Chill dawg."
Gallant said last night that police had advised residents to stay away from his apartment building because explosives could be inside the damaged Starbucks.
He posted pictures of the damage, saying, "Great job a - holes," and noted that he'd also seen a fire a few blocks away.
"Zero clue what's going on, but the cat and I are going to find out."
The turnabout didn't go unnoticed, as conservatives ridiculed Gallant for his earlier view, tweeting messages such as "Just chill dawg," and "Huh, maybe Trump was right."
Jason Rantz, another Seattle radio host, said, "Guess we're finally doing that field trip we discussed."
Gallant acknowledged the humor: "Woke up to a bunch of people tweeting 'chill dawg' at me. I laughed."
He said he stood by his earlier statement, as he had walked through the CHAZ autonomous zone created by anarchists and found it to be less bad than it was portrayed.
"Then burning and pillaging actually happened," he said. "Classic."
Octavia Spencer ta yi kira ga 'yan Hollywood da su kara mutanen da ke da nakasa a finafinai
Wannan na daga cikin sabon shirinta na jan hankali PSA da ke kira da a kara yawan wadanda ke da nakasa a harkar nishadantarwa.
Wannan gangami da ta soma ya zo daidai da bikin murnar cika shekara 30 ta Lahadi da samar da dokar Amurkawa nakasassu (ADA).
Bidiyon da ta yi ya nuna Spencer ta na tattauna muhimmancin na kowa ya ga kansa da kuma rayuwarsa an nuna ta yadda ya kamata a fina finai da talbijin.
"Babu wani abin da zai maye gurbin rayuwa ta hakika da kuma wakilci na gaskiya" ta na mai cewa.
"Don haka yake da matukar muhimmanci mu sa jarumin da ya dace a gurbin fim din da ya dace."
Spencer ta yi magana akan tasirin da ta ke ji na kallon da banbancin launi a a akwatunan talbijin a lokacin da ta ke yarinya ta ke kallon shirin "Good Times."

Shririn na talbijin mai dogon zango wanda CBS ta rika sa wa daga shekarar 1974 zuwa 1979, Norman Lear ne ya kirkire shi kuma hakan ya duk wasu shinge a matsayin shirin da talbijin na farko da ya nuna 'yan Amurka masu asalin Africa na iyaye biyu a wasan barkwanci.
Octavia Spencer calls on Hollywood to increase casting of people with disabilities
The actress is part of a new PSA that calls for increased inclusion of those with disabilities in entertainment.
The campaign coincides with Sunday's 30th anniversary of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA).
The video shows Spencer discussing the importance of everyone being able to see themselves and their lives accurately reflected on screen.
"Nothing can replace lived experience and authentic representation," she said.
"That's why it's imperative that we cast the appropriate actor for the appropriate role."
Spencer discussed the impact she felt seeing a family of color on screen as a young girl watching the show "Good Times."
The series, which ran on CBS from 1974 to 1979, was created by Norman Lear and broke barriers as television's first African American two-parent family sitcom.
Ma'aurata 'yan Jinin sarauta a da, 'su na jin an yi watsi da su' a lokacin gabatar da sakon Krisimeti na sarauniya, a cewar wani littafi
MEGHAN Markle da Yarima Harry suna jin cewa kakakarsa sarauniyar Ingila ta yi "watsi da su" a yayin gabatar da jawabinta na sakon Krisimeti data saba yi duk shekara.

A wani sabon littafin tarihin rayuwar ma'auratan biyu mai suna 'Finding Freedom' sun ikirari cewa an fitar da su daga jerin hotunan da aka baje a taron na sauraron jawabin na al'ada da aka sayi duk shekara.
Hotunan da ke kan teburin da sarauniyar ta ke zaune sun hada da na Yarima William da Kate Middleton da kuma 'ya'yansu uku, yarima da matarsa Camilla da kuma Yarima Philip.
Amma babu su, babu alamar su bayin sun haifi 'yar su Archie a watan Mayu na shekarar da ta wuce. Ko da yake jaririyar ba 'a ko ambace ta ba a matsayin 'tattaba kunnen sarauniya ta takwas'.

Sabon littafin - wanda ake sa ran fitowarsa cikin watan Agusta - ya kuma bayyana cewa Meghan daKate Middleton "ba su taba zama abokan juna ba"a yayin da "suke fama su wuce ladabin nesa" sun dai taba haduwa a wasu lokuta daban-daban.

An yi ikirarin cewa a jiya, rabuwar yarima Harry da dan uwansa William ya samo asali ne 'yan shekaru da suka wuce kafin soma soyayyarsu da Meghan - kuma hakan ya kai makura ne a lokacin da William ya auri Kate Middleton.

Mai rike da sarautar Duke na Sussex ya na jin kansa tamkar "wukar baya"a duk wani taro da dan uwansa William da Kate Middleton za su je - da hakan yayi ikirari, "tun kafin zuwan Meghan ta zo, ya ke so ya sauya abubuwa."
Ex-royal couple 'felt snubbed' in Queen's Christmas speech, new book claims
MEGHAN Markle and Prince Harry "felt snubbed" by his grandmother, The Queen, during her Christmas speech.
The couple's new biography, Finding Freedom, claims they felt left out of the photo collection on show in the festive address.
Pictures on the desk that The Queen was sitting at included Prince William, Kate Middleton and their three children, Prince Charles and his wife Camilla along with Prince Philip.
Yet, Meghan and Harry were nowhere to be seen having welcomed Archie last May - although the youngster did get a mention as Her Majesty's 'eighth great-grandchild'.

The new book - which is set to be released in August - also reveals that Meghan and Kate Middleton "were never friends" as they "struggled to move past distant politeness" and they only met up on a few occasions.
It was claimed yesterday that Prince Harry's split with his brother William started years before his romance with Meghan - and that it came to a head over William's marriage to Kate Middleton.
The Duke of Sussex felt like a "spare part" at events with his brother and Kate Middleton - with it claimed, "long before Meghan he wanted to change things."
Mun kashe miliyoyin naira wajen gyaran filayen wasa - Kwamishina.
Gwamnatin jihar Katsina ta ce ta kashe kudi fiye da naira miliyan 175 wajen gyaran filayen wasanni guda biyu a jihar.
Kwamishinan wasanni na jihar Sani Danlami ne ya bayyana hakan yayin da yake zaiyana aiyuka da ci gaban da ma'aikatar wasanni ta kawo.

Danladi ya kuma ce, an kashe sama da naira miliyan 111 wajen yin kwaskwarima tare da daga likafar babban filin wasa na karamar hukumar Malumfashi, inda aka kashe fiye da naira miliyan 62 wajen karasa ginin filayen wasanni a cikin garin Katsina.
"Mun gudanar da wadannan aiyukan ne don bunkasa harkokin wasanni don amfanin matasa a jihar nan", a cewar kwamishinan.
We spent millions of naira on renovating stadiums - Commissioner
Katsina state government says that it has spent over 175 million naira on the renovation of the two sports stadiums in the state.
The state commissioner of sports, Sani Danlami, made the remarks while outlining the services and development provided by the Ministry of Sports.

Danladi also said that more than N111 million had been spent on renovations and upgrading of the Malumfashi Local Government Area stadium, while more than N62 million had been spent on completion of stadiums in Katsina.
"We delivered these services to promote sports for the benefit of the youth in this state," the commissioner said.
Sojoji Sun Kashe Sufeton 'Yan Sanda Da Duka A Nijeriya - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
An gano cewa wasu sojoji dake gadin wani kamfani ne suka kashe wani ɗan sanda bayan ya karya dokar bin hanya a gaban kamfanin a ranar Lahadi 16 ga watan Agusta, 2020.

Dan uwan wannan jami'in dan sanda da ya yi hira da PUNCH akan wannan aika-aika kuma ya bukaci a boye sunansa, inda ya ce: "Dan uwana tare da ƴan sanda guda biyu sun ki bin dokar hanya sakamakon shinge da aka sanya a gaban kamfanin na "Eleme Petrochemical", sai wani soja ya tsare su, har dai jayayya ta yi nisa tsakaninsu abin ya zama fada.
Daya daga cikin sojojin wanda ya shiga fadan ya yi amfani da katon falanki ya makawa dan uwana a kai, take ya fadi ya daina motsi.
Cikin gaggawa aka garzaya dashi asibiti don ceto rayuwar shi.
Bayan shafe awa 24 a asibiti, sai ya mutu.
Har yanzu daga ƴan sandan har sojojin babu wanda ya yi magana a kan wannan lamari ko ya dauki mataki a kai.

Da aka tuntubi kakakin rundunar sojin dake Fatakwal, Charles Ekeocha, ya ce bashi da labari akan wannan lamari, amma ya yi alkawarin bayyana labarin da zarar ya samu labari akai. Amma dai har ya zuwa lokacin da muka rubuta wannan rahoto bai ce komai ba.
Soldiers kills Police Inspector in Nigeria by beating - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
It has been discovered that a soldiers guarding a company killed police officer after he broke a traffic rules in front of the company on Sunday, August 16, 2020.

A relative of the police officer who spoke to PUNCH about the incident also demanded anonymity, saying: “My brother along with two police officers refused to follow the traffic rules as a result of a fence erected in front of Eleme Petrochemical, they were detained by a soldier, and a heated argument ensued which resulted into a fight.
One of the soldiers, who was involved in the fighting, used a large wood to hit my brother on the head, he fell down and stop moving instantly.
He was rushed to hospital to save his life.
After 24 hours in the hospital, he died.
So far no one from the police or the military has commented on the incident or taken action.

When contacted, the military spokesman in Port Harcourt, Charles Ekeocha, said he had no information on the incident, but promised to release it as soon as he received it. But by the time of this writing, he has not said anything.
Kasar Serbiya ta nemi karin jiragen saman yaki a tsaka da tashin hankali na Balkan
BELGRADE, Serbia (AP) - Serbia za ta karfafi sojojinta kuma yayin da ta ke neman ta sayo karin jiragen yaki ana tsaka da tsananin tashin hankali a cewar shugabana kasar ta Serbia a ranar Lahadi.

Shugaba Aleksandar Vucic ya ce "wasu matakai" a cikin bin su domin a sayo wasu jerin jiragen saman yaki samfurin fighters bomber, ta na zargin Amurka da kuma wasu kasashen yamma da ba kasar Serbia wacce ta ke makwabciyar kungiyar NATO wacce ta balle daga tsohuwar lardin Kosovo.
"Amurkawa da Turkawa da kuma Jamusawa suna kokarin kulawa da 'ya 'yansu abin masonsu " in ji Vucic, yana nufin Kosovo.
Ya ce yana Amurka a kwanan nan ta kai wa sojojon Kosovo motoci masu sulke masu yawa.

A yayin da ya ke ziyarar rundunar sojojojin yakin motocin sulke, Vucic ya ce kasarsa ba za ta iya gasa da makwabtanta ba da ake yi"kyautar da kungiyar NATO ba ta fuskar makamai", don haka dole ne mu yi mu kadai da kanmu."

Vucic bai fada takaimaimai irin jiragen saman yakin da Serbia ta ke da shirin saya ba. Amma kafofin yada labarai masu goyon bayan gwamanati na cewa gwamnatinsa a hukumance ta bukaci Amurka da ta ba su jiragen saman yaki guda 20 samfurin fighters-Bombers.
Rahotanni na cewa Washington ba ta ce komai ba dangane da bukatar ta Belgrade in kuma ta ki, toh, da akwai da yiwuwar za ta sayi jiragen na yaki guda 25 na kasar Russia samfurin Sukhoi na kai hari.

Kasar Serbia, wacce ta yi ikirarin matsayi 'yar baruwanmu ta fuskar soji, a baya-bayan nan ta karbi wasu na'urori na zamani da kakkabo jiragen sanman yaki daga Russia, wacce kuma ta bata jiragen yaki, da jiragen saman masu saukar ungulu na kai hari da kuma motoci masu sulke.
Wata kawar Serbia, China ta kai mata taimakon jirage masu sarrafa kansu na soji.

Jami'an Amurka a baya sun yi magana a bayyane akan kakabawa Serbia takunkumi idan Mascow ta sake aika mata da karin wasu makamai, musamman wadanda za su iya jefa harkar tsaron kasashen NATO mai makwabtaka cin hadari.
Kasashen yamma da kuma wasu makwabtan Serbia na kallon samar da makaman da kasar China da Russia ke yi da faraba.
Hankula na kara tashi yankin na Balkan, wacce ta ke farfadowa daga wani kazamin yakin basasa a shekarun 1990.
Kungiyar Tsaro ta NATO ta shiga tsakani a Serbia domin dakatar da yawan zub da jinin Serbi kan 'yan aware Albaniyawa a Kosovo a shekarun 1999.
Duk da cewa ta nemi ta shiga cikin Kungiyar Tarayyar Turai, Shugaban Serbia mai farijn jini ya kara inganta alakar siyasa da sojin kasar da Kremlin da kuma Beijing.
Serbia da Russia da kuma China ba su amince da 'yancin cin gashin kan Kosovo ba, wacce ta samu amincewar Amurka da kuma yawancin kasashen Turai.
Serbia seeks more warplanes amid Balkan tensions
BELGRADE, Serbia (AP) - Serbia will strengthen its armed forces and is seeking to purchase more warplanes amid simmering tensions in the Balkans, the Serbian president said Sunday.

President Aleksandar Vucic said "certain initiatives" have been made to buy a fleet of fighter-bombers, accusing the U.S. and other Western countries of arming Serbia's NATO neighbors and its breakaway former province of Kosovo.
"The Americans, Turks and Germans are taking care of their beloved child," Vucic said, referring to Kosovo.
He said the U.S. has recently delivered a number of armored vehicles to Kosovo's security forces.
During a tour of a Serbian army tank brigade, Vucic said his country cannot compete with "NATO donations" to its neighbors when it comes to weapons, "therefore we must do it alone."
Vucic did not specify what type of warplanes Serbia plans to buy, but the pro-government media said his government has officially asked the U.S. for the delivery of 20 fighter-bombers.
The reports said Washington has not yet responded to Belgrade's request and that in case of a refusal, it is likely to purchase Russian-made Sukhoi-25 attack aircraft.
Serbia, which claims military neutrality, has recently received a sophisticated anti-aircraft system from Russia, which has also provided fighter jets, attack helicopters and armored vehicles.
Another Serbian ally, China, has delivered military drones.

U.S. officials have in the past spoken openly about introducing sanctions against Serbia if Moscow sends more arms to the country, especially those that could jeopardize the security of neighboring NATO-member states.
The Russian and Chinese arming of Serbia is being watched with unease in the West and among Serbia's neighbors.
Tensions are growing in the Balkans, which went through a devastating civil war in the 1990s.
NATO intervened in Serbia to stop a bloody Serb crackdown against Kosovo Albanian separatists in 1999.
Despite formally seeking to join the European Union, Serbia's populist leadership has further strengthened close political and military ties with the Kremlin, as well as Beijing.
Serbia, as well as Russia and China, don't accept Kosovo's independence, which is recognized by the U.S. and most of the West.
Karbar Bakuncin CIIE Ya Alamta Burin Sin Na Raba Damarmakinta Sauran Duniya.

Shugaban kasar Sin Xi Jinping, ya ce karbar bakuncin bikin baje kolin kayayyakin da ake shigowa da su kasar Sin ko CIIE a takaice karo na 3, ya alamta matukar burin kasar Sin na raba damarmakinta na kasuwa da sauran sassan duniya, tare da ba da gudummawa ga farfadowar tattalin arzikin duniya baki daya.

Xi wanda ya gabatar da jawabin bude taron na bana, da aka bude da almurun yau Laraba ta kafar bidiyo, ya ce ya dace a nace kan manufar gudanar da harkokin kasa da kasa ta hanyar tattaunawa, tare kuma da kiyaye tsarin cinikayya dake tsakanin bangarori daban daban karkashin jagorancin hukumar cinikayyar duniya, ta yadda za a ingiza gina tattalin arzikin duniya ba tare da rufa rufa ba.

Xi ya ci gaba da cewa, kasar Sin ta gabatar da manufar kara cudanya a kasuwar gida, tare kuma da kara cudanya a kasuwannin kasa da kasa, domin biyan bukatun gida, tare kuma da amfanin al'ummun kasa da kasa.

Xi ya kara da cewa, kasar Sin tana da al'umma masu yawan biliyan 1.4, a ciki, adadin mutanen da suka samu kudin shiga har kudin Sin yuan wajen dubu biyar a kowanne wata ya kai miliyan 400, a don haka kasar Sin ta kasance babbar kasuwa a duniya, har ma ana hasashen cewa, a cikin shekaru goma masu zuwa, gaba daya adadin kayayyakin da za a shigo da su kasar Sin zai kai dala triliyan 22.
Shugaban kasar Sin Xi Jinping, ya bayyana sababbin matakai da kasarsa za ta aiwatar a fannin bude kofa daga dukkanin fannoni.
Shugaban ya bayyana hakan ne cikin jawabinsa, na bude bikin baje kolin kasa da kasa na kayayyakin da ake shigowa da su Sin karo na 3 ko CIIE na birnin Shanghai.

Shugaban ya ce kasarsa, za ta bullo da jerin hajojin da za a dakatar, a fannin cinikayyar hidimomi na kasa da kasa, za ta kuma fadada wasu sassan, kamar na raya tattalin arziki ta amfani da fasahohin zamani na yanar gizo, da zurfafa sauye sauye, da kirkire kirkire a fannin cinikayya da zuba jari, da sakarwa kasuwa mara, da samar da kyakkyawan yanayi.

Kazalika a cewar shugaba Xi, Sin za ta rage jerin fasahohin da aka hana, ko aka takaita shigo da su, ta yadda hakan zai ba da damar samar da kyakkyawan yanayi na musayar fasahohin zamani tsakanin kasa da kasa.

Bugu da kari, Sin za ta ci gaba da inganta tsarin shari'ar ta, ta yadda zai dace da na kasa da kasa ta fuskar kara bude kofa, da yin komai a bude, da karfafa kariya ga ikon mallakar fasaha, da ma yadda za su samar da kariyar shari'a, da moriyar masu zuba jari na kasashen waje.
Ya ce Sin a shirye take, ta sanya hannu kan yarjeniyoyin cinikayya cikin yanci masu inganci, tare da sauran kasashen duniya.
CIIE Hosts China's Aim to Share Its Opportunities with the World

Chinese President Xi Jinping has said that hosting the 3rd China Import and Export Exhibition (CIIE) is a sign of China's determination to share its market opportunities with the rest of the world and make contributions. for the global economic recovery.

Xi, who delivered a speech at the opening of this year's summit, which opened on Wednesday, said that it is important to adhere to the principle of international cooperation through dialogue and the maintenance of bilateral trade different under the direction of the World Trade Organization, so as to push the construction of the global economy without closing.
Xi said China has pursued a policy of expanding domestic market linkages and expanding international markets to meet domestic needs and the interests of the international community.

Xi added that China has a population of 1.4 billion, with a total income of about 5,000 yuan a month, which is about the world's largest market, and it is projected that in the next decade, China's total imports will reach $ 22 trillion.
Chinese President Xi Jinping has announced new steps to be taken by his country in opening up in all fields.
He made the remarks at the opening ceremony of the 3rd China Import and Export Exhibition (CIIE) in Shanghai.

The president said his country would introduce a series of suspended sanctions in the field of international services trade, expand its sectors, such as economic development through the use of modern technology, and deepen transformation, innovation in trade and investment, free trade, and creating a conducive environment.

Furthermore, according to President Xi Jinping, China will reduce the number of technologies that are banned or restricted, so as to create a favorable environment for the exchange of modern technology between nations.

In addition, China will continue to improve its legal system in line with international standards in terms of opening up, transparency and strengthening protection of intellectual property rights, and to provide legal protection, and the interests of foreign investors.
He said China is ready to sign free trade agreements with the rest of the world.
An Kashe Sama Da Mutum 60 a Wani Hari a Sudan.

Rahotannin sun ce an kashe sama da mutum 60 kana kusan wasu su 60 sun jikkata a ranar Asabar a lokacin wani harin makamai a wani kauye da ke yankin Dafur a Sudan wanda ke yawan fuskantar tashin hankali, a cewar hukumar kula da ayyukan jinkai ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya da yammacin ranar Lahadi 26 ga watan Yuli.

Harin na kauyen Masteri da ke yammacin jihar Darfur "shine na baya-baya a cikin jerin matsalolin tsaro da aka sanar a makon da ya gabata wanda ya yi sanadiyyar kona kauyuka da gidaje da yawa, kana aka wawushe dukiyoyi a kasuwanni da shaguna, aka kuma lalata gine-gine", a cewar sanarwar hukumar ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya.
Sai dai hukumar ba ta yi wani karin bayani a kan majiyarta ba.
Ya zuwa yanzu babu wani bayani a hukumance daga gwamnatin kasar a kan harin, kuma kamfanin dillancin labaran Reuters bai samu damar tuntubuar jami'ai domin karin bayani ba.
A ranar Lahadi, Sudan ta ce za ta jibge rundunar tsaron hadin gwiwa daga jihohi da yawa a Darfur biyo bayan sake kunnowar tashin hankalin kwanan nan a wurin, a cewar SUNA, kafar yada labaran kasar.
More than 60 killed in Sudan attack.

Reports says more than 60 people were killed and at least 60 others injured on Saturday during an armed attack on a village in Sudan's troubled Darfur region, according to the United Nations humanitarian agency on Sunday 26th July in the evening.

The attack on Masteri village in western Darfur state "is the latest in a series of security crackdowns announced last week that have resulted in the burning of many villages and houses, looting of markets and shops, and damaging buildings ", according to the UN statement.
However, the commission did not comment further on the source.
Up to now, there has been no official word from the government on the attack, and Reuters has not been able to contact officials for more information.
On Sunday, Sudan said it would deploy a joint security force from several states in Darfur following the recent resumption of violence there, according to SUNA, the country's state-run media.
Shin ko yarima Andrew zai shiga cikin jerin masu abin kunyar neman mata?
Masarauta na shirin mayar da martani kan wata yiwuwar bankada da ake shirin yi a bisa wasu takardu na Kotu kan samartakansa da Jeffery Epstein da Ghislaine Maxwell
Wani alkali a Amurka ya bayar da umarnin bayyana wasu takardu na sirri da suka danganci Epstein da kuma Maxwell
Takardun masu shafi 80 na dauke da sassa na shaidar da Maxwell ya bayar a shekarar 2016
Fito da takardun a na iya sa Yarima Andrew cikin matsin lamba saboda suna dauke da wasu wasiku tsakanin Maxwell da Epstien daga watan Janairu 2015
Virginia Roberts wacce a ke zargin dadiron attajiri mai abin kunyar nan, ta yi ikirarin cewa a shekarar 2015 a cikin takardun na Kotu cewa, an tilasta mata yin jama'i da yarima Andrew

Yarima ya yi shirin yakar yiwuwar sakin wadannan bayanai a wannan mako na jerin tonon asiri masu zub da mutunci game da alakarsa da mai lalata da yara kanana Jeffery Eptein da kuma wanda ake zargin suna tare Ghislain Maxwell.

Alkalin wata Kotu a Amurka Loretta Preska a makon da ya wuce ta bayar da umarnin fitar da takardun na sirri masu shafuka 80 na sharia, wadanda suka kai shafuka ɗari masu alaka da Maxwell da kuma Epstein.

Wallafa wadannan takardu zai zama wani babban nakasu ga Maxwell dan shekara 58, domin sun kunshi wasu sassa masu yawa na shaidar da ta bayar ga lauyoyi a shekarar 2016, ciki har da abin da nata lauyoyin suka kira "tambayoyin kwakwa" kan rayuwar jam'inta.

Hakan kuma zai iya kai wa ga matsin lamba kan Yarima Andrew saboda daya daga cikin takaradun ya kunshi wasiku tsakanin Maxwell da Epstein tun daga watan Janairun shekarar 2015 a lokacin da Virgina Roberts wata dadiron da ake zargi ta attajiri mai abin kunya, a ikirarin da ta yi kamar yadda ya kunsa a cikin takardun na Kotu cewa an tilasta mata yin jima'i da Yarima a lokuta daban-daban har sau uku.
Yariman ya tsaya kai da fata, a kuma lokuta da yawa ya karyata wannan ikirarin.
A wata wasika ta emel da aka tsegunta ta a shekarar 2015 wacce kuma BBC ta yada, na nuna cewe Andrew ya nemi taimakon Maxwell kan yadda zai yi da ikirarin da Virginia Roberts yi game da shi.
Ba ma tantanma cewa gaskiyar Yariman mai rike da sarautar Duke za ta bayyana
A cikin ta, yana mai harkar shakatawa na jama'a: "Ka sanar dani lokacin da za mu yi magana. Ina da wasu tambayoyi ne da na ke so zan yi maka kan Virginia Roberts."
Maxwell ya amsa da cewa: "Ina da wasu bayanai. Ka kira ni a duk da ka ke da lokaci."

A daren jiya, a cewar wata majiya da ke kusa da Andrew na mai cewa: Yariman mai sarautar hakimin York ba wani abu da ya yi na Allah wadai, don haka mu babu da wani abu da ya daga mana hankali dangane da sakin wasu takardu na Kotu.
Kamar yadda kotunan Amurka suke ta fama da kokarin nunawa, don kawai an shigar da wani zargi a takardun kotu hakan bai sa zarge-zargen sun zama gaskiya ba.
"Kotunan na Amurka sun yi kira ga kafofin yada labarai da kuma jama'ar gari da su yi matukar taka tsan-tsan da duk wasu zarge-zarge da ke cikin takardun na kotu.
Mu ma mun amince da hakan kacokam.
Mu ba ma haufin cewa gaskiyar yarima zata fito ne kuma za a wanke shi cikin 'yan makonni masu zuwa."

Ana tsare da Maxwell ne a wata cibiyar tsare jama'a ta Manhattan da ke tsakiyar birni, a na tsare da shi ne bisa jiran sharia'a da ya ke yi kan laifin da ake zarginsa da aikatawa na dauka da kuma shirya wasu daga cikin yara masu kananan shekaru da Epstein ya ribato a tsakanin shekarun 1994 da kuma 1997.
An kuma zarge shi da laifin yin shaidar zur da kuma karyar da ta yi na nuna rashin sanin matsayin shari'a kan cin zarafin da yake yi.
Ta musanta duk tuhume-tuhumen da ake yi mata.
Wasu Lauyoyi sun yi hira da ita cikin watan Afrilu da Yuli shekarar 2016 a cikin wani bangare na karar bata suna da Misisi Robert ta shigar, wacce yanzu ta ke amsa sunan mijin da ta aura Giuffre.

Kimanin shafuka 40 cikin adadin shafuka 418 na shaidar da aka bayar aka kuma fito da su baynar jama'a a shekarar da ta wuce, amma bayan yanke hukuncin kotu wacce mai shari'a Preska ta yi a New York, za a iya sakin wasu sassan nan da ranar Alhamis.
An ba Lauyoyin Maxwell mako guda su daukaka kara.
An gano gawar Epstein a dakinsa a gidan yarin da ya ke tsare a New York a shekara da ta wuce, ya mutu yana jiran yanke hukuncin alkali a zarge-zargen da ake yi masa kan laifukan da suka shafi jima'i.
Will Prince Andrew be named in new sex dossier?
Royal prepares to fight back against possible disclosure in court documents about his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell
US Judge ordered release of secret documents relating to Epstein and Maxwell
The 80 pages of documents contain sections of Maxwell's 2016 testimonies
Release of the pages could also heap pressure on Prince Andrew as they include communications between Maxwell and Epstein from January 2015
Virginia Roberts, an alleged sex slave of the shamed US financier, claimed in 2015 court papers that she was forced to have sex with Prince Andrew

Prince Andrew is preparing to fight back against the possible disclosure this week of further damaging allegations about his friendship with paedophile Jeffrey Epstein and alleged accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell.
US District Judge Loretta Preska last week ordered the release of 80 secret legal documents, running to hundreds of pages, relating to Maxwell and Epstein.

The publication of the vast tranche of papers would be a blow for Maxwell, 58, as they feature large sections of testimony she gave to lawyers in 2016, including what her legal team said was "intrusive questioning" about her sex life.

They could also heap pressure on Prince Andrew because one of the documents includes communications between Maxwell and Epstein from January 2015, when Virginia Roberts, an alleged sex slave of the shamed US financier, claimed in court papers that she was forced to have sex with the Prince on three occasions.
Andrew has repeatedly and strenuously denied the claims.
A leaked email from 2015 that was revealed last year by the BBC appears to suggest that Andrew asked for Maxwell's help in dealing with Ms Roberts's claims.
We have no doubt the Duke will be vindicated
In it, he told the socialite: "Let me know when we can talk. Got some specific questions to ask you about Virginia Roberts."
Maxwell replied: "Have some info. Call me when you have a moment."
Last night, a source close to Andrew said: "The Duke of York has done nothing wrong, so we are relaxed about the unsealing of any court documents.
As the US courts have been at pains to point out, just because an allegation is included in court papers does not make them true.
"The US courts have urged the media and public to treat any allegations contained in court papers with extreme caution.
We entirely concur.
We have no doubt the Duke will be completely vindicated in the weeks ahead."
Maxwell is being held in Manhattan's Metropolitan Detention Center awaiting trial for recruiting and grooming some of Epstein's underage victims between 1994 and 1997.
She is also accused of perjury for denying knowledge in legal depositions of his abuse.
She denies all the allegations.
Maxwell was interviewed by lawyers in April and July 2016 as part of a defamation lawsuit brought by Ms Roberts, who now goes by her married surname Giuffre.
About 40 of 418 pages of that testimony were made public last year, but following last week's ruling by Judge Preska in New York, further sections could be unsealed as early as Thursday.
Maxwell's lawyers were given a week to file an appeal.
Epstein was found dead in his New York prison cell last year while he was awaiting trial for sex offences.
Masu zanga-zanga a Seattle sun yi arangama da 'yan sanda shirin karo yawan jami'an tsaro na tarayya

'Yan sanda a Seattle sun yi amfani da abubuwan fashewa marasa hadari da barkonon tsohuwa a ranar Asabar kan masu zanga-zaga wadanda suka cinna wuta kan motocin gine-gine da ke ajiye a kofar wani gidan yari na matasa ana tsaka da fushi kan shirin Shugaba Donald Trump karo jami'an tsaro na tarayya a manyan birane.

Karar fashewar abubuwan akai-akaina ya cika kan tituna da ke cikin birnin jihar Washington, hayaki ya tashi daga wuraren da ake yin zanga-zangar a inda suka cinnawa motocin masu gine-gine da aka ajiye a kofar wata cibiyar tsare matasa da ake ginawa.
Masu zanga-zangar sun yanka tayoyin motocin tare da farfasa tagoginsu.
'Yan sanda a cikin shirin yaki da tarzoma su yi taho mu gama da 'yan zanga zangar wandanda yawancinsu suna rike da lema don kare kansu daga burbushin barkonon tsohuwa da ake fesawa.
Jaridar Seattle Times ta bayar da rahoton cewa 'yan sanda sun ce sun kama mutane 16 a bisa zargin kai hari kan Jami'an 'yan sanda, da tare hanya da kuma kin fashewa daga wurin.
Seattle protesters clash with police over Trump's 'surge' of federal agents plan

Police in Seattle used flashbang grenades and pepper spray on Saturday against protesters who set fire to construction trailers outside a youth jail, amid a wave of public anger over President Donald Trump's planned "surge" of federal agents into major cities.
