The sounds of repeated small detonations rang out in the streets of the city in Washington state, and smoke rose from an area where demonstrators had set fire to trailers by a construction site for the youth detention facility.
Demonstrators slashed car tires and smashed trailer windows.
Police in riot gear faced off against the demonstrators, some of whom held up umbrellas against falling pellets of pepper spray.
The Seattle Times newspaper quoted police as saying 16 people were arrested on suspicion of assault against officers, obstruction and failure to disperse.
Yanayin Gareth Bale a Real Madrid 'bai gamsar da kowa ba', in ji Toni Kroos
Dan wasan tsakiya na Real Madrid Toni Kroos ya ce halin da Gareth Bale ke ciki a kungiyar ta Sipaniya 'bai gamsar da kowa ba'.

Bale bai taka rawar a zo a gani ba a duk wasanni bakwai da suka gabata, kuma ya kasance mutum ne na daban a bikin da Los Blancos ke yi na bikin LaLiga gabanin tsawaita lokacin bazara yayin da dan wasan ke son ci gaba da zama tare da ganin kwantiraginsa kuma kungiyar na fatan zai tafi.
"Babu wata hanyar da za a kaucewa lamarin kasancewar bai gamsar da kowa ba," in ji Kroos a hirarsa da Lauschangriff Endlich mit Sport! wani shiri na podcast.
"Tabbas ba su sanya masa hannu ba don ya taka leda a taikaice ba kamar yadda yake a yanzu.
"Ina ganin a ka'ida ya so barin kulob din a bazarar da ta gabata kuma kungiyar ta ce 'eh' bisa manufa sannan kuma 'a'a' bayan haka.
"Ban sani ba ko har yanzu yana ɗan fushi saboda wannan. Abin da 'yar matsala."
Da aka tambaye shi ko lamarin ya yi wani mummunan tasiri ga yanayin kungiyar ta Real, Kroos ya ce: "Tabbas bai kai yadda za a iya tsammani ba.
"Komai yana tafiya daidai a kungiyar. Na san shi tsawon shekaru shida kuma mun samu nasara a wasu muhimman abubuwa tare."
Gareth Bale's situation at Real Madrid is 'unsatisfactory for everyone', says Toni Kroos
Real Madrid midfielder Toni Kroos says Gareth Bale's situation at the Spanish side is 'unsatisfactory for everyone'.

Bale did not feature in any of the last seven games and was a peripheral figure in Los Blancos' LaLiga celebrations ahead of a summer stand-off as the player looks to stay and see out his contract and the club hope he will leave.
"There is no way to avoid the situation being unsatisfactory for everyone," Kroos told the Lauschangriff Endlich was mit Sport! podcast.
"They certainly didn't sign him to play as little as he is now.
"I think in principle he wanted to leave last summer and that the club said 'yes' in principle and then 'no' after that.
"I don't know if he's still a little angry because of that. It's a difficult matter."
Asked if the situation had a negative effect on the atmosphere at Real, Kroos said: "Certainly not as much as it might seem.
"Everything is good with the team. I have known him for six years and we have won some important things together."
KORONA: Dole ka saka Takunkumin Fuska idan ka shiga jama'a a Kano -Inji Ganduje.
Gwamnatin jihar Kano ta raba wa kungiyoyi takunkumin fuska guda miliyan biyu domin dakile yaduwar cutar Korona a jihar.
Gwamnan jihar Abdullahi Ganduje ya raba takunkumin ranar Lahadi ga kungiyoyin ƴan kasuwa, dalibai, NARTO, NURTW da sharadin cewa za su jajirce wajen amfani da su.
Gwamna Ganduje ya kuma saka dokar sa takunkumin fuska dole musamman a lokacin da mutum zai shiga cikin jama'a jihar.
Gwamnati na kokarin ganin an samu dawwamammiyar hanyar dakile yaduwar cutar Covid-19 a jihar da hakan ya zama dole mutane su kiyaye dokoki da sharuddan gujewa kamuwa da cutar.
Mutane a jihar basu kaunar saka takunkumin fuska musamman idan suna cikin jama'a.
Daga yanzu gwamnati ta umarci Jami'an tsaro domin tilasta wa mutane suna saka takunkumin fuska dole.
Gwamnati ta yi Kira ga kungiyoyin NARTO NURTW da su rika amfani da takunkumin fuska sannan direbobi su tabbatar duk fasinjar da za su dauka ya saka takunkumin.
Bayan haka mataimakin gwamnan jihar Nasiru Gawuna ya ce kwanakin baya gwamnati ta raba takunkumin fuska miliyan uku ga kungiyoyi a jihar domin hana yaduwar cutar.
Gawuna ya Yi Kira ga mutane da su hada hannu da gwamnati domin ganin an dakile yaduwar cutar Covid-19 a jihar.
Mai martaba sarkin Kano Aminu Bayero ya Yi Kira ga mutane da su kiyaye sharudda da dokokin gujewa kamuwa da cutar da gwamnati ta saka musamman a lokacin shagulgulan babbar Sallah.
KORONA: You must wear face mask if you are in public in Kano - Ganduje.
The Kano State Government has distributed 2 million face mask to groups to curb the spread of Corona in the state.
State Governor Abdullahi Ganduje on Sunday distributed face masks to trade unions, students, NARTO, NURTW on the condition that they remain committed to using them.
Ganduje also imposed mandatory sanctions, especially when is in public in the people of the state.
The government is working to find a lasting way to curb the spread of Covid-19 in the state and people must abide by the rules and regulations to avoid contracting the disease.
People in the state do not like to wear face mask especially when they are in public.
The government has now ordered security forces to force people to impose sanctions.
The government has called on NARTO NURTW to use face mask and drivers to ensure that all passengers they carry wears face mask.
Meanwhile, the deputy governor of the state, Nasiru Gawuna, said the government had recently distributed three million face masks to groups in the state to curb the spread of the disease.
Meanwhile, the deputy governor of the state, Nasiru Gawuna, said the government had recently distributed three million face masks to groups in the state to curb the spread of the disease.
His Highness the Emir of Kano Aminu Bayero has called on the people to abide by the rules and regulations set by the government, to avoid infection especially during the annual Eid celebration
Masu zanga-zangar wariyar launin fata sun yi arangama da 'yan sanda a Seattle

An yi arangama da tsakanin 'yan sanda da masu zanga-zangar nuna wariyar launin fata wanda ya haifar da kame mutane da yawa a ranar Lahadi, yayin da fushin al'umma ya ke karuwa akan a shirin Donald Trump na "kara" yawan jami'an tsaro na tarayya a manyan birane.

Jerin zanga-zanga kan banbancin launin fata da kuma zaluncin 'yan sanda ya samo asali ne daga kisan George Floyd wani bakar fata ba Amurke dan asalin Africa a Minneapolis wanda ba ya dauke da makami a watan Mayu.

Masu zanga-zangan a Seattle sun yanka tayoyin motoci da kuma farfasa tagoginsu a yayin zanga-zangar a ranar Asabar, wanda hakan ya sa 'yan sanda su kaddamar da yaki da tarzoma su kuma tarwatsa su ta yadda za su bude tituna tare da yin feshin barkonon tsohuwa da kuma tayar da kananan abubuwan fashewa.
Masu zanga - zanga sun cinnawa wasu kananan motoci na wasu kamfanonin gine-gine da ke ginin swara cibiya ta tsare matasa.
'Yan sanda sun ce mutane 45 aka kama yayin da jami'an 'yan sanda 21 aka ji wa ciwo.
Zanga-zangar na goyon bayan irin wannan zanga-zanga ne Portland da ke kusa, Oregon.

Portland ta zama cibiyar gumurzu da Jami'an tsaro na gwmantin tarayya wanda a bisa umarnin Trump da suka janyo cece-ku-ce, daya daga cikin wanda ba shi da goyon bayan jami'ai na garin da suka ce an fi amfani da karfi da ya wuce kima.
Masu zanga-zangar sun yi fito kan tituna a Austin ta Texas da kuma Louisville ta Kentucky; da New York; da Omaha ta Nebraska; da Oakland ta California da Los Angeles, da kuma Richmond da ke Virginia.
A Austin, an kashe wani mutum a wani harbe-harbe da ya barke a daren Asabar wata zanga-zanga da aka yi a tsakiyar babban birnin Texas a cewar 'yan sanda.

Wadannan zanga-zanga na zuwa ne bayan da Trump ya ke fuskantar wani kalubale mai wuya na neman a sake zabarsa a watan Nuwamba, kuma a yayin da yake yakin neman saka zaben nasa a kan "tabbatar da doka da oda."
Anti-racism protesters clash with police in Seattle

Clashes in Seattle between police and anti-racism protesters resulted in dozens of arrests on Sunday, as public anger mounts over US President Donald Trump's planned "surge" of federal agents into main cities.
Demonstrations against racism and police brutality have been ignited by the death in Minneapolis of unarmed African-American George Floyd in May.

Protesters in Seattle slashed car tires and smashed trailer windows during the demonstrations on Saturday, prompting police to declare a riot and clear the streets with pepper spray and flash-bang grenades.
Protesters also set fire to trailers by a construction site for a youth detention facility.
Police said 45 people were arrested while 21 officers were injured.
The march was in support of ongoing protests in nearby Portland, Oregon.
Portland has taken centre stage for the highly controversial crackdown by federal agents ordered by Trump -- one that is not supported by local officials, who say officers use excessive force.
Protesters have marched in Austin, Texas, as well as Louisville, Kentucky; New York; Omaha, Nebraska; California's Oakland and Los Angeles, and Richmond in Virginia.
In Austin, a man was killed in a shooting that broke out Saturday night at a protest in the downtown area of the Texas state capital, police said.
The protests come as Trump faces an increasingly tough battle for re-election in November, and is campaigning on a "law and order" platform.
Jeetandra, Shobha Ekata da kuma Tusshar Kapoor sun tuna baya ciki kasaita
Jarumin fina-finai Tusshar Kapoor a ranar Lahadi ya yada wasu hotuna kuciyarsa cikin kasaita don murnar bikin zagayowar ranara iyaye ta duniya.

Jarumin ya yada wasu jerin hotuna da suka kunshi hotunansa yana yaro shi da mahaifinsa Jeetendra da babansa Shobha da kuma kuna kaawarsa Ekta Kapoor da kuma wani na baya-bayannan da ke dauke da shi da dansa.
A tsohon hoton maras launi, an ga jarumi Jeetendra ya yi tsayuwar daukar hoto yana rike dan jariri Tusshar da Ekta Kapoor a hannunsa.
Ana iya ganin matar Jeetendra a tsaye kusa da mutanen uku a cikin hoton.
A hoto na biyu Tusshar Kappor da dansa Laksshya na tsaye cikin fara'a da annashuwa suna kallon Kamara.
A rubutun da ya saka a jikin hoton da ya yada, ya rubuta "Ina taya ku murnar zagayowar ranar tunawa da iyaye"
Tusshar Kapoor yana zaune da 'ya'yansa da ba uwa.
An haifi Lakshiya ne ta hanyar daukar cikinta a wajen mahaifa a shakarar 2016.
Wadansu lokutan jarimin na yada hotunan da bidiyon karamin dan na sa a shafukan sada zumunta na Instagram.
A bangaren aiki kuwa, ganin karshe da aka yiwa Tusshar Kapoor shine a Sabki Phategi.
Ana sa ran sake ganinsa ne a fim din 'Laxmmi Bomb' wanda Raghava Lawarence ya bayar da umarni.
A cikin fin din da akwai kuma Akshay Kumar da Kiara Advani.

A daya bangaren kuma Ekita Kapoor ya shirya wasu shirya-shiryen Talbijin da kuma Fim kamar su Dream Girl da Hum Paanch da Dolly Kitty aur Chamakte Sitare, da Ye Hai Mohabbatein, da Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii da kuma Kasturi da sauransu.
Jeetendra, Shobha, Ekta And Tusshar Kapoor In A Major Blast From The Past
Actor Tusshar Kapoor, on Sunday, shared a special blast from the past to celebrate Parents' Day.
The actor shared an album, comprising a throwback picture of himself, his father Jeetendra, mother Shobha and sister Ekta Kapoor, and a recent one featuring his son.
In the old black and white photograph, actor Jeetendra can be seen posing for the camera while holding tiny Tusshar and Ekta Kapoor in his arms.
Jeetendra's wife can be seen standing near the trio in the picture.
In the second photo, Tusshar Kapoor and his son Laksshya can be seen smiling with all their heart for the camera.
Sharing the photos, Tusshar Kapoor captioned it: "Happy Parents' Day."
Tusshar Kapoor is a single parent.
Laksshya was born via surrogacy in the year 2016.
The actor often shares pictures and videos of his little son on Instagram.
In terms of work, Tusshar Kapoor was last seen in Booo Sabki Phategi.
He will be next seen in Laxmmi Bomb, which has been directed by Raghava Lawrence.
The film also features Akshay Kumar and Kiara Advani.

Ekta Kapoor, on the other hand, has produced several television shows and films such as Dream Girl, Hum Paanch, Dolly Kitty Aur Woh Chamakte Sitare, Ye Hai Mohabbatein, Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii and Kasturi among others.
Na Ci Alwashin Cika Wa Buhari Burinsa - Magashi - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Ministan Harkokin Tsaro a Nijeriya, Manjo Janar Bashir Salihi Magashi (mai ritaya), ya ce, ya ci alwashin cika wa Shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari babban burinsa na tabbatar da cewa, gwamnatinsa ta kawo karshen matsalar tsaro a fadin tarayyar kasar.

Bayanin hakan ya na kunshe ne a cikin sanarwar da ministan ya bayar mai dauke da sa hannun mai taimaka ma sa kan harkokin yada labarai, Mohammad Abdulkadir, a Abuja yayin cikarsa shekara daya a matsayin minista.
Ya na mai cewa, zai yi hakan ne kasancewar Buhari a matsayin Babban Kwamandan Askarawan Nijeriya, wanda ya sadaukar da kansa ga kasar ba tare da son kai ko kasala ba.
Janar Magashi ya kuma gode wa Shugaba Buhari bisa damar da ya ba shi ta bauta wa kasarsa ta haihuwa, ya na mai cewa, yanzu ne ma su ka fara aiki tukuru ga Nijeriya da Ƴan Nijeriya.

A yayin da ya ke tabbatar da irin goyon bayan da Shugaban Kasar ya ke bai wa rundunonin sojan kasar, domin kawo karshen matsalolin tsaron da su ka shafi na ƴan tayar da kayar baya, satar mutane da garkuwa da su da kuma ƴan bindiga, Janar Magashi ya bayyana kwarin gwiwarsa da cewa, lallai haske na nan tafe a karshen al'amarin.

Daga nan sai ya yi kira ga dukkan Shugabannin Rundunonin Tsaron Nijeriya da su sake tashi tsaye wajen nuna kishin kasarsu, ya na mai karawa da kiran su da su rika yin aiki tare, domin nauyi ne wanda ya rataya a wuyan dukkan ƴan Nijeriya.
A karshe ya gode wa sojojin kasar da kuma dukkan masu ruwa da tsaki a harkokin tsaron Nijeriya bisa irin goyon bayan da su ke ba shi a tsawon kwanaki 365 da ya kwashe a ofis.
I Vow To Fulfill Buhari's Goal - Magashi - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Nigeria's Minister of Defense, Major General Bashir Salihi Magashi (rtd), has vowed to fulfill President Muhammadu Buhari's ambition to ensure that his administration puts an end to the security crisis across the federation.
The announcement was made in a statement issued by the Minister in Abuja on the occasion of his one year tenure in office, signed by his Information Assistant, Mohammad Abdulkadir.
He said he would do so because Buhari as the Commander-in-Chief of the Nigerian Armed Forces, who dedicated his life to the country unselfishly.
General Magashi also thanked President Buhari for giving him the opportunity to serve his homeland, saying that they had just started working hard for Nigeria and Nigerians.

While reaffirming the President's support for the country's armed forces, to end the security challenges posed by insurgents, kidnappings and hostilities, General Magashi he expressed optimism that light was coming at the end of the day.
He called on all Nigerian security chiefs to stand up for their country, urging them to work together as it is the responsibility of all Nigerians.
He thanked the Nigerian Army and all stakeholders in the Nigerian security forces for their support during his 365 days in office.
Bayan wania tsawon lokaci da ma'aikacin dan majalisar wakilia Vern Bucahnann ya mutu sakamakon kamuwarsa da cutar Koronabirau
"Gary cikakken ma'aikaci ne da kwarai wanda kuma ya sadaukar da kans ga aikinsa na jam'a gaba da baya", Bucahnan ya ce a shafinsa na Facebook.
" Ya taba rayuwar kowa, wadanda suka yi mu'amilla da shi ta kuasa da kusa suna kaunarsa.
Ba zan taba manta sakin fuskarsa ba da fara'arsa da kuma ganin irin jin dadin da ya ke yi wajen taimakon mutane"

Ofishin Dan Majalisar Wakilai Buchanan ya aika da wani sako ta shafinsa na dandalin sada zumunta na Twitter a farkon watan nan ida sakon ke cewa Tibbets bai yi wata mu'amilla ta aiki ba da kowa a wannan ofishi a baya-bayan nan.
Tibbets, mai wakiltar Dan Majalisar a ayyukansa na waje, ya yi aiki da Buchanan tun shekarar 2011.

Birnin Florida ta bayar da rahoton bullar alkalumman wadanda suka kamu da cutar 414,511 tun lokacin da aka bayar da labarin annobar, wannan ya haura na birnin New York da 411,200, a cewar hukiumomin lafiya na jihar.
Yawan adadin wadanda aka kwamtar a asibitit ya karu da 79% tun ranar hudu ga watan Yuli, kamar yadda alkaluma daga ma'aikatar Lafiya ana jiha ya nuna.
Sashen kula da marasa lafiya da ke bukatar kulawa ta musammam na asibitoci 50 ne suka cika taf a ranar Asabar, kamar yadda bayanan ya kunsa.
"Mun fito da wani tsarin da zai iaya tasiri" A cewar DeSantis a watan Yuni.
" A lokaci guda kuma, mu yi aikin 'yan sanda tare da sa tara kan masu aikata laifuka, wani abu ne da ba zai haifara da, da mai ido ba."
Longtime staffer of Rep. Vern Buchanan dies of coronavirus
"Gary was the consummate professional and a true public servant in every sense of the word," Buchanan said on Facebook.
"He touched so many lives and was loved and respected by those who knew him.
I will never forget his uplifting spirit, sense of humor and sheer joy at helping others."
Rep. Buchanan's office had tweeted a statement earlier this month that Tibbetts did not have any recent interactions with anyone else in the office.
Tibbetts, a field representative, had worked for Buchanan since 2011.
Florida has reported 414,511 cases since the start of the pandemic, above New York's 411,200, according to state health agencies.
The number of hospitalizations has increased by 79% since the Fourth of July, data from the state's health care administration shows.
At least 50 hospital intensive care units in Florida have reached capacity on Saturday, the agency's data shows.
"We've advised that's something that could make an impact," DeSantis said in June.
"At the same time, to do police and put criminal penalties on that is something that probably would backfire."
NEMA Ta Bada Agajin Gaggawa Ga Wadanda Ambaliyar Ruwa Ta Shafa A Katsina.
Hukumar Ba da Agajin Gaggawa ta Kasa (NEMA), ta ba da kayayyakin tallafi ga mutane 880 da ambaliyar ruwa ta shafa a Karamar Hukumar Baure, ta Jihar Katsina.
Kodinetan NEMA na Arewa maso Yamma, Alhaji Abbani Imam, ya fadi hakan lokacin da yake rarraba kayayyakin ga wadanda suka ci gajiyar a ranar Laraba a Baure, hedikwatar karamar hukumar.

Imam ya ce kayayyakin sun hada da buhunan masara 880 mai nauyin 10kg, buhu 880 na wake 10kg, katon 880 na tumatir din leda, buhu 880 na shinkafa 10kg, gidan sauro 880, jarkokin man girki 880 da katon din sabulu.
Sauran kayayyakin sun hada da buhunan siminti, da kwanon rufi, da katako, da kusa, da kayan sawa da barguna.
An samu tallafin ta hanyar kokarin Alhaji Nasir Sani, dan majalisa mai wakiltar Baure / Zango a majalisar wakilai ta tarayya domin rage wahalhalun da mutanen ke ciki.
"Mun zo nan ne domin rarraba kayayyakin da suka hada da kayan abinci da wadanda ba na abinci ba tare da fatan cewa wannan karamcin zai kawo sauki ga mutanen da abin ya shafa", in ji shi.
A nasa bayanin, Sani ya yaba wa NEMA game da wannan karamcin.
"Ya zama dole in mika alhini na da tausayawa ga mutanen Baure wadanda ambaliya ta lalata wa gidaje da gonakai" in ji shi.
Sani ya tabbatarwa da mutanen mazabarshi samun karin romon dimokiradiyya.
Ya bukaci wadanda ke kula da raba kayayyakin su zama masu adalci ga kowa.
Malam Baban-gida Nasamu, Babban Sakatare na Hukumar Ba da Agajin Gaggawa ta Jihar (SEMA), ya yaba wa NEMA kan wannan tallafi.
Ya ba da tabbacin cewa gwamnatin jihar za ta ba da irin wannan kayan ga wadanda abin ya shafa domin ci gaba da magance matsalar.
NEMA provides emergency assistance to flood victims in Katsina.
The National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA) has donated relief items to 880 flood victims in Baure Local Government Area of Katsina State.
The North West NEMA Coordinator, Alhaji Abbani Imam, made the remarks while distributing the items to the beneficiaries on Wednesday in Baure, the headquarters of the local government area.
Imam said the items included 880 bags of 10kg maize, 880 bags of 10kg beans, 880 bags of raw tomatoes, 880 bags of 10kg of rice, 880 mosquito nets, 880 bags of cooking oil and a box of soap.
Other items include cement bags, roofing sheets, wood, nails, clothing and blankets.

The relief materials was made possible through the efforts of Alhaji Nasir Sani, a Member of Parliament for Baure / Zango in the Federal House of Representatives to alleviate the suffering of the people.
“We have come here to distribute food and non-food items with the hope that this generosity will bring relief to the people affected,” he said.
In his remarks, Sani commended NEMA for this generosity.
"I must extend my deepest condolences to the people of Baure whose dwellings and farms have been devastated by the floods," he said.
Sani assured the people of his constituency of more democratic dividends.
He urged those in charge of distributing the goods to be fair to everyone.
Mr. Baban-gida Nasamu, Executive Secretary of the State Emergency Management Agency (SEMA), commended NEMA for this support.
He assured the beneficiaries that the state government would provide similar relief materials to the victims to further alleviate their suffering.
Mick Fleetwood ya yi ta'aziya ga Peter Green: 'wakokinsa za su cigaba da wanzuwa'
Mick Fleetwood ya mika ta'azziyarsa ga Peter Green, daya daga cikin wanda suka kirkiro Fleetwood Mac, wanda ya mutu ya na dan Shekara 73.
Green na daya daga cikin kungiyar makada na tarihi na asali, tare da wanda muka anbata a baya Mick, da kuma Jeremy Spencer.

Duk da cewa ya bar kungiyar makadan a shekarar 1970 kafin babbar nasarara da suka samu da faifan album dinsu kamar Rumours, Mick ya jajantawa tsohon abokin kidansa, yana mi tabbatarwa da masoyansa cewa "wake-waken da ya yi za su wanzu"
Fleetwood ya fadawa PA cewa: A gareni, kowanne dan kungiya na da, dana yanzu na Fleetwood Mac, rashin Peter kasurgumi ne.
"Peter shine mutumin da ya soma kungiyar Fleetwood Mac tare da ni kaina, da John McVie da kuma Jeremy Spencer.

Babu wanda ya taba shiga rigar Fleeetwood Mac ba tare da ya yabawa Peter Green da kuma baiwar da Allah Ya yi masa, da kuma gaskiyar cewa kida da waka ya zama mai haskakawa da kuma a koda yaushe ya ana yinsa da kauna ta gaskiya."
Dan shekara 73 mawaki tsoho mai ran karfe ya kara da Peter zan yi kawar ki, amma ka kwanta lafiya, wakarka zata cigaba da wanzuwa.
Na yi godiya matuka da ka ba ni damar zama mai kidanka a duk tsawon shekaru nan da suka wuce.
Mun yi mai kyau. Da kuma bude hanya a tafarkin waka da wasu da yawa za su hau su kuma ji dadi.
"Allah ya kiyaye hanya, babban abokina.... Ina mai kaunarka Mick Fleetwood."

Tabbatar da mutuwar Green, a wata sanarwa daga ofishin lauyoyi na Swan Turton na mai cewa: "Cikin matukar alhini iyalan Peter Green ke sanar da Rasuwarsa cikin wannan karshen makon, a cikin salama a yayin kwaciyar barcinsa.
"Wata karin sanarwar za ta biyo baya nan da'yan kwanaki"
Green ya mutu ya bar 'yarsa mai suna Rosebud Samuels -Greenbaum wacce kuma 'ya ce ga tsohuwar matarasa Jane Samuels.
Green ya kafa kamfann Fleetwood Mac tare da abokan kidansa Mick Fleetwood da Jeremy Spencer, da kuma sunan kungiyar na asali Peter Green Fletwood Mac tare da Jeremy Spencer.
Sai dai kuma, mawaki mai kuma rubutawa zi bar kungiyar a shekarara 1970 bayan sun wallafa kundin wakoki har guda hudu.

Fleetwood Mac za ta je ta cimma tashe da farin jini na duniya tare da karin wadanda suka shigo ciki da suka hada da Lindsey Buckingham da Stevie Nicks tsarin wakokin wanda ciki har da Rumours da kuma Tusk.
Mick Fleetwood pays tribute to Peter Green: 'His music will live on'
Mick Fleetwood has paid tribute to Peter Green, the co-founder of Fleetwood Mac, who died today aged 73.
Green was an original member of the iconic rock group, alongside the aforementioned Mick, as well as Jeremy Spencer.
Despite leaving the band in 1970 before their greatest successes with albums like Rumours, Mick has paid tribute to his former bandmate, assuring fans that "his music will live on."
Fleetwood told PA: "For me, and every past and present member of Fleetwood Mac, losing Peter Green is monumental.
"Peter was the man who started the band Fleetwood Mac along with myself, John McVie, and Jeremy Spencer.

No one has ever stepped into the ranks of Fleetwood Mac without a reverence for Peter Green and his talent, and to the fact that music should shine bright and always be delivered with uncompromising passion."
The 73 year old rock legend added: "Peter, I will miss you, but rest easy your music lives on.
I thank you for asking me to be your drummer all those years ago.
We did good, and trail blazed one hell of a musical road for so many to enjoy.
"God speed to you, my dearest friend....... Love Mick Fleetwood."
Confirming Green's death, a statement from Swan Turton solicitors read: "It is with great sadness that the family of Peter Green announce his death this weekend, peacefully in his sleep.
"A further statement will be provided in the coming days."
Green is survived by his daughter, Rosebud Samuels-Greenbaum, who she shared with ex-wife Jane Samuels.
Green formed Fleetwood Mac with bandmates Mick Fleetwood and Jeremy Spencer, with the band originally called Peter Green's Fleetwood Mac featuring Jeremy Spencer.
However, the singer-songwriter would leave the group in 1970, after four albums.
Fleetwood Mac would go on to achieve great acclaim and worldwide fame with additional line-ups including Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks on seminal albums including Rumours and Tusk.
Mahara sun sako matar kwamandan ƴan banga da su ka yi garkuwar da ita a Jigawa.
Maharan da suka yi garkuwa da matar kwamandan ƴan bijilante Abdullahi Suleiman su sako ta ranar Litinin da dare.
Majiya ta shaida wa PREMIUMTIMES cewa an sako Husna matar Suleiman mai shekaru 50 bayan an biya Kudin diyyar Naira miliyan 2.
Sai dai kakakin rundunar ƴan sandan jihar Audu Jinjiri, bai tabbatar ko an biya kudin fansar ba sai dai ya ce maharan sun sako Husna da karfe 10 na daren Litinin.

Bayan haka a ranar Talata wani makusancin iyalan Suleiman ya shaida wa PREMIUM TIMES cewa ƴan bindigar sun bukaci a biya su kudin fansa har naira miliyan 50, daga baya dai aka samu suka amince a biya naira miliyan 2.
Ya ce ƴan bindigan sun tsare Husna da sauran mutanen da su ka yi garkuwa da su a dajin Ringim.
Husna na gida tare da iyalinta cikin koshin lafiya.
Gunmen have released the wife of a vigilante commander they kidnapped in Jigawa.
The gunmen that kidnapped the wife of a vigilante chief Abdullahi Suleiman have released her on Monday night.
Sources told PREMIUMTIMES that the 50 years old wife, Husna, was released after a ransom of N2 million was paid.
However, the police spokesman Audu Jinjiri, did not confirm whether ransom has been paid, but said that the kidnappers released Husna at 10pm on Monday night.
Later on Tuesday, a close relative of Suleiman's family told PREMIUM TIMES that the gunmen demanded a ransom of 50 million naira, but later agreed to accept 2 million naira.
He said the gunmen held Husna and other hostages in Ringim Forest.
Husna is at home with her family in good health.
An Bada Belin Abdulrashid Maina.

Tun ranar 26 ga watan Nuwamban 2019, kotun tarayya da ke Abuja a karkashin Mai Shari'a Okon Abang ta bayar da belin Abdulrashid Maina, amma rashin cika sharrudan bayar da shi beli suka sa aka cigaba da tsare shi a kurkuku.
Daga bisani lauyoyinsa suka roki a sassauta masa sharudan belin, inda alkali ya yarda ya rage yawan Sanatoci da za su karbi belin sa zuwa guda daya.

Barista Mazi Afam Osigwe daya daga cikin lauyoyin da ke kare Maina ya fada wa VOA ta wayar tarho cewa ba a cika sharrudan belinsa ba sai da Sanata Mohammed Ali Ndume mai wakiltar yankin da Maina ya fito ya zo ya tsaya masa sannan aka bada belin sa ranar Juma'a 24 ga wannan wata na Yuli.
Mazi ya kara da cewa ba a sako shi ba sai da aka cika wasu takardu wajen bin wasu hanyoyi da ka'idojin aiki sannan aka sako shi, kana wanda ya ke wakilta yanzu haka yana zaune cikin iyalansa.
Sannan ya ce za a ci gaba da shari'ar idan kotu ta dawo hutu a cikin watan Satumba mai zuwa.

A ranar 25 ga watan Oktoban 2019, Hukumar EFCC ta gurfanar da Abdulrashid Maina tare da dansa Faisal da wani Kamfani mai suna Common Input Property and Investment Ltd a gaban babbar kotun tarayya da ke Abuja a karkashin Mai Shari'a Okon Abang inda ya ke fuskantar tuhumar cin hanci, rashawa da yin sama da fadi da biliyoyin Naira.
Abdulrashid Maina's bail was granted.

Abdulrashid Maina was granted bail by the Federal Court in Abuja under Justice Okon Abang on November 26, 2019, but his bail was not upheld for not fulfilling the bail conditions and he was remanded in custody.
His lawyers later asked for softening some of the bail conditions, with the judge agreeing to reduce the number of senators to one.

Barrister Mazi Afam Osigwe, one of Maina's lawyers, told VOA by telephone that his bail conditions were not met until Senator Mohammed Ali Ndume, representing Maina's constituency, came to stand by him and granted him bail on the same day. Friday the 24th of this month of July.
Mazi added that he was not released until certain documents and rules of procedure were completed and he was released, and that his client was now living with his family.
He said the trial would resume in September when the court return from the holiday.

On October 25, 2019, the EFCC indicted Abdulrashid Maina, his son Faisal and Common Input Property and Investment Ltd before the Federal High Court in Abuja under Justice Okon Abang on the allegations of corruption and embezzlement of billions of naira.
Cibiyar koyar da ilmin sana'o"i makaranta ce mafi kyau.
Nurimangul Obulqasim ta taba karatu a cibiyar koyar da ilmin sana'o"i a jihar Xinjiang.
Yanzu tana matsayin direkta mai kula da harkokin mata a wani kyauye, ta tuna cewa, saboda matukar talauci ba ta samu ilmi sosai ba.
Karon farko da ta shiga wannan cibiyar, ta yi mamaki sosai saboda ganin na'urorin zamani da take da su.
Ta ce, wannan cibiya makaranta ce mafi kyau a gare ta.
Daliban cibiyar suna samun darasuna 6 a ko wace rana daga Litinin zuwa Juma'a, inda suke koyon daidaitaccen Sinanci da ilmin doka da shari'a da fasahohin sana'o'i da kawar da tsattsauran ra'ayi.
A lokacin hutu na Asabar da Lahadi kuma, su kan je ayyukan addini.
Ta ce, wasu kafofin yada labarai sun ba da labari cewa, cibiyar ta cire kodar dalibanta da tilasta su aske gashinsu, wanda ta bayyana a matsayin maras tushe.
Ta ce tana maraba da wadannan kafofin yada labarai su ziyaraci Xinjiang don ganewa idanunsu hakikanin halin da ake ciki, da ma tattaunawa da daliban da suka taba samun ilmi a wannan cibiya.
Vocational training center is the best school.
Nurimangul Obulqasim once studied at a vocational training center in Xinjiang.
Now as the director of women's affairs in a village, she remembers that because of extreme poverty she did not get much education.
The first time she entered the center, she was amazed to see the state-of-the-art equipment it has.
She said this center is the best school for her.
The students of the center receive 6 lessons every day from Monday to Friday, where they learn standardized Chinese, law, legal, vocational skills and the elimination of extremism.
During the weekends, they also attend religious services.
She said some media outlets had reported that the center had removed the kidneys of its students and forced them to cut their hair, which she described as baseless.
She said she welcomes these media outlets to visit Xinjiang to get a first-hand look at the situation, as well as to talk to students who have previously studied at the center.
Amurka Na Yunkurin Kulla Dangantaka Takanin Isra'ila Da Daular Larabawa - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Gwamnatin shugaba Trump za ta aike da manyan jami'ai 2 a Gabas ta Tsakiya a wannan makon, tare da zimmar ƙarfafa yarjejeniya mai cike da tarihi tsakanin Isra'ila da Haɗaɗɗiyar Daular Larabawa, domin kafa dangantakar jakadanci.

Jami'an diflomasiyya 3 sun ce Sakataren Harkokin Wajen Amurka Mike Pompeo da babban mashawarci kuma sirikin shugaba Donald Trump Jared Kushner, sun yi shirin kai ziyarce-ziyarce a lokuta daba-daban kuma a ƙasahe da dama a yankin a ƴan kwanaki masu zuwa, domin ƙarfafa sake danganta tsakanin Daular da kuma Isra'ila.

Ana sa ran Pompeo ya tashi a yau Lahadi zuwa Isra'ila, Bahrain, Oman, Haɗaɗɗiyar Daular Larabawa, Qatar da Sudan, a cewar jami'an na difilomasiyya da suka nemi a sakaya sunansu saboda ba a kai ƙarshe ko bada sanarwar jadawalin tafiyar ba.
Shi kuwa Kushner, zai tashi ne a ƙarshen makon nan zuwa Isra'ila, Bahrain, Oman, Saudi Arebiya da Morocco.

Ana sa ran ziyarar ta su za ta kai ga ba da sanarwar cimma matsaya a cewar jami'an difilomasiyyar, duk da ya ke dukan su suna da manufa aƙalla ɗaya, ta daidaita al'amuran yarjejeniya da Isra'ila nan gaba kadan.

Haka kuma Pompeo ya shirya tattaunawa da ƴan ƙungiyar Taliban a Qatar, akan batutuwan da suka tattaunawar zaman lafiya, wanda shi zai kasance muhimmin tafarkin janye sauran dakarun Amurka a Afghanistan.

Fadar shugaban ƙasa ta White House da kuma Ma'aikatar Harkokin Wajen Amurka ba su sharhi akan ziyarce-ziyarcen da ba za su kasance wani mataki na gwamnatin Amurkar na ƙarfafa ɗinke ɓaraka tsakanin Daular Larabawa da Isra'ila, duk kuwa da cewa ba a sami cimma daidaito ba akan tankiya tsakanin Isra'ila da Palasɗinu.
US attempts to forge closer ties between Israel and the United Arab Emirates - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

President Trump's administration will send two top officials to the Middle East this week, with the aim of strengthening a historic agreement between Israel and the United Arab Emirates, to establish diplomatic relations.

Three diplomats say US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and President Donald Trump's top adviser Jared Kushner plan to visit the region at various times in the next few days, because to strengthen the re-establishment of relations between the Empire and Israel.

Pompeo is expected to fly on Sunday to Israel, Bahrain, Oman, the United Arab Emirates, Qatar and Sudan, according to diplomats who asked not to be named because the travel schedule has not been finalized or announced.
Kushner, meanwhile, will fly this weekend to Israel, Bahrain, Oman, Saudi Arabia and Morocco.
Their visit is expected to lead to the announcement of a deal according to diplomats, although they all have at least one goal, to settle the terms of the agreement with Israel in the near future.
Pompeo is also scheduled to hold talks with the Taliban group in Qatar on issues including peace talks, which will be a key step in withdrawing the remaining US troops from Afghanistan.

The White House and the State Department have not commented on visits that would not be part of the US government's efforts to strengthen ties between the United Arab Emirates and Israel, although achieving no compromise on tensions between Israel and Palestine.
ECOWAS da sojojin Mali sun cimma yarjejeniyar sakin Boubacar Keita - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Jagororin ƙungiyar ci gaban yammacin Afirka ta ECOWAS da mambobin rundunar sojin da suka yi juyin mulki a ƙasar Mali sun cimma yarjejeniyar sakin hamɓararren shugaban ƙasar Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta.
Kamfanin dillancin labarai na AFP ya ruwaito shugabannin sojoji sun bayar da shawarar kafa gwamnatin rikon ƙwarya ta sojoji wacce za ta kwashe shekara uku kafin ɗaukar mataki na gaba.
Sai dai dubban ƴan ƙasar ta Mali sun fito kan titunan babban birnin ƙasar Bamako ranar Juma'ar da ta gabata, inda suka riƙa nuna goyon bayansu ga juyin mulkin na baya-bayan nan.
Sojojin da suka ƙwace mulki a Mali sun ce suna tattaunawa da jam'iyyun adawa da sauran ƙungiyoyi na ƙoƙarin kafa gwamnatin da suke yi.
ECOWAS and Malian army reach agreement on release of Boubacar Keita - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Leaders of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) and members of Mali's military junta have reached an agreement to release ousted President Ibrahim Boubacar Keita.
The AFP news agency reports that military leaders have proposed the formation of a military interim government that will take three years before taking the next step.
But thousands of Malians took to the streets of the capital, Bamako, on last Friday showing their support for the recent coup.
The Military that topple Mali's government says it is in talks with opposition parties and other groups trying to form a government.
An yanki a jaruma Spencer Grammer a kofar wani gidan cin abinci

NEW YORK - Jaruma Spencer Grammer ta ce lokacin da ta ke kokarin kwantar da hankalin wani mutum da ke cikin tashin hankali ne, sai ya kawai ya yanke ta a hannu sannan kuma ya dabawa kawarta wuka a baya a ranar Juma'a a kofar wani gidan cin abinci a birnin New York.

Grammer 'yar shekara 36 da haihuwa ta fadawa jariadar US WEEKLY cewa ita da kawarta "sun yi duk wani abin da wani ya kamata ya yi idan ya samu kansa a cikin irin wannan hali" haka kuma suna "kokarin hana cacarbakin daga karuwa" sai aka far musu.
Grammer ita da kawarta 'yar shekara 32 na cin abinci ne a wani teburi a waje na wani gidan cin abinci mai suna Black Ant a Manhattan a wata unguwa da ke gabashi da misalin karfe 11:30 na dare.
A ranar Juma'a ne a daidai lokacin da gidan abincin ke shirin rufewa sai mutum ya taho kamar mai sanda ya bukaci da a bashi abinci.
Grammer da kawarta ba sun raunin ne a"kokarin da suka yi raba gardamar da ta so tsakanin mutumin da ba a gane ko wanene ba da kuma sauran masu abincin a wurin " in ji 'yan sanda.
Mutumin ya gudu bayan ya ji wa Grammer rauni a hannunta na dama da kuma kawarta a bayanta da wani abu mai kaifi da ba san komene ba, in ji 'yansanda.
Babu wanda aka kama.
Grammer wacce ta yi muryar Summer a shirin "Rick and Morty" ta kuma fito a shirin mai dogon zango "Greek" na kallon iyali a matsayin 'ya ga "Fraser" Jaruma Kesley Grammer da kuma Doreen Alderman.
Grammer ta ce ita da kawarta ana sa rai za su warke cikin sauri.
Duk su biyu babu wacce ta samu wani rauni na ciki fata.

A cikin bayaninta ga US Weekly, Grammer ta godewa wadanda suka kai musu taimakon gaggawa fara da kuma ma’aikatan Asibitin Bellevue wadanda suka kula da su sannan ta lura da cewa sun yi “yakin da ba zai misaltu ba” da cutar ta Koronavirus.
"Grammer ta ce "Yana matukar girgiza mu da muka samu damar yi musu godiya kai tsaye.
Actress Spencer Grammer slashed outside Manhattan restaurant
NEW YORK -- Actress Spencer Grammer says she was trying to calm an agitated man when he slashed her in the arm and stabbed her friend in the back Friday outside a New York City restaurant.
Grammer, 36, told US Weekly that she and her friend "did what anyone else would do in the same situation" and were "attempting to prevent the altercation from escalating" when they were attacked.
Grammer and her 32-year-old friend were eating at an outside table at The Black Ant in Manhattan's East Village neighborhood around 11:30 p.m.
Friday when the man ambled up and demanded to be served as the restaurant was closing down.
Grammer and her friend were hurt as they "attempted to break up a dispute between the unidentified male and other patrons at the location," police said.
The man ran away after wounding Grammer in the right arm and her friend in the lower back with an unknown sharp object, police said.
No arrests have been made.
Grammer, who provides the voice of Summer on "Rick and Morty" and previously starred on the ABC Family series "Greek," is the daughter of "Frasier" star Kelsey Grammer and actress Doreen Alderman.
Grammer said she and her friend both expect to recover quickly.
Neither suffered serious internal injuries, she said.

In her statement to Us Weekly, Grammer thanked the first responders and Bellevue Hospital staff that treated them and noted the "incredible battle" those workers have fought against the coronavirus pandemic.
"It was very moving for us to have the opportunity to thank them in person," Grammer said.
Mai shari'a ya musanta zarginsa da ake yi na hana aiwatar da umarnin kotu da ta yi umarnin sakim yaran da ke tsare a hannun jami'an kula da shiga da fice.

A hukuncin da ta yanke a zaman da ta ranar Asabar, mai shari'a Dolly Gee ta yi amai ta lashe dangane da matsayar da ta dauka ta na mai cewa hukumar kula da shige da fice ta Amurka ba sai ta saki yaran nan da ke hannunta ba idan har hanyoyin guda uku da ta zana ba kawo su a hunkuncin da ta yanke a baya kan wannan batun ba.
Amma mai shari'ar ta jaddada a umarnin da ta bayar cewa duk da haka hukumar kula da shige da ficen ICE ta na da hakkin sakin yaran a lokacin da ya dace.

Hanyoyin da Mai shari'ar ta zayyana sun hada da sakim iyalan da ke tsare a hannun hukumar ICE a tare, sakin yaran ga wani wanda zai dauki nauyinsu ko sakin iyalai a bisa dogaro da wani umarnin kotun tarayya

Shalyn Fluharty, daraktan Proyeco Dilley, wata kungiya da ta ke bayar da taimako ta fuska doka ga iyalan da ke tsare, ta yi Allah wadai da yunkurin da zai ba hukumar ICE damar daukan hukuncin ko su ci gaba da tsare yara a wurnsu.

Fluharty na mai cewa "Ni a wurina hakan na nufi cewa za iya tsare yara har illa ma shaAllah kuma ba su da wata hanyar fita sai har hukumar ICE ta yarda da hakan ko kuma iyali sun amince su rabu tukunna.
Ana tsare iyalai a wasu wuraren tsare mutane da hukumar ICE ba kula da su-Berks da ke Pennsylvania, da Texas ta kudu, (Dilley) da kuma gundumar Karnes shima a Texas.
Shekarun yaran da ake tsare da su a wuraren su n kama ne daga shekara 1 zuwa 12, a cewar lauyoyi da kuma masu bayar da shawara wadan da ke bayar da taikmako ta fuskar shari'a.

Gee - wacce ta ke sa ido kan aiki da yarjejeniyar Flores wacce ta shardanta kiula da yaran da ke tsare -- tana mai cewa a watan Yuni " rashin aiki yadda ya kamata da yarjejeniyar ko kuma banager-bangera da kuma kin aiki da ka'idar sa takunkumi da bayar da tazara da juna ", hakan zai tilasta a dauke kula da yaran zuwa wani wuri daban
Da akwai wadanda ake tsare da su 969 a hannun hukumar ICE da ke dauke da cutar Koronabirus wadanda ko an killacesu ko kuma an sa musu ido har zuwa ranar 23 na watan Yuli, a cewar hukumar ICE.
Cikin wadannan adadi, da akwai 25 da aka tabbatar suna dauke da cutar a Karnes, daya a Dillsy, biyu daga cikin wuraren tsare da iyalai.
A baki daya dai, an samu a sama da mutane 3,700 wadanda ake da tabbacin cewa sun kamu a yayin da suke tsare
Judge denies attempt to stop order requiring release of children in immigration custody

In a Saturday ruling, Judge Dolly Gee appeared to make the upcoming deadline moot by saying that US Immigration and Customs Enforcement doesn't have to release children if the three ways outlined in her previous order can't be met.
But Gee also underscored in her order that ICE still has a duty to release children in a timely manner.
The three ways Gee had outlined included releasing families who are in ICE detention together, releasing children to a sponsor, or releasing families based upon a federal court order.

Shalyn Fluharty, director of Proyecto Dilley, an organization that offers legal services to families in detention, decried the move as allowing ICE to decide whether to continue keeping children detained.
"The bottom line for me is that kids are detained indefinitely and they have no way out unless ICE agrees to do it or families agree to be separated," Fluharty said.
Families are detained in three facilities run by ICE -- Berks in Pennsylvania, South Texas (Dilley) and Karnes County in Texas.
Children at the facilities range from ages 1 to 17, according to lawyers and advocates who provide legal assistance.

Gee -- who oversees implementation of the Flores Agreement, which governs care of children in custody -- said in June that given "non-compliance or spotty compliance with masking and social distancing rules," it was imperative to transfer children out of the facilities.
There are 969 detainees in ICE custody with positive coronavirus cases who are under isolation or monitoring as of July 23, according to ICE.
Of those, there are 25 confirmed cases in Karnes and one in Dilley, two of the family detention centers.
Overall, there have been more than 3,700 confirmed cases in custody
Dalilan da suka sanya gwamnatin Kano daukar alarammomi aikin koyar wa.
Gwamnatin Jihar Kano ta amince da daukan alarammomi sittin da za su koyar a makarantu goma sha biyar da gwamnatin ta samar don koyar da almajirai ilimin zamani.
Gwamnan Kano Dakta Abdullahi Umar Ganduje ne ya amince da hakan a jiya Litinin.
Amincewar ta biyo bayan karbar rahoto daga hukumar da ke kula da makarantun Isalamiyya a jihar Kano, karkashin jagorancin kwamishinan Ilimi Malam Muhammad Sunusi Kiru.

Gwamna Ganduje ya ce, gwamnatin sa ta samar da kwamitin da zai magance matsalar hana barace-barace a kan titinan jihar Kano, wanda kuma ta tsara samar da makarantun da za su bai wa almajiran damar haddar Alqur'ani mai da na zamani don kyautata rayuwarsu.

Idan dai za a iya tunawa gwamnatin ta samar da makarantun a kananan hukumomin Bunkure da Madobi da Bagwai da kuma sauran kananan hukumomi goma sha biyu cikin kananan hukumomin Arba'in da hudu na fadin jihar Kano.
Reasons why the Kano state government recruited Qur'anic scholars into teaching initiative.
The Kano State Government has approved the recruitment of 60 Qur'anic scholars to teach Qur'anic students modern education in 15 reserved schools.
Kano State Governor Dr. Abdullahi Umar Ganduje approved the move yesterday, Monday.
The approval follows a report from the Kano State Islamic Schools Board, headed by Education Commissioner Malam Muhammad Sunusi Kiru.

Governor Ganduje said his government had set up a committee to address the problem of street begging in Kano State, and had also set up schools to enable Qur'anic students to memorize Qur'an and modern education to improve their lives.
It may be recalled that the government has provided schools in Bunkure, Madobi, Bagwai and 12 other Local Government Areas of the 44 Local Government Areas of Kano State.
Guguwar Hanna ta kayar da bishiyoyi yayin da ta ratsa ta kudancin Texas

Guguwa mai dauke da ruwan sama ta Hanna ta sassauta gudunta da karfinta bayan da ta fada a gabar teku na kudancin Texas a ranar Asabar 25 ga watan Yuli, amma jami'ai sun yi gargadin cewa guguwar har yanzu na kafin da zata kai ga matakin "barazana ga rayuwa" na ambaliya ruwa.

Hukumar Kula da Yanayi ta kasa (NWS) ta ce ruwa mai zuba da bakin kwarya ta kasance babbar barazana a kudancin Texas da kuma arewa maso gabashin Mexico a lokacin da gaguwar ta soma matsawa zuwa yamma -kudu amso yamma a ranar Lahadi.
Jorge Castillo ya yada wannan karamin bidiyon a Tuwita, ya kuma bayar da labarin da ya dauka, ya kuma dauki wannan bidiyon ne a kofar gidansa a Combes a Texas a ranar Lahadi da safe.
Tree Branches Downed as Hurricane Hanna Passes Through Southern Texas

Hurricane Hanna weakened to a tropical storm after it made landfall on the coast of southern Texas on Saturday, July 25, but officials warned the storm still had potential to lead to "life-threatening" flash flooding.
The National Weather Service (NWS) said heavy rainfall remained the greatest threat in southern Texas and northeastern Mexico as the storm moved west-southwest on Sunday.
Jorge Castillo shared this footage on Twitter, and told Storyful he filmed this footage outside his home in Combes, Texas, on Sunday morning.
Manchester United Da Chelsea Sun Sami Gurbin Gasar Zakarun Turai.

Ƙungiyoyin Ƙwallon Ƙafar Manchester United da Chelsea sun sami gurbi a gasar zakarun Turai ta kakar wasanni mai zuwa, bayan da duka Ƙungiyoyin biyu su ka yi nasara a wasanninsu na Ƙarshe na gasar Premier a ranar Lahadi.

Tun a makon jiya ne Liverpool ta ɗaga kofin na gasar Premier ta bana da aka soma tun a ranar 19 ga watan Agustan bara, to sai dai kuma aka ɗan dakatar da ita na tsawon watanni 3 sakamakon annobar coronavirus.

United ta ƙarƙare a matsayin ta 3 teburin gasar ta Premier bayan da ta yi nasarar doke abokiyar takararta Leicester City da ci 2-0, a yayin da ita ko Chelsea taƙarƙare a matsayin ta 4, bayan da ita ma ta doke Wolves da ci 2-1.

Leicester da ta ƙarƙare a matsayin ta 5 tebur ko za ta fafata gasar Europa League a kakar wasanni mai zuwa, tare da Tottenham, wadda ta ƙarƙare a zaman ta 6, bayan da ta yi kunnen doki da Crystal Palace da ci 1-1.

A can ƙasan tebur kuma Bournmouth da Watford sun faɗi daga gasar ta Premier kasancewar su a matsayin na 28 da 29 a ƙasan tebur, inda suka bi sahun Norwich wadda ta sami tabbacin faɗuwa daga gasar tun a makon da ya gabata.
Manchester United and Chelsea have qualified for the Champions League.
Manchester United and Chelsea have qualified for next season's Champions League, with both sides winning their final Premier League games on Sunday.
Liverpool lifted the Premier League trophy last week, which began on August 19 last year, but was temporarily suspended for three months due to the coronavirus outbreak.
United finished third in the Premier League table with a 2-0 win over Leicester City, while they or Chelsea slipped to 4th after also beating Wolves 2-1.
Leicester, which finished 5th in the table or will be competing in the Europa League next season, will face Tottenham, who finished 6th, after a 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace.
At the bottom of the table Bournemouth and Watford are relegated from the Premier League being 28th and 29th, following in the footsteps of Norwich who have secured relegation since last week.
Rashin Sanin Sakamakon Zabe Ya Sa Wasu Amurkawa Gudanar da Zanga Zanga.
Wasu rukunin ƴan kadan masu goyon bayan Shugaba Trump sun taru a wajen cibiyoyin kidayar kuri'u da ke jihohin Michigan da Arizona.
Haka kuma masu zanga zanga sun yi tattaki a biranen Chicago, Los Angeles, Seattle, Houston, Pittsburgh, Minneapolis da kuma San Diego.
Baya ga kiran a kirga kuri'u, masu zanga zangar sun kuma nuna yadda ake nuna rashin daidaiton jinsi, da shine ya haddasa zanga zanga a duk fadin Amurka a wannan shekarar.
Magoya bayan Shugaban kasa Donald Trump sun je wurin kidayar kuri'u a garin Detroit na jihar Michigan, suna neman a dakatar da kidayar da ake yi.
Wadanda suka yi nasu gangamin daga baya a garin Phoenix na jihar Arizona, suna rera cewa, "A dakatar da sata".

Zanga zanga iri iri na faruwa ne sanadiyyar ci gaba da rashin sanin tabbas game da zaben da aka yi tun ranar Talata, da kuma ikirarin da Shugaban kasa ya yi ba tare da gabatar da hujja ba, cewa an yi magudin zabe yayin da kuma ƴan Republican suka shigar da kararraki da yawa game da zaben.
Lack of information on election results forced some Americans to Protest
A small group of supporters of President Trump gathered outside polling counting centers in Michigan and Arizona.
Demonstrators also marched in Chicago, Los Angeles, Seattle, Houston, Pittsburgh, Minneapolis and San Diego.
In addition to the call for a vote count, protesters also demonstrated gender inequality, which has led to protests across the United States this year.
Supporters of President Donald Trump went to the ballot counting centers in Detroit, Michigan, demanding a halt to the count.
The Protesters later chanted "Stop stealing" in Phoenix, Arizona.

The protests are the latest in a string of uncertainties about the election since Tuesday, as well as unconfirmed allegations by the president that the election was rigged by Republicans. they filed several complaints about the election.
Wilfred Zaha na so ya bar kungiyar Crystal Palace a cewar Roy Hudgson: "Ci gaba da sa ido a wannn gurbin"

Mai kula da kungiyar Crystal Palace Roy Hodgson ya fadarwa da 'yan kallon gaba a gabannin karshen kakan wasanni a yayin da ya fadi cewa mai farin jinin Wilf Zaha mai kai hari na kungiyar na shirin barin kungiyar wasan kwallon kafar.

Dan asalin kasar Cote d ivore kuma tauraron kasa da kasa da ya dade da Selhurst Park har na sama da shekaru biyar, yanzu ya soma tattara kayansa zai matsa gaba, bayan da shahararsa ake alakantar da ita ga Arsenal da kuma Bayern Munich.

A shekara 27 da haihuwa kowa ya nade hannnnsa domin ganin ko manya-manya kulod irin wadannan na da sha'awara yi masa ruwan kudi, musamman ma a wannan bazara da ke cike da fargabar koma bayan tattalin arziki a harkar wasanni, Bayan fatatawar da aka yi a in da Zaha ya ci kwallaye hudu ya kuma samu nasarar taimakawa a ci har sau biyar don samun gurbi a kungiyar Palace wanda hakan bai yiwu ba.

Yayin da ya ke jawabi bayan fafatawar da aka yi a wasan karshe, Hodgson ya fadawa Alex Crock na shirin 'TalkSport' cewa "ka sa ido kan wannan gurbin" dangane da kila-wa-kala na barin Zaha kulob din bayan ya amsa cewa, dan gaban ya "fito karara" cewa yana ganin cigabansa ne a can wani wuri nesa da wannan kungiya.

Dan wasan gaban har yanzu yana da sauran shekaru uku da suka rage a yarjejeniyarsa da kungiyar Palace kuma a shekarar da ta wuce suna masu cewa suna da bukatar Fam miliyan 100 idan suna so su yakice shi daga kungiyar.
Bangaren Hodgson sun kammala jerin wasannin da suke yi ne da shan kashi har sau bakwai a jere da kuma kunnen doki a ranar karshe wanda hakan ya sa suka koma mataki na 14 a tafiyar.
Zaha da kansa ya ci kwallo sau daya ne kawai a tsakiyar watan Disamba da kuma a karshen kakar wasan, wani diba mai dogon zango na rashin samun nasara ga kungiyar Chelsea.

An bayar da rahoton cewa ya mika takardar neman sauya kungiyar a bazarar da ta wuce a kokarinsa na ya kaucewa abin da ake gudu, amma hakan bai yiwu ba da har zai ja hankalin kungiyar Palace din ta sayar da shi.

A wani kokari na zahiri na habaka damarsa na barin kungiyar, Zaha ya sauya ajen din sa a watan Janairu da kuma muhimman abubuwan da ke gabansa na makonni masu zuwa na nuna karara cewa shine ya bar kungiyar.

An shirya cewa Zaha ne zai taka rawa a yawancin mintunan wasan gasar Primier a wannan kakar wasa da kungiyar Palace za ta yi, baya da cewa shine kadai da wasan da ke kasa da shekara 28 da haihuwa da zai yi wasa har na tsawon mintuna 1,100 ko sama da haka, duba da yadda aka da bukatar yin garanbawul a 'yan wasan da wasu karin kudi da aka yiwa mai buga lamba 11.
Wilfried Zaha wants to leave Crystal Palace, says Roy Hodgson: "Watch this space"
Crystal Palace manager Roy Hodgson dealt a blow to fans ahead of the close-season by revealing star attacker Wilf Zaha wants to leave the club.
The Ivorian international has been at Selhurst Park for over five years and now looks set to depart, having previously been linked with the likes of Arsenal and Bayern Munich.

At age 27 it remains to be seen if that calibre of club are still interested in splashing out a large fee on him, particularly this summer with the economic uncertainty in the sport, after a campaign in which Zaha scored four goals and claimed five assists for a Palace side which failed to inspire.

Speaking post-match after the final day, Hodgson told TalkSport's Alex Crook to "watch this space" regarding Zaha's probable exit after acknowledging the forward has "made it clear" he sees his future away from the club.
The forward still has three years left on his current Palace deal and they last year suggested it would take £100m to prise him away from the club.
Hodgson's side wrapped up the campaign with seven straight defeats and a final-day draw, dropping to 14th place in the process.
Zaha himself netted just once between mid-December and the end of the season, a long-range strike in a defeat to Chelsea.
He was reported to have handed in a transfer request last summer in a bid to force a move away, but a bid didn't materialise to tempt Palace to sell.
In an apparent move to boost his chances of a departure, Zaha changed agents in January and his priority for the weeks ahead will clearly be to secure a move away.

Zaha was the player to feature for the most minutes in the Premier League this season for Palace and the only member of the squad under 28 years of age to play 1,100 minutes or more, pointing to the level of rebuild which might be required in the squad with the potential fee brought in for the No 11.
Kungiyar yaki da nuna rashin adalci mai alaka da banbancin launin fata ta Amurka ta gudanar da zanga-zanga
Masu zanga-zanga sun mamaye titinan yawancin biranen Amurka domin jan hankali kan rashin adalaci da ke alaka da launin fata.
Sama da wata biyu ana ta zanga-zanga a Portland, da ke Oregon tun ranar 25 ga watan Mayu bayan mutuwar George Floyd yayin da ya ke tsare a hannun 'yan sanda a Minneapolis da ke Minnesota.
Gwammatin Trump ta aika da jami'an tsaro na gwamnatin tarayya zuwa Portland, wanda hakan ya kara izza wutar zanga-zangar.
Sai zanga-zangar ta rikide ta koma zanga-zangar adawa da zuwan wadannan jami'an garin.

A birnin Seattle 'yan sanda suna amfani da kulake da hayaki mai sa hawaye sun kuma kama mutane 45 a ranar Asabar bayan zanga-zangar da ke goyon bayan zanga-zangar ta birnin Porland ta rikide ta koma tashin hankali.
'Yan sanda suka ce sama da jami'an 'yan sanda 20 suka samu raunuka.
A ranar Asabar da dare a garin Austin ta Texas wani mutum ya rasa ransa yayin da wani yayi harbi a cikin 'yan zanga-zangar Black Lives Matter.
Rahotanni daga kafofin yada labarai na cewa watakila mutumin ne ya je kusa da wata mota da wani a cikinta ke dauke da bindiga, sai aka harbe shi da ita.
" Ni dai abin da na sani shine mutum ya mutu a lokacin da ke zanga-zanga abin da tashin hankali." Magajin gari Steve Daler na Austin ya fada a cikin wata sanarwa.
Adler ya na mai cewa, "na shiga cikin dimuwa da tashin hankali."

A birnin Lousville da ke Kentucky, wasu gungun masu zanga-zanga dake dauke da makami na kiran da a yiwa Breonna Taylor, wata mace bakar fata wacce ta mutu a Lousville a lokacin da 'yan sanda suka kutsa gidanta kwatsam dauke da umarnin kotu na "shiga babu sallama" suka kuma harbeta.
Saurayin Taylor ne ya fara yin harbin 'yan sandan a bisa tunanin cewa masu kutse ne.
An kori wani jami'in dan sanda saboda harbin da ya faru ga Taylor, sai dai sauran 'yan sandan babu abin da aka yi musu.

Shugaban kungiyar NFAC, wata kungiya mai gwagwarmaya da makamai ta bakar fata zalla da ke cikin masu zanga-zangar ta ce tana son 'yan sanda su binciki kisan da aka yi wa Taylor, sannan binciken a yi shi a bayyane.
'yan sanda sun ce uku da ga cikin 'yan kungiyar ta NFAC sun samu raunuka a ranar Asabar a lokacin da bindigar da daya daga cikinsu ta tashi abisa kuskure.
US Racial Injustice Protests Mount
Protesters have taken to the streets of several U.S. cities to bring attention to racial injustice.
Protests in Portland, Oregon, have been going in for two months, since the May 25 death of George Floyd while in police custody in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
The Trump administration has sent federal officers to Portland, adding additional fuel to the protests.
The demonstrators now are also protesting the federal presence in the city.
In Seattle, police using flash bangs and tear gas arrested 45 people Saturday after demonstrations in support or the protests in Portland turned violent.
Police said more than 20 police officers were injured.
Saturday night, in Austin, Texas, a man was killed when someone shot into a Black Lives Matter march.
Media accounts say the man may have approached a vehicle with a rifle before he was fired upon.
"All I know is that someone dying while protesting is horrible," Mayor Steve Adler of Austin said in a statement.
Adler said he is "heartbroken and stunned."

In Louisville, Kentucky, a group of armed protesters called for justice of Breonna Taylor, a Black woman who died in Louisville when police entered her home without warning on a "no knock" warrant and shot her.
Taylor's boyfriend had fired at the officers first, thinking they were intruders.
One police officer has been fired because of the Taylor incident, but charges have not been brought against the other officers.
The leader of the NFAC group, an armed Black militia involved in the protests, says he wants the police investigation into the Taylor killing to be more transparent.
Police say three NFAC members were injured Saturday when one of the militia's weapons accidentally discharged.
KORONA: Mutum 137 suka kamu da cutar a Najeriya ranar Talata.
Hukumar NCDC ta sanar da karin mutum 137 da suka kamu da cutar Korona a Najeriya ranar Talata.

Alkaluman da hukumar NCDC ta fitar ranar Talata sun nuna cewa jihar Legas ta samu karin mutum 60, Abia-21, FCT-18, Rivers-13, Kaduna-5, Oyo-4, Edo-3, Delta-2, Imo-2, Kano-2, Ogun-2, Bauchi-1, Gombe-1, Nasarawa-1 Niger-1 da Osun-1.
Yanzu mutum 63,173 suka kamu da cutar a Najeriya, mutum 59,634 sun warke, 1,151 sun rasu.
Sannan kuma zuwa yanzu mutum 2,375 ne ke dauke da cutar a Najeriya.

Har yanzu dai jihar Legas ce ke da mafi yawan wadanda suka kamu da mutum 21,398, FCT -6,142, Oyo - 3,456, Edo -2,669, Delta -1,816, Rivers 2,844, Kano -1,749, Ogun -2,053, Kaduna -2,663, Katsina -953, Ondo -1,669, Borno -745, Gombe - 938, Bauchi - 713, Ebonyi -1,049, Filato -3,652, Enugu - 1,314, Abia - 898, Imo -619, Jigawa - 325, Kwara - 1,069, Bayelsa - 413, Nasarawa - 483, Osun -930, Sokoto - 165, Niger - 277 , Akwa Ibom - 295, Benue - 493, Adamawa - 252, Anambra - 277, Kebbi - 93, Zamfara - 79, Yobe - 79, Ekiti - 335.
Akwai yiwuwar mai dauke da cutar Korona zai iya afkawa cikin matsalar tabuwar hankali.
Likitocin jami'ar University Collage UCL dake kasar Birtaniya sun bayyana cewa akwai yiwuwar wanda ya kamu da Korona ya afka cikin hali na jirkitar kwakwalwa.
Jagoran wannan bincike Kuma jami'in UCL Ross Paterson ya sanar da haka yana mai cewa dole a ci gaba da gudanar da bincike domin gano adadin illar da cutar za ta iya yi wa mutum.

Kwayoyin cutar Corona Virus na daga cikin kwayoyin cutar dake sa a kamu da mura wanda idan ya yi tsanani akan yi fama da matsalar cutar dake hana numfashi yadda ya kamata da ake kira (Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV), da kuma cutar tsanannin mura da kan toshe makogoro.
Amma ita cutar Corona Virus sabuwar cuta ce da ba a taba samun ta a jikin mutum ba.
Alamun kamuwa da cutar sun hada da matsala a kafofin wucewar iska a makogoro wato numfashi, yawan zazzabi, tsananin tari, da ciwo a makogoro.

Haka kuma idan abin ya yi tsanani, ya kan kai ga shakar iska ma ya gagara, sannan a samu matsalar sanyin hakarkari wato "Nimoniya", kuma idan har ya yi tsanani matuka kodar mutum kan daina aiki kwata-kwata.
An samar da wasu hanyoyi na gaggawa domin kaucewa kamuwa da wannan cuta ta hanyar, yawaita wanke hannaye da ruwa da sabulu, sannan a rika rufe hanci da baki idan za ayi atishawa.
kuma a rika wankewa da dafa nama sosai ya nuna tubus kafin a ci da kwai.
WHO ta yi kira da a rika nisanta ko kuma zama kusa da wanda ya nuna alamun rashin lafiya musamman irin wadanda a ka lissafa a sama sannan a gaggauta zuwa asibiti da neman magani idan ba a da lafiya.
CORONA: 137 people infected in Nigeria on Tuesday.
The National Center for Disease Control and Prevention (NCDC) announced an additional 137 cases of coronavirus infection in Nigeria on Tuesday.

According to the figures released by the NCDC on Tuesday shows that Lagos State has an additional 60 people, Abia-21, FCT-18, Rivers-13, Kaduna-5, Oyo-4, Edo-3, Delta-2, Imo-2. , Kano-2, Ogun-2, Bauchi-1, Gombe-1, Nasarawa-1 Niger-1 and Osun-1
So far 63,173 people are infected in Nigeria, 59,634 have recovered, and 1,151 have died.
And so far 2,375 people are infected in Nigeria.

Lagos State still has the highest number of recorded cases with 21,398 cases, FCT -6,142, Oyo - 3,456, Edo -2,669, Delta -1,816, Rivers 2,844, Kano -1,749, Ogun -2,053, Kaduna -2,663, Katsina - 953, Ondo -1,669, Borno -745, Gombe - 938, Bauchi - 713, Ebonyi -1,049, Plateau -3,652, Enugu - 1,314, Abia - 898, Imo -619, Jigawa - 325, Kwara - 1,069, Bayelsa - 413, Nasarawa - 483, Osun -930, Sokoto - 165, Niger - 277, Akwa Ibom - 295, Benue - 493, Adamawa - 252, Anambra - 277, Kebbi - 93, Zamfara - 79, Yobe - 79, Ekiti - 335.
It is possible that a person with Korona will develop depression.
Doctors at the University College UCL in the UK said Corona's sufferer is at risk of developing mental disorder.
Lead researcher and UCL official Ross Paterson made the announcement, saying further research was needed to determine the extent of the disease's potential impact.

Corona Virus disease is one of the most common causes of influenza, which, if severe, can lead to what is called-Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV), as well as acute myocardial infarction that blocked the throat.
But Corona Virus is a new disease that has never been found in human body.
Symptoms of infection include problems with the airways in the throat i.e. shortness of breath, high fever, severe cough, and sore throat.
However if it's severe, it can lead to shortness of breath, which is pneumonia, and if it becomes chronic, the kidney will stop working completely.
Some emergency measures have been put in place to prevent infection by washing hands frequently with soap and water, and covering the nose and mouth when sneezing.
Clean and cook meat and egg thoroughly before eating. And wash and cook the meat thoroughly until tender before eating.
The World Health Organization (WHO) has called on people to stay away from those who show signs of illness, especially those listed above, and to seek medical attention immediately if you are unwell.
Harkokin Noma sun ƙara bunƙasa arzikin Najeriya, duk da matsin tattalin arzikin da aka shiga.

Fannin noma a Najeriya ya ƙara wa tattalin arziki bunƙasa da kashi 24.6 a watannin Afrilu, Mayu zuwa Yuni, fiye da watannin Janairu, Fabrairu da Maris, da kuma watannin Afrilu da Mayu da Yunin shekara ta 2019.
Hukumar Ƙididdigar Alƙaluman Bayanai ta Ƙasa ce ta bayyana haka a cikin rahoton da ta fitar a ranar Litinin.
Bayanan da hukumar ta fitar a ranar Litinin, sun nuna cewa Ƙarfin Tattalin Arzikin Cikin Gida na Najeriya ya ragu sosai a watannin Afrilu, Mayu da Yunin 2020.
Ƙarfin Arzikin Cikin Gida (GDP) shi ne Ƙarfi da yawan cinikin kayan gida da ake sarrafawa a cikin Ƙasa da kuma ayyukan hada-hadar kuɗade da aka yi a cikin ƙasa.
Fannin noma ya taimaka da kashi 24.65 a watannin Afrilu, Mayu da Yuni na 2030, fiye da na waɗannan watanni uku a shekarar 2019, inda aka samu kashi 22.78.
Kuma fiye da watannin Janairu, Fabrairu da Maris, na 2020, inda aka samu kashi 22.96.
Hakan ya nuna a shekara an samu ƙarin kashi 19.90 a wannan zangon watanni uku.
Wato idan aka auna da kuma yin la'akari da hauhawar farashi da tsadar kayayyaki, za a ga cewa fannin noma ya bada gudummawar kashi 23.9 ga Ƙarfin Tattalin Arzikin Cikin Gida (GDP) a Najeriya kenan.
Wato noma ya Ƙara bunƙasa ƙarfin tattalin arziki da kashi 1.58 na tattalin arzikin ƙasa baki ɗaya, daga 2019 zuwa 2020.
Rahoton ya ce shi kankin kan sa fannin noma ya ƙaru da kashi 6.57 idan aka kwatanta bunƙasar sa tsakanin watannin Janairu zuwa Maris a farkon shekarar 2020.
Fannin noma a Najeriya ya ƙunshi fannoni huɗu da suka haɗa da noman kayan abinci, kiwon dabbobi, bunƙasa gandun dazuka da kuma kiwon kifi.

PREMIUM TIMES ta buga labarin cewa Tattalin Arzikin Cikin Gida na Najeriya (GDP) ya kakare tare da yin tafiyar-kura, abin da aka fi sani da ci gaban mai ginin rijiya, a tsakanin watannin Afrilu, Mayu da Yuni na shekarar 2020.
NBS ta lura a ranar Litinin cewa waɗancan tsauraran matakan da aka gindaya na hana zirga-zirga ne suka haddasa tattalin arzikin gida na Najeriya ya riƙa yin tuƙin baya-da-baya.
Wannan jula-jula da tattalin arziki ya shiga, ya kawo ƙarshen bunƙasar da ake gani ya ɗan yi cikin shekaru uku, tun bayan ƙuncin tattalin arziƙin da Najeriya ta shiga cikin 2016.
Agriculture has boosted Nigeria's economy, despite the economic hardship pressure.
The agricultural sector in Nigeria contributed to economic growth by 24.6 percent in April, May to June, more than the months of January, February and March, and April, May and June 2019.
The National Bureau of Statistics said this in a report released on Monday.
The report released by the commission on Monday, shows that Nigeria's domestic economic strength declined sharply in April, May and June 2020.
Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the Gross Domestic Products produce locally and the cash flows within the country.
The agricultural sector contributed 24.65 percent in April, May and June 2020, up from those three months in 2019, with 22.78 percent.
And more than the months of January, February and March, 2020, which is 22.96 percent increased.
This represents an increase of 19.90 percent in the same period last year.
That is, when we look at inflation and high price of commodities, the agricultural sector contributes 23.9 percent to Nigeria's gross domestic product (GDP).
That is, agriculture has boosted the economy by 1.58 percent of the national economy, from 2019 to 2020.
The report said that the agricultural sector itself grew by 6.57 percent compared to it's growth in January to March in early 2020.
The agricultural sector in Nigeria consists of four sectors including food production, animal husbandry, forestry development and fisheries.
PREMIUM TIMES reports that Nigeria's gross domestic product (GDP) has stopped and slowdown, without any physical progress, between April, May and June 2020.
The National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) noted on Monday that austerity measures of lock-down is what had caused the Nigerian economy to reverses backward.
The economic downturn has put an end to what has been seen as a three-year growth spurt since Nigeria's economic crisis in 2016.
Khartoum: Ganawar Pompeo da Hamdok.

Firaministan Sudan Abdallah Hamdok ya sanar da ganawar ƙeƙe da ƙeƙe kan muhimman batutuwa da sakataren harkokin wajen Amurka Mike Pompeo a birnin Khartoum, ciki har da batun cire Sudan a jerin kasashen da Washington ta ayyana a daukar nauyin ƴan ta'adda.
Pompeo ya isa Kartoum ne daga Izra'ila, a ƙoƙarin Amurkan na karfafa dangantaka tsakanin Sudan da Izra'ila.
Ziyarar tasa na bangaren rangadin yankin ne, bayan cimma yarjejeniyar maido da dangantaka tsakanin kasar ta Baniyadu da Hadaddiyar Daular Larabawa cikin wannan wata.
Amurkan dai na neman sauran kasashen Larabawa da su bi sawun Abu Dhabi.
Tun a zamanin mulkin hambararren shugaba Omar Hassan al-Bashir ne dai, Washington ta kakabawa Sudan takunkumi saboda zarginta da goyon bayan kungiyoyin tarzoma da kuma yakin basasan lardin Darfur.
Khartoum: Pompeo and Hamdok meeting.

Sudanese Prime Minister Abdallah Hamdok has announced a series of briefings on key issues with US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo in Khartoum, including the removal of Sudan from the list of countries designated by Washington of sponsoring terrorists.
Pompeo arrived in Kartoum from Israel, an American bid to strengthen Sudan-Israel relations.
His visit is part of a regional tour, following the signing of an agreement to restore ties between Israel and the United Arab Emirates this month.
The United States is urging other Arab countries to follow in Abu Dhabi's footsteps.
Since the ousted President Omar Hassan al-Bashir, Washington has imposed sanctions on Sudan for allegedly supporting extremist groups and Darfur's civil war.
Saudiyya: Musulmi kalilan ne za su gudanar da aikin hajji.
A Saudiyya, maniyyata sun shirya soma gudanar da aikin hajjin bana da annobar Coronavirus ta janyo takaita yawan al'ummar musulmin da ke da niyyar zuwa.

Mutum dubu goma kacal da suka kasance ko ƴan asalin kasar ko kuma baki da ke zaune a cikin kasar ne, za su samu damar gudanar da aikin hajjin bisa wasu tsauraran ka'idoji da aka gindaya a yayin gudanar da ibadar.

Saudiyya ta kasance daya daga cikin kasashen yankin Gabas ta Tsakiya da ake da yawan alkaluman masu cutar ta Covid-19, inda tuni cutar ta kashe mutum dubu biyu da dari bakwai da talatin da uku daga cikin sama da dubu dari biyu da sittin da ta kama.
Wannan shi ne karon farko da ake daukar mataki na hana maniyyata daga sauran kasashen duniya shiga aikin hajjin a tarihi.
Ma'aikatar shirya aikin hajjin dai, ta ce ya zama dole a yi hakan, saboda fargabar yada cutar Coronavirus.
Saudi Arabia: Only a handful of Muslims will perform the hajj.
In Saudi Arabia, pilgrims are set to begin this year's hajj pilgrimage, which Corona pandemic limits the number of intended Muslim pilgrims.
Only 10,000 people, both natives and foreigners living in the country or otherwise, will be able to perform the hajj according to a new certain strict rules that are put in place.
Saudi Arabia is one of the countries in the Middle East with the highest number of Covid-19 cases, killing 2,733 people out of more than 260,000 infected.
This is the first time in history that steps have been taken to prevent pilgrims from other parts of the world from participating in hajj.
The Ministry of Hajj said it is necessary because of fears of spreading Coronavirus.
Gwamnati ta bada hutun bukukuwan sallah babba.
Gwamnatin tarayya ta ayyana ranakun Alhamis 30 da Juma'a 31 ga wannan watan amatsayin ranar hutun babban sallah.
Ministan cikin gida Ogbeni Rauf Aregbesola ne ya sanar da hakan ta hannun babban sakatariya a ma'aikatar, Georgina Ehuriah.
Sanarwar ta ce, ministan na taya alummar musulmai ƴan Najeriya dake gida da kasashen waje murnar zagayowar sallah babba, da kuma yin bukukuwan sallah lafiya.
Ka zalika ministan ya bukaci alumma da su kula da kan su wajen amfani da dokokin yaki da cutar Corona a ya yin bukukuwan sallah babba.
Rauf Aregbesola ya kara da cewar gwamnati mai ci ta shugaba Muhammadu Buhari wajen bin dokokin da aka shimfida da kuma samar da zaman lafiya a tsakanin al'ummar kasar nan.
The government has granted holidays for Eid celebration.
The federal government has declared Thursday, July 30 and Friday, the 31st of this month, as public holidays for the celebration of Eid festival.
The announcement was made by Interior Minister Ogbeni Rauf Aregbesola through the ministry's Permanent Secretary, Georgina Ehuriah.
The statement said the minister congratulated the Nigerian Muslim community at home and abroad on the occasion of the Great Eid festival and prays for a peaceful celebrations.
The minister also urged the public to be vigilant in applying Corona control measures during the festivities.
Rauf Aregbesola added that the current administration of President Muhammadu Buhari was committed to upholding the rule of law and creating peace among the people of the country.
Gwamnatin Neja Ta Yaba Wa Jagorancin Sarkin Musulmi Yayin Cikarsa Shekara 64.
Gwamnan Neja kuma shugaban kungiyar gwamnonin jahohin arewa ta tsakiya, Alhaji Abubakar Sani Bello ya taya sarkin musulmi Alhaji Muhammad Sa'ad Abubakar III, cika shekaru sittin da hudu da haihuwa.
Sanarwar taya murnar haihuwar na kunshe ne a wata takardar manema labarai da sakatariyar yada labaran gwamnan, Mary Noel Berje ta sanyawa hannu da taya tsohon janar mai ritaya murnar wannan rana.
Takardar tace, gwamna Abubakar Sani Bello ya bayyana sarkin musulmi a matsayin cikakken dan Najeriya mai kwatanta gaskiya, mai fafutukar hadin kai, da zaman lafiya ta yadda kasar za ta ci gaba.

Gwamnan yace kasancewarsa shugaban kungiyar Jama'atu Nasrul Islam (JNI) kuma shugaba na kasa na kungiyar hadin kan musulmin Najeriya (NSCIA), sannan shugaban hadin guiwa na kungiyoyin addinai (NIREC), ya taka muhimmiyar rawa kan matakan da yake dauka wajen ci gaban kasar nan.

Gwamnan yace a matsayina na shugaban kungiyar gwamnonin arewa ta tsakiya da ke son hadin kai da ci gaban yankin nan da Najeriya baki daya, "Zan iya bayyana cewar haihuwar mai martaba sarkin musulmi a wannan yankin ba karamin rahama ba ce a gare mu, saboda tsayuwarsa akan aiki tukuru da gaskiya akan tafiyar sarautar gargajiya yadda ya da ce".

Tsayuwarka akan zaman lafiya da hadin kai ya nuna irin salon shugabancin mutanen arewa, za mu cigaba da taya ka murna saboda yadda ka bada kai da lokacin ka ga ƴan kasar saboda kyakkyawar manufar ka gare su, ta fuskar al'ada, addini da dubarun siyasar ka, samun ka da muradun ka sun samar da zaman lafiya da hadin kan mabiya addinai.

A matsayin ka na cikakken jagora, kuma basaraken gargajiya, sama da shekaru da dama, ka horar da kan ka wajen ganin an samu yanayi mai kyau domin samun zaman lafiya a kasa, ta hanyar bayanan hadin kai da zaman lafiya wanda ya samar da kyakkyawar fahimta a tsakanin addinai da al'adda.

Ina yi maka kyakkyawan fata da sauran ƴan Najeriya wajen taya ka murnar wannan rana, tare da yaba maka wajen samar da fahimta tsakanin mabiya addinai ciki da waje saboda namijin kokarin da ka ke yi a kasar nan.
Gwamnan ya yabawa mai martaban wajen yaki da talauci, kiwon lafiya da shirye shirye kan ingancin ilimi ta fuskar fasaha da kwarewarsa a yankin kuma basaraken gargajiya na jama'a.
Gwamnan ya roki Allah da ya karawa sarkin musulmi lafiya da wasu karin shekaru masu anfani, farin ciki da kwazo domin ci gaba da kafa harsashen zaman lafiya da ci gaban kasa baki daya.
Na kara da cewar barka da shekarun haihuwar mai martaba sarkin musulmi.
An Kama Mutum Uku Da Zargin Kashe Uwargidan Liman A Kogi.
Daga Ahmed Muhammed Danasabe, Lokoja.
Rundunar yan sandan jihar Kogi ta damke mutum uku wadanda ake zarginsu da hallaka madam Yemisi Baderu, uwargidan babban limamin garin Ayere dake yankin karamar hukumar Ijumu na jihar Kogi.
Ganau da lamarin ya faru a idonsa yace an hallaka matar ne a kan idon mijinta da kuma yayanta a daren ranan alhamis a lokacin da maharan suka kai mata hari kuma suka sassareta da adduna.
Lamarin mara dadi wanda aka bayyana da cewa shi ne irinsa na farko daya auku a garin na Ayere, ya jefa mutanen garin cikin kaduwa da jimami.

Basaraken garin,wato Alayere na Ayere, Oba JO Olubo wanda ya bayyana kaduwarsa da bacin rai game da lamarin, ya roki yan sanda da kada su saki wadanda suka kama da zargin aikata danyen aikin mai ban takaici,sai har sun yi bincike mai zurfi da kuma hukunta su.
Sarkin ya kuma bukaci yan sanda da sauran jami'an tsaro da su mai da hankulansu akan garin na Ayere domin kawar da batagari dake boye a garin.

A labari kamar wannan, babban mai taimakawa gwamna na musamman akan sha'anin tsaro mai kula da karamar hukumar Ijumu, Hon Taufik Isa wanda ya ziyarci garin na Ayere a ranar asabar, ya yi Allah wadai da harin, inda ya bayyana lamarin da cewa rashin imani ne tsagwaransa.
Yace lamarin, shi ne karo na farko da ya faru a al'ummar ta Ayere.
Hon Isa ya kuma tabbatarwa da mazauna yankin kudurin gwamnati na maido da zaman lafiya da doka da oda a yankin.

Ya kuma yiwa babban limamin da basaraken garin ta'aziyya da kuma jajen lamarin mara dadi, kana ya yi addu'ar Allah ya jikan uwargida Yemisi Baderu tare da baiwa iyalanta da yan uwanta hakurin jure rashinta.
A bangare guda kuma, babban jami'in tsaron na karamar hukumar Ijumu, Hon Tafik Isa ya kakaba dokar hana fita a yankin tun daga karfe bakwai na maraice zuwa karfe bakwai na safe.

Da yake tabbatar da aukuwar lamarin, mai magana da yawun rundunar yan sandan jihar Kogi, DSP William Aya yace rundunar ta cafke mutum uku da ake zargi da hannu da kai harin kuma an fara bincike akan lamarin.
Niger State Government Praises Sultan's Leadership On clocking 64 years.

Niger State Governor and Chairman of the North Central Governors Association, Alhaji Abubakar Sani Bello, has congratulated the Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Muhammad Sa'ad Abubakar III, on his 64th birthday.
The announcement of the birthday was contained in a press release signed by the governor's information secretary, Mary Noel Berje, congratulating the retired general on the occasion.
According to the statement, Governor Abubakar Sani Bello described the Sultan of Nigeria as a true Nigerian who was honest, a champion of unity and peace so that the country could move forward.

The governor said being the chairman of the Jama'atu Nasrul Islam (JNI) and the national chairman of the Nigerian Muslim National Union (NSCIA), and the chairman of the National Association of Religious Associations (NIREC), played an important role in his development of this country.

The governor said in his capacity as chairman of the North Central Governors Association, which is committed to the unity and development of the region and Nigeria as a whole, on hard work and honesty on the traditional monarchy as he said ".

Your commitment to peace and unity reflects the leadership style of the people of the North.
