We will continue to rejoice with you on this occasion due to the sacrifice and the selflessness you demonstrate that makes you, your presence and your desires to create peace and unity for the followers of religions.

As a full-fledged leader and traditional ruler, over the years, you have trained yourself to create a conducive environment for peace in the country, through information and cooperation that provides a better understanding between religions and cultures.

I wish you and other Nigerians the best of luck in congratulating you on this day, and commend you for creating understanding among religious people inside and outside the country for your tireless efforts in this country.

The governor commended the Sultan in the fight against poverty, health and programs on the quality of education in terms of technology and expertise in the region and the traditional ruler of the people.
The governor prayed for the health, happiness many blissful years of the Sultan to further the foundations of peace and development in the country.
I added that happy birthday to His Majesty the Sultan.
Three Arrested For Killing Imam's Wife In Kogi.
From Ahmed Muhammed Danasabe, Lokoja.
Kogi State Police Command has arrested three suspects in connection with the murder of Yemisi Baderu, wife of the Chief Imam of Ayere town in Ijumu Local Government Area of Kogi State.
An eyewitness said the woman was killed in front of her husband and children on Thursday night when the attackers attacked her and cut her with machetes.
The unfortunate incident, described as the first of its kind in Ayere town, has shocked the people of the town.

The Chief of Alayere, Alayere na Ayere, Oba JO Olubo, who expressed shock and outrage over the incident, urged the police not to release those arrested on suspicion of committing heinous crimes, until they conduct an in-depth investigation into the incident and punish them accordingly.
The Chief also urged the police and other security agencies to focus on Ayere town to eradicate the bad eggs hiding in the town.

In a related development, the Special Assistant to the Governor on Security in Ijumu Local Government Area, Hon Taufik Isa, who visited Ayere on Saturday, condemned the attack, saying it sheer inhuman and brutal.
He said the incident was the first of its kind in the Ayere community.
Hon. Isa also assured the residents of the area of the government's commitment to restore peace, law and order in the area.
He also offered condolences to the Chief Imam and Chief of the town, and prayed for the sweet repose of his wife Yemisi Baderu and for the perseverance of her family.
Meanwhile, the Chief Security Officer of Ijumu Local Government Area, Hon Tafik Isa has imposed a curfew in the area from 7pm to 7am.
Confirming the incident, Kogi State Police Command spokesperson DSP William Aya said the force had arrested three suspects in connection with the attack and an investigation was underway.
Jarumar Shirin White Star Laura Haddock 'yar shekara 34 ta tafi neman gida tare da tsohon masoyinta Tom Rhys Harries dan shekara 28

Sun soma soyayyane ne a wajen daukar shirin White Lines, wani wasan kwaikwayo kan rayuwar sheke aya a tsibirin Ibiza - amma daga ranar da Laura Haddock da saurayinta Tom Rhys Harries suka je neman gidan zama a makon jiya, sai suka bayyana a matsayin wandanda ke cikin kwanciyar hankali daban da 'yar rayuwar sharholiyarsa na cikin shirin.

Masoyan da ke fitowa a matsayin wa da kanwa a cikin shirin mai farin jini daukar nauyin kamfanin NETFLIX, an gan su ne a lokacin da suka je kallon wani gidan gona mai dan karen kyau siffar Oxfordshire wanda ake neman fam miliyan 1.2.

Sun iso wurin ne a wata mota kirar Range Rover wacce Laura ke tukawa 'yar shekara 34, tana sanye da gajeren wando na denim, da kuma farar riga a inda dillalin gidan wanda ya shigar da su gidan mai dakunan kawana 5 na alfarma domin su ganewa idonsu.

A cikin shirin na 'white Lines wanda aka dauka da kaka, Zoe Walker wacce ta fito a Laura, ta gano rayuwar sharholiya na Ibiza a lokacin da ta ke binciken kisan gillan da aka yiwa a dan uwanta Axel mai wasan DJ wanda Tom dan shekara 28 ya fito.
Labarin soyayyarsu bai bayyana ba sai farkon watan nan, kasa da shekara guda bayan mutuwar aurenta da Sam Claflin na tsawon shekara shida, wada ya fito a fim din nan mai suna 'The Hunger Games.
Sun haifi da namiji mai shekara hudu mai suna Pip da kuma 'ya mace mai suna Margot 'yar shekara biyu.

A lokacin da suka sanar da rabuwarsu a watan Ogustan da ya wuce, Claflin dan shekara 34 ya rubuta a shafinsa na dandalin sada zumunta na Instagram: "Laura da ni mun yanke shawarar da mu kawo karshen aurenmun. Babu komai a tsakaninmu yanzu sai abin da ba a rasa ba na kauna da matukar mutunta juna, za kuma ci gaba da kokarin kula da yaranmu tare."

Laura da Sam sun fara haduwa ne a shekarar 2011 a wani gwajin 'yan wasa, sai kuma shi Sam da ya ke fitowa a cikin shirn 'Peaky Blinders' ya kwatanta aurensu a shekarar 2013 a matsayin " wata babbar nasara a rayuwarsa baki dayanta."
Kafi shirin 'White Lines' Laura ta fito a farko a wasu shirye-shiryen fin da kuma shirin wasan kwaikwayo na BBC "The Capture" a inda ta fito a matsayin Lauya Hanna Roberts.
Tom kuma ya fito a cigaban shirin 'Inbetweeners' da kuma wani wasan kwaikwayo na 'Britannia' na gidan talbijin din SKY.
White Lines star Laura Haddock, 34, goes house-hunting with her 28-year-old lover Tom Rhys Harries

They started dating on the set of White Lines, a drama about debauchery on Ibiza - but when Laura Haddock and her boyfriend Tom Rhys Harries went house-hunting last week, they cut an image of relaxed calm far from the hedonism of the party island.
The couple, who played brother and sister in the hit Netflix series, were spotted as they viewed a stunning Oxfordshire farmhouse, which is on the market for £1.2 million.
They arrived in a Range Rover driven by Laura, 34, wearing denim shorts and a white top, and were met by an estate agent who ushered them inside for a look around the five-bedroom home.
In White Lines, which was filmed last autumn, Laura played Zoe Walker, who discovers the seedy side of Ibiza as she investigates the murder of her DJ brother Axel, played by 28-year-old Tom.
News of their relationship only emerged earlier this month, less than a year after the collapse of Laura's six-year marriage to Sam Claflin, who starred in The Hunger Games films.
Together they have a son, four-year-old Pip, and a daughter Margot, two.

When they announced their split last August, Claflin, 34, wrote on Instagram: "Laura and I have decided to legally separate. We will move forward with nothing but love, friendship and a deep respect for one another whilst we continue to raise our family together."
Laura and Sam first met in 2011 at an audition and Sam, who's also been in Peaky Blinders, described their marriage in 2013 as "easily one of his greatest achievements."
Before White Lines, Laura appeared in the first Inbetweeners film and last year's BBC crime-drama The Capture, playing lawyer Hannah Roberts.
Tom has appeared in the Inbetweeners sequel and Sky drama Britannia.
Sojoji sun karkashe tare da ragargaza sansanin 'yan bindiga a jihar Zamfara

Rundunar sojojin sama na gamayyar sojojin da suke yakin da aka labawa suna operation HADARIN DAJI sun yi raga-raga da wani sabon sansanin'yan bindiga da ke karkashin jagorancin wani mai suna “Dangote” a dajin Doumborou da ke jihar Zamfara.

Babban Jami'in da ke lura da ayyukan yada labaran da suka shafi tsaro, Manjo Janar John Enennche ya ce harin ta sama da aka kai wanda ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar 'yan bindigan da dama, an aiwatar da shi ne bayan wasu rahotanni na lekan asiri na dan adam (HUMINT) da kuma tabbatattun hujjoji da aka samu na leken asirin da aka yi ta yi ta sama.

Manjo Janar Enenenche ya ce tsarin leken asiri na mutum da mutum da ake kira HUMINT ya tabbbtar da cewa 'yan bindigan su da kayan muhimman bukatunsu, da ababen hawansu da kuma daruruwan shanun sata, sun tashi daga inda a da suke, zuwa wannan sabon wuri kusa da wani wuri mai tsaunuka a cikin dajin

Enenche ya ce bangaren sojin sama na rundunar da ke yaki da 'yan bindigan daga bayan ta ya aika da wani rukuni na jiragen sojin saman Najeriya wada nda suka kunshi jirage masu saukar ungula masu dauke da manyan bindigogi da suka kai jerin hare-hare a kan sansanin.
A cewarsa, jirgen da suka kai harin yayi aikinsa yadda ya kamata a wurins ta inda ya dau sauti daidai ba tare da kuskurewa ba ya ragargaji 'yan bindiga da hakan ta sa ywancinsu suka rasa rayukansu.
Sauran wadanda suka yi kokarn su gudu cikin figici kuma an hallaka su a wani harin da aka kai musu ta kasa."

A sakonsa na jinjina ga sojin sama na rundunar yakin mai lakabi da HADARIN DAJI Shugaban sojojin sama na Najeriya Air Marshal Sadique Abubakar ya yi kira ga sojin saman da su kara zage damtse a aikin da suke yi na kai hare-hare ga 'yan bindigar.

Shugaban sojin sama na Najeriya ya yi kiransu da su cigaba da tallafawa rundunar sojin da suke aiki tare da kariya ta sama domin a kawo karshen duk wani ta'addanci da masu dauke da makami ke yi domin dawo da zaman lafiya a yankunan arewa maso gabas da kuma gabas ta tsakiya na kasar.
Troops destroy bandits' camp, eliminate bandits in Zamfara State

The air interdiction missions conducted by the Air Component of Operation HADARIN DAJI have destroyed a new camp belonging to the armed gang headed by the bandit leader known as "Dangote" in the Doumborou Forest area of Zamfara State.

The Coordinator Defence Media Operations, Major General John Enenche said the airstrike, which also resulted in the killing of several armed bandits, was executed following Human Intelligence (HUMINT) reports as well as series of confirmatory aerial surveillance missions.

Major General Enenche said the HUMINT established that members of the gang, along with their logistics items, motorcycles and hundreds of rustled livestock, had relocated from their erstwhile position to the new area by a rocky high ground within the Forest.
Enenche said the Air Component, therefore, dispatched an enhanced force package of Nigerian Air Force (NAF) fighter jets and helicopter gunships to attack the location.
According to him "the attack aircraft engaged the target area scoring accurate hits and taking out some of the bandits.
Many others, who were seen trying to flee the location in disarray, were mopped-up in follow-on attacks."

While commending the Air Component of Operation HADARIN DAJI for its professionalism, the Chief of the Air Staff (CAS), Air Marshal Sadique Abubakar, urged them to remain resolute in the conduct of airstrikes against armed bandits.

The Chief of the Air Staff tasked them to continue to provide close air support for the ongoing ground operations in order to eradicate all armed bandits and restore normalcy to the North-West and North-Central zones of the Country.
Yadda Aka Fara Aikin Hajjin Bana
An rage adadin waɗanda za su iya halartar aikin Hajjin na bana sakamakon yadda annobar coronavirus ta mamaye duniya.

Maimakon sama da mutum miliyan 2 da ke zuwa aikin hajji a kowace shekara daga sassan duniya, hukumomin ƙasar sun taƙaita aikin hajjin bana ga ƴan ƙasar Saudiyya da baƙi mazauna ƙasar mutum 1,000 kacal, waɗanda aka tantance a makonnin da suka gabata.

An yiwa mahajjatan da shekarunsu suka kasance tsakanin 20 zuwa 50 gwajin cutar COVID-19 gabanin shigar su Makkah, inda aka buƙaci su killace kansu tsawon mako 2 a ɗakunan otel ɗinsu, kafin su iya gudanar da aikin hajjin.

Musulmi a duk faɗin duniya na zuwa aikin Hajjin ne domin cika ɗaya daga cikin shika-shikan musulunci wanda aƙalla ake so mutum ya yi sau ɗaya a rayuwarsa zuwa wannan wuri mafi tsarki ga mabiya addinin Islama.
Bayan waɗanda suka je Hajjin a wannan shekarar sun kammala aikin nasu, an buƙace su da su sake killace kansu na tsawon mako guda domin tabbatar cewa basu kamu da cutar ba a yayin Hajjin.
How This Year's Hajj Began
The number of people who will be able to attend this year's Hajj has been reduced due to the spread of the coronavirus worldwide.

Instead of more than 2 million pilgrims making the annual pilgrimage from around the world, the country's authorities have limited this year's hajj to only 1,000 Saudi nationals and foreigners living in the country, who have been assessed in recent weeks.

Pilgrims between the ages of 20 and 50 were tested for COVID-19 before entering Mecca, where they were required to isolate themselves for 2 weeks in their hotel rooms, before being able to perform the hajj.
Muslims all over the world come for Hajj to fulfill one of the pillars of Islam which one is required to perform at least once in one's life to this holiest place for Muslims.
After those who went for Hajj this year completed their pilgrimage, they were required to isolate themselves for a week to ensure that they did not contract the disease during Hajj.
Kotun Duniya Ta Fara Bincike Kan Zanga-zangar EndSARS.

Kotun hukunta masu manyan laifuka ta duniya wato ICC ta fara gudanar da binciken farko dangane da rigingimun da suka wakana kan zanga-zangar neman kawo karshen sashin rundunar "yan sanda ta #EndSARS a fadin Nijeriya.

Ofishin mai shigar da kara na kotun ICC ya shaida ta cikin sanarwar da ya fitar cewa ya samu bayanai kan laifukan da ake zargin an aikata yayin zanga-zangar da ta juya zuwa rikici da bartana kadarori da dukiyoyin gwamnati da na al'umma.
Masu zanga-zangar sun shafe makonni masu yawa a titunan biranen kasar nan suna zanga-zangar adawa da cin zarafin da ake zargin jami'an ƴan sanda na yi.
Kimanin fararen hula 51, da ƴan sanda 11 da sojoji bakwai aka kashe, a cewar shugaban Nijeriya Muhammadu Buhari lokacin da ya gabatar da shawo kan lamarin ga duniya.
A nata bangaren kuma kungiyar kare hakkin dan adam ta Amnesty International ta ce jami'an tsaro sun bude wuta kan masu zanga-zangar, inda suka kashe tare da jikkata wasunsu da dama.
Yan sanda da sojoji duk sun yi watsi da zargin na Amnesty, sai dai ICC ta ce za ta bayyana sakamakon bincikenta na farko ga jama'a.
Zanga-zangar ta EndSARS wadda aka fara a Legas da Abuja, ta kuma fantsama zuwa wasu jihohin kasar, kafin daga bisani ta rikide ta koma rikici, abun da ya janyo asarar rayuka da dukiyoyin jama'a.
Wasu bata gari da ake zargin sun fake da zanga-zangar sun rika rusa gine-ginen gwamnati da na wasu ƴan siyasa musamman a jihar Legas, da ke kudu maso yammacin kasar.
Hukumomi sun baza jami'an ƴan sandan kwantar da tarzoma domin shawo kan lamarin, sai dai tashin hankali ya ci gaba da karuwa sakamakon kisan masu zanga-zanga a Lekki.
Masu zanga-zangar sun zargi jami'an tsaro da bude masu wuta a Lekki da ke jihar Legas, wato cibiyar inda ake gudanar da zanga-zanar, abin da ya janyo jikkatar mutane da dama.
Wasu dai na ganin budewa masu zanga-zangar wuta ya taimaka wajen kazantuwar lamarin musamman a jihar ta Legas.
International Court of Justice launches inquiry into EndSARS protests.
The International Criminal Court (ICC) has launched its first probe into the violence over protests against the #EndSARS police force that took place across Nigeria.

The ICC's prosecutor's office testified in a statement that it had received information on alleged crimes committed during the protests which turned into violence and the destruction of government and public property.
Protesters have been protesting for weeks on the streets of the country's cities against the alleged abuse of police officers.
At least 51 civilians, 11 policemen and seven soldiers were killed, according to Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari when he presented his response to the international community.
On its part an international human rights group Amnesty International says security forces opened fire on protesters, killing and injuring dozens.
Soldiers and police have all denied the Amnesty International's allegations, but the ICC has said it will release the results of its first public inquiry.
The EndSARS protests, which began in Lagos and Abuja, also spread to other parts of the country, before escalating into violence, resulting in the loss of lives and property.
Suspected hoodlums took advantage of the protest to vandalize government and private of properties of some politician's, particularly in the southwestern state of Lagos.
Authorities deployed riot police to quell the incident, but violence continued to escalate following the killing of protesters in Lekki.
Protesters have accused security forces of firing on the protesters in Lekki, Lagos State, the epi-center of the protest, which left several people injured.
Some believe that the firing on the protesters has contributed to the deterioration of the situation, especially in Lagos State.
Matsaikaicin Farashin man fetur a Amurka ya karu da kwabo daya a cikin makonni biyu zuwa $2, 25 gallon daya.
Camarillo, jihar California - Matsakaicin farashin man fetur a Amurka ya dan hau da kwabo a cikin 'yan makonni zuwa $2.25 galan daya.
Wannan shine santi 56 kasa da matsaikacin farashin da ake sayarwa a gidan mai daga yadda farashin ya ke a shekarar da ta wuce.
Mai nazari a harkar Trilby Lunderberg Survey yana mai cewe a ranar Lahadi, a wannan shine kari mafi kankanta da aka gani tuna watan Afrilu.
Tana mai cewa farashin danyen mai sun kasance a wuri daya ga kuma wadataccen mai da ake samar da shi a Amurka domin cimma bukatar 'yan kasa.
A kasar baki daya, mafi kololuwar abin da za a biya na manfetur shine a birnin San Francisco sashin bakin teku a farashin $3. 27 a gallan daya
Mafi karanci a farashi kuwa shinne Baton Rouge, a Lousiana a farashin $2.79 a gallan daya.
Farashi matsakaici na man Dizel a garin Survey da aka dauka a ranar Juma'a ya tasaya cak daga makonni biyu baya a bisa farashin $2.54 a gallan
Average US gas price up a penny over 2 weeks to $2.25/gallon
CAMARILLO, Calif. -- The average U.S. price of regular-grade gasoline inched up less than penny over the past two weeks to $2.25 per gallon.
That's 56 cents below the average pump price from a year ago.
Industry analyst Trilby Lundberg of the Lundberg Survey said Sunday it's the smallest rise in prices seen since late April.
She said crude oil prices have remained stable and there's an abundant supply of U.S. gasoline to meet the demand.
Nationwide, the highest average price for regular-grade gas is in the San Francisco Bay Area at $3.27 per gallon.
The lowest average is in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, at $1.79 per gallon.
The average price of diesel in the survey taken Friday held steady from two weeks earlier at $2.54 a gallon.
HEPATITIS: Rashin Sani, kin yin gwaji na daga cikin dalilan da ya sa mutane ke fama da cutar a Najeriya.
Ranar 28 ga Yulin kowace shekara ne ranar da kungiyar kiwon lafiya ta duniya ta ware don wayar da Kan mutane game da cutar hepatitis a duniya.
Cutar ta yi tsanani a dalilin rashin sani, rashin yin gwajin cutar da tsadar magani da mutane ke fama da su.
Bincike ya nuna cewa duk shekara cutar na yin ajalin akalla mutum miliyan 1.4.

A Najeriya mutum miliyan 17 zuwa 20 na dauke da cutar ba tare da sun sani ba sannan da dama daga cikin mutane kan sani suna dauke da cutar ne a lokacin da ta yi tsanani a jikin su da magani ba zai iya yi musu aiki ba.
Alamun kamuwa da cutar Hepatitis sun hada da canja kalar fatar jikin mutum zuwa kalar ruwan kwai, farin kwayar ido,amai, yawan jin gajiya a jiki,ciwon ciki, yawan zuwa bahaya da sauran su.
Taken taron na bana shine "Dakile yaduwar cutar hepatitis B musamman a jikin mata da jarirai sannan da wayar da Kan mutane yayin da duniya ke yaki da cutar covid-19".
Hanyoyin hana yaduwar cutar.
Wani likita mai suna Mike Omotosho ya yi kira ga mutane da su rika zuwa asibiti domin yin gwajin cutar musamman ganin cutar ba ta nuna alamu a jikin Mutum.
Ya ce yin haka zai taimaka wajen Hana cutar yin ajalin mutum sannan zai taimaka wajen hana yada cutar.
Bayan haka wata likita dake aiki a asibitin Asokoro Nnabuchi Chidinma ta yi kira ga gwamnati da ta taimaka wajen wayar da kan mutane game da cutar da hanyoyin samun kariya daga kamuwa da ita.
Abubuwa 9 game da Hepatitis B da C.
Cutar hepatitis B da C cututtuka ne dake kisan miliyoyin mutane a duniya duk shekara.
Cutar kan zama cutar dajin dake kama huhu idan ba a gaggauta neman magani ba wanda hakan kan yi ajalin mutane miliyan 1.34 a duniya.
Hepatitis B da C na daga cikin cututtukan da basu nuna alamu idan an kamu da su sai dai dole an yi gwaji.
Wadannan cututtuka na da nasaba da kashi 60 bisa 100 na cutar dajin.
Matsalolin rashin yin gwaji da kula na cikin matsalolin da ya kamata a kawar da su kafin nan da shekarar 2030.
Yin gwaji da wuri da shan magunguna ne mafita daga wadannan cututtuka.
Cutar na iya kashe mutum farat daya idan ba a shan magani.
Ana iya kubuta daga kamuwa da cutar ko kuma a warke idan an kiyaye sharuddan guje wa kamuwa da cutar.
Ana iya kamuwa da cutar idan ana amfani da abin da mai dauke fa cutar ya yi amfani da kamar su reza, abin aski da sauran su.
Abubuwa 7 game da maganin rigakafin cutar Hepatitis (Hepatitis B Vaccine)
An sarrafa maganin rigakafin cutar Hepatitis daga cutar Hepatitis wanda idan ya shiga jikin mutum yake kare shi daga kamuwa da cutar.
Wannan maganin na kare mutun daga kamuwa da Hepatitis B ne kawai.
Ana bada rigakafin maganin sau uku ko hudu a cikin watanni shida domin samun kariya daga kamuwa da cutar.
Za a iya yi wa jarirai allurar rigakafin wannan cutar.
A yi rigakafi.
HEPATITIS: Lack of awareness, lack of testing is one of the reasons why people are suffering from the disease in Nigeria.
July 28 of each year is World Health Day is set aside the World Health Organization for public enlightenment on Hepatitis world wide.
The disease is exacerbated by ignorance, lack of testing and the high cost of treatment.
Research shows that every year the disease kills at least 1.4 million people.
In Nigeria, 17 to 20 million people are infected unknowingly and many people are aware that they are infected when it is so severe that the drug cannot work for them.

The theme of this year's conference is "Preventing the spread of hepatitis B especially in women and infants and raising awareness as the world fights covid-19".
Ways to prevent the spread of the disease.
A Medical Doctor, Mike Omotosho called on people to go to the hospital for tests, especially as the disease does not show any symptoms.
He said doing so would help prevent the disease from killing people and would also help prevent the spread of the disease.
Thereafter, a Doctor at Asokoro Hospital, Nnabuchi Chidinma, called on the government to help raise awareness about the disease and ways to prevent it.
9 facts about Hepatitis B and C.
Hepatitis B and C are diseases that kill millions of people worldwide every year.
The disease can lead to lung cancer if left untreated, killing 1.34 million people worldwide.
Hepatitis B and C are diseases that do not show symptoms if they are contacted but must be tested.
These diseases are associated with 60 percent of cancers.
Problems of lack of testing and supervision are among the problems that need to be addressed by 2030.
Early testing and medication are the solution to these diseases.
The disease can kill a person instantly if left untreated.
The disease can be avoided or cured if the conditions are avoided.
The virus can be transmitted through the use of razor blades, clippers and other sharp objects, that an infected person used.

Alkalan Da Aka Yi Garkuwa Da Su A Zamfara Sun Kubuta.
Watanni biyu da yin garkuwa da wasu alkalai a jihar Zamfara, masu garkuwar sun saki alkalan kotun shari'a ta jihar Zamfara su biyu da suka sace.
Hakan na zuwa ne watanni biyu bayan sace su a hanyarsu ta dawowa daga Maradi ta Jumhuriyar Nijar.
Rahotanni sun ce an biya kudin fansar kowannensu naira miliyan daya, kafin a sakesu alkalan sune, Salihu Abdullahi da Shafi'u Jangebe.
An bukaci kowannensu da ya biya naira miliyan 10, amma hakan bai yiwu ba.
Daga bisani sai ƴan bindigar suka kira ƴan uwansu sannan suka bukaci da su biya duk abinda za su iya biya.
Kidnapped Zamfara's judges were released.
After two months of kidnapping some judges in Zamfara, the kidnappers had release the two abducted sharia court judges.
This happened two months ago after they were kidnapped on their way back from Maradi, Niger republic.
Reports says that a ransom of one million naira was paid each before the judges were release, they are Salihu Abdullahi and Shafi'u Jangebe.
They are requested to pay ten million naira each, but it wasn't possible.
But then the gunmen called their relatives and ask them to pay whatever they can afford to pay.
Gwamnatin za ta tsaurara dokar hana shiga asibitin Aso Rock.
Gwamnatin Tarayya za ta kara tsaurara matakai don rage yawan mutanen da ke shiga asibitin fadar Aso Rock.
Babban sakataren fadar shugaban kasa Tijjani Umar ya sanar da haka ranar Alhamis.
Gwamnati ta yi haka ne domin inganta aiyukkan asibiti.
Umar ya ce bisa ga yadda tsarin yake kamata ya yi asibitin ta rika kula da kiwon lafiyar shugaban kasa da iyalensa, mataimakin shugaban Kasa da iyalensa sannan da ma'aikatan fadar shugaban kasa.
A 2015 gwamnati ta ware wa asibitin naira biliyan 3.94, daga nan asibitin ta samu naira biliyan N3.87 a 2016.
A shekaran 2017 gwamnati ta ware naira biliyan 331.70 sannan a shekaran 2018 asibitin ta samu naira biliyan 1.03.
A shekaran 2019 asibitin ta samu naira miliyan 800.
A dalilin haka ne shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya Sanar da Shirin da gwamnati ke yi wajen dawo da darajar da aka san asibitin da shi.

Kodinatan "Servicom National" Nnennna Akajemeli ta bayyana cewa baya ga matsalar rashin kudi da asibitin ke fama da shi asibitin na fama da rashin isassun ma'aikatan lafiya musamman likitoci sannan da rashin wutar lantarki.
Bincike ya nuna cewa shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari da iyalensa na daga cikin mutanen da ya kamata suna samun kula a wannan asibiti amma basa zuwa.
Government to tighten the ban on Aso Rock Hospital.
The federal government will tighten measures to reduce the number of people admitted to Aso Rock Hospital.
The Permanent Secretary of the Presidency Tijjani Umar made the announcement on Thursday.
The government has the measures in order to improve the hospital services.
Umar said according to the system, the hospital should take care of the health of the president and his family, the vice president and his family as well as the presidential staff.
In 2015, the government allocated N3.94 billion to the hospital, followed by N3.87 billion in 2016.
In 2017, the government allocated 331.70 billion naira and in 2018, the hospital received 1.03 billion naira.
In 2019, the hospital received N800 million.
That is why President Muhammadu Buhari has announced the government's plan to restore the hospital's reputation.

Servicom National Coordinator Nnennna Akajemeli said that in addition to the financial crisis, the hospital was also suffering from a shortage of health workers, especially doctors, and a lack of electricity.
Investigations show that President Muhammadu Buhari and his family are among the people who should be receiving treatment at the hospital but they do not patronize it.
Majalisar Kolin Musulunci ta sake rubuta wa Sufeto Janar da Shugaban SSS wasika kan kisan Musulmai.

Majalisar Kolin Musulunci (NSCIA), wadda a Turance ake kira National Supreme Council for Islamic Affairs, ta sake rubuta wa Sufeto Janar na Ƴan Sanda Muhammad Adamu da Babban Daraktan Hukumar Tsaro ta SSS wasika, dangane da zargin kisan-gillar da aka yi zargin an yi wa Musulmai a Kudu maso Gabas da Kudu maso Yammacin Najeriya.

NSCIA, wadda ita ce majalisa mafi girma da ke wakiltar lamurran da su ka jibinci Musulmai a kasar nan, ta bayyana cewa ya zama tilas ta sake rubuta wa shugabannin tsaron wannan wasika, sakamakon rahotannin da wasu su ka kai cewa an kai masu munanan hare-hare a Kudu maso Yamma da Kudu maso Gabas.
Cikin makonnin nan an samu rahotonnin da ke nuna cewa an kai wa Musulmi hare-hare a Kudancin Najeriya.
An rika watsa wasu hotuna a jaridun online masu nuna an kai wa Musulmai hari tare da ji masu ciwo da kuma banka wa masallacin su wuta a Orlu, cikin Jihar Imo.
Kakakin Yada Labaran Ƴan Sanda a Jihar Imo, Ikeokwu Orlando, ya shaida wa PREMIUM TIMES cewa rundunar su tsara komai domin tabbatar da cewa duk wani dan kowace kabila ya samu kariya a jihar.

Cikin makon da ya gabata, jaridar The Cable ta buga labarin kona masallatai biyu a garin Nsukka da ke jihar Enugu, biyo bayan wata tankiya da ta faru tsakanin wani dan Keke NAPEP, har dangin wata mata su ka ji masa ciwo saboda rikici ya hada shi da matar, kan rashin cika masa kudin sa ya dauke ta.
Amma kakakin ƴan sandan Enugu, Daniel Ekea, cewa ya yi ba zai yi magana har sai ya tabbatar da afkuwar lamarin tukuna.
Wasikar Nuna Damuwa.

Cikin wasiku daban-daban da NSCIA ta aika wa IGP da SSS, wadanda mataimakin sakataren majalisar, Salisu Shehu ya sa wa hannu, ya nuna cewa irin yadda aka dauko kisan tiryan-tiryan kuma daki-daki, abin damuwa ne.
Ya yi kira ga jami'an tsaro da su kare rayuka, dukiyoyi da masallatan Musulmai a Kudu maso Gabas da Kudu maso Yamma.
Wasikar ta kuma yi kira da a duba lamarin wadanda aka ragargaza wa dukiyoyi.
Ta kuma yi kira shugabannin tsaron su tashi tsaye su dakile barazanar da ake wa Musulmi da dukiyoyin su a yankunan biyu.
The Supreme Council of Islamic Affairs has re-written a letter to the Inspector General of police and the Director General of the SSS on the killings of Muslims.

The National Supreme Council for Islamic Affairs (NSCIA) has re-written a letter to Inspector General of Police Muhammad Adamu and the Director General of the State Security Service (SSS) in connection with the alleged killings of Muslims in South East and Southwest Nigeria.

The National Security Council (NSCIA), the largest body representing Muslims in the country, said it had to rewrite the letter to the security chiefs, following reports that there were some deadly attacks on Muslims in the South West and South East.
In recent weeks there have been reports of attacks on Muslims in Southern Nigeria.
Pictures were posted online showing Muslims being attacked, injured and their mosque set on fire in Orlu, Imo State.
Imo State Police Spokesperson Ikeokwu Orlando told PREMIUM TIMES that the force should make every effort to ensure that every member of any ethnic group is protected in the state.

Last week, The Cable reported the burning of two mosques in Nsukka, Enugu State, following an altercation between a NAPEP cyclist who was injured by relatives of a woman in a scuffle with who refused to pay him his full fare.
But Enugu police spokesman Daniel Ekea said he would not comment until he had confirmed the incident.
Letter of Concern.

In various letters sent by the NSCIA to the IGP and the SSS, signed by the Deputy Secretary of the Council, Salisu Shehu, it pointed out that the manner in which the killing was being carried out serially, is worrisome.
He called on security forces to protect the lives, property and mosques of Muslims in the South East and South West.
The letter also called to look after those whose properties were damaged.
The letter also called on the security chiefs to step up their efforts to curb threats against Muslims and their properties in the two regions.
JIGAWA: Kungiyar Hisbah ta ragargaza kwalaben giya 588 a Ringim.
Hukumar Sanya idanu Kan Hana Laifukan Da Suka Saɓa Shari'ar Musulunci (Hisbah), ta bayyana kamawa da fasa kwalaben giya 588 a ƙaramar hukumar Ringim dake jihar Jigawa.
Kwamandan hukumar Ibrahim Ɗahiru ya Sanar da haka wa Kamfanin Dillancin Labaran Najeriya ranar Lahadi a garin Dutse.
Dahiru ya ce hukumar ta fasa kwalaben giyar ne ranar 29 ga watan Agusta.
Ya ce sun kwato kwalaban giyar daga ƙauyukan Tudun Babaye, Gujungu, Kijawal da Wadugur dake ƙaramar hukumar Ringim.
Ɗahiru ya bayyana cewa addinin Musulunci ya haramta shan giya da duk sauran wasu abubuwan sa maye da bugarwa a birni da ƙauyukan jihar.
Ya ce hukumar za ta ci gaba da Kama Kuma ta hana masu aikata miyagun aiyukka irin haka a al'umma.
Idan ba a manta ba a watan Satumba na shekarar 2019 ne Hukumar Hisbah ta kama Kuma ta fasa kwalaben giya 196,400 duk a cikin Kano.

An fasa kwalaben giyar a dajin Kalemawa, cikin Karamar Hukumar Dawakin Tofa, inda Gwamna Abdullahi Ganduje ya bayyana cewa addinin Musulunci ya haramta shan giya da duk sauran wasu abubuwan sa maye da bugarwa, waɗanda za su iya yi wa kwakwalwar mutum lahani.
Malaman mu na addinin musulunci, da shugabannin mu su hada hannu domin yaki da wannan lamari na kawar da kayan shaye-shaye masu bugarwa.
Inji Ganduje.
JIGAWA: Hisbah board destroyed 588 bottles of beer in Ringim.
The Hisbah Board has announced the seizure and destruction of 588 bottles of liquor in Ringim Local Government Area of ​​Jigawa State.
The commander of the Board, Ibrahim Dahiru, made this known to the News Agency of Nigeria on Sunday in Dutse.
Dahiru said the commission destroyed the liquor bottles on August 29.
He said they seized the liquor bottles from Tudun Babaye, Gujungu, Kijawal and Wadugur villages in Ringim Local Government Area.
Dahiru explained that Islam forbids the consumption of alcohol and all other intoxicants in the cities and villages of the state.
He said the commission would continue to arrest and deter such perpetrators in the community.
It will be recalled that, in September 2019 the Hisbah Commission seized and destroyed 196,400 liquor bottles in Kano.

The liquor bottles were destroyed in Kalemawa Forest, Dawakin Tofa Local Government Area, where Governor Abdullahi Ganduje declared, that alcohol and other intoxicants which can harm the human brain, are prohibited by Islam.
Our Islamic scholars and our leaders must collaborate and work together to fight this scourge of alcoholism.
Ganduje said.
Yan Majalisar Sarki 5 Sun Yi Murabus a Zamfara.

Masarautar Shinkafi dake Jihar Zamfara a arewacin Najeriya, ta nada Femi Fani kayode, tsohon Ministan Sufurin Jirgin Saman Najeriya a matsayin sarautar Sadaukin Shinkafi, lamarin da bai yiwa al'ummar Shinkafi dadi ba.
Yan majalisar Sarkin su biyar sun yi murabus domin nuna adawa da nadin da Sarki Muhammad Makwashe ya yi.

Dr. Tijjani Salihu daya daga cikin ƴan majalisar sarki, kuma malami a jami'ar Usman Dan Fodio Sokoto, ya shaidawa wakilin muryar Amurka cewa, ya yi murabus daga mukaminsa na "Uban Marayun Shinkafi" saboda a cewar sa an baiwa makiyin arewacin Najeriya sarauta, kuma mai yawan sukar sarkin Musulmi, kuma hakan abin bakin ciki ne.

Shi ma Alhaji Sulaiman Shu'aibu, wanda ya yi murabus daga mukamin sa na "sarkin Shannun Shinkafi", ya bayyana wa wakilin muryar Amurka dalilin sa na ajiye wannan mukami, cewar bai amince da aka baiwa Femi Fani kayode sarautar Saukin Shinkafi ba, saboda ya dade yana sukar arewa da shugabanninta.

Ya kara da cewa sarautar Sadauki, sarauta ce mai daraja, wanda duk wanda yake da sarautar zai iya sadaukar da rayuwar sa da dukiyar sa ga al'ummar yankin, da addinin su da al'adun su da zamantakewar su, da kuma kare mutunci da muradun wadannan al'umma.
Mai bada shawara na musamman ga gwamnan jihar Zamfara, Alhaji Zailani Baffa ya shaidawa wakilin muryar Amurka cewa, gwamnati ba ita take zabar duk wata sarauta ba.
5 Emir's Councilmen Resign in Zamfara.

The Shinkafi Kingdom of Zamfara State in northern Nigeria has appointed Femi Fani Kayode, the former Minister of Civil Aviation of Nigeria, as the Hero of Shinkafi and which did not go down well with the people of Shinkafi.
Five members of the Sultan's Council have resigned in protest of Emir Muhammad Makwashe's decision.

Doctor. Tijjani Salihu, a member of the Emir's Council and a lecturer at Usman Dan Fodio University in Sokoto, told VOA that he had resigned as "Benefactor of Shinkafi's Orphans" because, according to him, the enemy of northern Nigeria had been given a royal title, a frequent critic of the Sultan, and that is unfortunate.

Alhaji Sulaiman Shu'aibu, who has resigned as the "The Overseer of Shinkafi's Cattle ", also told VOA that he did not approve of Femi Fani Kayode's traditional title in Shinkafi because of his long standing criticism of the north and its leaders.

He added that the title Sadauki is a noble is prestigious, the holder of the title is he who dedicated his life and wealth to the people of the region, their religion, culture and society, and protect the dignity and the interests of these communities.
The Special Adviser to the Zamfara State Governor, Alhaji Zailani Baffa, told VOA that the government does not choose for the emirs who to give titles.
Masifa kan masifa: Texas na fama da ambaliyar ruwa sakamakon guguwar Hanna sai ga wata sabuwar masifar Korona birus ta bullaʻ

Masu hasashen yanayi na hasashen afkuwar "masifar ambaliyar ruwa" a kudancin Texas bayan da guguwar Hanna ta haddasa zaizaiyar wasu tuddai biyu, da kuma haifar da zubar ruwan sama kamar da bakin kwarya, da iska mai karfi da ke gudun mil 90 a cikin awa guda.

Guguwar ta iso gaba ne ranar Asabar a matsayina hadari mai mataki na daya (mafi kusaci ga doron kasa a cikin matakai biyar) daga bayan da ya rikide zuwa hadari mai tafiya kasa-kasa da kuma karfi, duk da haka zai iya zubar da ruwan saman na santimita 15 - 30 (inci 6-12) a ranar Lahadi tare da iska mai gudu a mil 60 cikin awa daya.
Wasu wuraren tuni sun soma bayar da rahotanni samun ruwan saman da ya kai santimita 23 (inci 9), ciki har da gundunmar Cameron wacce ke iyaka da kasar Mexico.

Guguwa iska mai dauke da ruwan sama ita ce mabudin kakkar jerrin guguwar da ake yiwa lakabi da Atlantic ta shekarar 2020, Chris Birchfield wani masanin yanayi ya gargadi mazauna yankin da su sa ido da bi a hankali, yana mai cewa "Da sauran aiki a gabanmu". Har yanzu muna sa rai da afkuwar mummunan ambaliyar ruwa."
Jihar Texas ta sha fama da karuwar wadanda suka kamu da cutar Koronabirus a cikin 'yan kwankin nan.
Gwamna Greg Abbott ya fitar da wata sanarwa gargadin afkuwar bala'i ga gundumomi 32 wadanda ke kan hanyar guguwar, cikin hara da Harris, da fort Bend, da Galveston, da kuma Brazoria.
Yana mai cewa: "Duk wata guguwa ba karamar kalubale ba ce.
Wannan kalaubale na da sarkakiya, yanzu ya sake tabarbarewa gnuncewa guguwa ta ratsa ne a wajenda a ka yi fama da cutar COVID-19."
Zaizayewar tuddai nafarako ya faru ne da misalin karfe 5 na yamma a ranara Asabar mil 15 arewa da Port Mansfield, wanda ya ke kimanin mil 130 kudu daga Corpus christi.
Na biyn ya faru ne a kusa a gabashin gudumar Kennedy.
Sama da mutane 43,700 ne a kudancin Texas, cikin har da Corpus Christi, da Harlingen, da kuma Brownsville sue fana da rashin wutar lantarki a yammacin Asabar.
Masu bayar da agajin gaggawa a Corpus Christi sun sassaka jinshikai kuma mahada a shirin ko ta kwana idan ambaliyar ya ci tituna.
A wani sako da ya aika ta shifinsa na Tuwita, Shugaba Trump ya ce gwamnatinsa na sa ido kan guguwar Hannatare da Guguwar Douglas wacce take kan hanyarta ta zuwa tsbirin Hawaii dake tekun Atlantis.
Sherry Behme wacce ta ke zaune a bakin gabar tekun Coirpus Criti na mai cewa, wannan guguwar da ke dosowa ta kara mana damuwa da muke ji a lokacin annobar.
'Yar shekara 67 wacce ta ke yawan zama a gida saboda larurar lafiya da take fama da ita da shafi matsanancin ciwon huhu.
Ta ce: "wannan kamara wani duka biyu ne a gare mu.
Ina jin wannan ya fadarwa da mutane da yawa gaba.
"Za mu ga karshen abin.
Kowa da kowa na zaune kalau tare da karfin gwiwa da kuma zama tare."
Hurricane Hanna: Coronavirus-hit Texas faces new threat of catastrophic flooding in 'double whammy'
Forecasters are predicting "catastrophic flooding" in southern Texas after Hurricane Hanna made landfall twice, bringing heavy rain and winds up to 90mph.

It came ashore on Saturday as a category one storm (the lowest of the five levels) and has now been downgraded to a tropical storm - but there could still be 15-30cm (6-12in) of rain on Sunday with 60mph winds.
Some areas have already reported getting up to 23cm (9in) of rainfall, including Cameron County, which borders Mexico.

Hanna was the opening hurricane of the 2020 Atlantic cyclone season, and meteorologist Chris Birchfield warned residents to stay alert, saying: "We're not even close to over at this point. We're still expecting catastrophic flooding."
Texas has already been dealing with a surge in coronavirus cases in recent weeks.
Governor Greg Abbott has issued a disaster declaration for 32 counties in the storm's path, including Harris, Fort Bend, Galveston and Brazoria.
He said: "Any hurricane is an enormous challenge.
This challenge is complicated and made even more severe, seeing that it's sweeping through an area that is the most challenged area in the state for COVID-19."
The first landfall happened at 5pm on Saturday, 15 miles north of Port Mansfield, which is about 130 miles south of Corpus Christi.
The second took place nearby in eastern Kennedy County.
More than 43,700 people in South Texas, including Corpus Christi, Harlingen and Brownsville, were without power on Saturday evening.
Emergency services in Corpus Christi have placed barricades near intersections so they are ready to use if streets flood.
In a tweet, President Donald Trump said his administration was monitoring Hanna, along with Hurricane Douglas, which was heading toward Hawaii in the Pacific Ocean.
Resident Sherry Boehme, who lives along a beach in Corpus Christi, said the approaching storm had increased the anxiety she felt during the pandemic.
The 67-year-old has mostly stayed at home because of health issues related to chronic lung disease.
She said: "It's almost like a double whammy to us.
I think it's made a lot of people nervous.
"We'll get through it.
Everybody is good and strong and sticks together."
Shugabannin Afirka Da Aka Kora Daga Karagar Mulki.
A farkon wannan mako ne sojoji a kasar Mali suka gudanar da juyin mulki inda suka kawar da shugaban kasa Ibrahim Boubacar Keita daga karagar mulki.
Keita shine shugaban kasa na 15 da aka tilastawa sauka daga karagar mulki a Afirka a cikin shekaru 10 da suka gabata.
A ranar 18 ga watan Fabarairun shekarar 2010, sojoji a Jamhuriyar Nijar sun kawar da shugaban kasa Mamadou Tandja bayan ya sauya kundin tsarin mulkin kasar domin samun damar yin wa'adi na uku.
A ranar 14 ga watan Janairun shekarar 2011, juyin juya hali ya kifar da gwamnatin Firaminista Zine El Abidine Ben Ali, wanda ya gudu ya bar kasar bayan ya kwashe shekaru 23 a karagar mulki.

A ranar 11 ga watan Fabarairun shekarar 2011 zanga zanga ta tilastawa shugaba Hosni Mubarak na Masar sauka daga kujerar sa bayan ya kwashe shekaru 30 yana mulki, abinda ya baiwa sojoji damar hawa karagar shugabanci.

A ranar 11 ga watan Afrilun shekarar 2011, jami'an tsaro suka kama shugaban Cote d'Ivoire Laurent Gbagbo bayan tashin hankalin da ya biyo zaben shugaban kasar wanda aka bayyana Alasassne Ouattara a matsayin wanda ya lashe.
A ranar 20 ga watan Oktobar shekarar 2011 ƴan tawayen Libya da taimakon kungiyar tsaro ta NATO suka kashe shugaban kasar Libya Moammar Ghadafi wanda ya kwashe kusan shekaru 42 a karagar mulki.
A ranar 22 ga watan Maris na shekarar 2012, sojoji suka yi bore a Mali inda suka kama shugaban kasa Amadou Toumane Toure.
A ranar 12 ga watan Afrilun shekarar 2012 sojoji suka kama shugaban kasar Guinea Bissau Raimundo Pereira da tsohon Firaminista Carlos Gomes Junior sakamakon takaddamar zaben shugaban kasa.

A ranar 24 ga watan Maris na shekarar 2013, yan tawayen kungiyar Seleka suka tilastawa shugaba Francois Bozize tserewa daga karagar mulki, inda suka nada shugaban su Michel Djotodia a karaga, yayin da shima a ranar 10 ga watan Janairun shekarar 2014 ya sauka daga mulki sakamakon matsin lambar kasashen duniya.

A ranar 31 ga watan Oktobar shekarar 2014, sojoji suka tilastawa shugaba Blaise Compaore da ya kwashe shekaru 27 a karagar mulki tserewa ya bar kasar, yayin da kasa da shekara guda aka tilastawa wanda ya gaje shi, shugaban rikon kwarya Michel Kafando sauka daga mukamin, kafin daga bisani aka mayar da shi.
A ranar 21 ga watan Janairun shekarar 2017 Yahya Jammeh ya fice ya bar Gambia bayan ya sha kashi a zaben shugaban kasar, sakamakon nasarar da Adama Barrow ya samu.

A ranar 21 ga watan Nuwambar shekarar 2017, shugaba Robert Mugabe na Zimbabwe da ya kwashe shekaru 37 a karagar mulki ya sauka daga mukamin sa, bayan da Majalisar dokoki ta fara mahawarar tsige shi, yayin da tsohon mataimakin sa Emmerson Mnangagwa ya gaje shi.

A ranar 14 ga watan Fabarairun shekarar 2018, shugaban kasar Afirka ta kudu Jacob Zuma ya sauka daga karagar mulki sakamakon yunkurin tsige shi saboda zargin cin hanci da rashawa, abinda ya baiwa mataimakin sa kuma shugaban Jam'iyyar ANC Cyril Ramaphosa damar zama shugaban kasa.

A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilun shekarar 2019, shugaban Algeria Abdelaziz Bouteflika da ya kwashe shekaru 20 a karagar mulki ya sauka daga mukamin sa sakamakon zanga zangar tsadar rayuwa da kuma bukatar sa ta neman wa'adi na biyar.

A ranar 11 ga watan Afrilun bana sojoji sun kifar da gwamnatin shugaban kasar Sudan Omar Hassan al Bashir sakamakon zanga zangar da aka kwashe watanni 4 ana yi a kasar, matakin da ya bada damar kafa gwamnatin rikon kwarya da ta kunshi soji da fararen hula.
African leaders that are ousted from power.
Earlier this week, Mali's military staged a coup to oust President Ibrahim Boubacar Keita.
Keita is the 15th president to be forced out of power in Africa in the last 10 years.
On February 18, 2010, the military in the Republic of Niger ousted President Mamadou Tandja after he amended the country's constitution to allow him a third term.
On January 14, 2011, a revolution overthrew the government of Prime Minister Zine El Abidine Ben Ali, who fled the country after 23 years in power.
On February 11, 2011, protests forced Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak to step down after 30 years in power, allowing the military to take over the government.
On April 11, 2011, security forces arrested Cote d'Ivoire's President Laurent Gbagbo in the aftermath of the post-election violence in which Alasassne Ouattara was declared the winner.
Libyan leader Moammar Ghadafi, who has been in power for nearly 42 years, was assassinated on October 20, 2011 by Libyan rebels with the help of NATO forces.
On March 22, 2012, the military rebelled and arrested President Amadou Toumane Toure in Mali.
Guinea-Bissau President Raimundo Pereira and former Prime Minister Carlos Gomes Junior have been arrested by the military on April 12, 2012 in connection with a disputed presidential election.
On March 24, 2013, Seleka rebels forced President Francois Bozize to step down, appointing their leader Michel Djotodia, while he also resigned on January 10, 2014. due to international pressure.

On October 31, 2014, the military forced President Blaise Compaore, who had spent 27 years in power, to flee the country, while less than a year later his successor, interim President Michel Kafando, was forced to step down and he was later restored.
On January 21, 2017, Yahya Jammeh left The Gambia after losing the presidential election to Adama Barrow.

Zimbabwe's President Robert Mugabe, who has ruled the country for 37 years, resigned on November 21, 2017, after parliament began debating his impeachment, and while his former deputy, Emmerson Mnangagwa succeeded him.

On February 14, 2018, South African President Jacob Zuma stepped down following an attempt to oust him over allegations of corruption, allowing his deputy and ANC party leader Cyril Ramaphosa the chance to be the president.
On April 2, 2019, Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika, who has been in power for 20 years, resigned following protests over the cost of living and his demand for a fifth term.

On April 11 this year, the military overthrew the government of Sudanese President Omar Hassan al-Bashir in the wake of four months of protests in the country, which paved the way for the formation of an interim government consisting of both military and civilian.
Ina jin takaicin kin gayyata ta da aka yi - Dan wasan Najeriya.

Dan wasan Najeriya dake taka leda a kungiyar kwallon kafa ta KRC Genk Cyriel Dessers ya nuna takaicin sa kan rashin saka shi cikin tawagar ƴan wasan da za su fafata da Sierra Leone a mako mai kamawa a wasan neman tikitin gasar cin kofin Afrika ta 2021.
Dessers mai shekara 25 ya kuma ce zai ci gaba da kokarin ganin Gernot Rohr ya dawo masa da gurbin sa a tawagar.
Ya kuma sha alwashin kara kwazo da dagewa a kungiyar sa ta Genk domin ya kara samun amincewa daga Gernot Rohr.
Rohr dai ya gayyaci Paul Onuachu da suke a kungiya daya da Cyriel Dessers.
I am feel frustrated for not inviting me - Nigerian footballer.

A Nigerian footballer playing for KRC, Genk Cyriel Dessers, has expressed his frustration at not being included in next week's squad for 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier against Sierra Leone which would take place next week.
The 25-year-old Dessers also said he would do his best to make Gernot Rohr return to him to his place in the squad.
He has also vowed to work harder at his Genk club in order to gain the support of Gernot Rohr.
Rohr has invited Paul Onuachu, who is in the same team as Cyriel Dessers.
Hare-hare Kan Gidajen Yada Labaran Nijeriya Abin Damuwa Ne - Majalisar Dinkin Duniya.
Majalisar Dinkin Duniya da kuma kasar Ingila sun kwatanta karuwar kai hare-hare a kan gidajen yada labarai da kuma manema labaran a Nijeriya da cewa wannan babban abin damuwa ne.

Don haka, Majalisar ta Dinkin Duiya da kuma gwamnatin ta kasar Ingila sai suka nemi hukumomi da su dakatar da dukk wani matsin lamba da suke yi a kan sashen na ma'aikatan yada labarai da kuma ma'aikatan na shi, wanda yin hakan ya zama wajibi domin hukumomin ne za a kama da laifi a kan tursasawan.
Babban jakadan kasar Ingila a nan Nijeriya, Catriona Laing, ne ya yi bayanin hakan a ranar Litinin a wajen bukin ranar hana aikata laifuka ga manema labarai na wannan shekarar ta 2020.
Babban jakadan ya aike da sako a shafinsa na twita a inda yake cewa, samar da sashen yada labarai mai cikakken ƴanci ya zama tilas a kan kowace gwamnati.
Sam bai kamata a tursasawa manema labarai ba, ko kuma a kai masu hari.
Hakanan shi ma daraktan yada labarai na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya a nan Nijeriya, Ronald Kayanja, ya ce, a muhimmiyar rana irin wannan tilas ne a shelanta kare manema labarai da gidajen yada labaran.

Kayanja ya ce, kai hare-hare a kan gidajen yada labarai da kuma ma'aikatan yada labaran babban abin damuwa ne ainun, don haka sai ya yi kira ga hukumomi da su binciki zarge-zargen irin wannan cin mutunci domin tsayar da gaskiya da adalci.
Kayanja ya ce wani matakin kuma na kawar da yada labaran karya shi ne ta hanyar karfafan gidajen yada labarai masu zaman kansu.

Kamar dai yanda ake bayar da tallafi ga sauran sassan tattalin arziki, domin sake gina su da karfinsu, zai yi kyau su ma gidajen yada labaran a tallafa masu, mun dai kawo maku rahoton da ke nuni da cewa, aƙalla gidajen yada labarai guda uku ne aka kone su a lokacin hargitsin nan na neman kawo karshen SARS, tare da jiwa manema labarai masu yawa raunuka a lokacin da suke a kan bakin aikinsu na shaida wa Duniya yanda zanga-zangar ke wakana.
Attacks on Nigerian Media is very Worrisome - United Nations
The United Nations and the United Kingdom have described the increase in attacks on the media and journalists in Nigeria as a major concern.

For this reason, The United Nations and the British government have called on the authorities to end all pressure on the media and its staff. It is necessary because the authorities will be held accountable for the harassment.
The British Ambassador to Nigeria, Catriona Laing, made the announcement on Monday at the 2020 Crime Prevention Day Press Conference.
The Ambassador Tweeted that the creation of a fully independent media is a must for any government.
Journalists should not be intimidated or attacked.
Ronald Kayanja, the UN's director of public relations for Nigeria, also said that on such an important day, the protection of the media and the media must be proclaimed.
Kayanja said attacks on media outlets and media staff is a major concern, and called on the authorities to investigate allegations of such abuses to uphold truth and justice.
Kayanja said another step in eliminating fake news is through supporting private media outlets.

Just as support is being given to other sectors of the economy, to rebuild them with their strengths, it would be good for the media to be supported as well, we have just reported that there are at least three media outlets. They were burned during the SARS riots, with many journalists injured while on duty to tell the world how the protests were taking place.
Mayar da hankali kan tarihi na iya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen sasantawa
Rarrabawa kawuna sun zurfi a lokacin da fahimta da warkarwa ya yakamata su zama manufofinmu.
Tsarin tafi da makarantunmu na daga cikin wani bangare da za mu zarga na wannan gazawar ilmi da fahimta.
Ba a koyar da tarihin kasar Australiya sosai.

A zahiri, ba tare da aiwatar da tsattsauran ra'ayi ba, makarantar ita kadai ta ke mai da hankali kan tarihinmu - "tarihin Australiya," a shekara ta 12 - zai mutu a cikin shekaru biyar masu zuwa, watakila ma kafin wannan lokacin.
A shekarar da ta wuce, a cikin ɗaliban Victoria 49,324 da suka kammala VCE, 628 ne kadai, ko kashi 1, suka yi tarihin Australiya.
A cikin shekaru shida da suka gabata, wannan adadi ya kusan komawa rabi, tare da kusan ɗalibai ɗari ne suke yin rajista a kowace shekara.
Babban dalilin da yasa dalibai kaɗan ne suka zaɓi yin nazarin tarihin Australiya a shekara ta 12 shine ba a yi komai ba a shekarun da suka gabata donza zaburar da sha'awar yin hakan.
Tarihi ba ma wani fage ban ne fannin karatu mai zaman kansa, amma a hade yake a cikin faffadan al'maura na"dan Adam."
Don haka a tsawon shekaru 7 da 8, ɗalibai sun kammala taƙaitaccen sashe ɗaya tak a kan tsohuwar al'adun mutanen Aborigine da mazauna tsibirin Torres."
Sannnan a wasu shekaru 9 da 10, da akwai kuma wani bangare mai mayar da hankali kan kasar Australiya a lokacin yake-yaken duniya.
Ga yawancin daliban Victoria, wannan shine jimillar tarihin Australiya da ake koyarwa a daukacin a shekarun su na karatun Sakandare.
A shekaru 9 da 10, da akwai wani zabi na wani sashe da ya tattaro tun daga shekarun 1750 zuwa 1918.
Wasu abubuwa guda uku na da bukatar a yi aiki domin ceto tarihin a Australiya a makarantun Victorian.
Da farko a mayar da tarihi ya zama bangaren ilimi mai zaman kansa kamar Ingilishi da Liassafi da kuma kimiyya.
Saboda ana koyar da tarihi kawai a cikin abubuwa na dan adam, an bashi takaittcen gurbi a cikin tsarin mahajjar karatu.
Haka nan a ko dayaushe ana koyar da shi ta hanyar masu nazarin dan adam gama gari waɗanda su ba suyi karatun tarihi ba da kansu.
Kwarewa nazarin tarihi kamar nazarin shaidu, suna da rikitarwa.
Dole ne mu sake daukar kwararrun malaman tarihi don tabbatar da cewa ana koyar da su ta hanya mai sauki da kuma ban sha'awa.
Na uku, nazarin tarihin Australiya daga shekarar 1788 zuwa 1914 dole ne ya zama tilas.
Dalibai suna son abin da suka sabawa.
Da yawa daga tsoffin ɗalibaina sun yanke hukunci cewa ba za su yi tarihin Australiya a shekara ta 12 saboda da sai sun koyi abubuwan da ke ciki tun daga farko.
Sanin tarihinmu kadai ba zai dinke bambancin launin fatarmu ba da ta suka yi zurfi.
Amma ba tare da shi ba, kamar yadda tsarin karatun Victoria ya fito da shi karara, aikin ba zai yiwu.
Dr. Matthew Bach Dan Majalisar Dokokin Victoria ne kuma tsohon sassaucin ra'ayi, kuma mataimakin shugaban makarantar Ivanhoe Girls" Grammar ne.
History focus can play an important role in reconciliation
Divides have deepened when understanding and healing should be our goals.
Our school system is partly to blame for this failure of knowledge and understanding.
Far too little Australian history is taught.
In fact, without radical action, the only school subject that focuses specifically on our history - "Australian history," at year 12 - will die within the next five years, maybe sooner.
Last year, of 49,324 Victorian students to complete the VCE, only 628, or 1 per cent, did Australian history.
Over the past six years, this figure has been almost halved, with almost 100 fewer students enrolling every year.
A key reason why so few students choose to study Australian history in year 12 is that little has been done in earlier years to fire their passion.
History is not even a standalone learning area, but is subsumed within the broader "humanities."
So across years 7 and 8, students complete only one short unit on ancient "Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples and culture."
Then, in years 9 and 10, there is another unit focusing on Australia during the world wars.
For many Victorian students, that is the sum of Australian history taught across their secondary years.
At years 9 and 10, there is another optional unit covering the period from 1750-1918.
Three actions should urgently be taken to save Australian history in Victorian schools.
First, history must become a standalone learning area like English, maths and science.
Because history is taught only as part of the humanities, it is given little space within the curriculum.
It is also normally taught by humanities generalists who have not studied history themselves.
Historical skills, such as the analysis of evidence, are complex.
We must recruit more specialist history teachers to make sure these are taught in an accessible and exciting way.
Third, the study of Australian history from 1788 to 1914 must become compulsory.
Students love familiarity.
So many of my former students decided against Australian history in year 12 because they would have had to learn the content from scratch.
Knowledge of our history alone will not bridge our deep racial divides.
But without it, as the Victorian curriculum makes clear, the task is hopeless.
Dr Matthew Bach is a Liberal member of the Victorian Parliament and former deputy principal of Ivanhoe Girls" Grammar.
Fiye da cutar Koronabirus dubu 13.85 ne a Indiya har zuwa yanzu, mutane 32,063 suka mutu, kashi 63.91% ne suka warke
Adadin mutane 8,85,577 ne suka warke kuma adadin kaso da suka warke ya kai kashi 63.91 cikin dari.

Garin New Delhi: Indiya ta ba da rahoton wadanda suka kamu da kwayar cutar ta coronabirus 48,661 a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata, suna ɗaukar jimillar zuwa 13,85,522, kamar yadda bayanan gwamnati sun nuna.
Adadin wadanda suka mutu ya haura 32,063, a inda mutane 705 suka mutu a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata.
Adadin wadanda suka kamu da kwayar cutar coronabirus ya ninka sau biyu a kusan makonni uku tun daga ranar 2 ga watan Yulin, a lokacin da kasar ta tsallake matakin dubu dari shida.
Yawan adadi na wadanda suka kamu da cutar Covid-19 na kasar ya kai makin dubu dari a ranar Juma'ar da ta gabata.
Tun daga wannan lokacin, an sami rahoton sabbin kamuwa da ya kai dubu uku. Wannan ita ce rana ta huɗu a jere lokacin da masu kamuwa da cutar COVID-19 suka ƙaru da fiye da 45,000.

Maharashtra a ranar Asabar ta ba da rahoton sabbin kamuwa da cutar 9,251 wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta COVID-19, inda suka dauki adadin a jihar zuwa 3,66,368 yayin da wadanda suka mutu suka kai 257, ciki har da 116 a yankin Mumbai yakin tsakiyar birni (MMR), zuwa 13,389, in ji Ma'aikatar Kiwon Lafiya ta jihar.
An sallami adadin marasa lafiya 7,227 a rana, inda aka dauki adadin wadanda suka warke zuwa 2,07,194.
Kimanin marasa lafiya dubu 8.85 ne suka warke ya zuwa yanzu; darajar farfadowa ya tsaya a kashi 63.91 bisa dari a safiyar yau.
Kaso na yawan wadanda suka kamu da cutar - yawan marasa lafiya waɗanda aka gwada aka kuma tabbatar sun kamu da kwayar cutar - shine kashi 11 cikin ɗari.
A farkon wannan makon ne, gwamnati ta ce tana da niyyar saukar da adadin wadanda suka kamu da ƙimar zuwa kashi 5 cikin 100.
Jihar Karnataka a ranar Asabar ya yi rajistar a sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta Koronavirus 5,000 a rana ta uku a jere, wanda hakan ya kai adadin ya haura 90,000 baki daya.
A Bengaluru kadai an bayar da rahoton sabbin mutanen da suka kamu da cutar zuwa 2,036 da suka kai jimillar adadin zuwa 43,503.

Matsayin birnin Delhi ya haura a cikin yawan wadanda aka samu da cutar COVID-19 kuma a halin yanzu birnin na matsayi na takwas tsakanin jihohi da yankuna da ke karkashin ikon gwmanatin tarayya a kasar, Babban Ministan Arvind Kejriwal ne ya faɗa a ranar Asabar.

A cikin wani karuwar adadi da aka taba samu a rana daya har zuwa yanzu, Kerala a ranar Asabar ta ba da rahoton mutane 1,103 sabbbi da suka kamu da COVID-19, wanada hakan ya daga adadin masu dauke da cutar zuwa 18,098, yayin da sama da dubban mutane 1.5 ake lura da su.
Kimanin mutane 9,420 ne ke karbar maganin cutar Koronabirus.

Yawan wadanda suka kanu da cutar Coronavirus a Tamil Nadu ya tsallake makin dubu dari tare da sabbin wadanda suka kamuwa da cutar 6,989 da aka rawaito a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata, wanda kuma shi ne mafi girma a rana guda, kamar yadda bayanan gwamnati ya nuna.
Mutane tamanin da tara sun mutu kuma 7,758 sun warke a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata.
Yawana adadin wadanda suka kamu a yanzu ya kai 2,06,737.

Gujarat a ranar Asabar ta shigar da bayanai mafi yawaa rana guda na adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar Koronavirus da 1,081 na sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar, wanda hakan ya kai jimlar zuwa 54,712 yayin da marasa lafiya 22 suka mutu, ciki har da aka samu 11 a cikin Surat, a cewar ma'aikatar kiwon lafiya ta jihar.

Babban Ministan Maharashtra Uddhav Thackeray zai ƙaddamar da shirin bayar da gudummawar plasma a ranar 27 ga watan Yuli, bayan "Plasma Daan Sankalp Abhiyan" don binciken farko na marasa lafiyar COVID-19 da suka warke a yankin Dharavi na Mumbai.

Indiya ce ta uku a cikin kasashe masu fama da cutar Koronavirus a duniya bayan Amurka da Brazil, a hankali ta kara karfin gwajin cutar ta COVID-19 kuma ta gudanar da gwaje-gwaje sama da dubu dari 4.2 a cikin yini daya, Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Tarayyar ta ce a ranar Asabar, tana mai yaba karuwar tare da danganaa samun wannan nasara ga yawan dakunan gawaje-gwaje da aka samu.

Annobar ta hallaka sama da mutane 6,33,000 a fadin duniya tun lokacin da cutar da bayyana a kasar Chima a shekarar da ta wuce, da samun yawan mutane sama da miliyan 15.5 wadanda suka kamu dac cutar, a cewar kamfanin dillancin labarai na AFP.
Over 13.85 lakh coronavirus cases in India so far, 32,063 deaths, 63.91% recovery rate
A total of 8,85,577 have recovered and the recovery rate is 63.91 per cent.
New Delhi: India reported 48,661 coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours, taking the total so far to 13,85,522, government data shows.
The number of death have risen to 32,063, with 705 deaths in the last 24 hours.
The number of coronavirus cases have doubled in nearly three weeks since July 2, when the country crossed the six lakh-mark.
The country's Covid tally touched the 10 lakh-mark last Friday.
Since then, around three lakh new infections have been reported.This is the fourth consecutive day when COVID-19 cases increased by more than 45,000.

Maharashtra on Saturday reported 9,251 new COVID-19 cases, taking the cumulative count in the state to 3,66,368 while fatalities mounted by 257, including 116 in Mumbai Metropolitan Region (MMR), to 13,389, the state Health department said.
A record number of 7,227 patients were discharged in the day, taking the count of recovered cases to 2,07,194.
Around 8.85 lakh patients have recovered so far; the recovery rate stood at 63.91 per cent this morning.
The positivity rate - percentage of patients who have tested positive for coronavirus - is 11 per cent.
Earlier this week, the government had said that it aims to bring down the positivity rate to 5 per cent.
Karnataka on Saturday registered over 5,000 new coronavirus cases for the third day in a row, taking its total past 90,000.
Bengaluru alone reported 2,036 new cases taking its overall tally to 43,503.

Delhi has improved its position in the number of active COVID-19 cases and is currently at the eighth spot among states and union territories in the country, Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal said on Saturday.
In the highest single-day spike till now, Kerala on Saturday reported 1,103 fresh COVID-19 cases taking the infection count to 18,098, while over 1.5 lakh persons are under observation.
As many as 9,420 persons are under treatment for coronavirus.
Coronavirus cases in Tamil Nadu have crossed the two lakh-mark with 6,989 new cases reported in the last 24 hours, which is also the biggest single-day spike, government data shows.
Eighty-nine have died and 7,758 have recovered in the last 24 hours.
The total cases in the state is now 2,06,737.

Gujarat on Saturday logged the highest single-day spike in coronavirus cases with 1,081 new infections, taking the total count to 54,712 while 22 patients died, including 11 in Surat, the state health department said.

Maharashtra Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray will launch a plasma donation program on July 27, following the "Plasma Daan Sankalp Abhiyan" for primary screening of recovered COVID-19 patients in Dharavi area of Mumbai.

India, the third worst-hit country in the global coronavirus tally after US and Brazil, has gradually ramped-up its COVID-19 testing capacity and has conducted over 4.2 lakh tests in a day, the Union Health Ministry said Saturday, crediting the increase to the number of labs for the achievement.
The pandemic has killed more than 6,33,000 people worldwide since it surfaced in China late last year, with more than 15.5 million people infected, according to news agency AFP.
Man United ta samu tikitin zuwa Champions League - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Manchester United, ta kai bantan ta da kyar a kokarin neman tikitin zuwa gasar kofin Zakarun Turai ta Champions league, bayan samun nasara a wasanta da abokiyar burminta ta Leicester City.
A wasan karshe, kuma na 38 a gasar kakar wasanni ta bana,2019/2020, Manchester ta samu nasara da ci biyu da nema a filin wasa na Kingpower Stadium, dake birnin na Leicester.
Bayan tafiya hutun rabin lokaci a zagaye na biyu, dan wasa Bruno Fernandez ya zura kwallo a minti na 71 a bugun daga kai sai mai tsaron gida, bayan da dan wasa Martial ya samo bugun.

Ana gab da tashi a wasan ne kuma, cikin minti na 90 mai tsaron gida na Leicester City, Kasper Schemiechel ya yi kuskuren turawa dan wasan gaba na tawagar Manchester wato Jesse Lingard kwallo, wanda take ya yi amfani da damar wajen zura kwallo ta biyu, hakan ya tabbatar da kasancewar su a gurbi na hudu haka kuma na karshe a kungiyoyin da za su wakilci kasar a gasar Champions league na shekarar mai zuwa, bayan samun maki 66.
Man United secure Champions League ticket - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Manchester United have struggled to qualify for the Champions League after winning over it is opponent, Leicester City.
In the final play, and 38th of the 2019/20 season, Manchester United won by two goals to nil at Leicester's Kingpower Stadium.
After the half time, in the second round, Bruno Fernandez scored in the 71st minute with a penalty kick, which Martial had found the kick.

When the game was about to end in the 90th minutes, Leicester City's goalkeeper Kasper Schemiechel mistakenly pass the ball to Manchester United striker Jesse Lingard, who used the opportunity to score the second goal instantly, that puts them in fourth place and last in the teams that will represent the country in next year's Champions League, after scoring 66 points.
Shekarau zai fitar da ƴan ƙwallo zuwa kasashen waje - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Tsohon gwamnan Kano kuma sanata mai wakiltar Kano ta tsakiya Malam Ibrahim Shekarau ya yi alƙawarin zai fitar da matasa ƴan kwallo haziƙai biyar, zuwa kungiyoyin kwallon kafa na ƙetare, daga ƙungiyarsa ta Shekarau Babes.
Shekarau ya bayyana hakan ne a daren Jumu'a yayin ganawarsa da jagororin ƙungiyar ta sa a birnin tarayya Abuja.
Hakan na kunshe ne cikin wata sanarwa da aka rabawa manema labarai mai dauke da sa hannun kakakin jagororin kungiyar ta Shekarau Babes Ahmad Babandi Gama.
Sanatan ya tabbatar da cewar kungiyar za ta shiga a dama da ita a gasar rukuni na ɗaya wato Nigeria National League (NNL) na kakar wasa ta 2021/2022.
Shekarau to sponsors footballers to overseas - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Former Kano governor and Kano state senator Malam Ibrahim Shekarau has promised to take five talented young footballers to overseas football clubs from his Shekarau Babes team.
Shekarau made the remarks on Friday night during a meeting with his group leaders in Abuja.
This was contained in a press release signed by Shekarau Babes Ahmad Babandi Gama, spokesman for the group's leaders.
The senator confirmed that the team will be competing in the first round of the Nigeria National League (NNL) for the 2021/2022 season.
Israilawa suna cigaba da zanga-zanga kan yadda Firayi ministan kasar ke tukarar wannan annoba

Birnin JERUSALEM (AP) - Dubban yahudawa ne suka gudanar da wasu jerin zanga-zanga a fadin kasar kan Firayi Ministan kasar a ranar Asabar, yayin da babbar zanga-zanga aka yi ta a birnin Jerusalem a kofar gidan Benjamin Netanyahu.

An yi ta gudanar da zanga-zangar har na tsawon makonni, a kan abin da masu suka ke gani a matsayin gazawar gwamnati na yadda ta ke tafi da halin da aka shiga mai tashin hankali dangane da cutar Koronabirus bayan da a farko ta na mai kore barazanar a cutar a kasar.
Tuhumar da ake yiwa Netanyahu na cin hanci ya dada izza wutar zanga-zangar.
"Bini ka tafi gida", a wani rubutu da wani mai zanga-zanga ya ke rike da shi.
Wani kwalli ma an rubuta "kowa dai yana ganin cewa sarki a tube ya ke ya zub da kayansa na sawa"
Daruruwan masu zanga-zanga ne a ranar Asabar suka taru a kofar gidan Netanyahu da ke bakin wara gaba a wata unguwar masu hannu da shuni da ke garin Caesarea.
A makon da ya wuce, 'yan sanda sun yi amfani da ruwa mai karfi daga bututu don a tarwatse taron jama'a a Jerusalem.

Bayan wani abin da aka kira shawara ta gaggawa mai cike da kurkurai na bude tattalin arziki a watan Mayu, yawan wadanda suka kamu da cutar ya karu da kiyasin sabon wani ya kamu a kowacce rana a 2,000.
Tattalin arzikin kasar ya yi raga-raga sakamakon bayyanar cutar da kokarin dakileta ga kuma yawan marasa aikin yi da ke tashin gwaron zabi zuwa kusan 20%.
Masu zanga-zanga suna cewa tallafin da gwamnati ta ke bayarwa ba sa kaiwa ko ina ballatana su kai ga isa.
Zanga-zangar na zuwa ne bayan da ake zargin Netanyahu da laifin cin hanci wanda za a cigaba a wannan watan.
Za a ci gaba da sauraron shari'ar a watan Janairu.
Ana tuhumarsa da zamba da cin amana da kuma karbar cin hanci a cikin wasu jerin abin kunyar da ya aikata.
Israelis continue protests against PM's handling of pandemic

JERUSALEM (AP) - Thousands of Israelis held several demonstrations across the country against their prime minister Saturday, with the main protest taking place in Jerusalem outside the official residence of Benjamin Netanyahu.
The protests have been going on for the past few weeks, sparked by what critics see as a government failure to handle the coronavirus crisis after initially keeping the threat of the virus at bay.
Corruption charges against Netanyahu have further fueled the demonstrations.
"Bibi, go home," read one sign held by a protester.
Another placard read "Everyone can see that the emperor has lost his clothes."
Hundreds of protesters Saturday also gathered outside Netanyahu's beach house in the upscale town of Caesarea.
Last week, police used water cannons to disperse crowds in Jerusalem.
After what has been called a hasty and erratic reopening of the economy in May, infections shot up with the average number of new cases daily at 2,000.
The country's economy has been battered by virus restrictions and the unemployment rate has skyrocketed to nearly 20%.
Protesters say the government's offers of financial assistance have been nowhere near enough.
The protests came in the shadow of Netanyahu's corruption trial which resumed this month.
Hearings will start in January.
He is charged with fraud, breach of trust and accepting bribes in a series of scandals.
An tabbatar da fitar Pedro Chelsea yayin da abokan buga kwallonsa suka rausaya da sarewa a walimar ban kwana da suka shirya a dakin canjin kaya.
Shugaban kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Chelsea Frank Lampard ya yabi mai buga gefe Pedro Rodriguez bayan wasansa na lig na karshe wa kungiyar a ranar Lahadi.
Dan shekara 32, ya sa hannu a wani dan kari a kwantiraginsa da zai mayar da shi kulob din AS Roma a wani sauyin sheka na kyauta da zaran sun gama da wannan kakakar wasan

Dan kasar Spania na kasa da kasa, wanda da zo daga Barcelona a shekarar 2015, ya dan taka leda na dan wani lokaci a karkashin Lampard a wannan kakar da somin tabi guda takwas na gasar firimiya da kuma taka wasanni 21 a jerin wasannin

Shugaban 'yan shudin gida ya tabbatar da tafiyar Pedro bayan da kungiyar ta yamma da birnin Landan ta kai mataki na hudu a kasa bayan ta lallasa kungiyar Wolves 2 da nema, wanda daga bisani tsohon dan wasan ya taso daga kan benci domin buga kwallonsa na karshe.
"Pedro ya bugawa kungiyar kwallonsa na karshe tare da ita", Lampard yana mai shedawa shirin talbijin sky sports.
" Abokan kwalllonasa sun karrama shi da wata 'yar walima a dakin canza kaya kuma hakan ya yi daidai saboda da irin nasorin da ya samu a sana'arsa ta buga kwallo da kuma kungiyarsa.
'Wannan shine wasansa na karshe a gasan firimiya, amma irin tasirin da gudunmawar da ya bayar na da girma.
Ina mai kara mika godiyata ga Peds tare da yi mi shi fatan alheri a kungiyar da ya koma.
"Yana nan don karasa kakar wasan da ta rage, amma duk lokacin da wani babban dan wasa ya bar kungiya sai yanayina sauran abokan wasan nasa ya sauya kamar yadda na a lura".
A sakon ban kwana da Pedro ya sa a shafinsa na dandalin sada da zumunta na Tuwita, dan wasan na mai cewa: "wasana na kashe filin Stanford Bridge"
Ina godiya da daukacin magoya bayana da dukkannin goyon bayan da ku ka bani tsawon wannan shekaru, ga Kulob kuwa ina godiya da damar da aka ba ni na zama mai daura launin shudi ga abokan wasana kuma
Ina mai cewa a garesu kuna cikin ruhin zuciyata har abada.
Dan haka mu dage don yin yakin cin kofin FA !!
JINJINA GA 'YAN UWANA 'YAN SHUDIN GIDA"

Tsohon dan gaba na Barcelona ya bar Chelsea bayan ya taimakawa kungiyar tun shekarar 2017 a karkashin Antonio Conte ya kuma ciwo kofin FA a shekarar 2018, da kuma kofin Europa a gasar Lig bayan shekara a karkashin Maurizio Sarri.
Pedro Chelsea exit confirmed as team-mates 'serenade' forward in changing room send-off
Chelsea boss Frank Lampard has paid tribute to winger Pedro Rodriguez after making his final league appearance for the club on Sunday.
The 32-year-old penned a short-term extension to his contract to see out the season with the club but will join AS Roma on a free transfer upon the conclusion of the campaign.
The Spain international, who arrived from Barcelona back in 2015, has played a bit-part role under Lampard this season with only eight Premier League starts and 21 appearances in all competitions.
The Blues boss confirmed Pedro's departure after the west London club sealed a top-four finish with a 2-0 win over Wolves, with the veteran coming off the bench for his final appearance.
"Pedro has played his last game for the club," Lampard told Sky Sports.
"The lads have just pretty much serenaded him in the changing room and rightly so because of the career he has had generally and for this club.
"It was his last Premier League game, but the impact he has had here is huge.
I want to say a big thanks to Peds and wish him well as he goes forward.
"He is here for the remainder of games, but a big player of the club leaves and the spirit of the club I saw afterwards was pretty special."
Pedro tweeted a farewell message after the game via his Twitter account, writing: "My last game at Stamford Bridge.
Thanks to every fan for your support through these years, to the club for giving me the chance of being a Blue and to my team-mates.
You'll be in my heart forever.
Now let's fight for the FA Cup trophy!!!
BIG BLUE FAMILY."
The former Barcelona forward leaves after helping Chelsea since the title in 2017 under Antonio Conte and also won the FA Cup in 2018, as well as the Europa League a year later under Maurizio Sarri.
Dattijan Kano sun nemi Buhari ya ki amincewa da bukatar Ganduje.

Wasu dattawan jihar Kano ƴan kungiyar Kano Unity Forum sun bukaci shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari da majalisun dokokin tarayya da kuma ma'aikatar kudi ta tarayya da su ki amincewa da bashin da gwamnatin Kano ke neman karbowa daga kasar China don aikin jirgin kasa da ya kai naira biliyan dari uku.
Kungiyar ta Kano Unity Forum karkashin jagorancin Alhaji Bashir Tofa ta bayyana adawarta karara da ciyo bashin daga China Development bank don shimfida layin dogo a birnin Kano.

A cikin wata sanarwa mai dauke da sa hannun Alhaji Bashir Tofa a madadin kungiyar ta Kano Unity Forum aka kuma rabawa manema labarai a yau Alhamis, ta ce abin damuwar babu wanda ya san ka'idojin da ke cikin yarjejeniyar kafin ba da bashin.

Kungiyar ta Kano Unity Forum ta ce in dai har kasar China ta na son taimakawa jihar Kano ce da to ba wai a bangaren shimfida layin dogo za ta kawo dauki ba, kamata ya yi ta kawo dauki ta bangaren ilimi da lafiya da aikin gona da samar da wutar lantarki da masana'antu, samar da ruwan sha da kuma kimiyya da fasaha.
Kano elders have asked Buhari to reject Ganduje's request.

Some Kano State elders, members of the Kano Unity Forum, have called on President Muhammadu Buhari, the Federal Parliament and the Federal Ministry of Finance to reject the loan that the Kano State Government is seeking to borrow from China for a railway project worth three hundred billion.
The Kano Unity Forum, led by Alhaji Bashir Tofa, has strongly opposed borrowing money from China Development Bank for railway construction in Kano.

In a statement signed by Alhaji Bashir Tofa on behalf of the Kano Unity Forum and distributed to newsmen on Thursday, she said it was a matter of concern that no one knew the terms of the agreement before issuing the loan.

The Kano Unity Forum has said that if China wants to help Kano State, it should not only build a railway line, but also provide education, health, agriculture, production, electricity and industry, water supply, science and technology.
Akwai yiwuwar bude makarantun boko.
A yau ne ake saran cewa gwamnatin tarayya da na jihohi za su gana wajen sake yin nazari kan bin dokokin da aka sanya musu, domin yanke shawarar ranar da za a bude makarantu a kasar nan.

A dai kwanakin baya ne ma'aikatar ilimi ta kasa ta aikewa shugabanin makarantu kundin bayani mai dauke da shafuka 52 na bin dokokin da aka shimfida musu da zai baiwa dalibai na karshe rubuta jarrabawar a makaratu duk da annobar Corona da ake fama da ita a kasar nan.
Babban sakatare a ma'aikatar ilimi Mr. Sonny Echono ya sanar da hakan cewa, da zarar an kammala ganawar ne ake saran cewar za a sanar da ranar da za a bude makarantu a Najeriya.
Ganawar wacce za a yi ta kafar Internet tare da hukumomin ma'aikatar ilimi da kwamishinonin ilimi na jihohin kasar nan 36 har da na babban birnin tarayya Abuja.
Mr Sonny Echono ya kara da cewar daga cikin wadanda ake sa ran za su shiga ganawar akwai, hukumomin masu shirya jarrabawa ta kasa NECO da WAEC da kuma NABTEB.
Sauran su ne kungiyar Shugabannin makarantu masu zaman kan su ta kasa NAPPS da kuma ANCOPSS da dai sauran su.
A dai makon da ya gabata ne karamin ministan ilimi Emeka Nwajiuba ya sanar da cewar, an baiwa Najeriya zabin rubuta jarrabawar karshe ta kammala sakandire ta kasa daga watan Nuwanba zuwa Disamba.
There is the possibility of re opening western schools.
Today, the federal and state governments are expected to meet to review the implementation of the rules and regulations, to decide on the opening date of schools in the country.
Some days ago, the Ministry of Education sent a 52-page manual to school principals to allow final students to write exams in schools despite the Corona epidemic in the country.
The Permanent Secretary in the Ministry Of Education Mr. Sonny Echono said that as soon as the meeting was over, the opening date of the schools in Nigeria was expected to be announced.
