The online meeting will be held with the agencies of the Ministry of Education and the Commissioners of Education of the 36 states of the country, including the Federal Capital Territory, Abuja.
Mr Sonny Echono added that among those expected to attend the meeting were the National Examinations Commission NECO, WAEC and NABTEB.
The others are the National Association of Private Schools NAPPS and ANCOPSS among others.

Last week, the Minister of State for Education, Emeka Nwajiuba, announced that Nigeria had been given the option of writing the final examinations for the National Secondary School Leaving Examination from November to December.
Sojin Najeriya 9 sun rasa ransu bayan da motarsu ta taka nakiya a Maiduguri.
Rahotanni daga Najeriya sun ce akalla sojojin kasar 9 sun rasa rayukan su sakamakon taka nakiya da motar su ta yi a yankin arewa maso gabashin kasar mai fama da rikicin Boko Haram.

Kamfanin dillancin labaran Faransa ya bayyana cewar an samu hadarin ne a Malam Fatori da ke kusa da iyakar Nijar a ranar litinin din da ta gabata, lokacin da motocin sojin ke jigilar abinci daga Maiduguri.
Rahotanni sun ce rashin kayan sadarwa ya hana labarin fitowa da wuri.

Wannan dai ba shi ne karon farko da Sojojin ke taka nakiyar ba, wadda aka daddasa ko kuma aka bibbirne a karkashin kasa, duk dai cikin yakin da ake na kawo karshen kungiyar ta'addanci ta Boko Haram da ke ci gaba da kisan jama'a a yankin arewa maso gabashin Najeriyar.
9 Nigerian soldiers lost their lives after their vehicle struck a landmine in Maiduguri.

Reports from Nigeria says at least nine Nigerian soldiers have been killed in a land mine explosion when their vehicle struck a landmine in the northeastern part of the country plagued by the Boko Haram insurgency.
The French news agency says that the incident took place in Malam Fatori last Monday near the Niger border, while the military vehicles were conveying food from Maiduguri.
Reports say lack of communication is responsible for the delay in the dissemination of the news story.
This is not the first time the Army struck landmines, which were planted or buried underground, all in the campaign against the deadly Boko Haram that continues to kill people in northeastern Nigeria
Saudiyya Musulmi sun fara aikin Hajj 2020.
An takaita yawan maniyatan da ke aikin hajjin na bana basu da yawa saboda annobar corona da ta yadu a fadin duniya.
Yan kasar Saudiyya ne kadai da kuma baki daga kasashe kimanin 160 wadanda ke zaune a kasar ta Saudiyya suke gudanar da aikin hajjin ba bana.

A shekarun baya dai musulmi kimanin miliyan biyu da rabi ke hallara a birnin Makka domin gudanar da aikin hajjin wanda ke zama daya daga cikin shikashikan musulunci guda biyar da ake bukatar dukkan musulmi da ke da iko ya halarta akalla sau daya a rayuwarsa.
Alhazan za su kwana yau a Minna kafin su wuce zuwa hawan Arfat a ranar Alhamis.
Saudi Muslims begin Hajj 2020.
The number of pilgrims attending this year's hajj is limited due Corona epidemic that is spreading around the world.
Only Saudis and foreigners from about 160 countries living in Saudi Arabia are performing the hajj this year.

In recent years, about 2.5 million Muslims have gathered in Mecca for the hajj, which is one of the five pillars of Islam that all Muslims who can afford are required to attend at least once in their lifetime.
The pilgrims will spend the night in Minna before proceeding to the ascent of Arfat on Thursday.
Gwamnati Ta Amince Da Fitar Da Biliyan N87.539bn Don Gina Hanyoyi Da Gadar Lokko-Oweto.

Majalisar Zartarwar Tarayyar Nijeriya (FEC) ta amince da fitar da naira biliyan N87.539, domin gina hanyoyin da su ka taso daga jihohin Oyo, Kwara, Nasarawa da kuma Jihar Binuwe, wanda zai hade da Babban Birnin Tarayya, Abuja.

Ministan FCT Muhammad Bello shine ya shaida hakan ga ƴan jarida a fadar Shugaban kasa dangane da zaman Majalisar zartaswa ta tarayya wanda shugaban kasa Muhammad Buhari ya jagoranta a jiya Laraba a fadar mulkin Nijeriya da ke Abuja.
Yana mai cewa gina manyan hanyoyin an amince da bada kwangilarsu wa kamfanin Messrs Gilmor Engineering Nig.
Ltd, a kan kudi naira biliyan N30,686,609,298.68 da za su kammala cikin watanni 32.
Bello ya ce, Majalisar ta kuma amince da bada kwangilar sabunta babban hanyar Murtala Mohammed Way wanda aka fi sani da Kubwa Express way.
Ya kara da cewa, wannan aikin na daga cikin kashi na biyu na birnin tarayya, wadanda ke da iyaka da Mabushi, Kado, Katampe da kuma Jabi.
A cewar Ministan ayyuka za su taimaka wajen bunkasa sufuri, kyautata tsaro da kuma samar da ayyukan yi.
Yana mai cewa aikin zai kuma taimaka wajen rage cinkoso a cikin birnin tarayya Abuja.

Ministan ayyuka da gidaje Babatunde Raji Fashola, a lokacin da ke karin haske ga yan jarida ya shaida cewar ma'aikatarsa ta gabatar da takardu guda biyo domin tabbatar da ganin an samu nasarar kammala dukkanin ayyukan da ake kan gudanarwa a halin yanzu.

Fashola ya kuma ce gwamnatin tarayya ta amince da karin kudin kwangila na naira biliyan N47.504b domin karasa hanya mai Nissan kilomita 52 na Oyo-Ogbomosho highway wanda ya ke hade da babbar hanya mai tsawon kilomita 146 na Illorin zuwa Ibadan.
Ya ce karin kudin ya kai ga maida kwangilar zuwa naira biliyan N105.041.

Ya ce, karin ya zo ne a sakamakon yunkurinsu na kara yawan ayyukan da a ke yi ma wannan titin tare da fadada sararin hanya da tsawonsa da kuma ingancinsa wanda hakan ya sanya a ka samu karin kudin kwangila.
Ita wannan kwangilar da ake Magana a kanta an bada aikinta ne tun 2010.
Kashi 1 cikin 3 na aikin an kammala.
Muna kan kokarin karasawa saura kashi na 2 wanda gadarsa mu ka yi daga gwamnatocin baya.
Minista Fashola ya kuma kara da cewa majalisar zartaswar ta kuma amince da karin naira biliyan N9.348b domin bada damar karasa aikin gidar Lokko-Oweto Bridge da ya hade jihohin Nasarawa zuwa Benue,
Ya ƙara da cewa aiki kashi na biyu da muke kokarin kammalawa shine gadar Lokko-Oweto Bridge.
An bada wannan kwangilar ne a 2011 da mu ke ta kokarin kammalawa a halin yanzu.
Government Approves N87.539bn For construction of Road And Lokko-Oweto-Oweto Bridge.

The Federal Executive Council (FEC) has approved the release of N87.539 billion for the construction of the Oyo, Kwara, Nasarawa and Benue State, roads which will connect to the Federal Capital Territory, Abuja.

FCT Minister Muhammad Bello made this known to reporters at the Presidency in connection with the Federal Executive Council (FEC) meeting chaired by President Muhammadu Buhari on Wednesday at the State House, Abuja.
He said the construction of the highways had been awarded to Messrs Gilmor Engineering Nig.
Ltd., at a cost of N30,686,609,298.68 billion to be completed in 32 months.
Bello said the council had also approved the award of a contract for the renovation of the Murtala Mohammed Way, better known as the Kubwa Express way.
He added that the project is part of the second phase of the federal capital, which borders Mabushi, Kado, Katampe and Jabi.
According to the Minister of Works, they will help improve transportation, improve security and create jobs.
He said the project would also help reduce congestion in the Federal Capital Territory, Abuja.
The Minister of Works and Housing, Babatunde Raji Fashola, while briefing the press, said his ministry had submitted a series of documents to ensure the successful completion of all ongoing projects.

Fashola also said the federal government had approved an additional contract worth N47.504b for the completion of the 52-kilometer Oyo-Ogbomosho highway which connects the 146-kilometer Illorin to Ibadan highway.
He said the increase led to the total amount of the contract to N105.041 billion.

He said the increase came as a result of their efforts to increase the number of works on the road as well as widen the width, length and quality of the road which resulted in increased contract costs.
The contract in question has been awarded since 2010.
1 in 3 parts of the project is completed.
We are trying to finish the second phase which we inherited from previous governments.
Minister Fashola added that the Cabinet had also approved an additional N9.348b to allow the completion of the Lokko-Oweto Bridge, which connects Nasarawa and Benue states,
He added that the second phase of the project we are trying to complete is the Lokko-Oweto Bridge.
This contract was awarded in 2011 which we are currently working on.
An gina gada ta farko a aikin jirgi mai tafiya a kasrkashin kasa na Delhi a kashin aikin na 4

Aikin gina jirgi mai tafiya a karkashin kasa na birni Delhi ya cimma wani mataki mai muhimmanci yayin da ya shiga wani kashi a aikin-4 yayin da a ka gina gada ta farko a kan mashigar yamma na Janakpurita R K Ashram Marg, A cewar wasu jami'ai a ranar Lahadi.
An yi aikln gadar ne a Keshopur a kan wani tudu da ke tsaknin Keshpur da Mukaba Chowks a daren Asabar.

"Hukumar kula Jirgin karkashin kasa ta birnin Delhi ta sake samun kai wa ga wani babban mataki na 4 aikin da ta ke yi na fadada layin dogo na karkashin kasa da samun nasarar ginin karfe na wata gada a wata mashiga hanyar jirgin karakashin kasa ta yamma a Janakpuri RK Astta Marg," a cewar wata sanarawa da Hukumar DMRC ta fitar.

Wannan "babban nasara da aka samu a wannan aikin ginin layin dogo" an same ta ne duk da karancin ma'aikata da kuma wasu matsalolin jigila da kai-kawo saboda annobar cuta da ake fama da ita, a cewar wani jami'i.
Matsakaicin tsayin wannan gada ta wannan mashiga shine mita 10.
Sai daia sauran gadojin zasu zama masu tsawon mita 20 a Madhun Chowk (wurin tsallakawa n a 1)da kuma mita 25 a Haderpur Badli Mor a inda wannan layin dogo zai tsallaka wani layin dogon na 2.
A Haider, pur Mor, gadar da za ta dauki layin dogon da zai wuce ta wurin zai kasance mita 28, wanna shine mafi girma a tarihin layin dogo na birni Delhi, a cewar sanarwar.
A yanzu dai wuri ma fi tsawo shine wanda ya ke Dhaula Kuan, a inda layin dogo na 7 da ke kan gada ya wuce har tsawon mita 23.6.
A tsarin kimiyyar gine-gine ana yin ginshikin gine-gine ne a tsatstsaye domin su tallafin nauyin ginin da ke zama kamar gada a kan ginshikan biyu na gefe da gefe.
Wadannan su suka zama kamar ginshikan da suka tallafi tudun da aka dora layin dogon mai wucewa a kai.
Gadojin da a ka dora layin dogo na jirgin karkashi kasa da dora su a tsakiyar hanyoyin mota a birnin Delhi ta kan su ne aka giggina mashigar jiragen karkshin kasa.
Yawanci wadannan gadojin sun sa sun zama fittatun kuma ababen kwantace a wajen bayar da adireshi a birnin Delhi.
Mashigar layin dogo ta Janakpurin yamma - RK Ahsram ita ce ma fi tsawo da tsawon kilomita 28.92, ita ce karin layin dogo na MAgenta za ta kuma dauki tashohi 22.
Yayin da kilolmita 21.18 na wannan mashigar za a daga shi, yayin da 7.74 kilomita na wannan layi zai kasance a karkashin kasa.
An soma aikin ginin wannan sashi a watan Disambar shekarar da ta wuce.
A ranar 17 ga watan Yuli, a ka soma aikin ginin sashen karkashin kasa na mashigar wanda aka fara da gina bangon D a tashar jirgin karkashin kasa na wurin shakatawar Krishna.
A ranar 24 ga watan Yuli, Hukumar ta DMRC ta soma kakkafa karafunan zuba kankaren durakai da kuma ginshikai don daga layin dogon wannan bangare na mashigar layin dogon.
A karkashin wanna rukunin aiki na 4, kilomita 61. 679 na sabbin layukan dogo za a giggina a kan mashigai daban-daban guda uku da za su kunsh tasoshi 45 na jirgin kakshin kasa.
Wannan sabon sashi zai samar da wata babbar mahada a tsakanin shiyoyin daban-daban na jiragen karkashin kasa na birnin na Delhi.
A cikin wannan adadi, Kilomita 22.35 duk za su kasance a karkashin kasa ne yayin da sauran za su kasance a kan gadoji.
Delhi Metro Casts First Pier Under Phase-4 Work
The Delhi Metro has reached a major milestone in the Phase-4 work as it cast its first pier on the under-construction Janakpuri West-R K Ashram Marg corridor, officials said on Sunday.
The pier was cast at Keshopur on the elevated stretch between Keshopur and Mukarba Chowk on Saturday night.

"The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation took another important step forward in its Phase 4 construction work as the first pier of this phase of Metro expansion was cast on the Janakpuri West-R K Ashram Marg Metro corridor," the DMRC said in a statement.
This "major construction milestone" has been achieved, despite severe shortage of manpower and other logistical challenges because of the pandemic, officials said.
The average height of piers on this corridor is 10m.
However, piers will be 20m high at Madhuban Chowk (crossing with Line 1) and 25m at Haiderpur Badli Mor where this line will cross Line 2.
At Haiderpur Badli Mor, the viaduct level is going to be at 28m, the highest in the history of Delhi Metro, the statement said.
Presently, the highest point is at Dhaula Kuan, where the Line 7 viaduct passes at a height of 23.6m.
Piers, in terms of civil engineering are vertical loadbearing structures which act as intermediate support for adjacent ends of two spans.
They form the vertical support structures on which the elevated metro viaducts stand.
Metro piers today dot innumerable road medians in Delhi through which elevated Metro corridors run.
Pier numbers are now important landmarks for addresses across the Delhi-NCR.
The 28.92-km-long Janakpuri West-R K Ahsram Marg corridor is an extension of Magenta Line and will come up with 22 stations.
While 21.18 km of this corridor will be elevated, 7.74 km will be underground.
Construction work on this particular section had started in December last year.
On July 17, the work on the underground section of this corridor was commenced with the beginning of D Wall construction work at the Krishna Park Extension Metro station.
On 24th June, DMRC had started the casting work of u-girders which would be installed on the elevated section of this corridor.
Under Phase-4, 61.679 km of new metro lines shall be constructed across three different corridors comprising 45 metro stations.
These new sections shall provide interconnectivity among the already operational sections of Delhi Metro.
Out of this, 22.35 km will be underground while rest will be elevated.
Gwamnatin Ghana Da USAID Sun Samar Da Hanyar Koyar Da Yara Karatu Ta Radiyo.
Gwamnatin kasar Ghana tare da hadin gwiwar hukumar raya kasashe masu tasowa ta Amurka USAID, sun samarwa kananan yara shirye-shiryen radiyo da ke koyawar miliyoyin dalibai.
Ana gabatar da shirin na tsawon sa'a guda kwanaki shida a cikin mako, kuma ana dogaro da koyarwa ne cikin wasa.
hukumar USAID ta na samar da shirye-shirye na koyar da karatu a Ghana, kafin ta hada hannu da gwamnati da wasu masu ruwa da tsaki wajen gabatar da shirin na radiyo.
Ministan Ilimin kasar Ghana, ya fadi cewa an tsara shirin ne domin kananan yara kafin su fara firamare da kuma wadanda suke firamare kuma za a ci gaba har bayan annobar coronavirus.
Ghana Government and USAID Introduces a Radio Education Program for children.
The Ghanaian government, in partnership with the United States Agency for International Development (USAID), has provided radio programs for millions of students.
The one-hour program is presented six days in a week, and is based on play way method of instruction.
USAID provides educational programs in Ghana, before partnering with the government and other stakeholders to launch a radio program.
Ghana's education minister said the program was designed for children before they start primary and secondary school and would continue until the coronavirus epidemic.
Gwamnonin Arewa Sun Yaba Wa Sarkin Musulmi Yayin Taya Shi Murnar Cika Shekaru 64 - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
Ƙungiyar Gwamnonin Arewa (NGF) ta yaba wa Mai Alfarma Sarkin Musulmi, Alhaji Muhammad Sa'ad Abubakar III yayin da yake cika shekara 64 da haihuwa.
Ta kuma yaba da ayyukan wanzar da zaman lafiya da ƙoƙarin da yake yi na magance jahilci a yankin na Arewa.

Shugaban taron kuma gwamnan jihar Filato, Simon Lalong, a cikin saƙon taya murna da Daraktan yaɗa labarai, Dakta Makut Simon Macham ya fitar a jiya a Jos, ya yaba da ƙoƙarin Sarkin na inganta zaman lafiya, haɗin kai da ci gaba a Arewa da ma ƙasa baki ɗaya.
"Muna alfahari da tallafinku da ku ke bamu don shawo kan kalubalen dake yankin na Arewa", in ji shi.
Northern Governors Praise Sultan on his clocking 64 Years of age - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
The Northern Governors Forum (NGF) has congratulated His Highness the Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Muhammad Sa'ad Abubakar III on his 64th birthday.
She also lauded his peacekeeping efforts and efforts to address illiteracy in the North.

The chairman and Governor of Plateau State, Simon Lalong, in a congratulatory message issued yesterday by the Director of Information, Dr. Makut Simon Macham in Jos, lauded the King's efforts to promote peace, unity and development in the North and the whole country.
"We are proud of your support in overcoming the challenges in the North," he said.
Mata nakasassu, marasa matsuguni na cikin rundunar Chennai masu yaki da cutar COVID 19

Shantri a wani mai sana'ara dinki mai fama da nakasa, ta kan ziyarci gidaje 250 a kowanne rana don ya gano mutanen da ke dauke da alamomin cuta a tsakanin mutane da ke zaune Kodambakkam, wata unguwa da cutar Korana ta yi kamari a Chennai da ke dauke da wadanda suka kamua da cutar su kimanin 10,000.
A kowacce rana ta kan soma fita ne da sasafe da kimanin karfe 7:30 ta kuma gama zagayenta da misalin karfe 4:00 na yamma.
Ta kan bincika zafin jikin mazuna unguwar, ta kan yi musu tambayoyi dangane da alamomin cutar da yaduwarta da kuma wayar da kai akan muhimmancin sa takunkumi, da yawan wanke hannu, da nisanta juna.
Irin ayyukan da ta ke yi ya taimaka wajen ganewa da wuri da kuma warkewar mutane hudu da suka kamu da cutar.
Shanthi na daga cikin ma'aikata 16,000 ma'akatan kamfanin birnin Chennai wadanda ba mai'aikatan lafiya ba da ke bi gida-gida suna yin gwaji.
Wannan yunkuri, a cewar mahunkuta ya kai ga samun raguwa yaduwar cutar da kashi 50 a alkaluman wadand suka kamu da cutar a kullum a yayin da alkaluman suke tashi a wasu yakunan na Tamil Nadu.
Shanthi ta ce ba duk mazauna wuraren ne ke ba ta hadin kai ba.
Sannan ta kuma kara da cewa, "Yawancin mutane na bayar da hadin kai idan sun ga mata nakasassu ne ke ba su agaji.
Wasu kuma abi na ba su haushi.
Bazan damu ba.
Ni dai burina shine mutane su kasance ba sa cikin hadarin kamuwa da cutar.
Idan na ske ziyartarsu washegari sai su zama su na mutuntani.
Samun kyakkyawar fahimta na taimakawa."
Da akwai wasu da yawa irin Shanthi wadanda suke zauna a inda kamafanin ya tanada na marasa matsuguni na mata nakasa suke taikamakawa a yakin da ake da curtar COVID -19.
Dan nesa kadan daga Kodambakkam, Kavita wacce ita ke fana da wata nakasa ta shiga bayar da ta nata gudunmawar a matsayin mai sa ido.
Duk da cewa tana amfani ne da keken guragun na musamman, Kavitha tana tafiya ne tare da taimakon wasu sanduna biyu wanda da haka ta ke ganawa da mutane.
"Ina cikin farin ciki," ta kuma yi magana kan raguwar yawan adadin da ake samu, amma saia ta kara da cewa "Ina so wannan adadadin ya sauko kasa sosai zuwa kamar 100 a rana.
Kuma ina da karfin gwiwar cewa za mu iya kaiwa ga hakan."

A kasan bene inda aka yiwa marasa matsuguni, inda su biyu suke zaune, MatildaFunceca wata 'yar wasan kwallon kwando da ke amfani da keken guragu, da kuma Manimekalai, wata malamar makaranta, suna aikawa da bayanan da kimanin mata 40 suka aiko musu zuwa ma'adanar bayanai na kamfanin.
Matilda ta ce ita ba ta tsoron kamuwa da cutar Koronabirus.
"Cikin taimakon wasu, Allah zai karemu" ta cigaba da cewa.
Da aka tambayerte game da irin matakan kariyar da suke dauka, Manimekalai ta yi bayanin cewa:"Ina sa takunkumi sannan ina bayar da tazara ina kuma wanke hannunna akai-akai.
Sannan ina kuma shan Kabasura Kudineer, wani abin sha mai inganta sinadarin kariya na Siddha."

A 'yan watannin da suka wuce a lokacin da cutar Korona ta bulla a Chennai wadannan mata maus nakas sun yi amafani da lokacinsu da basirarsu wajen dinka takunkumi da hannu ga mai'aikatan tsabta a garin.
Dabkta Aiswanya Rao darakataa mai kula da cibiyar Bincike da samar na Dorcas mai da matsugunin ya ce. "su kan bayar da taimakon ne daidai da irin bukatara da ake da ita.
A da, ana bukatar takunkumi sai suka yi kokarin samar da shi.
Yanzu kuma ana bukatar tamakawa al'umma nan ma ba su gajiya ba."

A dadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta Koronabirus a Tamila Nadu ya haura gejin dubu biyu da karin 6,989 na sabbin alakluman sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar a cikin awanni 24 wanda kuma shi ne karuwa ma fi girma a ranar daya, kamar yadda alkaluman gwamnati suka nuna.
Mutane tamanin da tara suna mutu, yayin da 7,758 suka warke daga cutar a ciin awa 24 da suka wuce.
Yawan adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar a jihar yanzu ya kai 2,06,737.
Differently-Abled Homeless Women Part Of Chennai's COVID-19 Fight
Shanthi, a differently-abled master tailor, visits 250 homes everyday to identify symptomatic people in Kodambakkam, a key Covid hotspot in Chennai with around 10,000 positive cases.
Her day starts as early as 7:30 AM and finishes at around 4 PM.
She checks the temperature of residents, quizes them for symptoms, and spreads awareness on wearing masks, frequently washing hands, and social distancing.
Her efforts have even helped the early identification and recovery of four positive people.
Shanthi is among Chennai City corporation's 16,000 non-medical workers who conduct door-to-door screening.
The iniative, authorties say, has led to a 50 per cent fall in positive cases in Chennai's daily tally even as they rise in other Tamil Nadu districts.
Shanthi says not all residents are cooperative.
She adds, "Most people cooperate seeing a differently-abled woman reaching out to them.
Some feel irritated too.
I'd not be worried.
For me, people should be safe.
When I visit them again the next day they are polite.
Establishing a good rapport helps."
And there are several others like Shanthi who stay at the corportation's homeless shelter for differently abled women and help in the fight against Covid-19.
Not far away Kodambakkam, Kavitha, who is also differently-abled, has joined the effort as a supervisor.
Though she has a retrofitted bike, Kavitha walks holding her crutches to meet people.
"I am happy," she says about the decline in numbers, but adds, "I want this to come down to perhaps around 100 a day.
I'm confident we can reach that."

On the ground floor of the homeless shelter where the two stay, Matilda Funceca, a wheelchair basketball player, and Manimekalai, a school teacher, upload all the data sent by around 40 women to Chennai Corporation's server.
Matilda says she has no fear of contracting coronavirus.
"When we help others, God will protect us" she adds.
Asked about the precautions they take, Manimekalai explains: "I wear a mask, follow social distancing and do frequent hand wash.
I also take Kabasura Kudineer, Siddha immunity-boosting drink."
A few months ago, when corona first struck Chennai these differently-abled women used their time and talent to stitch masks for sanitary workers in the city.
Dr Aishwarya Rao, director of the Shelter and Dorcas Research Centre that runs the shelter, said "They adapt according to the need of the hour.
Earlier mask was needed and they rose to the occasion.
Now it's time for community intervention and they readily said yes."
Coronavirus cases in Tamil Nadu have crossed the two lakh-mark with 6,989 new cases reported in the last 24 hours, which is also the biggest single-day spike, government data shows.
Eighty-nine have died and 7,758 have recovered in the last 24 hours.
The total cases in the state is now 2,06,737.
INEC Za Ta Fara Rijistar Masu Zabe A 2021.
Hukumar zabe mai zaman kanta ta Nijeriya (INEC) ta ce za ta fara aikin yin rijistan masu zaɓe a farkon watanni uku na shekarar da ke tafe.

Shugaban hukumar na kasa, Farfesa Mahmood Yakubu, shi ne ya shaida hakan a ganawarsa da ƴan jarida jim kadan bayan da ya bayyana a gaban kwamitin majalisar dattawa game da INEC domin kare kasafin kudin hukumar na 2021.
Ya ce, za su shafe tsawon lokaci suna gudanar da rijistar masu zabe inda za a daina yin rijistar ana saura watanni shida gabanin babban zaben 2023.
Ya ce, "Hukumarmu tana da niyyar dawo da aikin rijistar zabe a farkon watanni uku na shekarar 2021".
Da zarar muka dawo aikin, zai ci gaba da gudana har zuwa tsawon shekara daya da rabi, a takaice zai kai kusan saura watanni shida gabanin babban zaben 2023.
Ya ce, idan sun dawo aikin ba wai za su ke yi mako-mako ko wata-wata ba ne, a'a aikin zai ke gudana a kowani lokaci ne amma za suke bin aikin ne da tattara komai ba wai na hanzari ba.
Shugaban hukumar ya ce yanzu haka INEC ta na fuskantar kesa-kesai a kotu na gabanin da bayan zaben 2019 har guda 1,700.
Ya ce, kesa-kesan suna gayar ci musu kudi amma duk da hakan suna kokarin bin matakan da doka ya tanadar na amsar kowace kara da aka maka su.
"Kowa idan ya tashi garzayawa kotu sai ya hada da INEC, muna da kusan kesa-kesan kusan 1700 na gabani da bayan zaben 2019, muna ci gaba da amfani da dan kudaden da ke hannunmu", A cewar shi".

A yayin da yake kare kasafin hukumar a gaban majalisar, Yakubu ya shaida wa ƴan majalisar cewar hukumar na shirin fitar da naira biliyan N5.2 daga asusun INEC naira biliyan 10 domin karawa kan kasafin 2020.
Ya ce wannan biliyan 10 da suke zance a kai, yana daga cikin kudin da ke ajiye a asusun hukumar tun lokacin da aka kafa hukumar a 2010.

Ya ce bukatar hakan ta zama tilas ne lura da karancin kudin kasafin 2020 da suka samu kana da kuma matsalolin da suka fuskanto ciki kuwa har da wanda annobar Korona ta janyo da ya sanya hukumar ba ta samu cikakken kudin kasafin 2020 da aka tsara ba.

Game da ƴan Nijeriya da ke kasar waje kuwa, ya ce akwai dokar da aka yi wadda aka tsara yadda su ma za su ke kada kuri'a a yayin da ake gabatar da zabe, a cewarsa da zarar dokar ta fara aiki za su ringa samun damar kada kuri'arsu daga kasashen da suke zaune.
INEC To Start Voter Registration In 2021.
The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has said it will begin voter registration in the first three months of next year.
The chairman of the commission, Prof. Mahmood Yakubu, made the announcement in a press conference shortly after he appeared before the Senate Committee on INEC to defend the agency's 2021 budget.
He said they would spend a long time conducting voter registration where registration would be stopped with six months to go before the 2023 general election.
"Our commission intends to resume voter registration in the first three months of 2021," he said.
Once we get back to work, it will continue to run for a year and a half, in short it will be almost six months before the 2023 general election.
He said, that when they returned to work, they would not do it weekly or monthly, but the work would be done all the time but they would follow the work by collecting everything and not hastily.
The chairman said INEC was currently facing 1,700 cases before and after the 2019 elections.
He said, the court cases eats up their resources but still try to comply with the law in response to any lawsuit filed against them.
"Everyone going to court, includes INEC in his suit filed. We have about 1,700 cases before and after the 2019 elections. We continue to use our limited resources," he said.
Defending the commission's budget before parliament, Yakubu told lawmakers that the commission was planning to withdraw N5.2 billion from INEC's 10 billion naira to supplement the 2020 budget.
He said the 10 billion they were talking about was part of the commission's savings since its launched in 2010.

He said the need to do so was necessary given the shortfall in the 2020 budget and the problems it faced, including the Corona outbreak which caused the commission to not get the full budget as plan for year 2020.

As for Nigerians living abroad, he said there is a law in place that allows them to vote during elections, adding that once the law comes into force they will be able to get the right to vote from the countries they are living.
Har Yanzu Ana Cigaba Da Dakon Sakamakon Zaben Amurka.

To har yanzu Amurkawa na nan suna jiran sakamakon zabe a wasu jihohi da ake fafatawa, domin sanin ko Shugaba Mai ci Donald Donald zai ci gaba da jaogarantar kasar, ko kuma abokin hamayyarsa na jam'iyyar Democrat tsohon mataimakin shugaban kasa Joe Biden zai maye gurbinsa.
An yi ta gwangwajewa a birnin Washignton DC.
Da kuma birnin Miami da ke jihar Florida a daren jiya Talata, yayin da ake dakon sakamakon zaben shugaban kasa tsakanin Shugaba mai ci Donald Trump da kuma abokin hamayyarsa na Democrat Joe Biden.
Har yanzu babu wanda ya samu adadin kuri'a 270 daga cikin kuri'a 538 na wakilai na musamman da ake kira Eelctoral College, wanda ake bukata dan takara ya samu kafin ya lashe zaben.
Shi dai tsarin zaben Amurka, ba yawan kuri'ar da dan takara ya samu a zaben gama-gari ne yake ba shi nasara ba.
Jeremy Myer, Malami ne a Jam'iar George Mason da ke nan Amurka.
Ya ce, "Akwai alamun an yi kan-kan-kan a tsakanin ƴan takarar biyu ne".
Abin mamaki game da wannan zabe, kusan a iya cewa abin da ya faru a zaben 2016 ne yake sake faruwa, lamarin da zai sake komawa kan wadannan jihohi uku na Winsconsin, Michigan da Pennsylvania.
Asalin jihohin Winsconsin, Michigan da Pennsylvania, jihohi ne na ƴan Democrat, wadanda Trump ya lashe su a zaben 2016.
Duka ƴan takara biyu sun tafka yakin neman zabe a yankunan cikin kwanakin karshe gabanin a yi zabe.
Cikin sanyin safiyar yau Laraba, daga gidansa na Wilmington da ke jihar Delaware, Biden ya yi kira ga magoya bayansa da su kara hakuri.
Ku ci gaba da yin Imani, za mu yi nasara!
Na gode na gode na gode.

Jim kadan bayan haka, cikin wani sakon Twitter da ya wallafa, Trump ya yi maza-maza ya mayar da martani, yana mai cewa ƴan Democrat na kokarin su sace zaben, sakon da kamfanin Twitter ya ayyana shi a matsayin wanda zai haifar da rudani.
Amma daga baya, ya fito ya yi magana daga Fadar White House.
Wannan abu ne mara dadi, a gani na, wannan lokaci ne na alhini.
Amma za mu samu nasara, a nawa ganin ma mun riga mun yi nasara.
Duk da cewa shugaban yana ikirarin samun nasara, za a ci gaba da kidaya kuri'u, kuma ta yiwu abin ya dauki kwanaki kafin a san takamaiman wanda ya samu nasara.
LaTrice Washington, Malama ce a jami'ar Otterbein.
Ta ce, "saboda annobar Covid-19, mun ga yadda karin mutane suka yi ta aikawa da kuri'arsu ta gidan waya".
Saboda haka, an samu karin mutane da suka bukaci yin zaben ta haka, lamarin da zai sa a dan samu jinkiri wajen (kidayar).

Amurkawa dai sun gudanar da zaben nasu cikin lumana, duk da cewa an girke ƴan sanda a wasu rumfunan zabe, yayin da jami'an tsaron suka zauna cikin shirin ko-ta-kwana, bayan da aka kwashe lokaci ana zazzafar yakin neman zabe da ya rarraba kawunan jama'a.

Yayin da aka yi kan-kan-kan a wasu jihohi da dama, aka kuma kai kararraki kotu kan ka'idojin zabe, da watakila za su iya tasiri kan kuri'un da za a kidaya, dole ne yakin neman zaben na Amurka da aka kwashe watanni ana yi ya dauki lokaci kafin a ga karshensa.
US election results still awaited.

Americans are still waiting for the election results in some contested states, to see if the incumbent President Donald Trump will continue to lead the country, or whether his Democratic opponent, former Vice President Joe Biden, will replace him.
A lot of ceremonies are taking place in Washington DC.
And in Miami, Florida, on Tuesday night, as the results of the presidential election between incumbent President Donald Trump and his Democratic opponent Joe Biden is awaited.
No one has yet received 270 of the 538 special delegates votes called the Electoral College, which a candidate is required to have before winning the election.
The US election system, however, does not determine the number of votes a candidate receives in a general election.
Jeremy Myer is a professor at George Mason University in the United States.
"There are indications that there will be an equilibrium between the two candidates," he said.

Surprisingly about this election, it can almost be said that what happened in the 2016 election is happening again, a phenomenon that will once again affect these three states of Wisconsin, Michigan and Pennsylvania.
Originally the states of Wisconsin, Michigan and Pennsylvania, are Democrat states, which Trump won in the 2016 election.
Both candidates have been campaigning in the constituencies in the last days before the election.
Early morning today, Wednesday, from his home in Wilmington, Delaware, Biden called on his supporters to exercise more patience.
Keep believing, we will emerge victorious!
Thank you thank you thank you.
Shortly afterwards, Trump was quick to respond in a Twitter message posted, saying Democrats were trying to manipulate the election, a message that Twitter described as will cause chaos.
But later, he came out to speak from the White House.
This is an unpleasant experience, in my opinion, this is a time for reflection.
But we will win, I think we have already won.
Even though the president is claiming victory, the vote count will continue, and it may take days before the exact winner is known.
La Trice Washington she is a lecturer at the University of Otterbein.
"Because of the Covid-19 epidemic, we have seen more people sending their ballots by post," she said.
As a result, there are more people who want to vote in this way, which will cause a delay (in counting).

Americans have held peaceful elections, although police have been deployed at some polling stations, and security forces are on high alert after a heated campaign, which brought confusion between the people.

While there has been an identical votes in several states, and lawsuits have been filed in court over election rules, which may have an impact on the votes to be counted, the U.S. election campaign must takes months before it came to an end.
Amurkawa Sun Zaku a Kammala Zaben Shugaban Kasa.
Amurkawa na ci gaba da jiran sakamakon karshe na zaben Shugaban kasar.

Yanzu kallo ya koma wasu jihohi fagagen daga, inda sakamakon wuccin gadi ke nuna ana kankankan, kuma su na iya matukar tasiri wajen sanin wanda zai yi nasara tsakanin dan takarar jam'iyyar Demokarat, tsohon Mataimakin Shugaban Kasa Joe Biden da Shugaba mai ci dan Republican, Donald Trump.
A New York, an bukaci a kirga duk wata kuri'a a yayin da kasar ke ci gaba da jiran labarin wanda ya yi nasara.
Mutane a fadin kasar sun zaku, ciki har da na Pennsylvania, daya daga cikin fagagen daga.
Har yanzu ana cigaba da kirga kuri'u a wasu muhimman jahohi kalilan.

To amma bayan da aka bayyana Joe Biden a matsayin wanda ya ci Michigan da Wisconsin - jihohi biyu da Shugaba Trump ya ci shekaru hudu da su ka gabata - Biden ya ce yana da kwarin gwiwar cewa zai samu makin kuri'u (Electoral College Votes) akalla 270, da ake bukata domin cin zaben.
Joe Biden, dan takarar jam'iyyar Demokarat, ya ce, "Ba na zo nan don in ce mun ci zaben ba ne, na zo ne domin in bayyana cewa idan aka kammala kirga kuri'un, mun yi imanin cewa mu za mu yi nasara".
Georgia, wacce bisa al'ada jihar Republican ce, na daya daga cikin fagagen dagar, inda ake ganin irin goyon bayan da Biden ke da shi a birane da kewaye na iya kai shi ga nasara.

Yayin da ake shirin kidaya kuri'u, Shugaba Donald Trump ya tura sakon twitter jiya Laraba cewa, yana mai ayyana nasara a Pennsylvania, Georgia, North Carolina, da Michigan, ikirarin da Twitter ta bayyana da "marar tabbas".

Kwamitin yakin neman zaben Trump na shirin rugawa kotu don tsai da kirgen kuri'u a Michigan da Pennsylvania, bisa hujjar cewa ba a barin jam'iyyar Republican ta yi cikakken sanya ido kan yadda kirgen ke gudana.
Shugaba Donald Trump ya ce, "Za mu je Kotun Kolin Amurka.
Mu na son a daina duk wata kidayar kuri'u.
Ba mu son sun samo wasu kuri'u da karfe hudu na asuba su kara kan adadin kuri'un.

Willaim Howell wani mai ilimin kimiyyar siyasa a jami'ar Chicago, ya ce: "Kowanne daga cikin ƴan takarar na da damar bukatar a sake kirga kuri'un idan banbancin da ke tsakani bai kai kashi 1 cikin 100 ba.
To amma bisa tarihi sake kidaya kuri'u bai cika haifar da alkaluman da su ka banbanta da na farko ba, domin haka ba lallai a sake kirgen ya haifar da irin sakamakon da yake so ba.
Daruruwan magoya bayan Trump sun yi zanga zanga a wani wurin kirga kuri'u a garin Phoenix na jihar Arizona da daren ranar Laraba, su na masu zargin cewa ba a bin ka'ida wajen kirga wasu kuri'un.
Da alamar daga karshe dai a kotu ce za a tantance sakamakon karshe na Arizona da sauran jahohin.
Americans are eagerly waiting for the final results of the presidential election
Americans are still waiting for the final results of the presidential election.

Now the focus is on other states on the battlefield, with preliminary results showing little chance, and they can be very effective in determining who will win between Democratic candidate, former Vice President Joe Biden and the incumbent Republican. , Donald Trump.
In New York, all votes are required to be counted as the country continues to await the winner.
People across the country are excited, including in Pennsylvania, one of the battlefields.
Counting is still going on in a few key states.

But after Joe Biden was declared the winner of Michigan and Wisconsin - two states that President Trump won four years ago - Biden said he was confident he would win the Electoral College Votes. At least 270, required to win the election.
Joe Biden the candidate for the Democrat says "I didn't come here to say we won the election, I came here to make it clear that once the counting is complete, we believe that victory is ours".
Georgia, traditionally a Republican state, is one of the battlefields, and Biden's support in and around the city is seen as a key factor in his victory.

In the run-up to the vote count, President Donald Trump tweeted Wednesday that he was declaring victory in Pennsylvania, Georgia, North Carolina, and Michigan, a claim Twitter described as "uncertain".
The Trump campaign committee plans to rush to court to stop the counting in Michigan and Pennsylvania, on the grounds that the Republican Party is not allowed to fully monitor the counting process.
President Donald Trump said, "We are going to the US Supreme Court.
We want to stop all counting of votes.
We do not want them to get more votes by 4:00 am to increase the number of votes
William Howell, a political scientist at the University of Chicago, said: “Each of the candidates has the right to request a recount if the difference is less than 1 percent.
But. historically, the recount did not necessarily result in a different tally, so the recount did not necessarily have the desired effect.
Hundreds of Trump supporters rallied at a polling station in Phoenix, Arizona on Wednesday night, accusing the counting of irregularities.
From all indications the final results of Arizona and other states are likely to be decided by a court of law
Badaru ya soke bukukuwan sallah a Jigawa - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Gwamnatin jihar Jigawa ta soke yin duk wasu bukukuwa na al'ada bayan saukowa daga Sallar Idi.
Kwamishinan Lafiya kuma Shugaban kwamatin daƙile yaɗuwar cutar Covid-19 Dr, Abba Zakari Umar ne ya bayyana haka, jim kadan bayan kammala taron tattaunwa da masu ruwa da tsaki kan lamarin.
Dr. Abba yace duk wanda zai je Sallar Idi dole ne sai ya sanya takunkumin rufe baki da hanci, sannan kuma a bada tazara a tsakanin mutane.
Kazalika Dr. Abba ya kuma ƙara da cewa bikin babbar Sallar zai zamo ne kamar yadda aka yi na ƙaramar Sallah, domin kaucewa yaɗuwar cutar corona Virus tsakanin mutane.
Wakilinmu Muhd Aminu Umar Shuwajo ya rawaito cewa, mahalarta taron sun haɗa da sarakunan gargajiya, da kuma malamai sai ƴan kwamatin yaƙi da cutar Covid-19 da sauran masu ruwa da tsaki.
Badaru cancels Eid festivities in Jigawa - Freedom Radio Nigeria
The Jigawa state government has canceled all traditional ceremonies following the Eid prayers.
The Commissioner for Health and Chairman of the Covid-19 Epidemiological Control Committee, Dr. Abba Zakari Umar, made this known shortly after concluding a stakeholder meeting on the issue.
Doctor. Abba said anyone attending the Eid prayers must impose restrictions by wearing face masks and observing social distances.
Also Dr. Abba also added that the celebration of the Eid Kabir will be the same as the Eid Fitr, in order to avoid the spread of corona virus among people.
Our correspondent Muhd ​​Aminu Umar Shuwajo reports that the participants included traditional rulers, scholars, members of the Anti Covid-19 committee and other stakeholders.
Corona: Mutane fiye da miliyan 16 sun kamu.
Har yanzu Amirka ce ke kan gaba na adadin wadanda suka fi mutuwa da mutum sama da dubu 146, yayin da Brazil ke biye mata da mutane sama da dubu 86 da suka rasu sai Birtaniya da mutane kusan dubu 46.
Nahiyar Afirka na ɗaya daga cikin wasu yankunan duniya da cutar ta shafa inda ɗaukacin kasashen nahiyar ke da adadin mutane dubu 17 da 513 da suka rasu.
Masu aiko da rahotanni sun bayyana cewa ƙasashe da dama ne ba sa aiwatar da gwajin kamar yadda ya kamata, a yayin da wasunsu ke yin gwajin kawai ga waɗanda rashin lafiyarsu ta tsananta.
Corona: More than 16 million people are infected.
The United States still remains the world's deadliest country with more than 146,000 deaths, followed by Brazil with more than 86,000 deaths and Britain with nearly 46,000.
Africa is one of the worst-hit regions in the world with a total of 17,553 deaths.
Correspondents says that many countries do not carry out the test properly, while some only test for those whose illness is severe.
Gwamnatin Kaduna ta garkame gidajen saida abinci kan take dokar Corona - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Ma'aikatar da ke kula da harkokin kasuwanci,kirkire-kirkire da fasaha ta jihar Kaduna ta garkame gidajen saida abinci da kayan kwalama da kuma na barasa kuda 6 saboda take dokokin da aka shinfida don kare kai daga kamuwa daga cutar Korona.

An dai rufe gidajen sayar abincin da kayan kwalam ne ya yin da ma'aikatar ke zagayen gani da ido domin tabbatar da ana amfani da dokokin da aka shinfida kan Corona wajen amfani da su a wuraren da ya dace domin kare kai daga kamuwa da cutar COVID-19.
Kamfanin dilancin labaru na kasa ya rawaito cewa tawagar kwamishinan ta kai ziyarar ba zata ne Otel-Otel da gidajen abinci da shaguna sayar da kayan kwalama na jihar ta Kaduna.
Kwamishinan kasuwanci da fasaha na jihar Kaduna Sama'ila Idris-Nyam ne ya sanar da hakan cewa, ayarin ma'aikatar ta ziyarci wuraren kasuwanci goma sha shida ya yin da ta kama 6 daga ciki da laifi.
Kaduna State Government lock-up Restaurants In Violation Of Corona - Freedom Radio Nigeria
The Kaduna State Ministry of Commerce, Innovation and Technology has lock-up 6 restaurant and fast foods joints and bars for violating laws to protect against Corona infection.
The restaurants and fast foods joint were locked-up while the ministry was patrolling to ensure the rules and regulations laid against Corona virus infection were being followed accordingly.
The News Agency of Nigeria reports that the commissioner's delegation paid a surprise visit to hotels, restaurants, shops and fast foods joints in Kaduna State.
The Kaduna State Commissioner for Trade and Technology, Sama'ila Idris-Nyam, said the delegation visited 16 business places and arrested six of them.
Kamaru Za Ta Binciki Yadda Aka Kashe Dala Miliyan 40 Kan COVID-19.

Hukumomin Kamaru sun ba da umurnin kaddamar da bincike kan yadda aka sarrafa kudaden tallafin da fararen hula suka bayar a matsayin gudunmowa wandanda aka zuba su a wani asusu na musamman domin yaki da cutar COVID-19 a kasar.

Umurnin na zuwa ne bayan da kungiyoyin kare hakkin bil adama suka nuna matsin lamba kan a gudanar da binciken, inda suka yi zargin cewa an wawure dala miliyan 40 da aka tara na kudade da kayayyakin aiki da jama'a suka bayar a matsayin taimako.
Koken nasu ya samo asali ne bayan da kungiyoyin suka yi zargin cewa an sayar da buhun shinkafa dubu hudu wadanda asalinsu na tallafi ne da aka tanadarwa wadanda suka kamu da cutar COVID-19.

Ko da yake, hukumomin kasar sun ce an sayi isasssun kayayyakin gwajin lafiyar jiki, sabulu, man kashe kwayoyin cuta, takunkumin rufe baki da hanci, magunguna tare da raba wadataccen ruwa a duk fadin kasar.
Shi dai Shugaba Paul Biya ya zuba dala miliyan 1.8 a asusun tallafin baya ga fararen hula, kamfanoni, ministoci da ƴan majalisu da suka ba da tasu gudunmowar.
Kasar ta Kamaru har ila yau ta samu tallafi daga kasashen waje domin yaki da cutar ta COVID-19.
Cameroon to Investigate $ 40 Million Spend on COVID-19
Cameroonian authorities have ordered an investigation into the mismanagement of public funds as donations made to a special fund to fight COVID-19 in the country.
The order comes after human rights groups put pressure on the investigation, alleging that $ 40 million in public funds and equipment had been embezzled.
Their complaint arose after the groups alleged that 4,000 bags of rice originally originated in aid had been sold to victims of COVID-19.
However, authorities say sufficient medical equipment, soap, antiseptics, nasal and nasal decongestants, medicines and water supply have been procured across the country.
President Paul Biya has invested $ 1.8 million in grants in addition to individuals, companies, ministers and members of parliament.
Cameroon has also received foreign funding to fight COVID-19.
Yakubu Dogara ya koma APC.
Tsohon Shugaban Majalisar Tarayya, Yakubu Dogara ya wancakalar da jam'iyyar PDP, ya koma APC.
Dogara ya bayyana haka ne bayan ganawa da ya yi da shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari a fadar gwamnati ranar Juma'a.
A shekarar 2018 Dogara ya fice daga jam'iyyar APC ya koma PDP, bayan rashin jituwa da ya shiga tsakanin su da gwamnan jihar a wancan lokaci.
Idan ba a manta ba tare suka hada kai da gwamnan Bauchi, Bala Mohammed, suka kada APC a jihar Bauchi.
Yakubu Dogara decamped to APC.
Former Speaker of the National Assembly, Yakubu Dogara, thrashed the PDP for APC.
Dogara made the remarks after meeting with President Muhammadu Buhari at the State House on Friday.
In 2018 Dogara left the APC and joined the PDP, following a dispute between him and the then state governor.
It will be recalled that, he teamed up with Bauchi Governor Bala Mohammed to defeat the APC in Bauchi State.
'Yan sanda: an harbi wani mutum a yayin zanga-zanga a Texas
AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - An yiwa wani mutum mummunan harbi a yayin da ake zanga-zanga a Texas a lokacin da ya tinkari wata mota kuma direban ya bude masa wuta, a cewar 'yan sanda.
Harbin ya faru ne da misalin karfe 10 na yamma a wata zanga - zangar da aka yi a Austin, Katrina Ratliff mai magana da yawun 'yansanda ta fadawa 'yan jarida a safiyar ranar Lahadi.
An garzaya da mutumin Asibiuti a inda likitoci suka tabbatar da cewa ya mutu.
Motar ta yi hon sannan ta yi kwana zuwa wani layi, ta kuma yi cikin masu zanga-zangar cikin sauri, Micheal Capochiano wani da aka yi kan idonsa ya fadawa jaridar Austin American Statesman.
Mutumin da Capochiano ya ce na dauke da wata doguwar bindiga, ya tinkari motar ne sai kuma direban ya harbe shi.
Direban kuma ya yi tafiyarsa, a cewar Capochiano.
Rahotanni na farko na nuna cewa " mutumin da aka harba na dauke da bindiga," Ratliff ya fadawa 'yan jarida, ya kuma kara da cewa ana tsare da wanda ake zargi kuma yana na 'yan sanda hadin kai.
Tarin jama'a ce ta taru a ranar Asabar a wata zanga-zanga kan rayuwar ba bakaken fata ma na muhimmanci, a cewar kafofin yada labarai.
An sa zanga-zangar kai tsaye a shafin sada zumunta na Facebook an kuma dauki sautin hon din motar da kuma karar harbin bindiga a kai-akai da ake iya ji.
Police: Man fatally shot at protest in Texas
AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - A man was fatally shot at a protest in Texas when he approached a vehicle and the driver inside opened fire, police said.
The shooting happened just before 10 p.m. during a protest in Austin, police spokesperson Katrina Ratliff told reporters early Sunday.
The man was taken to a hospital where he was later pronounced dead.
The vehicle had honked, turned down a road and then sped toward protesters, witness Michael Capochiano told the Austin American-Statesman.
The man, who Capochiano said was carrying a rifle, approached the vehicle and was shot by the driver.
The driver then drove away, Capochiano said.
Initial reports indicated "the victim may have been carrying a rifle," Ratliff told reporters, adding that the suspect was detained and was cooperating with police.
The crowd gathered Saturday for a Black Lives Matter protest, news outlets reported.
The demonstration was streamed live on Facebook and captured audio of a vehicle's horn honking and several gunshots being fired.
Shugaban likitocin kasar Ukraine dan shekara 48 ya mutu daga cutar Koronabirus

Anaton Hudae, likitan kungiyar kwallon kafa ta kasar Ukraine ya mutu sakamakon kamuwa da ya yi daga cutarkoronabirus yana dan shekara 48, a cewar wata sanarwa da kungiyar kwallon kafa cikin a ta kasar (UAF)ta fitar.

"A madadin shugaban kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Ukraine Andriy Pavelka, da babban mai hoaras da 'yan wasan kungiyar kwallaon kafa ta kasar Andriya Shevenko da kuma daukacin 'yan wasan kwallon kafar kasar, muna masu mika ta'aziyya ga iyalinsa", a sanarwar da kungiyar AUF da ta fitar ke cewa.
"daukacin kungiyar kwallon kafar kasar na cikin matukar juyayi"
Hudaev kuma yana daya daga cikin likitocin wata karamar kungiyar kwallon kafa meatalis Khakiv.
Kwayar cutar ta hallaka sama da mutane 1.600 a Ukraine wacce ta sanar da cewa mutane kuasan 65,000 sun kamu da ita.
Ukraine team doctor, 48, dies from coronavirus
Anton Hudaev, the Ukrainian national team's doctor, has died from the novel coronavirus at the age of 48, the domestic football association (UAF) said.

"On behalf of the President of the Ukrainian Association of Football Andriy Pavelka, head coach of the national team Andriy Shevchenko and the entire football family of Ukraine, we extend our deepest condolences to his family," the UAF said in a statement.
"The whole national team is in great sorrow."
Hudaev was also team doctor for the local club Metalist Kharkiv.
The virus has killed more than 1,600 people in Ukraine, which has reported nearly 65,000 infections.
BABBAR SALLAH: Mutanen Abuja su yi Sallar Idi a masallatan Juma'a dake kusa da su.
Ministan Abuja, Muhammad Bello, ya yi kira ga mazauna garin Abuja da su yi Sallar idi a masallatan Juma'a dake kusa da su maimakon su dunguma zuwa filin idi.
Bello ya fadi haka ne a wata takarda da babban sakataren yada labaran ma'aikatar sa Anthony Ogunleye ya raba wa manema labarai ranar Talata a Abuja.
Ya ce masallata su garzaya masallatan dake kusa da su ne su yi sallar Idi maimakon zuwa filin idi.

Bello ya ce gwamnati ta dauki wannan mataki ne bayan ta tattauna da kungiyar mamalai kan tsarin hanyoyin da za su taimaka wajen kare kiwon lafiyar mutane daga kamuwa da cutar Korona a lokacin shagulgulan babbar Sallah.
Bayan haka Bello ya yi Kira ga malamai da su tsara hanyoyin da za su taimaka wajen hana cinkoso a masallatai.
Sannan kada a wuce awa daya a wajen Sallah.

Gwamantin Tarayya ta bada da ranakun Alhamis 30 ga Yuli da ranar Juma'a, 31 ga Yuli ranakun hutun Babbar Sallah sannan kuma ta yi kira ga Ƴan Najeriya su kiyaye dokoki da sharuddan gujewa kamuwa da cutar Korona da gwamnati da hukumar NCDC ta gindaya a lokacin shagulgular Babban Sallah.
Abuja na daga cikin wuraren da ake samun karuwar wadanda suka kamu da Korona a Najeriya.
EID KABIR: Abuja residents perform Eid prayers at nearby Friday Mosques.
The Minister for Abuja, Muhammad Bello, has called on Abuja residents to perform Eid prayers at nearby Friday mosques instead of going to the Eid grounds.
Bello made the remarks in a statement issued by his ministry's information secretary Anthony Ogunleye to newsmen on Tuesday in Abuja.
He said worshipers should go to nearby Mosques to offer Eid prayers instead of going to the Eid prayer grounds.
Bello said the government took the decision after consulting a group of scholars on ways to help protect people's health from Corona infection during the Eid Kabir Festival.
Bello later called on clerics to devise ways to help prevent congestion in mosques.
And not to spend more than one hour in the prayer.

The Federal Government has declared Thursday, July 30 and Friday, July 31, the main Eid Kabeer holidays and called on Nigerians to abide by the rules and regulations to avoid contracting Corona disease by the government and the NCDC at the time of the Eid Kabeer festivities.
Abuja is one of the fastest growing Corona cases in Nigeria.
Coman Ya Kifar Da Mafarinsa.

Manazarta lamurran wasanni na ci gaba da jinjina ga matashin dan wasan Bayern Munich Kingsley Coman, wanda ya zura kwallon da ta kifar da tsohuwar kungiyarsa ta PSG, ta kuma baiwa kungiyarsa ta yanzu damar lashe gasar zakarun Turai ta bana.
Coman ya kwashe tsawon shekaru kusan 10 a PSG, inda ya fara tun daga kwalejin kungiyar ta horar da kananan ƴan wasa har ya buga mata wasanni 4 a matakin babbar kungiyar.

Coman dan kasar Faransa mai shekaru 24, ya janyo hankalin manazarta kwallon kafa, akan yadda kungiyoyi ke sakin matasan ƴan wasan da suka horar, kana daga bisani su kasance wani abu har su zame musu alaƙaaki wata rana.
Coman ya bar PSG a shekarar 2014, ya koma Juventus inda ya lashe gasar Serie A sau 2, kafin komawarsa kasar Jamus, inda tauraruwarsa ta kara haskakawa musamman a karshen wannan kakar wasannin.
Gabaki daya dan wasan ya sami lashe kofunan gasar lig 9, 2 a PSG, 2 a Juventus da kuma 5 a kungiyarsa ta yanzu wato Bayern Munich.
Coman defeated his former club.

Sports pundits continue to pay tribute to Bayern Munich youngster Kingsley Coman, who scored the winning goal against his former club PSG and gave his current club the chance to win this year's Champions League.
Coman spent almost 10 years at PSG, starting with the club's junior player and playing four games for them at senior level.
Coman, a 24-year-old Frenchman, has attracted the attention of football pundits, with clubs releasing young players they have trained, and then turning them into something they can regrets one day.
Coman left PSG in 2014, moved to Juventus where he won the Serie A title twice, before returning to Germany, where his star shined especially at the end of this season.
In all, the player has won nine league titles, 2 at PSG, 2 at Juventus and 5 at his current club Bayern Munich.
An saka lokacin zaben Yuganda.

Hukumar zaben kasar Yuganda ta tabbatar da zaben kasar na ranar 14 ga watan Janairu mai zuwa na shekara ta 2021, inda za a fafata tsakanin Shugaba Yoweri Museveni da matashi mawaki mai farin jini Bobi Wine, inda a gaba daya akwai ƴan takara 11.
Mai magana da yawun hukumar zaben ya saka a shafinsa na sada zumunta na Tuwita cewa an gayyaci ƴan takara zuwa hukumar zaben a wannan Alhamis domin tattauna harkokin zaben.
Shugaba Yoweri Museveni da ke da shekaru 76 da haihuwa, wanda ya kwaci madafun ikon kasar ta Yuganda tun shekarar 1986 ta hanyar tawaye, ya yi ta gyara ga kundin tsarin mulkin domin samun tazarce.

Yayin da a daya bangaren mawaki Bobi Wine, wanda asalin sunansa shi ne Robert Kyagulanyi dan majalisar dokoki da ke da shekaru 38 da haihuwa, ya yi suna saboda neman ganin an samar da tsarin kwatanta gaskiya da adalci da yaki da cin hanci da talauci.
Uganda's election date is set.
Uganda's Electoral Commission has confirmed the January 14, 2021 general election, which will pit President Yoweri Museveni against popular singer Bobi Wine, with a total of 11 candidates.
A NEC spokesman posted on his Twitter account that candidates had been invited to the NEC this Thursday to discuss the election process.
76-year-old President Yoweri Museveni, who has seized power in Uganda since a 1986 uprising, has amended the constitution to allow him to run.

On the other hand, singer Bobi Wine, whose original name is Robert Kyagulanyi, a 38-year-old member of parliament, has made a name for himself by advocating for a fair and just system and fighting corruption.
Gwamnatin Buhari ta sallami tubabbun ƴan Boko Haram 601 zuwa gidajen su.

Ranar Asabar din nan ce gwamnatin Shugaba Muhammdu Buhari ta sallami tubabbun ƴan Boko Haram su 601 zuwa gidajen su, bayan sun kwashe zaman watanni shida ana yi musu bitar wankin kwakwalwar kankare musu akidar ta'addanci a zukatan su.
An gudanar da dan kwarya-kwaryar bikin yaye su daga Cibiyar Kankare wa Boko Haram Akidar Ta'addanci da ke garin Malam Sidi, cikin Karamar Hukumar Kwami, Jihar Gombe.

Ana ba su wannan horon nasihohi da koyar da sana'o'in hannu ne a karkashin shirin kankare akidar ta'addanci mai suna "De-radicalization Reintegration and Reorientation", (DRR), a karkashin gagarimin shirin karbar tubar ƴan Boko Haram, mai suna "Operation Safe Corridor", wato ka yi saranda a kama ka ko ka kai kan ka, sannan ka tuba ba za ka kara ba.
Shugaban shirin Manjo Janar Bamidele Shafa, ya ce wadannan 601 da za a sallama, su ne rukuni na 4 na gungun Boko Haram da aka sallama bayan sun tuba.
Ya ce su wadannan sun shafe watanni 6, tun cikin Disamba kenan aka yi musu rajista a sansanin, kuma aka horar da su kyawawan dabi'u.
Asali su 606 ne, amma uku sun mutu a cibiyar sakamakon wani ciwo da suka yi fama da shi, tun kafin su yi saranda.
An tsame daya daga cikin su, saboda wani dalili, kuma ana kan tuhumar, daya kuma an tura shi asibitin tababbu.
Guda 587 ne ƴan Najeriya, sauran 14 kuma ƴan kasar Nijar ne, sai na Chadi da kuma Kamaru.

Wadanda suka tura wakilai kuma wakilan suka yi jawabai a wurin, sun hada da Babban Hafsan Tsaro na Kasa, Abayomi Olanisakin, Gwamna Babagana Zulum na Barno da kuma Ministar Harkokin Agaji, Jinkai da Inganta Rayuwar Marasa Galihu, Sadiya Faruq.
Yadda ƴan Boko Haram 602 Suke Daukar Wa Gwamnatin Buhari Alkawarin Daina Ta'addanci.
Makonni biyu da suka gabata ne PREMIUM TIMES ta buga labarin yadda tubabbun ƴan Boko Haram 602 suka daukar wa Gwamnati alkawarin tuba daga aikata ta'addanci.
Bayyana Ta'addancin Da Ka Yi A Baya, Ka Tuba Ka Tafi Abin Ka.
Buhari government has released reformed 601 Boko Haram members to their homes.
The government of President Muhammadu Buhari on Saturday released 601 reformed Boko Haram members to their homes, after a six-month deradicalization and reintegration exercise.
The graduation ceremony was held at the Boko Haram Terrorism Reintegration Center in Malam Sidi town, Kwami Local Government Area of ​​Gombe State.

They are being trained in reformation and vocational training under the "De-radicalization Reintegration and Reorientation" (DRR) under the Boko Haram reintegration program, it is called "Operation Safe Corridor", that is, you surrender and be arrested, and then you repent and you will not do it again.
Major General Bamidele Shafa, the program director, said these 601 to be released were the fourth group of Boko Haram members to be released after their reformations.
He said they had been in the camp for six months, had been registered at the camp since December, and had been trained good manners.
Originally they were 606, but three died at the center as a result of an illness they had suffered, long before they surrendered.
One of them has been acquitted for some reason, and is being charged, and the other has been sent to a psychiatric hospital.
587 are Nigerians, 14 are Nigeriens, Chad and Cameroon.

Those sent delegates and the delegates who spoke at the event included the Chief of National Security, Abayomi Olanisakin, Governor Babagana Zulum of Borno and the Minister of Emergency Relief and Humanitarian Aid, Sadiya Faruq.
How 602 Boko Haram Vows to Buhari's Government to Stop Terrorism.
Two weeks ago, PREMIUM TIMES published an article on how 602 reformed Boko Haram members pledged allegiance to the government.
Explain Your Past Terrorism, Repent and Go Away.
Jose Morinho ya waiwayi gida yana mai ikirarin cewa komai za zamo cikin sauki ga Tottenham, albishir ga 'yan kallo idan sun dawo kall.

Jose Morinho ya taimaki Tottenham Hotspur ya soma wata sabuwa kuma gagarabadon tafiya tun da aka soma gasar firimiya, amma yana mai cewa dawowa gida da mayar da hankali kan gina gida ba zai yiwu ba in babu taimakon magoya baya.
Kulob din Spurs sun ci sau 12 daga wasannin da suka buga a gida a wannan kakar, amma sun sha kashi sau hudu - daya kadai daga cikin kulob shida da ke samansu da a ka ci su a gida.
Mai horas da 'yan wasan dan asalin Portugal ya ce za a iya samun wasu nasarori ko da babu taimakon magoya baya, amma hakan zai fi kyau a yi a gabansu.
"lallai da akwai bukatar mu yi tare da su". I dan babu su za ka iya samar da wata katanga ce mai duhuwa, amma kawai a tsarin cikin wasan ne kawai" ya na mai cewa.

"Amma ina ganin idan da magoya baya, zaka iya yin sa yadda zai yi karfi saboda yadda abin ya ke kara karsashi da taba su zuci a yayin wasan wannan a cikin filin wasa ne kadai tare da magoya baya ake samunsa"

Mourinho yana mai jin cewa cimma wannan irin tsari mai tsawo kuma gida irin wanda ya ke jin dadin sa a kungiyar Chelsea. ko Liverpool sun ginu ne tsawon kakar wasa har uku, kuma hakam ya na zama abu mai wuya yayin da hamayya ke dada zama mai wahala, kuma abokana hamayya ke kara karfi.

Hakan kuma wani matsa yi na mai mhimmanci a wajen tantance ko wani bangare ne zai iya cimma muradinsa a karshen kakar wasan, muasamman ma a wasannin da aka sha da kyar ko wasannin tsere a yanayin gida ke da matukar tasiri
"Ina jin dai wasan gasar Frimiya na daukar wata alkibla da wadannan nasarorin da aka samu wadansu abubuwa ne da suke dada zama a cimma musu saboda irin matasayin kulob-kulob din suke"
"Amma ka zama gwarzo a gida sannnan kuma ka kai karshen kakar wasa da babban maki a aljihunka daga wasannin da ka buga agida yana da matukar muhimmanci"
"ina jin dai sakamakonmu wasannanin da mu ka yi na gida ba tare da magoya baya ba na da matukar muhimmanci, amma muna da bukatar su dawo mana."
ka dubi irin nasarar da muka samu na doke kungiyar Arsenal da a ce filin wasan nan a cike ya ke da magoya bayan Tottenham ne
Toh, wannan shine irin shiga zucin da za ka iya samarwa daki-daki
Home form vital for Jose Mourinho as boss says it will be easier for Tottenham when fans return to stadiums
Jose Mourinho has helped Tottenham Hotspur start a new unbeaten run at home since the Premier League's restart, but he says making that home form more consistent would be easier with supporters back.
Spurs have taken 12 wins from their home fixtures this term, but were beaten four times - only one of the six teams above them lost more on home soil.
The Portuguese coach says it's possible to build those important streaks while fans are absent, but would be easier with them present.
"We need to do it with the fans. Without them you can create a kind of fortress, but based on the tactical side of the game," he said.
"But, I think with fans, you can do it in a much stronger way because you add the emotional side of the game that only your fans in your stadium can give to you."

Mourinho feels that achieving the kind of long unbeaten streaks on home soil which he enjoyed at Chelsea, or which Liverpool have built over the past three seasons, is becoming ever tougher as the opposition becomes stronger.

But it's also a crucial factor in determining whether sides achieve their respective objectives at the end of the season, particularly in close-fought or derby matches where a home atmosphere can make the difference.
"I think the Premier League is getting into a direction where these unbeaten records are something more and more difficult to achieve because of the level of the teams."
"But to be strong at home and to arrive at the end of each season with an important number of points in your pocket from home matches is very important."
"I think our recent results at home without the fans are important, but we need them back.
I can imagine that victory against Arsenal with the stadium full of Tottenham fans.
This is the kind of empathy that you can create step by step."
Wani mutum ya ji mummunan rauni yayin da motar shanu ta tuntsire a Wexford
Wani mutum ya samu munanan raunuka a wani hadarin mota na taho-mu-gama da ya faru a safiyar yau a kan gadar Ferrycarrig da ke Wexford.
Wata motar shanu wacce ta kwacewa direbanta ta daki wata gada ta kuma tintsira tare faduwa a wani filin ajiye motocin da babu kowa.
Direban motar dan shekara 34 ya ji munanan raunuka a hadarin da ya faru da misalin 1.50 na yamman yau.
An garzaya da shi babban asibitin Wexford kuma yana cikinn wani mummunan hali.
Masu bincike na shari'a a halin yanzu suna nazarin inda hadarin ya faru da kuma rufe gadar, an kuma samar da wata hanya ta daban a maimakon wannan.
Shanu da yawa sun mutu a hadarin na taho-mu-gama.

Gardai na kira ga duk wani wanda ya ke tafiya kan hanyar daga karfe 1.45 na yamma zuwa karfe 2 - ko kuma duka wani wanda ya kasance a wannan yankin da Allah Ya sa ya ga faruwar hadarin - da su tuntubi ofishin Garda na Wexford a kan lamba 053 916 5200, layin sirri na Garda shine 1800 666 111 ko kuma ko wane ofishin na Garda.
Man seriously hurt as cattle truck overturns in Wexford
A man has been seriously injured in a road traffic collision that occurred earlier today on Ferrycarrig Bridge, Wexford.
A cattle truck lost control going over the bridge and, in the process, overturned onto an unoccupied parked car.
The 34-year-old driver was seriously injured during the incident that took place around 1.50pm today.
He has been removed to Wexford General Hospital and remains in a serious condition.
Garda forensic investigators are currently examining the scene and the bridge remains closed with local diversions in place.
A number of cattle died in the collision.

Gardaí are appealing for anyone who was travelling on the road from 1.45pm to 2pm - or anyone who was in the area and may have witnessed the incident - to contact Wexford Garda Station on 053 916 5200, the Garda Confidential Line on 1800 666 111 or any Garda station.
Na ki jinin cin Hanci Da Rashawa.
Tsohon gwamnan jihar Kano, Kuma tsohon Dan takarar shugaban kasa, Rabiu Kwankwaso, ya bayyana cewa shi ya ki jinin cin Hanci Da Rashawa a rayuwar sa.
Kwankwaso ya fadi haka a hira da yayi da BBC Hausa yana mai cewa sun yi hannun riga da cin Hanci da Rashawa.
Cin Hanci Da Rashawa ne ya durkusar da Kasar nan.
Za ka ga mutum a gwamnati ya saci kudi don azurta kansa amma maimakon a hukuntashi, karshenta ma za ku ganshi a can sama ana damawa da shi a Harkokin gwamnati.
Daga nan sai ya yi tsokaci game da yadda cin Hanci Da Rashawa, satar kudin al'umma da ya kanannade hukumar NDDC.
Da kaina na hakura da ci gaba da zama kwamishina a hukumar NDDC a 2010 saboda mahaukacin satan kudin gwamnati da ake yi a hukumar.
Da naga ba zan iya ba na tattara nawa inawa na hakura da hukumar.
Sai dai kuma idan ba a manta ba, shi kansa Kwankwaso ya taba fadawa tarkon hukumar EFCC bayan an Kai mata korafin ya waske da kudin kananan hukumomi har naira Biliyan 3.4.
An zargeshi tilasta wa kananan hukumomin su zaro kudadensu su yi masa kamfen din shugaban kasa a wancan lokaci, Kamar yadda Daily Trust ta ruwaito.
Idan ba a manta ba hukumar NDDC ta fada Cikin kallin yan majaisar kasa, inda take bincikar shugabannin hukumar da zargin yin watanda da kudaden hukumar a tsakaninsu Babu kakkautawa.
A Cikin binciken da aka yi an gano har rabawa juna suke yi Kudade Babu kakkautawa, wai da sunan tallafin Korona, Suma su ji sanyi-Sanyi.
I hate corruption.
Former Kano State governor and former presidential candidate, Rabiu Kwankwaso, has said that he hates corruption in his life.
Kwankwaso made the remarks in an interview with BBC Hausa, saying that he and corruption are a part.
Corruption has brought this country to its knees.
You will see a person in government stealing money to be rich but instead of being punished, you will at the end see him at top being involved in government affairs.
He then went on to comment on how corruption, embezzlement of public funds damaged the NDDC.
I personally stop continuing to be a commissioner in the NDDC in 2010 due to the rampant embezzlement of public funds in the commission.
Since I can't help it, I gathered my belongings and left the Board.
However, it will be recalled that Kwankwaso himself fell into the trap of the EFCC after he was accused of embezzling N3.4 billion from local government funds.
He was accused of forcing local governments to withdraw from their coffers and fund his campaign for the presidency at that time, the Daily Trust reported.

It will be recalled that, the NDDC has fallen into the trap of the National Assembly, where it is investigating the NDRC leaders and alleging misappropriation of NDP funds between them without hesitations.
According to the investigations that was carried out, it was discovered that they share money amongst themselves in the name of Corona palliatives to comfort themselves.
Za a Bude Makarantu Ga Dalibai a Najeriya Domin Yin Jarrabawar WAEC.
Gwamnatin Najeriya ta bayyana cewa za a bude makarantu a ranar 4 ga watan Augusta ga daliban da ke ajin karshe a makarantun Sakandare domin rubuta jarrabawar WAEC.
Gwamnatin ta bayyana matakin ne a cikin watan sanarwar da ma'aikatar ilimi ta fitar a yau Litinin wacce ke dauke da sa hannun daraktan yada labarai na Ma'aikatar, Ben Bem Goong.
Wannan matakin ya biyo bayan shafe sa'o'i ana tattaunawa a yau tsakanin ma'aikatar ta ilimi da kwamishinonin ilimi da kuma masu ruwa da tsaki a harkokin ilimi a kasar.
Sanarwar ta bayyana yadda aka umarci 'yan ajin karshe da su koma makaranta da an kammala bikin sallah mai zuwa domin shirin yin jarrabawar wacce za a fara a ranar 17 ga watan Augusta.
A tattaunawar tasu, an Kuma bayyana cewa makarantu za su bukaci taimako daga gwamnatin tarayya wajen iya budewa cikin gaggawa.
Makarantu a kasar daga matakin farko zuwa karshe sun shafe watanni a garkame saboda kokarin takaita yaduwar cutar Coronavirus.
A cikin makonnin da suka gabata gwamnatin ta bayyana cewa ba za a gudanar da jarrabawar WAEC ba saboda cutar, amma yanzu gwamnatin ta sauya matsayarta.
Schools To Open In Nigeria For WAEC Exams.
The Nigerian government has announced that schools will reopen on August 4 for final year secondary school students to sit for the WAEC.
The government announced the move in a statement issued by the Ministry of Education on Monday, signed by the Ministry's Director of Publicity, Ben Bem Goong.
The move follows hours of discussions today between the Ministry of Education and the Commissioners of Education and other stakeholders in the country's education system.
The announcement described how the final class members were instructed to return to school after the upcoming Eid celebration is over return for the exams which will start on August 17.
In their discussion, it was also stated that the schools will need help from the federal government to be able to open in an emergency.
Schools across the country from primary to tertiary institutions have spent months closed in trying to curb the spread of Coronavirus.
In recent weeks the government has announced that WAEC exams will not be held due to the pandemic, but now the government has changed its position.

'yan sandan masu bincike na binciken matuwar wani matashi a Halensburg, suna kakarin na tattaro bayanan zirga-zirgann da yayi a lokutansa na karshe kafin mutuwarsa.
An gano gawar Kirk Allan ne a wani wuri da ke Johnson Court da kimanin karfe 06:25 rarnar Asabar
An tsare wani mutum dan shekara 30, 'yan sanda kuma sun tabbatar da cewa ana tuhumarsa dangane da mutuwar matashin.
Za a gurfanar da mutumin a gaban kotun Dumbarton Sheriff a ranar Litinin.
Mai binciken 'yan sanda sifeto Steve Martins ya ce: "muna jajantawa iyalan Kirk da abokansa da basu hakurin wannan rashi
Jami'anmu za su cigaba da aiki ba a ciki da wajen unguwannimu don samar da kwanciyar hankali.

"Ana cigaba da yin tambayoyi domin gano sahihinn abin da ya faru, musamman irin zirga-zirgan da mamacin ya yi a kwanakin kadan kafin rasuwar tasa, sai dai wannan na nufin da akwai wani takamaimai da muke nema ba dangane da kisan.
Police work on timeline of Helensburgh teenager's final movements
Detectives investigating the death of a teenager in Helensburgh are trying to build a timeline of his final movements.
The body of Kirk Allan, 19, was discovered at an address in Johnson Court at about 06:25 on Saturday.
A 30-year-old man was arrested and police confirmed on Sunday that he has now been charged in connection with the death.
He is due to appear at Dumbarton Sheriff Court on Monday.
Det Insp Steve Martin said: "Our thoughts remain with Kirk's family and friends at this very difficult time.
Officers will continue to work in and around the community to provide reassurance.

"Inquiries are continuing to find out the full circumstances of what happened, in particular Kirk's movements in the days preceding his death, however, we are not looking for anyone else in connection with the death."
Jam'iyun Hamayya a Nijer Sun Ƙaddamar Da Littafi Kan kura-kuren Tsare-tsaren Zaɓen Kasar.

Jam'iyyun hamayya a Jamhuriyar Nijer sun kaddamar da wani littafi mai kunshe da bayanan da suka kira kura-kuren da suka gano a tsare-tsaren zaben gama garin da ake sa ran gudanarwa a kasar, daga karshen shekarar 2020 a yayin da shugabannin hukumar zabe ke kiran bangarorin siyasa su bata hadin kai domin ganin komai ya gudana yadda ya dace.

Jan hankulan jama'ar cikin gida da na waje a game da yanayin da tsare-tsaren zaben Nijer ke gudana, shine makasudun rubuta wannan littafi da ake kira "Livre Blanc" wanda ta wani bangare ke matsayin wata hanyar wayar da kan magoya bayan jam'iyun hamayya, kamar yadda kakakinsu Maman Sani Adamou ya yi wa wakilin Muryar Amurka Karin bayani jim kadan bayan kaddamar da littafin mai shafika 40.

Aiwatar da sauye-sauyen da suka shafi hukumar zabe da kundin rajistar zabe na daga cikin bukatun da "yan adawa ke ci gaba da matsin lamba akansu, a cewar wani kusa a jam'iyar Moden Lumana, Lawali Salissou Leger, ya ce, mahimmancin wadanan bukatu ya kai matsayin da za a tsaya a gyara tafiya.
Da alama wannan yunkuri na ƴan hamayya ya fara tasiri a akan magoya bayansu a cewar Ramatou Alele daya daga cikin mayaƙan jam'iyar MPN Kishin Kasa.

Yanzu haka ana iya cewa an shayo gangara a tsare-tsaren zaben gama garin da za a fara gudanarwa daga watan Disamba mai zuwa, yayin da bayanai ke nunin da cewa hukumomin Nijer sun fara yunkurin baiwa kungiyar OIF aikin tace kundin rajistar zaben kasar, a matsayin wani matakin share fagen soma buga katinan zabe.
Saurari Karin bayani cikin sauti daga Souley Moumouni Barma.
Opposition Parties in Niger Launch a Book of Irregularities in the country's Election Planning Processes.

Opposition parties in the Republic of Niger have launched a document containing details of alleged irregularities in the country's planned by-elections, which will take place by the end of 2020. While the of Electoral Commission calls on all political parties to work together for a lasting solution.

The aim of writing this book, "Livre Blanc", is to raise awareness among Nigerien and foreign audiences about the state of the electoral process in Niger, named "Livre Blanc" Which in another angle it enlighten the opposition parties supporters. Spokesman Maman Sani Adamou told VOA's reporter shortly after the launch of the 40-page book.

Implementing some amendments to the electoral commission and the electoral roll is one of the demands that "the opposition continues to put pressure on," said Lawali Salissou Leger, a spokesman for the Modern Lumana party, he said the importance of these request reached the point where there is needs to stop and make the amendments.
It seems the opposition movement have began to have an impact on its supporters, according to Ramatou Alele, one of the MPN's nationalist fighters.

It is safe to say that preparations for the elections, which will begin in December, are well underway, with reports that the Nigerien authorities have begun trying to give the OIF the task of editing the country's electoral roll another step in the process of printing ballot papers.

An rufe wani sashi na wani babban filin shakatawa da ke Jeronimo da wasu karnukan daji su biyu suka kai wa mutane hari - daga kafar yada labarai ta CBS a Birnin Los Angeles
Wasu karanukan daji sun ciji mutane biyu a kusa da koramar Oso wacce ta mike ta bi titin Jeronimo da ke Mission Viejo da safiyar Asabar. Wanda hakan ya sa a ka rufe wurin.

Laura Wittmer ta ce ta kan ga wadannan karnukan daji kusan a kowacce safiya idan ta fito gudun motsa jiki kuma ta kan kauce musu, anma a wannan ranar Asabar, kawai sai daya daga cikinsu ya nunfota gadan-gadan ya kuma cijeta a kafa.
Yayin da a ka cigaba da bincike kan lamarin, an rufe wurin.

A wani sako a shafinta na dandalin sada zumunta na Twitter hukumar birnin Mission Viejo ta ce, "yau wasu mutane 2 sun kawo rahoton bullar wasu karnukan daji da suka ciji mutane. Hukumar kula da dabbobi na birnin na aiki tare da sashen kula da kifaye da dabbobin daji kan wannan batu, an kuma rufe wani sashi na babban filin shakatawa na Jeronimo. Ana kiran jama'a da su kiyaye, su kuma yi taka tsan-tsan a duk lokacin da suka fita zuwa wuraren a ke da dabbobin daji."
Wittmer ta yi kokarin korar karen dajin ta hanyar dukansa da robar ruwa.
Ta kuma kira lambar 911 don samu agajin abin hawa, amma sai ga shi ta iya tuka kanta har zuwa wurin da ake bayar da agajin gaggawa.
Karnukan dajin sun gudu tare da buya a cikin 'yan tsaunukan da ke wurin, amma jam'ai na kokarin bin sawun su tare da kama su don su gudanar da bincike ko suna da ciwon hauka.
Duk da haka, za a yiwa Wittmer maganin kamuwa daga ciwon hauka na mako biyu a matsayin rigakafi.

Wittmer ta kuma ce, harin da wadannan dabbobin daji suka kai mata ya tsorata ta amma hakan ba zai sa ta daina fita gudun motsa jikin da ke yi ba a kowacce safiya, sai dai kawai za ta sauya wani wuri ne.
Sai dai ba a san halin da daya mutumin da wadannan karnukan daji suka ciza ya ke ciki ba.
Section Of Jeronimo Open Space Temporarily Closes After 2 Coyote Attacks - CBS Los Angeles
Two people were bit by coyotes near Oso Creek Trail along Jeronimo Road in Mission Viejo Saturday morning, causing a temporary closure at the trail.
Laura Wittmer said she sees coyotes almost every morning when she's running and typically just tries to avoid them, but on Saturday morning, one came directly toward her and bit her on the leg.
As investigations continue into the attacks, the trail has been closed.

The City of Mission Viejo said in a tweet, "Today, 2 different parties reported coyote bites to a human. MV Animal Services is working with the Department of Fish & Wildlife on this matter and a section of Jeronimo Open Space has been closed. Please be aware and vigilant when you are out where wildlife is prevalent."
Wittmer tried to fight the coyote off by hitting it with a water bottle.
She called 911 to get a ride to her car but was able to drive herself to the emergency room.
The coyote disappeared into the hills but officials are hoping to track it down and check it for rabies.
Meantime, Wittmer will undergo rabies treatments as a precaution over the next two weeks.
She said the scary encounter won't stop her from her early morning runs but that from now on, she'll choose a different spot.
The condition of the other coyote bite victim is unclear.
Majalisar Kolin Harkokin Shari'ar Musulunci Ta Najeriya Ta Kalubalanci Shekau.
A wani taron manema labarai da majalissar ta kira a Kaduna game da barazanar da Shekau ya yi a faifan bidiyon da ya fitar ta cewa lokaci ya yi da ya kamata Shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya farga.

Daya daga cikin manyan malaman addinin Musulunci a Najeriya, Sheik Abdulwahab Abdullahi Mohammad, ya kalubalanci Shugaban Kungiyar ta Boko Haram Abubakar Shekau game da faifan bidiyon da ya fitar cewa har in ya cika jarumi, to ya fito ya yi gaba-da-gaba da jami'an tsaro.
Wannan na zuwa a dai-dai lokacin da batun matsalar tsaro a Najeriya ke dada jan hankalin 'yan kasa musamman ganin irin barazanar tsaron da aka fuskanta a kasar cikin wannan wata na Fabarairu.
The Supreme Council for Islamic Affairs Challenges Shekau.
