At a press conference convened by the Council in Kaduna on Shekau's threats in a video released by her, it was time for President Muhammadu Buhari to wake up to these challenges.

One of Nigeria's leading Islamic scholars, Sheikh Abdulwahab Abdullahi Mohammad, has challenged Boko Haram leader Abubakar Shekau over a video he has released that states that if he indeed he is brave, he should come out from hiding and face security agents.
This comes at a time when the security situation in Nigeria continues to attract attention, especially given the security threats facing the country this February.
Najeriya ta karbi tallafin dala miliyan 890 don yaki da cututtuka daga 'Global Fund'.
Asusun bada tallafi na duniya "Global Fund" ya tallafawa gwamnatin Najeriya da dala miliyan 890 domin yaki da cututtuka a kasar.
Wadannan cututtuka sun hada da cutar kanjamau, zazzabin cizon sauro da tarin fuka.
Ministan kiwon lafiya Osagie Ehanire ya sanar da haka a makon da ya gabata a Abuja.
Ehanire ya ce samun wannan tallafi zai taimaka wajen inganta fannin kiwon lafiyar kasar nan musamman bangaren yaki da wadannan cututtuka da suka yi wa kasar nan katutu.
Idan ba a manta ba a watan Janairu 2020 Gwamnatin tarayya ta bayyana cewa za ta ciwo bashin dala miliyan 890 daga asusun duniya domin dakile yaduwar cututtuka a kasar nan.
Gwamnati ta ce za ta kashe wadannan kudade wajen yaki da cutar Kanjamau, Zazzabin Cizon Sauro da tarin fuka daga shekarar 2021 zuwa 2023.
Gwamnati ta ce yaki da zazzabin Cizon Sauro ne zai samu kaso mafi tsoka daga cikin wadannan kudade da ya kai dala miliyan 417, Kanjamau dala miliyan 329 sannan tarin fuka dala miliyan 143.
Ya kara da cewa gwamnati ta tsara matakan da za su taimaka mata wajen yadda kashe wadannan kudade yadda ya kamata ba tare da wani ko wasu sun yi sama da fadi da su ba.
Nigeria receives $ 890 million to fight against diseases from Global Fund
The Global Fund has provided $ 890 million to the Nigerian government to fight disease in the country.
These diseases include AIDS, malaria and tuberculosis.
Health Minister Osagie Ehanire made the announcement last week in Abuja.
Ehanire said the support would help improve the country's health sector, especially in the fight against these diseases.

It will be recalled that in January 2020 the Federal Government announced that it would incur a debt of $ 890 million from the International Monetary Fund to curb the spread of disease in the country.
The government has said it will spend the money to fight AIDS, Malaria and Tuberculosis from 2021 to 2023.
The government says the fight against malaria will receive the largest share of the $ 417 million, $ 329 million for HIV and $ 143 million for tuberculosis.
He added that the government has put in place measures to help it manage its finances more efficiently without any oversight.
Magu ya karyata zargin ya yi wa naira bilyan 329 ta NNPC sata-ta-saci-sata.
Dakataccen Shugaban Hukumar EFCC Ibrahim Magu, ya karyata wani sabon zargin cewa wai ya karkatar da wasu makudan kudi da ya kwato har naira bilyan 329 da aka sata a NNPC.
Lauyan sa Wahab Shittu ya ce Magu bayan ya kwato kudaden daga hannun manyan dillalan fetur, ya maida su a asusun NNPC din.
Wahab Shittu ya ce bayan Magu ya maida kudaden, har rasidin shaidar karbar kudaden NNPC ta bai wa NNPC.
Maganar gaskiya surutan wai Magu ya danne naira bilyan 329 na NNPC da ya karbo daga hannun manyan dillalan mai, zancen banza ne kawai.
Magu ya kwato kudin kuma ya maida su asusun NNPC ta hanyar "remita", har ma rasidi suka ba shi na shaidar karbar kudaden".
NNPC ce ta nemi EFCC ta kwato mata kudaden ta a hannun manyan dillalan mai.
Ta karbo kuma an maida kudin a asusun NNPC din.
Har rasidi na nan ajiye, a matsayin shaida.
Don haka ta ya za a ce Magu ya danne kudaden da ko asusun wani ba su shiga ba, sai kai-tsaye asusun NNPC?
Daga nan ya ce Magu ba zai kara zura ido ana kala masa kage da kazafi da sharri ba.
Duk zargin da aka yi masa zai rika maida raddi.
Duk wanda ya yi masa kan kara, zai yi masa na itace.
Dama cikin makon da ya gabata, Magu ya kalubalanci Malami da fito-na-fiton ya kawo shaida guda daya tal inda ya karbi toshiyar baki.
Cikin makon da ya gabata Malami ya sanar cewa an dakatar da Magu ne bisa umarnin Shugaba Muhammdu Buhari.
Yayin da Magu ya ke karyata zarge-zargen da aka yi masa, shi ma ya karkato akalar sa, inda ya rika fallasa zargin rugumutsin harkallar da ya Malami ya rika tsbkawa.
Magu denies theft allegations of 329 billion naira from NNPC - Tit for tat.
The suspended EFCC chairman, Ibrahim Magu, has denied new allegations that he misappropriated N329 billion stolen from NNPC.
His lawyer, Wahab Shittu, said after Magu recovered the money from the major oil dealers, he returned it to the NNPC account.
Wahab Shittu said after Magu returned the money, even the receipt of recovering the money was given to the EFCC by the NNPC.
In the actual sense, the allegation that Magu suppressed the 329 billion naira from NNPC that was recovered from major oil dealers is nonsense.
Magu recovered the money and returned it to the NNPC account through "remita", and even gave him a receipt for the receipt of the money".
The NNPC has asked the EFCC to recover its funds from major oil dealers.
It was recovered and the money was returned to the NNPC account.
Even the receipt was there as an evidence of proof.
So how can it be said that Magu suppressed funds that did not go to anyone else's account, except directly to the NNPC account?
He then said that Magu would no longer fold his arms and watch false allegations and slander against him.
He will respond to any allegation against him.
Whoever strikes him, he will strike back with vehemence
Earlier in the week, Magu challenged Malami to come up with a single piece of evidence where he accepted a bribe.
Last week, Malami announced that Magu had been suspended on the orders of President Muhammadu Buhari.
While Magu denies the allegations, he also open-up on exposing allegations of corruption against Malami.
"Ba na son in zama kamar McGregor in rika nuna cewa ina da kudi
Na zo nan ne don in taimaki mutane'- a cewar Chimaev bayan ya kafa tarihi gasar dambe na UFC da a ka yi a fight Island

Ana jinijinawa Khamzat Chimaev a matsayin tauraron gasar damben UFC na gaba bayan da ya kafa tarihi a tsibirin Fight Island sai dai dan daben kuma dan asalin kasar Rashaya ce ba shi da wani shiri na nuna kasaita da baza dukiya irin su Conor McGrgor

Chimaev ya na ragargaji dan asalin Ireland ta kudu Rhys Mckee a karwar da suka yi don cin kambin ajin matsakaita a Abu Dhabi a daren Asabar, a inda ya kaia abokin karawarsa kasa tare da yi masa rubdugiu da naushi mintuna 3 da dakika 5 a zagayen farko na karawarsu

Wannan nasara ce ta shigar da sunan Chimaev a cikin kundin tarihin wasana damben UFC ba wanda ya taba yin nasara a cikin lokaci kankani na karawa damben a wannan zamani na yayata abubuwa, wanda ke zuwa kwanki 10 kacal bayan da ya cinye John Phillips wani dan Britamiya ta irin wannan ragargazar - a kuma a irin wannan aji na matsakaita.

Zakaran dambe Chimaev wanda ya soke $50,000 a aljihunsa a matsayin kari na bajintar da ya yi a dambensu da McKee wanda hakan kuma ya sa hankalin kungiyar dambe ta MMA ta Duniya ta koma kansa, yana nuni da cewa shine zai zama mgajin 'Khabib 2.0 - wartakla wani kwatankwaci na dole ganin yadda Chimaev ya nuna irin wannan mamaya na gasar kambin UFC ajin marasa nauyi. An haife shi a Chechnya mai makwabtaka da Dagestani garin da Khabib ya fito.

Duk da wannan sabuwar daukaka da tarin dukiya, mai tattusar magana Chimaev ya ce ba zai yi facaka da nuna isa da dukiyar da ya samu ba irin yadda gwarzon MMA mai takama da kudi Connor Mcgregor ko kuma dan wasan damben boxing Floyd Mayweather Jr. suka yi ba
"Na yi hakan ba don kaina kawai ba, na yi hakan ne domin kowa da kowa da zan iya taimakawa."
Ni ba na son in zama irin su Mayweather da McGregor ba, in rika dagawa da facaka da kudi da sauransu.
I na so in taimakawa mutane, in ji Chimaev a lokacin da aka tambaye shi a tsibirin na Fight Island kan yadda zai kashe kyautar kudin davya samu.

Wani mutum da ya ja hankalinsa shi ne abokin damben Conor Mc Gregor kuma dan gani-kashe-nin dandanlin sada zumunta naTuwita, Dllon Danis, wanda ya hau dandalin yana mai ikirarin cewa zai iya dankwafar da Chimaev cikn sauki
Hakan gayyato kakkausar martani daga dan damben da ake yiwa lakabi da "Borz' ko kuma "kerkeci" a yarensa na Chechen - wanda ya ce sai "na hada masa jini da maijina ido rufe"

Chimaev wanda yanzu yake sana'ar dambensa a wajen Stockholm ta kasar Sweden, ya bar kasar ne yana dan shekara 19, zai yi kankan da kai wajen taka tsan tsan a harkar kudi, amma ba shi da dama idan aka zo da maganar dambe.
"Zan iya ragargazar kowa...
'yan damben nawa ne a ajin matsakaita?
Duk sai in ragargaje su, "yana mai cewa.
"Ba ni zakaran nauyin Kilo 77 (ajinna kusa da matsakaita), zakaran nauyin masu kilo 64 (Ajin matsakaita) zan iya yi musu raga-raga dukkanninsu a rana daya"
'I don't want to be like McGregor and show my money...
I'm here to help people' - Chimaev after making history on UFC Fight Island - RT Sport News

Khamzat Chimaev is being hailed as a UFC star-in-waiting after making history on Fight Island, but the Russian-born fighter says he is not planning any ostentatious displays of wealth similar to the likes of Conor McGregor.

Chimaev overwhelmed Northern Ireland's Rhys McKee in their welterweight contest in Abu Dhabi on Saturday night, finishing his opponent with a ground-and-pound barrage 3 minutes and 9 seconds into the first round.

The win ensured Chimaev etched his name into the UFC history books by claiming the shortest-ever period between victories in the modern era of the promotion, coming just 10 days after he defeated Britain's John Phillips in similarly destructive fashion - on that occasion at middleweight.

The 8-0 Chimaev pocketed a $50,000 Performance-of-the-Night bonus for his work against McKee and has firmly earned the attention of the MMA world, being tipped as 'Khabib 2.0' - a perhaps inevitable comparison given Chimaev displays a similar oppressive dominance to the UFC lightweight champ, and was born in Chechnya, which neighbors Khabib's own Dagestani homeland.

Despite the newfound fame and financial boost, the softly-spoken Chimaev said he would not be prone to shows of wealth along the lines of MMA money-man Conor McGregor or his boxing equivalent Floyd Mayweather Jr.
"I do this not only for me, I do this for everybody I can help.
I don't want to be like Mayweather and McGregor, to show my money or something like that.
I want to help people," replied Chimaev when asked on Fight Island about how he would spend his bonus.
One man he has gained the attention of is Conor McGregor teammate and arch Twitter protagonist Dillon Danis, who took to the platform to claim he could submit Chimaev "easily."
That drew a withering response from the fighter known as 'Borz' - or 'wolf' in his native Chechen - who said he would "smash Danis with his eyes closed."

Chimaev, who now fights out of Stockholm, Sweden, having moved to the country at the age of 19, may be modest in displaying his financial ambitions but is distinctly less shy when it comes to his fighting prospects.
"I can smash everybody...
How many fighters in the welterweight division?
I can smash all of them," he said.
"Give me 77 kilos (welterweight) champion, 84 kilos (middleweight) champion, I'm going to smash both of them, same day."
Na Fuskanci Kalubale Kafin Zakulo Zulum Ya Gaje Ni - Shettima.

Tsohon Gwamnan Jihar Borno kuma Sanata mai wakiltar Borno ta Tsakiya a zauren Majalisar Dattijan Nijeriya, Alhaji Kashim Shettima, ya yi cikakken bayani kan irin kalubalen da ya fuskanta kafin ya kai ga iya zakulo gwamna mai ci a Jihar ta Borno, Farfesa Babagana Umara Zulum, a matsayin wanda zai gaje shi a kujerar da zai bari ta gwamnan jihar a zaben 2019. Inda ya ce, ya nemi dan siyasa mai gaskiya da rikon amana ne.

Shettima ya sanar da hakan ne a sa'ilin da ya ke gabatar da wata kasida a taron da gamayyar kungiyoyin da matasa su ka shirya (Coalition of Youths Groups) a Birnin Kebbi, babban birnin Jihar Kebbi, mai taken "Cigaban Matasa Da Iyayen Gida: Kwaikwayo Daga Manyan Arewa".
"Gwamna Babagana Zulum jajirtaccen mutum ne fiye da ni, wanda kuma zabar sa a matsayin magajin ba abu ne na son ran mutum daya ba, face ra'ayin baki ɗayan al'ummar Jihar Borno", in ji shi.

Haka kuma, tsohon gwamnan ya shawarci shugabanni a Nijeriya da cewa, kada su manta cewa, mulki amana ce da Allah Sarki ya damka wa mutum, inda ya kara da cewa, "kuma ku dauke shi a matsayin lokaci ne, kuma ranar lahira za a tambaye ku a kan duk abinda ku ka aikata a wannan lokacin".
A matsayinka na shugaba, dole mu kula cewa abin kwaikwayo ne, ya dace mu koyar da masu tasowa makoma ta gari, saboda ba za mu tabbata har abada ba.
Har wala yau kuma, Sanata Shettima ya yi wanka da kamar jirwaye dangane da yadda wasu masu rike da madafun iko ke wasa da damarsu, kuma ya ce, kila hakan ya na da alaka da giyar mulki.
A hannu guda kuma ya nuna matukar damuwa da irin yadda wasu matasa ke zaune kara-zube ta fannin neman ilimi ko sana'ar dogaro da kai.
Ya nuna cewa, akwai bukatar matasa su mike tsaye wajen neman ilimi, wanda hakan ne kadai zai ba su cikakkiyar damar gudanar da kasar nan zuwa ga tudun-mun-tsira.
Haka zalika kuma, Shettima ya bukaci inganta hanyoyin cikin gida wajen bunkasa ci gaban tsarin tattalin arziki da rage matsalolin rashin aiki a kasa baki daya.
I Faced Challenges Before I identified Zulum to Succeed me - Shettima

Former Governor of Borno State and Senator representing Central Borno in the Nigerian Senate, Alhaji Kashim Shettima, has detailed the challenges he faced before he was able to identify the incumbent Governor of Borno State, Prof. Babagana Umara Zulum, as his successor in the seat he will leave by the state governor in the 2019 elections He said he was looking for a politician who was honest and trustworthy.

Shettima made the announcement while delivering a keynote address at the Coalition of Youths Groups in Kebbi, the capital of Kebbi State, entitled "Youth and Family Development." : Imitation from the Great North ".
"Governor Babagana Zulum is a brave man more than me, and his election as successor is not a matter of personal preference, but of the people of Borno State as a whole," he said.

The former governor also advised leaders in Nigeria not to forget that power is a trust given to man by God the Almighty, adding, "and take it as a matter of time, and the hereafter will be ask you about everything you did during that time ".
As a leader, you must take into account that you are a role model, we should rightly educate this generation for a bright future, because we can not be here forever.
Furthermore, Senator Shettima has taken a swipe at how some in people in government are misusing their opportunity, he added this has to do with power obsession.
On the other hand, he expressed concern over the lack of education and self-employment for some young people.
He pointed out that there is the need for young people to strive for education, which will enable them lift the country to a greater height
Shettima also called for improved domestic measures to boost the economy and reduce unemployment in the country as a whole.
RANARWASA: Ranar karshe ta gasar firmiya; juve zai dauki kanbi
Duba da irin abubuwan da ke faruwa a gasar kwallon kafa ta Nahiyar Turai a ranar Lahadi:

Rana ce ta karshe a kakar gasar wasannin kwallon kafa kuma da akwai abubuwa da yawa suke kan gaba: gasar zakarun turai da kuma gasar fidda gwani na cin kofin Europa, da gurabe biyu na karshe a gudun yada kanin wani, da kuma takalmin zinare da na wanda ya fi cin kwallo.

Kungiyar Kwallon kafa ta Manchester United, da Chelsea, da kuma Leicester na fafatawa kan sauran gurabe biyu na gasar wasan zakarun fidda gwani na champions league a bayan zakaru Liverpool da masu mara musu baya Manchester city.
Kungoyin guda biyu da mak daya ne ya raba tsakninsu yayin da kungiyar Leicester ta karbi bakuncin United.
Wolverhampton da Tottenham na fafaftawa don kaiwa ga matakin karshe a gurbin gasan wasanEuropa.
Aston Villa da Watford da kuma Bournemouth tuni suna ta neman kaucewa gurabe biyu da suka rage na koma baya, wanda tuni wacce Norwhich take wannan matsayin.

Da sauran wasa daya tak da ya rage musu, dan kulob din Leicester Jamie Vardy shine kan gaba a cin kwallaye 23, a inda ya zarta Danny Ings na Southampton da biyu, ya kuma ba dan Arsenal Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang rata da kwallaye uku.
Wasannin share fage na tallata gasar ta firimiya ta soma ne da Swansea a inda ta karbi bakuncina Brentford a bugun farko na wasansu na zagayen kusa da na karshe.
Fulham ta kara da Cardiff a wata karawa ta kusa da na karshe somawa daga ranar Litinin.
Leeds da West Bromwich tuni likkafarsu ta daga, daga gurbi na biyu a gasar fidda zakaru.
Kungiyar Juventus za ta iya maimata lashe gasar serie A wanda ta ke yi a karo na tara a jere da doke kungiyar Sampdoria.
Wannan zai fitar da Bianconeri da maki bakwai akan Intermilan masu mataki na biyu da wasannin biyu ne kadai suka rage musu.
A can karshen jerin kungiyoyin, Lecce na bukatar ta doke Bologna domin ta inganta damanmakinta da zai kautar da ita daga faduwa.
Kungiyar na maki hudu kasa da Genoa wacce take mataki na 17, wacce ta buga wasanni da yawa.
MATCHDAY: Final day of Premier League; Juve can seal title
A look at what's happening around European soccer on Sunday:
It's the last day of the season and plenty is still at stake: Champions League and Europa League qualification, the final two relegation places, and the Golden Boot scoring trophy.
Manchester United, Chelsea and Leicester are fighting for the remaining two Champions League qualification positions behind champion Liverpool and second-place Manchester City.
The three teams are separated by one point and Leicester hosts United.
Wolverhampton and Tottenham are battling for a finish in the Europa League spots.
Aston Villa, Watford and Bournemouth are looking to avoid the two remaining relegation spots alongside already-demoted Norwich.
With one game left, Leicester's Jamie Vardy is the top scorer with 23 goals, two ahead of Southampton's Danny Ings and three clear of Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
The playoffs for promotion to the Premier League begin with Swansea hosting Brentford in the first leg of their semifinal.
Fulham plays Cardiff in the other semifinal starting Monday.
Leeds and West Bromwich have already been promoted from the second-tier Championship.
Juventus can win a record-extending ninth successive Serie A title with a win over Sampdoria.
That would take the Bianconeri seven points clear of second-placed Inter Milan with two matches remaining.
At the other end of the table, Lecce needs a win at Bologna to boost its chances of avoiding relegation.
Lecce is four points below 17th-placed Genoa, which has played a game more.
Na Cika Alkawari, Cewar Minista Sadiya - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Ministar Harkokin Agaji Da Jinkai, Hajiya Sadiya Umar Farouk, ta bayyana cewa a yanzu sabuwar Hukumar Nakasassu ta kasa, wato "National Disability Commission", ta riga ta kafu bayan amincewa da nada shugabannin ta da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya yi a ranar Litinin, 24 ga Agusta, 2020.

A cikin wata sanarwa da hadimar ta a bangaren aikin jarida, Hajiya Halima Oyelade, ta bayar a ranar Alhamis, ministar ta ce tun daga nadin ta a bara ta sha alwashin tabbatar da ganin an kafa wannan Hukumar Nakasassu ta kasa kuma ta fara aiki.

Ta ce, wannan ranar farin ciki ce a gare ni wadda buri na ya cika, ganin cewa wani sashe na mutane masu matukar bukatar tallafi wadanda na ke jin tausayin su, a karshe sun samu hukuma tasu ta kan su, har an nada mata shugabanni wadanda za su tafiyar da al'amurran ta.
Kuma ta kare hakkokin su, sannan ta sama masu kyakkyawan yanayi da za su inganta rayuwar su har su bada tasu gudunmawar ga cigaban al'umma baki daya.
Ministar ta mika godiyar ta ga Shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari saboda rattaba hannu da ya yi kan Dokar Hana Nuna Wariya Ga Nakasassu ta Shekarar 2019 a bara, wadda ta bada damar a kafa hukumar.

Sadiya Umar Farouk ta ce,ta hanyar amincewa da nadin shugaba da Babban Sakatare da sauran membobin cibiyar gudanarwar hukumar, Shugaban kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya kara nuna sadaukarwar sa ga batun inganta rayuwar mutane marasa galihu a Nijeriya, kuma ya ba su damar su ma su ci moriyar dukkan hakkokin su a matsayin su na yan Nijeriya.
Ta taya murna ga nakasassun da ke Nijeriya wadanda ta ce yawan su ya kai mutum miliyan 30 saboda wannan babbar nasara da aka samu.
Kuma ta yi kira a gare su da su yi amfani da wannan dama da aka sama masu.

Hajiya Sadiya ta ce ta na taya murna ga ƴan uwa maza da mata wadanda ke rayuwa da wata nakasa a Nijeriya saboda wannan cikar buri, kuma ta na kira a gare da su yi amfani da damar samun wannan hukuma wajen hada kan su domin gina rayuwa mai albarka.
Har ila yau, ministar ta taya murna ga shugabannin hukumar da aka nada tare da yin kira a gare su da su yi aiki tukuru.
Ta ce, ta na taya su murna sosai, kuma ta na kira a gare su da su dauki wannan wannan nadi na su a matsayin wata dama da su ka samu ta zama shugabanni na farko na hukumar.

Domin haka ta bukaci su shimfida fandeshi mai karko na hukumar, tare da tunanin cewa samun ingancin rayuwar mutum sama da miliyan 30 da ke fama da nakasa a Nijeriya yanzu ya danganta kan yadda su ka aiwatar da aikin su.
Da zarar Majalisar Dattawa ta amince da nadin, hukumar za ta shiga aiki gadan-gadan, inji ta.

Minista Sadiya ta ce, ayyukan hukumar sun hada da fito da tsare-tsare da manufofin da su ka dace tare da aiwatar da su domin ilmantar da nakasassu da kyautata rayuwar su, tsara hanyoyin inganta rayuwar nakasassu, da kuma kyautata rayuwar su ta hanyar sauya tunanin mutane su daina yi wa nakasassu kallon banza.
I have kept my promise, says Minister Sadiya - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

The Minister of Relief and Humanitarian Affairs, Hajiya Sadiya Umar Farouk, has announced that the new National Disability Commission has been established following the approval of the appointment of its principal officers by President Muhammadu Buhari on Monday 24 August, 2020.

In a statement issued by her press secretary, Hajiya Halima Oyelade, on Thursday, the minister said since her appointment last year, she had pledged to ensure the establishment and take off of the National Council for the Disabled.

She said: "This is a happy day for me. My dream has come true. A group of people who are in dire need of support and whom I feel sorry for, have finally found their own government establishment and have principal officers appointed to run its affairs.
It protects their rights, and provides them with a conducive environment that will improve their lives and contribute to the development of society as a whole.
The minister thanked President Muhammadu Buhari for signing the Anti-Discrimination Act 2019, which allowed the commission to be set up.

Sadiya Umar Farouk said that by approving the appointment of the President, Secretary General and other members of the Board of Directors, President Muhammadu Buhari reaffirmed his commitment to improving the lives of the underprivileged in Nigeria and empowering them to succeed. enjoy all their rights as Nigerians.
She congratulated the disabled people in Nigeria who she said numbered 30 million for this great achievement.
She urged them to take advantage of this opportunity.

Hajia Sadiya said she congratulated her brothers and sisters living with disabilities in Nigeria for this achievement, and called on them to take advantage of this opportunity to work together to build a blissful and better life.
The minister also congratulated the appointed principal officers and called on them to work hard.
She said she congratulated them and called on them to take this appointment as an opportunity to become the first to steer the affairs of the commission.

She therefore urged them to lay a solid foundation for the commission, considering that the quality of life of more than 30 million people with disabilities in Nigeria now depends on how well they carry out their work.
Once the Senate approves the appointment, the commission will commence work immediately, she said.

Minister Sadiya said the agency's work includes developing appropriate policies and programs and implementing them to educate the disabled and improve their lives, formulate ways to improve the lives of the disabled, and improve their lives by changing their mindset people to stop looking at the disabled in vain.
Babbar Kasuwar Sin Tana Kara Jawo Hankalin Ƴan Kasuwar Kasa Da Kasa.

Roy, manajan nazari da raya kamfanin samar da kayayyakin madara na Theland dake kasar New Zealand ya bayyana cewa, "Duk da cewa, ana fuskantar matsaloli, amma tabbas za mu je birnin Shanghai domin halartar bikin CIIE, wato bikin baje kolin kayayyakin da ake shigowa da su kasar Sin karo na uku".
Hakika lokaci ya yi na nuna ra'ayin yan kasuwar ketare wadanda suka zo nan kasar Sin domin halartar bikin CIIE, yayin da suke fama da tasirin da annobar cutar COVID-19 ke haifarwa.

A yammacin yau, an kaddamar da bikin CIIE karo na uku bisa shirin da aka tsara, wannan babban aikin tattalin arziki da kasuwanci shi ne na daban da aka shirya a kasar Sin, tun bayan bikin hada-hadar ba da hidimomin kasa da kasa na kasar Sin da aka shirya a watan Satumban da ya gabata.
Baya ga kasancewar bikin ya nuna wa al'ummun kasa da kasa sakamakon da kasar Sin ta samu wajen dakile annobar COVID-19, yana kuma ingiza farfadowar tattalin arzikin duniya.
A cikin shekaru uku da suka gabata, wannan dandalin na hadin gwiwar dake tsakanin kasa da kasa mai matsayin koli, ya samu ci gaba a bayyane.

Alal misali, fadin cibiyar nune-nune ya kara karuwa da mubara'in mita kusan dubu 30, kuma fadin wuraren nune-nune na manyan kamfanoni 500 mafiya girma a duniya shi ma ya karu da kaso 14 bisa dari, a cikinsu, kamfanoni sama da goma sun halarci bikin ne a karo na farko.
An lura cewa, wuraren nune-nunen kayayyakin kiwon lafiya, da magungunan sha sun fi jawo hankalin jama'a, musamman wuraren da aka kebe domin nuna kayayyakin dakile annobar cuta mai yaduwa.

A sa'i daya kuma, a karo na farko za a sayar da kayayyakin ta kafar bidiyo kai tsaye, inda za a gayyaci shahararrun taurarin yanar gizo domin su yi talla, ta yadda masu sayayya za su sayi kayayyakin kasa da kasa masu inganci ta kafar bidiyo kamar yadda suke so.
Hakika bikin CIIE na kasar Sin yana rika jawo hankalin "yan kasuwar kasa da kasa a cikin shekaru uku da suka gabata.

Manyan kamfanoni 500 mafiya girma a duniya wadanda suka rika halartar bikin sun kai kaso 70 bisa dari, dalilin da ya sa haka shi ne, sun samu riba mai tsoka a bikin, har ma suna sa ran za su shiga babbar kasuwar kasar Sin a wannan shekara, wadda ke cikin yanayi na musamman.
Ban da haka, dalilin da ya sa bikin ke kara jawo hankalin yan kasuwar kasa da kasa shi ne, kokarin da kasar Sin take yi wajen bude kofarta ga ketare.
Tun farkon bana, gwamnatin kasar Sin ta fitar da sabbin manufofi a jere, domin kyautata muhallin kasuwanci.

Yanzu haka babbar kasuwar kasar Sin wadda ke da yawan al'ummun biliyan 1.4, tana taryar manyan baki daga kasa da kasa ta dandalin bikin CIIE, inda ake sa ran zai ingiza farfadowar tattalin arzikin duniya.
China's biggest market is attracting more international investors.

Roy, research and development manager at Theland Dairy Factory, in New Zealand, he said: "Although we are facing difficulties, but we will definitely be going to Shanghai to attend the CIIE, China's third import fair and exhibition".
It is indeed time to express the views of foreign entrepreneurs who have come to China to attend the CIIE, as they struggle with the effects of the COVID-19 epidemic.

The third CIIE festival was launched this afternoon according to the plan, this major economic and trade project is the only one to be held in China since the country's International Service Fair. China scheduled last September.
In addition to showing the international community China's achievements in curbing COVID-19, the festival is also contributing to the global economic recovery.
Over the past three years, this forum of high-level international cooperation has made significant progress.

For example, the size of the exhibition center has increased by almost 30,000 square meters, and the size of the exhibition space of the world's 500 largest companies has also increased by 14 percent, among them, more than one company. ten attended the ceremony for the first time.
It was noted that the exhibitions of health products and medicines are the most popular, especially those set aside for exhibiting products to prevent the spread of the epidemic.

At the same time, for the first time, the products will be sold directly on video, where popular celebrities will be invited to advertise, so that shoppers can buy high quality international products via videos as they wish.
For sure the event of CIIE in china it also contribute in making them show their interest, international businessmen for the past three years.

The world's 500 largest companies attended the event with 70 percent, which is why they made huge profits from the festival, and even expect to enter China's biggest market this year, which is in a special case.
In addition, the festival is attracting more and more international investors because of China's efforts to open up to the outside world.
Since the beginning of this year, the Chinese government has issued a series of new policies to improve the business environment.
China's largest market, with a population of 1.4 billion, is currently attracting international dignitaries through the CIIE, which is expected to push for global economic recovery.
Mutum 50 ne za'a basu Izini shiga Masallatan a Karnataka a ranar Idi, Babu taron jama'a a ranar Sallar
Sallar idin Layya wacce ake kira Bakrid za a yi ta ne a ranakun 31 ga watan Yuli da kuma ranar 1 ga watan Agusta.

Gwamnatin Karnataka ta kyalle gudanar da Sallar idin Layya kadai a masalltan da yawan jama'ar bai wuce mutane 50 ba a lokaci guda ta kuma ce yin sallar jam'i a Eidgha ya haramta sakamakon barkewar annobar cutar Koronabirus.
Mutanen da ke zuwa masallatai don yin sallah a jam'i sai sun sa takunkumi sun kuma nisanci juna a sahun, a cewar AB Ibrahim Sakataren Sashen Kula da Walwala da waƙafi a wata doka.

Dokar ta kuma ce Kwamitin halal ya zartar da cewa Sallar Idin Layya wacce ake kira da Bakrid za yi ta ne a ranar 31 ga watan Yuli a gudundumin Udupi, da Dakshina, da Kannada da kuma Kodagu yayin da za a yi idin ne a ranar 1 ga watan Agusta a sauran jihohin.
La'akari da cewa sallar jam'i na da daya daga cikin muhimman ibadun da Musulmi ke yi a bikin Bakrid, dokar ta ce la'akari da bullar annobar cutar COVID 19.
Sai dai za a kyale yin Sallah a masallacin da jama'ar cikinsa ba su wuce sama da mutum 50 ba.
Idan yawansu ya fi haka sai dai su Sallar rukuni-rukuni. in ji hukumar a cikin dokar da ta bayar.
Ba kuma za a yi sallat a wasu wurare ba kamar dakunan taro da ire-irensu da kuma "Shadi-mahad" a cewar dokar.
Karnataka ta kyale masu zuwa bauta a sauran wasu wuraren ibada da za a iya budewa ga mabiya wadannan addinai daga ranar 8 ga watan Yuni tar da daukan dukkanin matakai na kariya akan COVID-19.
50 People To Be Allowed In Mosques On Eid, No Mass Prayers In Eidgah: Karnataka
Eid-ul-Azha, also known as Bakrid, would be celebrated on July 31 and August 1.

The Karnataka government has allowed Eid-ul-Azha prayers only in mosques with a maximum of 50 people at a time and said mass prayers at Eidgah and other places are prohibited in view of the coronavirus pandemic.
People visiting mosques for the prayers have to wear face masks and maintain social distancing, Minority Welfare and Wakf Department Secretary AB Ibrahim said in an order.

It said the Hilal committee has decided that the Eid-ul- Azha, also known as Bakrid, would be celebrated on July 31 in Udupi, Dakshina Kannada and Kodagu districts while it would be on August 1 in the rest of the state.
Noting that mass prayers were one of the important rituals Muslims perform during Bakrid, the order said in view of the COVID-19 pandemic such events at Eidgah and other places were prohibited.
However, prayers would be allowed in mosques with the restriction that not more than 50 people should take part.
If there were more people, the prayers should be performed in batches, the department said in the order.
Mass prayers should not be performed in any other places such as halls, community buildings and "Shadi Mahal," the order added.
Karnataka allowed temples, mosques and other places of worship to be open for devotees from June 8 with all COVID-19 preventive measures in place.
Sarkin Musulmi Ya Gana Da Gwamna El-Rufai.
Kusan awanni 24 bayan tsohon sarkin Kano, Muhammadu Sanusi ya hadu da Gwamna Nasir El'rufai, Mai Alfarma Sarkin Musulmi HRH Sa'id Abubakar III shima ya ziyarci gwamnan.
Sarkin Musulmi ya isa Gidan Gwamnatin Sir Kashim Ibrahim ne da misalin karfe 12:20 na ranar Litinin a cikin wata bakar mota mai suna SUV.
Sakataren gwamnatin jihar, Balarabe Abbas, Shugaban ma'aikata Muhammad Sani Dattijo, kwamishinan tsaro na cikin gida da kuma harkokin cikin gida, Samuel Aruwan suka tarbe shi.
Kwamishinan kananan hukumomi na jihar Jafaru Sani Ibrahim shima yana daga cikin jama'an da suka tarbi Sarkin.
In ba a manta ba dai, a ranar lahadin da ta gabata ne dubun nan mutane suka yi maraba da tsohon sarkin Kano Muhammadu Sanusi II domin ziyarar da ya kawo gidan gwamnatin jihar.
Sai dai rahoton ya nuna cewa, sarkin Musulmin ya kawo ziyara ne ga gwamna Nasiru El-rufa'i domin tattauna batun tsaron yankin kudancin Kaduna.
Yankin na kudancin Kaduna, ya dade ana yawan samun tashin hankula a yankin tsakanin kabilu mazauna yankin.
Sultan Meets Governor El-Rufai.
Nearly 24 hours after the former Emir of Kano, Muhammadu Sanusi met Governor Nasir El'rufai, His Highness the Sultan of Sokoto HRH Sa'id Abubakar III also visited the governor.
The Sultan arrived at the Sir Kashim Ibrahim Government House around 12:20 on Monday in a black SUV.
He was received by the Secretary to the State Government, Balarabe Abbas, the Chief of Staff, Muhammad Sani Dattijo, and the Commissioner for Homeland Security, Samuel Aruwan.
Jafaru Sani Ibrahim, State Commissioner for Local Government was also among those who welcomed the Emir.
It will be recalled that, last Sunday tens of thousands of people welcomed former Emir of Kano Muhammadu Sanusi II on his state visit.
According to the report, the Sultan paid a courtesy call on Governor Nasiru El-rufa'i to discuss security in southern Kaduna.
The southern part of Kaduna has long been a hotbed of inter-ethnic violence.
Rahotanni na cewa Amurka na matsin lamba 'yan kwangilar Nord Stream 2- RT labaran kasuwanci

Gwamnatin Amurka ta sake wani yunkuri na tilastawa wasu kamfanonin Turai da sua watsar da aikin da Russia ta ke jagoranta na shimfida butun iskar Gas na Nord Stream 2, Welt am Sonntag ce ta bayara da rahoton, tana mai bayar da misalai da mutanen da ke da masaniyar tattaunawa kan batun.

A cewar jaridar, Jami'ai daga ofishin kula da harkokin waje na Amurka, da kuma ofishin Baitul mali, da Ma'aikatar kula da makamashi sun tunkari 'yan kwangilar Tarayyar Turai da su tattabatar sun fahimci abin da ka zai iaya faruwea da su idan suka cigaba da yin aikin.
Kusan Jami'an Amurka sama da dozin ne aka bayar da labarin cewa sun tattauna akalla sau biyu ta yanar gizo da wakilan kamfanonin a 'yan kwanakin nan.
Yayin da yake magana cikin "sakin fuska" bangaren da Amurka ya jaddada cewa ya na so ne ya hana kammala aikina Nord Stream2, a cewar wasu masu sa ido kan tattaunawar.
"Na yi imani cewa barazanar da gasken-gaske ce ", a cewar daya daga cikinsu ga kafar yada labaran ta harshen Jamusanci.

Wadannan baraza sun zo daidai da wasu kalamai na Sakataren kula da harkokin waje na Amurka Mike Pompeo a makon da ya wuce, a inda ya ke gargadin cewa kamfanonin da suke cikin wannan aiki su "gaggauta fice yanzu" ko kuma su fuskanci hukuncia a karkashina sashi na 232 na dokar Kalubalantar Masu Adawa da Manufofin Amurka ta Hanyar Takunkumi (CAATSA).
Baya ga babban kamfanin samar da Makamashi na kasar Russia Gazprom wanda kan gaba a aikin, wasu kamfanoni da kasashen Turai sun shiga cikin aikin.
Kamfanonin su ne Engie na kasar Faransa OMV na Austria, da Royal Dutch Shell na UK- Dutch, sannan da Wintershall da kuma na kasar Jamus Uniper.

Yayin wata hira da ya yi da Welt am Sonntag, jaridar na mai cewa kokarin Amurkla na zagon kasa ga "muhimmin aikin samar da kayan more rayuwa" kutse ne cikin kwarya-kwaryar 'yancin gashin kai kasashen Turai.

A farkon makon nan dai, Majalisar Wakili Amurka ta amince da wani gyara a dokar Izinin Tsaro ta Kasa wacce aka fadada don shigo da takunkumi kan kamfanonin da ke cikin aikin samar da bututun iskar Gas na Russia na Nord Stream 2.

A cewar daya daga cikin wadanda suka gabartar da kudurin, matakan da za a dauka zai shafi kamfanoni ne da ke samar da, ko taimakawa jiragen ruwa, ko inshora ko kayan sukewa da dukar kaya a bakin gabar ruwa, ko turkewa da kulawa na wadannan jiragen, da kuma wadanda suke bayar da takardar shaidar inganacin aiki na Nord Stream 2.

Dukkannin harkokin kasuwanci na kasashen Turai da jami'an gwamnatoci sun yi ta Allah wadai da kokarin da Amurka ke yi na katsaladan a harkokin samar da makamashi na kasashen Turai ta hanyar saka takunkumi kan aikin Nord Stream2, wanda har wasu sun yi kira ga Brussels da soma tunanin matakan ramuwar gayya.
Mascow ma ta yiwa Washington kaca-kaca tana mai kiran wannan mataki da cewa karfa-karfe ne.

A farkon makon nan ne dai, Dmitry Presko wani mai magana da yawun shugaban kasa ke cewa Russia za ta fito da wani sabonn tsari na yadda za ta kammala aikin idan har Washington ta ci gaba da wannnan mataki mai azabtarwa.
US reportedly ramps up pressure on Nord Stream 2 contractors - RT Business News

The US government has made further attempts to force European firms to ditch the Russian-led Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline project, Welt am Sonntag reported, citing people familiar with talks on the issue.

According to the newspaper, officials from US Department of State, the Treasury Department, as well as the Department of Energy approached European contractors to make sure they fully understand the consequences of staying in the project.
Up to a dozen officials reportedly held at least two online conferences with representatives of the firms in recent days.
Speaking in a "friendly" manner, the US side stressed that it wanted to prevent completion of Nord Stream 2, observers of the online talks said.
"I believe the threat is very, very serious," one of them revealed to the German outlet.

Those threats are consistent with comments by US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo last week, in which he warned that companies involved in the project had better "get out now" or risk facing penalties under Section 232 of the notorious Countering America's Adversaries Through Sanctions Act (CAATSA).
Apart from Russia's energy major Gazprom, which is developing the project, five European companies have joined.
Those are France's Engie, Austria's OMV, the UK-Dutch company Royal Dutch Shell, as well as Wintershall and Germany's Uniper.
Speaking to Welt am Sonntag, the latter called US attempts to undermine the "important infrastructure project" a clear intervention into European sovereignty.

Earlier this week, the US House of Representatives approved an amendment to the National Defense Authorization Act, meant to expand US sanctions on companies involved in installing Russia's Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline.

According to one of the sponsors of the bill, the measures can target companies facilitating or providing vessels, insurance, port facilities, or tethering services for those vessels, as well as to those providing certification for Nord Stream 2.

Both European businesses and government officials have repeatedly decried US attempts to meddle in European energy policy by sanctioning Nord Stream 2, with some even calling on Brussels to work on countermeasures.
Moscow has also lambasted Washington's move, calling it unfair competition.
Earlier this week, presidential spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that Russia will develop a new strategy for completion of the project if Washington proceeds with new punitive measures.
Kumburin ciki: Wasu hanyoyi da za ka rage radadi ya hada shan kwayar Anise
Alkarsa ga cutar damuwa ba arashi ba ne.

Mutanen da ke dauke da cutarIBS, wata cuta wacce alamunta shine ciwon murdewar ciki, kumburin ciki, tusa, wuyar fitar bahaya da kuma gudawa a kai-a kai, na fama da faduwar gaba da damuwa, wanda hakan zai iya tazarra alamomin cutar, a cewar Kungiyar masu fama da cutar damuwa da kuma faduwar gaba ta Amurka (ADAA).
"Saboda wani bangare na babban hanji yana karbar umarni daga jijiyoyi masu isar da sakonnni wadanda da zarar sun samu sako na damuwa sai su kai dauki" A cewar wani bayani na kugiyar ADAA.
Idan kumburin cikin naka ya cigaba, hakan na iya zama wata alama ce ta rashin karbar abincin da ya shiga cikinka.
Stomach bloating: Tips to reduce pain include taking anise
The link to depression is not coincidental.

People living with IBS, a disorder characterised by abdominal pain, cramping, bloating, gas, constipation, and diarrhoea, frequently suffer from anxiety and depression, which can worsen symptoms, according to the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA).
"That's because the colon is in part controlled by the nervous system, which responds to stress," explains the ADAA.
If your bloating still persists, it could be a sign of a food intolerance.
Malaysia na neman 'yan Rohingya 24 da ake zaton sun nutse daga wajenn tsibirin

Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (AP) - Mahukuntan Malaysia sun fada jiya Lahadi cewa suna neman wasu ‘yan gudun hijira‘ yan kabilar Rohingya su kimanin dozin biyu wadanda ake fargabar sun nutse bayan sun tsalle daga kwale-kwalensu daga tsibirin shakatawa na arewacin Langkawi.

Zawawi Abdullah, wani babban jami’i a hukumar tabbatar da bin dokar ruwa ta Malaysia, ya ce bayanan ‘yan sanda na farko sun nuna cewa mutum daya ne kawai daga cikin‘ yan Rohingya 25 da suka yi tsalle daga kwale-kwalen ya yi nasarar yin iyo har ya kai gaɓar teku.
Wanda ya tsira shi kadai ya nemi taimako daga 'yan sanda da yammacin ranar Asabar kuma an tsare shi don ci gaba da bincike, in ji Zawawi.
Dubun dubatar musulmin Rohingya sun tsere daga Myanmar saboda wata mamaya da sojojin kasar suka kai musu, kuma da yawa suna zaune ne a sansanonin ‘yan gudun hijira da ke cunkoson mutane a Bangladesh.
Kasar Malesiya da Musulmai suka fi yawa ta kasance wani wuri da jiragen ruwan da masu fataucin mutane ke shiryawa ke yi wa ‘yan gudun hijirar romn baka na samun kyakkyawar rayuwa a kasashen waje.
Zawawi ya ce an tura jiragen ruwa biyu da kuma jirgin sama a binciken da ake na wadanda suka nutsen.
Ya ce hukumar za ta kuma fadakar da masunta na cikin gida da hukumomin makwabciyar kasar Thailand don taimakawa wajen binciken.
Bai bayar da wani karin bayani ba dangane da jirgin ruwan 'yan gudun hijirar ba.

A watan da ya gabata, hukumomin Malaysia sun tsare ‘yan gudun hijirar Rohingya 269 kuma sun gano wata gawa a cikin jirgin da ake zargi na fasakwaurin ne nesa daga Langkawi wanda suka ce da gangan aka lalata shi don a kara juya shi zuwa teku.
Daga baya Hukumar tabbatar da bin dokar ruwa ta Malaysia ta ce mutanen 269 an sauke su ne daga wani babban jirgi wanda aka yi imanin cewa mutane da dama sun mutu kuma an jefa gawarwakinsu cikin teku.
Firayim Minista Muhyiddin Yassin ya ce Malaysia ba za ta iya karbar wasu karin 'yan gudun hijirar Rohingya ba yayin da take fama da koma bayan tattalin arziki saboda bullar annobar cutar Koronabirus.
Amma yace wadanda suke kasar ba za mayar da su cikin Teku ba.

Malaysia ta kasance gida ga sama da baƙin haure miliyan 2 da kuma wasu 'yan gudun hijira 180,000 da masu neman mafaka - gami da' yan Rohingya 101,000 - waɗanda suka yi rajista da hukumar kula da 'yan gudun hijira ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya.
Malaysia searches for 24 Rohingya feared drowned off island

KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia (AP) - Malaysian authorities said Sunday that they were searching for two dozen Rohingya refugees who are feared to have drowned after jumping off their boat off the northern resort island of Langkawi.

Zawawi Abdullah, a senior official with the Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency, said initial police information showed that only one of 25 Rohingya men who jumped off the boat had managed to swim ashore.
The lone survivor sought help from police late Saturday and has been detained for further investigation, Zawawi said.
Hundreds of thousands of Muslim Rohingya have fled Myanmar due to a military crackdown, and many live in densely crowded refugee camps in Bangladesh.
Muslim-dominated Malaysia has been a common destination of boats arranged by traffickers who promise the refugees a better life abroad.
Zawawi said two vessels and an aircraft were deployed in the search.
He said the agency will also alert local fishermen and authorities in neighboring Thailand to assist in the search.
He didn't provide further details on the boat.

Last month, Malaysian authorities detained 269 Rohingya refugees and found a body on board a suspected smuggling boat off Langkawi that they said had been intentionally damaged so it couldn't be turned back to sea.
The Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency later said that the 269 were transferred from a larger vessel on which dozens of people were believed to have died and their bodies thrown into the sea.
Prime Minister Muhyiddin Yassin said Malaysia cannot accept any more Rohingya refugees as it struggles with an economic slowdown due to the coronavirus pandemic.
But he said those already in the country will not be sent back out to sea.
Malaysia is home to over 2 million illegal immigrants as well as some 180,000 refugees and asylum seekers - including 101,000 Rohingya - who are registered with the U.N. refugee agency.
Daruruwan Masu Zanga-zanga Sun Taru a Cikin Garin LA don nina goyon bayansu ga masu Zanga-zangar Portland

LOS ANGELES (CBSLA) - Kimanin masu zanga-zanga 300 ne suka hallara a cikin garin Los Angeles a ranar Asabar da rana don nuna goyon baya ga wani gangami na tsawon watanni biyu a Portland, Oregon, inda jami'an tsaro na tarayya ake bincikar su bayan wata arangama da suka yi da masu zanga-zangar.
An yi irin wadannan taron a duk fadin Amurka a Boston, da Chicago, da Cleveland, da New York da kuma sauran wasu biranen.
Kungiyoyin ƙin jin jinin mulkin kama-karya da na samar da 'yancin matasa ne suka shirya zanga-zangar ta LA.
Gangamin taron Jama’ar sun yi tattaki ne zuwa hedkwatar Ofishin ‘yan sanda na Los Angeles da ke Farkon da kuma Babban tituna, sannan zuwa Cibiyar Tsare jama'a ta cikin birni.
Har ila yau masu zanga-zangar sun koma zuwa ga filin Alameda na babar hanyar 101, amma daga baya suka tafi.

Wasu daga cikin masu zanga-zangar an gansu suna farfasa tagogin gine-ginen gwamanatin tarayya na cikin gari da alamomin hanya da kuma allunan sunayen wurare na hukumomin tarayya wadanda suka zazzane su da kalaman batanci.
Aƙalla an kama mutum ɗaya a yayin zanga-zangar.
Hundreds Of Demonstrators Gather In Downtown LA In Solidarity With Portland Protesters

LOS ANGELES (CBSLA) - About 300 protesters gathered in downtown Los Angeles on Saturday afternoon in support of a two-month-long movement in Portland, Oregon, where federal law enforcement officials are under scrutiny after clashes with protesters.
There were similar rallies throughout the U.S. in Boston, Chicago, Cleveland, New York and other cities.
The L.A. demonstrations were organized by the groups Refuse Fascism and Youth Liberation Front.
The crowd marched to the Los Angeles Police Department headquarters at First and Main streets, then to the Metropolitan Detention Center.
Participants also moved to the Alameda offramp of the 101 Freeway, but later left.
Some of the people in the group were seen breaking windows of the downtown federal building and federal signage has been graffitied with profanities.
At least one arrest was made during the protests.
Yadda Najeriya za ta iya farfaɗo da tsarin ilmi.
Tsohon Shugaban Ƙasa Olusegun Obasanjo ya bayyana cewa a yanzu akwai kananan yara sama da milyan 14 da ke gararamba, ba su shiga makaranta ba.
Ya ce hakan tauye musu damar yin ilmi ne.
Sannan kuma ya ce tsarin ilmi a ƙasar nan ba zai taɓa gyaruwa ba, har sai matasa ne ke jan ragamar samar da ilmi a ƙasar nan.
Obasanjo ya yi wannan bayani a Lagos, lokacin da ya ke jawabi wurin taron yaye Ɗalibai na "Teach for Nigeria Fellows".
Kungiya ce da ta bada gudummawar bunƙasa ilmin dalibai aƙalla 9,660 a makarantu 80 a jihohin Lagos, Ogun da Kaduna.
A wannan taron, an yaye dalibai 161 ne.
Kungiyar ta na maida hankali ne wajen kara bunƙasa harkokin ilmi wadda wasu shugabanni a cikin al'umma suka maida hankalin aiwatarwa da gudanarwa.
Obasanjo ya ce, "waɗannan milyoyin yara an tauye musu damar samun ilmin da za su iya yin amfani da basira da kwarewar su, ta yadda al'umma za ta amfana da su, kuma su ma su amfana da al'umma.
Hujjoji na nuna cewa muddin ana so a gyara harkokin ilmi a kasar nan, to to sai matasa sun karbi ragamar kula da fannin ilmi.

Ba a ɓangaren ilmi kaɗai ba, Obasanjo ya ce tilas sai matasa sun karbi jagorancin bangarori da fannoni da dama a cikin al'umma, sannan za a iya fita daga ƙangin kalubalen da fannonin ilmi da sauran fannoni ke fuskanta a ƙasar nan.
A na ku bangaren wannan kungiya, daliban su sun samu nasarar shiga gasanni daban-daban kuma su na cin nasara.
"Kwanan nan na samu labarin cewa daliban "Teach For Nigeria Fellows", sun zo na biyu a Gasar "National Lafarge Competition" ta Ƙasa da kuma samun damar guraben karin karatu a makarantun gaba".
Obasanjo ya shawarci su rika maida hankali wajen koya wa dalibai fasahar ƙirƙire- ƙirƙire domin kara wa ilmin su inganci da martaba.
Ya kuma nemi su zama wakilai na ƙwarai da kuma jakadun kawo canji mai nagarta da ƴanci da adalci a Najeriya.
Obasanjo ya kuma yi tsokaci dangane da yadda cutar Coronavirus ta yi illa a kasashen Afrika.
How Nigeria can revitalize the education system.
Former President Olusegun Obasanjo says there are more than 14 million out-of-school children roaming about currently.
He said this limited their access to education.
He also said that the education system in the country would never be reformed until the youth were in charge of education in this country.
Obasanjo made the remarks in Lagos, while addressing the graduation ceremony of "Teach for Nigeria Fellows".
It is an organization that contributes to the education of at least 9,660 students in 80 schools in Lagos, Ogun and Kaduna states.
161 students graduated on this occasion.
The organization focuses on the further development of education which some community leaders focus on implementation and management.

Obasanjo said, "these millions of children have been denied access to education so that they can use their skills and experience, in order that the community can benefit from them, and they can benefit themselves too."
Evidence shows that if education is to be reformed in this country, then the youth have to take charge of the education sector.

Not only in the field of education, Obasanjo said young people must take the lead in many areas and sectors of society, and be able to overcome the challenges faced by education and other sectors in this country.
On your part this organization, their students have successfully participated in various competitions and they are winning.
"I recently learned that students of "Teach For Nigeria Fellows", came second in the National Lafarge Competition and have access to scholarships in future schools."
Obasanjo advised them to focus on teaching students innovation skills to enhance their knowledge and quality.
He also called on them to be good representors and ambassadors for positive change, freedom and justice in Nigeria.
Obasanjo also commented on the impact of coronavirus in Africa.
Karo tsakanin Sachin Pilot da Ashok Gehlot; BIP ya ce jihar ta shiga hargitsin siyasa: Majalis ta ja daga ja daga kan gwaji a baynar jama'a.
Ashok Gehlot ya ce idan ta zama dole, Majalisa za ta yi zaman dirshan a kofar gidan Firayi minsta

Hakan ya zo ne bayan da jagorartara wani wasan kwaikwayo a Raj Bhavan a Jaipur, Babban minista Ashok Gehlot a ranr Asabar yana mai cewa idan ya zama dole, 'yna majlisar baki dayansu za za su gana da shugaban kasa su kuma yi zaman dirsshan a kofara godan Firayi mistnista domin a magnace matsalar siyasar jihar.

A wani taro na jam'iyyar Congres Legislatiyre Party CLP, Mista Gehlot ya nuna cewa burinsu sihine su na 'yar kashi a zauren majalisar domin su nunwa cewa sauran 'yan majalisar da magoya bayansu na tare da shi a wannan fada da ake yi na nuna iko.

"ya na mai cewa gwamnati ita ta ke da rinjaye kuma ta ke son gwada kwanjinta a zauren majalisa", a wata sanarwa da shugaban masu tsawatarwa na majalisa Manesh Jishi ya fitar bayan wani taron na jam'iyyar CLP ya ce
An yi taron jam'iyyar na CLP ne a wani otal din da 'yan majalisar na bagaren Gehlot suke boya na kwana da kawanaki.
"babbaan ministan ya nememuu da mu zama cikin shirin cigaba da zama a otal din na sai baba ta gani.
idan har bukatar haka ta tas, a cewarsa, za mu je mu gana da shugaban kasa sannan mu yi zaman dirshan a kofar gidan Firayi Minista," Shugabann jam'iyyar ya ce.

Dole ne Gwamnan Rajasthan ya kira wani zaman majalisa domin ya bari majalisa ta tabbatarwa da rinjayenta, shugaban jam'iyyar Rahul Gandhi ya fada a ranar Juma'a, yana mai zargin hadin bakin BIp na kokarin kifar da gwamnatin Ashol Gehlot ya fito karara
Wannan kasa ana milkinta ne bisa tsarin mulki ba kuma doka da oda
Ana kafa gwamnati ne a kuma gudannar da ita a bisa bukatun jama'a.
Hadin bakin na kokarin kifar da gwamnatin Rajasthan ya fito karara
Wannan kuma wani cin fuska ne ga mutanen 8 'yan asalin Rajasthan.
Don hka dole ne gwamna ya kira zaman majalisa a inda gaskiya za ta bayyana a gaban kowa da kowa a wannan kasa" Mista Gandhi ya aika ta sakon Tuwita a harshen Hindi.

Babban minista Ashok Gehlot ya fadawa 'yan jam'iyyar Congress a majalisa a ranar Asabafr cewa a shirye ya ke ya je ya sami shugaban kasar Indiya domin ya tabbatar da cewa abin da ya kira "hadin baki" don gwada karfin a majalisa bai ci nasara ba.

Mista Gehlot, wanda ya gudanar da zanga-zangar na awowi a gidan Gwamna Kalraj Mishra a ranar Juma'a, don matsa lamba don yin babban taro ranar Asabar daga bisani aka bada sabuwar bukatar da gida suka amince da ita.
Mista Mishra a daren jiya ya tambayi Mista Gehlot da ya sake mika bukatarsa ta neman a kira majalisa ta zauna, yana mai lissafa wassu dalilai guda shida na kin amincewa da haka
Wannan bukatar zaman za a aikata zuwa ga gwamana nan ba da jimawa ba.
Mista Gehlot ya zargi gwamna da jan kafa kan zaman majalisar saboda "ya na cikin matsin lamba" ya dakile nuna karfin nuna ikon gwamnati.

Kamar yadda Mista Gehlot ya hadu da 'yan majalisar zartarwansa, wata tawaga ta jam'iyyar BIP a karkashin shugabanta na Rajasthan Satish Poonia da kuma shugaban 'yan adawa Gulab Chandra Katria sun gana da gwamna don tattauna matsalar cutar COVID-19 a jihar.
Sachin Pilot Vs Ashok Gehlot; BJP Says State In Political Crisis; Congress Wants Floor Test
Ashok Gehlot said if necessary, Congress hold a sit-in outside the prime minister's home.

A day after leading a dharna at the Raj Bhawan in Jaipur, Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot on Saturday said if necessary, the Congress MLAs will meet the President and hold a sit-in outside the prime minister's residence to settle the crisis in the state.

At a meeting of the Congress Legislature Party (CLP), Mr Gehlot indicated that the plan was to have a floor test to prove that the majority of Congress MLAs and allies are with him in the tussle for power.
"He said the government has the majority and wants to go to the assembly floor," a statement issued by Congress chief whip Mahesh Joshi after the CLP meeting said.
The CLP meeting was held at the hotel where the MLAs in the Gehlot camp are holed up for days.
"The chief minister asked us to remain prepared to stay longer at the hotel.
If required, he said, we would go to meet the President and would also hold a dharna outside the prime minister's residence," a party leader said.

The Rajasthan Governor must call an assembly session to let the Congress prove its majority, party leader Rahul Gandhi on Friday said, alleging that the BJP's conspiracy to topple the Ashok Gehlot government was now clear.
"The country is ruled in accordance with the law and constitution.
Governments are formed and run based on people's mandate.
BJP's conspiracy to topple the Rajasthan government is clear.
This is an insult to 8 crore people of Rajasthan.
The governor must call assembly session so that the truth comes before the country," Mr Gandhi tweeted in Hindi.

Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot told Congress MLAs on Saturday that he was ready to go to the President of India to make sure that what he calls a "BJP conspiracy" to stall a test of strength does not succeed.

Mr Gehlot, who protested for hours at Governor Kalraj Mishra's home on Friday to press for an assembly session, held meetings with Congress MLAs and his cabinet on Saturday, after which a fresh proposal was drawn up and passed by the cabinet.
Mr Mishra had last night asked Mr Gehlot to re-submit the request for an assembly session, citing six objections.
This proposal will be sent to the Governor soon.
Mr Gehlot has accused the Governor of delaying the session because he is "under pressure" to stall his government's test of strength.

As Mr Gehlot met with his cabinet, a BJP delegation led by Rajasthan BJP leader Satish Poonia and Leader of Opposition Gulab Chandra Kataria met the Governor to discuss the COVID-19 situation in the state.
Yadda Aka Kai Hari a Garin Auno.
Da daren ranar Lahadi ne wasu mahara da ake zaton ƴaƴan kungiyar Boko Haram ne, suka far ma wannan gari na Auno, wanda ke da tazarar kilomita 121 da babban birnin Maiduguri.
Maharan sun yi ta banka wa motoci da ma gidajen mutane wuta.
Tun da sanyin safiyar ranar Litinin ne gwamnan ya ziyarci wannan garin domin jajantawa mazauna garin.
A jawabinsa ga jami'an sojojin Najeriya, gwamnan ya ce daga ranar da aka rantsar da shi izuwa wannan lokaci, anfarma wannan gari na Auno akalla sau shidda.
Gwamnan ya bayyana takaicinsa, a game da cewa, akwai wasu motoci uku da maharan suka cika da mata da yara kuma suka tafi da su.
Kwamandan rundunar sojojin Najeriya na operation lafiya Dole manjo janar Olushegun Adeniyi ya ce, za su kara kaimi kan kokarin da su ke yi domin ganin cewa sun kawo karshen irin wadannan matsaloli.
How Auno Town was attacked
On Sunday night, suspected Boko Haram insurgents attacked the town of Auno, 121 kilometers from the capital Maiduguri.
The attackers set fire to cars and even people's homes.
The governor has been visiting the town since early Monday morning to offer condolences.
Addressing Nigerian military officials, the governor said since the day he was sworn in, the town of Auno has suffered attack at least six times.
The governor expressed annoyance that three vehicles full of women and children had been hijacked by the attackers.
The Commander of the Nigerian Army's Operation Safe Haven, Major General Olusegun Adeniyi, has said that they will intensify their efforts to put an end to such incidents.
Kauyen Aswan sun tattara, da gadin da kuma dawo da lodin kayan da ya tuntsire na alawar chakuleti da ya fadi kan hanyarsa zuwa kasar Sudan

Wata babbar motar daukar kaya mai dauke da lodin halawar Chakulet da ke kan hanyarta zuwa kasar Sudan ta tuntsure kan hanyar Aswan-Abu ranar Lahadi hanya mai sauki ta kasa da kasa a ranar Lahad, a daidai kofar shiga kauyen wadi Karkar, A inda direban motar ya suma ne a sakamakon tsananin zafi.
Kauyawan sun garzaya wurin cikin hanzari tare da kokarin ceton direban da kuma alkinta kayan da motar ke dauke da shi wadanada suka tarwatse.
Daya daga cikinsu mai suna Alaa Bahr, ya na mai bayanin cewa direban motar bako ne wanda hanya ta biyo da shi ta kauyen , a don haka ba za mu kyale shi ba, ba tare da taimaka masa ba.
"Dole ne mu taimaki kowa, ba tare da la'akari da ko su wanene ba, in dai har suna cikin halin bukatar taimako"
Ya kuma ci gaba da cewa, mazauna kauyen sun kirawo motar daukar marasa lafiya don daukar direban, sannan sai suka yi kokarin alkinta kayan babbar motar da yawansu na kai na kimanin LE miliyan uku.
A cewar Bahr, mazuana kauyen sun zauna gadin kayan tun daga safiya har zuwa dare suna ta iya bakin kokarinsu na tattaro kayan da suka tarwatse.
Ya na mai cewa, "Abu ma fi muhimmanci a garemu shine ceto ran direban da kare kayan da motar ke dauke da shi, da kuma bude wannan babbar hanya ta kasa da kasa.

Mutanen kauyen cikin hanzari su ka kawo wa direban da ya ji rauni ruwa da tare da samar masa makwanci, Bahr ya kuma kara da cewa, su dai bukatarsu ita ce yadda direban ya shiga kauyen lafiya, ya fita lafiya da salama.
Aswan villagers collect, guard and return crashed chocolate shipment to Sudan

A truck loaded with tons of chocolate headed to Sudan rolled over on the Aswan-Abu Simple International Road on Sunday, in front of Wadi Karkar Village entrance, with the driver falling into a coma brought on by heatstroke.
Villagers rushed to the scene to attend to the fallen driver and retrieve the fallen shipments.
One of them, Alaa Bahr, explained his view that the driver was "a passerby in front of our village; we could not leave him alone.
We should help anyone, whatever their identity, if they are in distress."
He added that the villagers brought an ambulance to retrieve the driver, and then attempted to retrieve the truck's goods, estimated to be worth three million LE.
According to Bahr, the villagers stayed at the scene from morning to night retrieving as many shipments as they could.
"The most important thing for us was to save the driver's life, protect the shipment, and open up the international road," he explained.
The villagers were more than ready to bring water and shelter the injured driver, Bahr said, adding that all they wanted was to ensure that he would enter and leave the village safely.
Kasar Poland za ta fice daga yarjejeniyar Turai da ke nufin hana cin zarafin mata
Gwamnatin Poland mai sassaucin ra'ayi ta ce za ta janye daga yarjejeniyar Turai dake kokarin hana cin zarafin mata.

Yarjejeniyar ta Santanbul ita ce ta farko da kasashen duniya ke shirin aiki da ita kan yadda za a hana cin zarafin mata, amma ministan Shari'a na kasar ta Poland Zbignew Ziobro ya bayyana kudirin da cewa yana da "illa" saboda ya bukaci cewa a koyawa yara game da jinsi daga mahanga ta mu'amilla da ilimin zamantakewar jama'a.
Ziobro ya na mai cewa a karshen mako, ranar Litinin zai fara shirye-shiryen bin matakai da ka'idojin janyewa daga yarjejeniyar.

"Wannan bangare na akida yana da nasaba da wajibcin canza ilimi a makarantu da wajen shirye-shiryen makarantu, dangane da ilmantarwa, da halaye, da hukuncin da samari 'yan asalin kasar Poland suka yi, a ra'ayinmu, zaton da ake yi na cewa ilimin jima'in halittu na gargajiya ne, kuma a zahiri duk abin da ya bayu ne ga yanayin zamantakewar al'umma da al'adu da kuma jinsi. "

A ra'ayin Ziobro, ƙudurin da a ka zartar da ya shafi ilimintar da yara da matasa da kuma dangantakar iyalai da ke tsakanin masu dabi'ar mata-maza da luwaɗi da maɗigo cikin yanayin zamantakewa, ba za'a yarda da shi ba.

"Haka kuma ba za mu amince da shigar da dabi'ar mata-maza da maza masu neman maza, da mata masu neman mata, wajen yada wannan dabi'a da 'yan rajin kare hakki da kuma 'na luwadi da ke son mayar da akidarsu zama doka kan jama'a", a cewarsa.
A ranar Lahadi Majalisar Turai ta ce ta "kadu" da cewa kasar Poland na janyewa daga yarejeniyar.

A garin Warsaw a ranar Juma'a, kimanin mutane 2,000 ne ciki har da kungiyoyin mata da kuma sauran masu rajin kare hakki ne suka yi wata zanga-zanga a kofar ofishin Ordo Luris, wata kungiyar da ke goyon bayan janyewar kasar daga yarjejeniyar.
"Ba za mu yarda a cucemu ba" Suna ta fada cikin rewa waka.
An kuma gudanar da irin wadannan zanga-zangar a wasu biranen kasar ta Poland.

Kasar Poland na daga cikin kasashen da suka sa hannu a yarjejeniyar da aka kulla a birnin Istanbul kan yaki da cin zarafin mata da kuma fadace-fadace na cikin gida a watan Disambar shekarar 2012 aka kuma zartar da ita a shekarar 2015.
Poland to withdraw from European treaty aimed at preventing violence towards women
Poland's right-wing government says it will withdraw from a European treaty aimed at preventing violence against women.

The Istanbul Convention is the world's first binding instrument to prevent violence against women but the Polish Justice Minister, Zbigniew Ziobro, described the text as "harmful" because it requires that schools teach children about gender from a sociological point of view.
Ziobro said over the weekend that on Monday he will begin preparing the formal process to withdraw from the treaty.

"This ideological element is linked to the imperative to change education in schools and outside of school programs, in terms of learning, attitudes, convictions of the young Polish generation of students to make, in our opinion, the false assumption that biological sex is archaic, and in fact everything comes down to the socio-cultural gender."
In Ziobro's opinion, the convention's articles concerning the education of children and young people as well as family relationships in the LGBT context are not acceptable.
"We also reject the LGBT element of promoting family relationships, a view propagated by activists from left-wing or homosexual circles who want to translate their beliefs into binding law," he said.
The Council of Europe said on Sunday it is "alarmed" that Poland is aiming to withdraw from the Convention.

In Warsaw on Friday, around 2,000 people including women's groups and other rights activists held a demonstration in front of the offices of Ordo Luris, a right-wing organisation that supports withdrawal from the convention.
"We will not be victims" they chanted.
Demonstrations were also held in other Polish cities.
Poland signed the Istanbul Convention for the prevention and combating of violence against women and domestic violence in December 2012 and ratified it in 2015.
'Yan Kungiyar IPOB Sun Kashe Jami'anmu Biyu A Inugu -DSS - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.

Ma'aikatar Tsaro ta kasa (DSS) ta ce a ranar Lahadi ne aka kaiwa Jami'anta masu sintiri hari a inda kuma aka kashe mata jami'ai mutum biyu a Emene, jihar Enugu daga hannun ƴan asalin yankin Biafra (IPOB).
A cewar Dr Peter Afunanya, kakakin ta, hukumar DSS ta rasa jami'anta biyu a cikin harin.
A cewar sa ya bayyana a fili cewa wannan mummunan harin ta'addanci ne da kungiyar IPOB ta kaddamar kan hukumar yayin da suke kan aiki.
Ya kuma ce, hukumar tana yin ta'aziyya ga iyalan jami'an da suka rasu tare da yin addu'ar neman affuwar rayukansu.
Duk da haka, an sanya dukkanin matakai domin tabbatar da cewa wadanda suka kashe da duk wanda ke da hannu a wannan mummunan aikin an kamo su nan take kuma an gurfanar dasu a gaban kuliya.
Kuma sannan, za a gudanar da cikakken bincike game da abin da ya faru.
Har ila yau, Hukumar ta sake tabbatar da aniyarta na ƙara kaimi tare da aiki da sauran hukumomin tsaro domin kiyaye amincin jama'a da tsaron su.
Don haka, hukumar tana rokon jama'a masu bin doka da oda da su cigaba da kasuwancinsu na yau da kullun ba tare da tsoro ba.
IPOB Members Killed Two Of Our Officials In Inugu - DSS - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
The Department of State Security (DSS) said on Sunday that its patrols agents were attacked and two female officers were killed in Emene, Enugu State by the Indigenous Peoples of Biafra (IPOB).
According to Dr Peter Afunanya, spokesman of DSS lost two of its officers in the attack.
He said, it was clear that this deadly attack was carried out by IPOB terrorist on the commission while they were on duty.
He said the commission was offering condolences to the families of the deceased officers and prayed for their forgiveness.
However, all measures have been put in place to ensure that the perpetrators and anyone involved in this heinous act are immediately apprehended and brought to justice.
And then, a full investigation into the incident will be conducted.
However the commission also reaffirmed its commitment to work more closely with other security agencies to maintain public safety and security.
To this end, the commission urges law-abiding citizens to conduct their day-to-day business without fear.
An dai karya kashin bayan duk wata hadaka. Cutar koronabirus kuma na iya tabarbare al'amarin.

"Bullar wannan annobar kadai ita ma manuniya ce da kuma kira ga zababbu shugabanninmu na irin shugabanci da hangen nesan da yakamacemu a lokacin rikici irin wannan", a cewar wani rahoto wanda da aka samar bayan hirarraki da Leonard Steinhorn, wani Farfesa na kimiyya sadarwa da ke Jami'ar Amurka, shi da Mark Sobol marubuci kuma kwararre kan sanin tsari da shugabanci suka gudanar.
"Amma kuma muna fuskantar wani babbaba tabo na zunubin asali kuma na cikin gida na kasar nan dangane da rash

Bincien ya gangara a hankali cikin a abubun da aka saba da su a wajen nazarin halin takaici na halin majalisa ta ke ciki: Zaman'yan marina da ake yi da juna wanda ya dakushe duk wata dama ta mu'amilla ta hakika, karfin iko bakii dayansa na hannun shugabanni, bukatar a tara musu kudi a kai-a kai, rashin karfafa gwiwar hadaka na jami'iyyun da suka banbanta a manufinsu da akida, da mummunan tasirin kakafen yada labarai maus aikijn ba dae, ba rana, da kuma hakikaninn cewababbab abin da ke gaban yawancin 'yan majalisa shi ne cin zabe, da kuma dankwafe 'yan jami'iyyarsu masu ra'ayin da suka sha ban-ban da nasu.

Ya kuma yi gargadin cewa mayar da harkokin majalisa zuwa yanar gizo a sakamakon wannan annobar, kamar samar da wani tsarin yin zabe a majalisa ta hanyar wakilci da zai ba 'yan majalisar damar kada kuri'arsu ba sai sun je birnin Washinton ba, zai iya dada lalata lamarin da ake ciki.

Idan har shawarar gudanar da zaman majalisa da hanyar yanara gizo ya samu amincewa, a cewra rahoton, hakan ba karamin ci baya zai kawowa yunkurin da ake yi na samun hadaka da kokarin hada hannun a tsakanin jam'iyyu masu banbancin akida ba.
"Bullar wannan annoba, ya tilasatawa majalisa gudanar da yawancin harkokinta ta hayar yanar gizo, kuma mun ka fahimci daliln da sa a yi hakan," a cewar rahoton.
"Amma duk da cewa yin hakan ya zama dole babu yadda za a y, kar a fassara hakan da cewa yin hakan nagarta ne."
Bayanin rahoton ya ci gaba da cewa Majalisa na bukatar "sababai na 'yan majalisa su hadu da juna da kuma yin mu'amilla ba akasin haka ba.

"Da akwai bukatar su mazabun junansu, su tattauna ta fahimtar juna da zai samar da wata dama ta dinke duk wata barakar da ke tsakaninsu da samun amintar juna da ka iya kai wa ga samar da maganin matsalolin da suka damu a'umma"

A makon da Dan Majalisar Wakilai Ted Yoho da jam'iyyar Republican daga Florida haka kawai ya zazzagi dan majalisar wakilai Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez dan jam'iyyar Democrat daga New York da kuma lokacin da aka 'yan Republicans suka yiwa dan uwansu Dan Majalisar Liz Cheney daga Wyoming, taron dangi na yi masa kaca-kaca, hakan ya dada fito da bukatar kara samun wayewa da mutunta juna.
Congress Was Already Broken. The Coronavirus Could Make It Worse.

"The pandemic alone is a call to our elected officials for the type of leadership and vision we expect at a moment of crisis," says the report, which grew out of interviews conducted by Leonard Steinhorn, a professor of communication at American University, and Mark Sobol, an author and expert on organizational development and executive leadership.
"But we are also facing another reckoning, one over our nation's original sin and the racial inequities that have beset our country since its founding."

The study ticks through familiar themes when it comes to assessing the sorry state of Congress: the lack of any real across-the-aisle relationships, a schedule that limits opportunities for interaction, too much power concentrated in leadership, constant fund-raising demands, discouragement of bipartisanship, the negative influence of round-the-clock media, the fact that the most important election for lawmakers is often their primary, and the shutting out of minority-party voices.

It also warns that the shifts toward a more virtual Congress as a result of the pandemic, such as a new system of proxy voting in the House that allows lawmakers to cast their votes without traveling to Washington, could exacerbate the existing problems.
If the idea of a remote Congress takes hold, the report suggests, it would be a serious setback to efforts to enhance bipartisan interaction.
"Because of the pandemic, Congress was forced to conduct much of its business virtually, and we certainly understand why," the report said.
"But as much as that may have been a necessity, it should not be interpreted as a virtue."
The document says Congress needs "more and not less in-person interaction among members of Congress.
They need to learn more about each other's districts, hold civil conversations aimed at finding common ground, build relationships of trust that can lead understanding and solutions."

In a week when Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Democrat of New York, was verbally assaulted without provocation by Representative Ted Yoho, Republican of Florida, and fellow Republicans ganged up on Representative Liz Cheney, Republican of Wyoming, in a hostile confrontation, the call for civility rang especially true.
Hambararren shugaban CAR Francois Bozize ya sanar da aniyarsa ta sake tsayawa takarar shugaban kasa

Hambararren shugaban kasar Jamhuriyar Africa ta tsakiya Francois Bozize a ranar Asabar ya sanar da aniyarsa ta sake tsayawa takara a zaben shugaban kasar da za a gudanar a watan Disamba duk da cewa Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta sa masa takunumi kuma za a iya kama shi don fuskantar hukunci a bisa zargin da a ke yi masa na aikata laifukan yaki.
Ya bayar da wannan sanarwar ce a wani jawabi da ya yi a gaban dubban jama'a magoya bayansa a taron jam'iyyarsa Kwa na Kwa (aiki sai mai shi) a babban birnin Bangui.

Dan shekara 73 da haihuwa Bozize tsohon janar din soja ne kuma shugaban rundunar sojojin kasar da wasu gamayyar kungiyoyin tawayen 2013 wanda yancinsu musulmai ne daga arewacin kasar suka yiwa juyin mulki wanda hakan ya jefa kasar da yawancinta Kristoci ne cikin wani kazamin yaki da kuma matsalar 'yan gudun hijira mai tsanani wanda har yanzu bai yanke ba.

"wannan kasa na bukatar mutum mai gogewa da son zaman lafiya da kuma ka'ida." Bozize ya na mai fadi a wani jawabi da yayi wanda ya kuma yi kakkausar suka ga shugabancin Faustin-Archange Touadera wanda ke kan kujera.
Bozizie ya jagoranci kasar ne bayan wani juyin mulki da ya yi a shekarar 2003 ya kuma shugabanci kasar har na tsawon 10 kafin ya tsere ya bar kasar a shekarar 2013.

Sanbuwar gwamnatin Kasar ta nemi a kama shi ne a bisa zarginsa da aikata laifukan yaki da kuma tunzura jama'a da hakan ya kai ga aikata kisan kiyashi, amma kuma ba a kama shi ba tun da ya dawo kasar daga gudun hijira a karshen shekarar da ta wuce.
Ba dai san yadda takardar izinin kama shi ba, da kuma takunkumin da kasashen waje suka sa masa zai iya shafar takarar ta sa.
A wataan Janairu, Bozize ya ce zai bukaci ta dage takunkumin da sa mi shi a bisa zargin da ake yi mi shi na goyon bayan kungiyar Kiristoci masu dauke da maka ta Anti - Balaka a shekarar 2014.
A yanzu Touadera ne ke mulkida taimakon wata babbar runduna rwanzar da zaman lafiya ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniy da ke da dakaru 13,000 na 'yan sanda da Soji.
An zabe shi a sheklarar 2016, a na kuma sa ran zai sake tsayawa takara na wa'adi na biyu a zaben da ake shirin yi ko da yake ba a tabbatar da hakan ba tukunna.
An shirya soma zagayen farko na yakin neman zaben a ranar 27 Disamba.
A cikin watan Fabarairu 2019 Gwamnatin kasar ta sanya hannun wata yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya da wasu kungiyoyi 14 masu dauke da makamai da suke ikirarin kare muradin wasu al'umma ko wani addini.

Tuni dai tashe-tashe hankali ya lafa, sai da akan samu daidaiku mummunan tashin hankli nn da can mai kamar kullum nasaba da fada kan mallakar arzikin kasa yayin da yawancin arzikin lu'lun da ke kasar na yankunan da ba sa karkashin ikon gwamnati.
Wannan tashin hankali ya tilastwa mutane sama da milyan 1.5 tserewa daga gidajensu.
Francois Bozize, deposed CAR leader, announces presidential bid

Deposed former Central African Republic President Francois Bozize announced on Saturday his candidacy for the December presidential vote despite being under United Nations sanctions and subject to an arrest warrant for alleged crimes against humanity.
He made the announcement in a speech to a large crowd of supporters at a congress of his party, Kwa na Kwa (Work, Nothing But Work), in the capital Bangui.

The 73-year-old former general and army chief was overthrown in a 2013 rebellion by a coalition of mainly Muslim rebels from the north, plunging the majority Christian nation into a violent civil war and an acute and continuing humanitarian crisis.
"The country needs a man of experience, peace and conviction," Bozize said in the speech that criticised the tenure of the current president, Faustin-Archange Touadera.
Bozize first took power after a 2003 coup and served 10 years as president before fleeing the country in 2013.
The new administration sought his arrest for alleged crimes against humanity and incitement to genocide, but has not moved to arrest him since he returned from exile late last year.
It is not clear how the warrant or foreign sanctions will affect his candidacy.
In January, Bozize said he would ask the UN to lift the sanctions imposed in 2014 over his alleged support for Anti-balaka Christian armed groups.
Touadera governs today with the support of a large UN peacekeeping operation with more than 13,000 troops and police.
Elected in 2016, he is expected to seek a second term in the election but has not yet confirmed he will run.
The first round of the race is scheduled for December 27.
The government signed a peace deal in February 2019 with 14 armed groups, who typically claim to defend the interests of specific communities or religions.
Violence has since generally receded, but there are still bloody incidents, typically sparked by fighting over resources and most of the diamond-rich country remains beyond government control.
The violence has forced more than 1.5 million people to flee their homes.
Har Yanzu Ana Fuskantar Mawuyacin Halin Rayuwa a Najeriya.

Kawo yanzu gwamnatin tarayyar Najeriya da kuma jihohi na ikirarin kashe dubban Miliyoyin Naira wajen tallafawa masu karamin karfi, domin rage radadin wahalar rayuwa da ake fama da ita sakamakon annobar Covid-19 da aka fi sani da coronavirus.

Ahmad Tukur Jada, daya daga cikin shugabanin kungiyoyin kananan manoma a Najeriya, ya bayyana wa sashen Hausa irin kalubalen da talakawa ke fuskanta a wannan lokaci na annoba, wanda ya hada da tsadar rayuwa.
Game da batun tallafin corona kuwa ya ce babu abin da suka gani.
Sai dai yayin da talakawa ke kokawa, tuni wasu wakilai da kuma kungiyoyi suka fara neman hanyar tallafawa, domin ragewa al'umma wahalar da suke ciki.

Dan Majalisar Dokokin jihar Taraba, Bashir Muhammad Bape, ya fadawa Muryar Amurka cewa a mazabarsa ta Nguroje, sun sayi Babura guda 60 da injinan markade da kuma Kekunan dinki suka rabawa al'umma domin su sami hanyar gudanar da rayuwa.
Ya zuwa yanzu dai, an bude wasu kasuwanni a jihar Taraba sai dai ana kokawa kan yadda wasu kayayyakin more rayuwa irin su Hatsi da masu karamin karfe matukar bukata na kara yin tashin gwauron zabi.
Nigerians are still facing life difficulties.
