The Federal Government of Nigeria and the states have so far claimed to have spent billions of naira to support the less fortunate, to alleviate the suffering caused by the Covid-19 virus known as coronavirus.

Ahmad Tukur Jada, one of the leaders of smallholder farmers' groups in Nigeria, described to the Hausa community the challenges faced by the poor in this time of pandemic, including the cost of living.
On the issue of corona support he said they saw nothing.
But as the masses are struggling, some agents and organizations are already looking for ways to support, to alleviate the suffering of the community.
Taraba State Member of Parliament Bashir Muhammad Bape told VOA that in his Nguroje constituency, they bought 60 motorcycles and sewing machines distributed to the people to make a living.
So far, some markets have been opened in Taraba State but there are struggles over the fact that some infrastructure such as grains which is in high demand by the masses it's price are escalating.
Ana Faɗaɗa Aikin Gwajin COVID-19 a Senegal

Ƙasar Senegal na faɗaɗa aikin gwajin cutar coronavirus don baiwa matafiya damar a gwada su kafin su bar ƙasar, da kuma waɗanda ke isa ƙasar wadda ke yammacin nahiyar Afrika, a cewar kamfanin dillancin labaran Reuters.

Ƙasar Senegal, da tattalin arzikinta ya dogara ga yawon buɗe idanu domin samar da kuɗin shiga kusan kashi 4 cikin 100 daga kayayyaki da ayyukan da ake yi a ƙasar duk shekara, ta ce mutum 9,422 suka kamu da cutar COVID-19 tun bayan ɓarkewar annobar, mutum 182 kuma suka mutu.
Kusan mutane miliyan 1.7 suka je hutu a Senegal a shekarar 2019.
Ƙasar ta ɗage dokar hana tashi da saukar jiragen sama na ƙasa da ƙasa daga ranar 15 ga watan Yuli amma ta ce za ta hana ƴan ƙasashen da suka hana ƴan Senegal zuwa ƙasashensu shiga ƙasarta.
Ma'aikatar lafiyar ƙasar ta ƙaddamar da cibiyoyin gwajin cutar COVID-19 guda 4 a Dakar babban birnin kasar domin gwada matafiya, wanda a lokacin da cutar ta ɓarke guda ɗaya ne kawai.
Ƙasar na kuma shirin faɗaɗa gwaje-gwajenta a sauran wasu manyan garuruwa.
COVID-19 Testing expanded in Senegal.
Senegal is expanding its coronavirus testing to allow travelers to be tested before leaving the country, as well as those arriving in the West African country, according to Reuters.

Senegal, whose economy relies on tourism to generate about 4 percent of the country's gross domestic product and services each year, says 9,422 people have been infected with COVID-19 since the outbreak. 182 people also died.
Nearly 1.7 million people went on holiday in Senegal in 2019.
The country lifted the ban on international flights from July 15 but said it would ban nationals who barred Senegalese nationals from entering their countries.
The Ministry of Health has launched 4 COVID-19 testing centers in the capital Dakar to test travelers, of which at the time of the outbreak there was only one.
The country also plans to expand its tests to other major cities.
Gottlieb ya yi gargadin cewa "zai yi matukar wahala a bude" makarantu da kaka a wuraren da aka kasa dakile yaduwar cutar Koronabirus

Birnin Washington - Dakta Scott Gottlied, tsohon shuguban Hukumar kula da ingancin abinci da magunguna, ya yi gargadin cewa, abubuwa za su yi "tsananin matuka" ga makarantu a gundumomi su bude don soma katatu a shekarar karatu mai zuwa na shekara mai zuwa idan har da akwai rashin dakile yaduwar cutar Korona Birus a wuraren.
Ga makarantun da ke unguwanni da ke gundumomi, Ina ganin suna da bukatar da su rinka kallon dalilan da ke sa cutar ta yadu a wurare.
Idan aka samu matsalar yaduwar cutar a unguwanni ba a iya da dakile ta ba, zaj zo da matular wahala a bude a cikin irirn wannan yanayi." Gottlieb ya ce a "shirin Face the Nation."

Da kusantowar zangona kaarutun na kaka a 'yan makonni, gwamnatin Trump ta na ta kira ga makarantu a gundumomi da su bude azuzuwansu domin dalibai su soma daukar karatu a tsarin gani - gaka a kwnaki biyar na kowanne mako.

Amma wannan matsin lamba daga Shugaba Trump da kuma Sakataren Ilimi Betsy DeVos na zuwa ne a lokacin da Mista Trump ya yi gargadi a makon da ya wuce yana mai cewa cutar Koronabirus na iya " ta'azzara kafin ta yi sauki " sannan suka yarda da cewa makarantun da ke gundumomi a wuraren da ke zafi su jinkirta budewa da 'yan makonni.
Duk da haka, Cibiyar kula da yaduwar cuttuka da dakile su, ta fitar da wata sanarwa a ranar Alhamis kan yadda za a bude makarantu domin dalibai su dawo ba tare da yiwuwar kamuwa da cutar ba.

Sanarwar jagorar na kira ga makarantu da su bi ka'idar bayar da tazara, na kira ga dalibai da kuma malamai su sa takunkumi su kuma sa dalibai a da'irori domina rage cudanya da juna, kadan daga cikin sauran jagororin.

Sai dai hukumar ta CDC ba ta bayar da wani ma'auni na yadda shubannin makarantu za su iya daga karatunsu ko kuma rufe makarantun baki daya idan an samu labarin wani ya kamu da cutar ta Korona, wacce Gottlied ke cewa, " abin takaici ne."

"Cikin halin yanayi na kila-wa-kala da kuma rashin fadin takarmaimai yadda za a ci gaba da barin makarantun a bude, ina jin dai iyaye da yawa za su yi kuskure a wajen daukar matakan kariya" yana mai cewa.
" Shi ya sa ya ke da matukar muhimmanci a samu takamaiman bayani kan ma'auni mai wuya da hukumar ta CDC ta hankalinta bai kai wurin ba."

Gottlied ya ce kamata ya yi makarantun da ke gundumomi su rika tunani kan afkuwar lamarin a wuraren da suke da kuma yadda za a yi gwajin cutar ta yadda za a iya tsai da shawarar uadda za a tunkari lamarin da kuma kom za ci gaba da barin makaranta a bude ko kuma a koma baki daya zuwa karatun ta hnayara yanar gizo.

Yiwuwar kamuwa da cutar tsakanin 5% zuwa 10% ya na mai cewa, "hankula zai soma tashi" yayin da sama da kashi 10% ya zama "matakin da sai ka yi taka tsan-tsan tere da tunanin ko yakamata ka rufe makaranta a yankin baki dayansa."

" Wannan shine alamar cewa lallai annobar ta doso wannan wuri gadan - gadan" Gottlieb yana mai cewa, zai abu ne mai wahala ga wasu yankuna na jihar Florida wacce ta kasance cibiyar annobar Koronabirus a Amurka, da zai sa su bude maukarantunsu a koma karatu kamar yadda a ka saba gani-gaka.
Sama da jihohi 30 ne da kuma gundumar Columbia ne ke fuskantar karuwar wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta Korona, yayin da Sun Belt ya zama cibiyar yaduwarta.
Amma Gottlieb ya ce da akwai abubuwan da suke nuna cewa a wasu jihohi ciki har da Arizona da kuma Texas za su kai kololuwa.

Duk da dai Gottlieb ya ce akwai "alamun da ba za a iya ganewa ba" annobar tana tafiyar hawainiya a wasu jihohin a fadin Sun Belt, tana "ɗumama" a wasu, ciki har da South Carolina, da Alabama, da Indiana da kuma Illinois.

Gwamnoni da yawa sun kafa doka da ke buƙatar mutane su sanya takunkumi lokacin da suke cikin jama'a kuma sun dakatar da sake buɗe wuraren taron jama'a, a cikin yunƙurin rage yaɗuwar ƙwayar cutar ta Koronabirus.

Gottlieb ya ce ya kamata jihohi su yi duba yiwuwar rufe mashaya, da iyakance yawan mutane a gidajen abinci, da rufe gidajen sinima da ma sauran wuraren nishadi na cikin rufaffunn wurare, da aiwatar da dokar rufe fuska don dakile yaduwar annobar, matakan da za su ba jihohi damar dakatar da koma baya ga mafi tsauraran da hani aka sanya a farkon bullar cutar a watan Maris.
Baya ga jihohin da ke bayar da umarnin rufe fuska, yawancin kamfanoni na buƙatar kwastomomi da suma su sanya abubuwan rufe fuska.
McDonald's na daga cikin waɗanda suka buƙaci rufe fuska, da kuma babban wurin sayar da abinci Walmart, Starbucks da sauransu wajen aiwatar da ƙa'idojin kansu na takunkumi.
Gottlieb ya ce yana fatan ganin karin wuraren kasuwanci za su aiwatar da umarnin rufe fuska a wurarensu, musamman ma wadanda ake ganin suna da matukar hadari.

"Idan da gaske ne za mu iya magance cigaba da yaduwar cutar har zuwa lokacin hunturu har sai mun kai ga samun allurar rigakafi ko wani nau'in magani wanda ke canza yanayin tafiyar wannan rashin lafiyar, a likitance, kawai tare da abin rufe fuska wanda zai zama wani abu mai sauƙi wanda za mu iya yin hakan ba zai canza rayuwarmu da gaske ba, kuma yana ba mu damar kiyaye abin da ke da muhimmanci a gare mu kamar buɗe wasu kasuwancin a buɗe, kamar dawo da yaranmu zuwa makaranta, "in ji shi.

Yayin da Mista Trump ya ce ba zai sanya dokar rufe fuska ba a duk fadin kasar, ya bukaci Amurkawa a makon da ya gabata da su sanya makari, yana mai cewa yayin ganawa da manema labarai na Fadar White House "suna da tasiri."
Gottlieb warns uncontrolled coronavirus spread in a community makes it "very hard to open" schools in fall

Washington - Dr. Scott Gottlieb, former head of the Food and Drug Administration, warned Sunday it's going to be "very hard" for school districts to open for the upcoming academic year if there is uncontrolled spread of the coronavirus within their communities.
"For local school districts, I think they need to be looking at what is the spread within the community.
If you have uncontrolled spread within the community, it's going to be very hard to open against that backdrop." Gottlieb said on "Face the Nation."
With the fall semester set to begin in the coming weeks, the Trump administration had been urging school districts to open their doors to students for in-person instruction five days a week.

But the push from President Trump and Education Secretary Betsy DeVos comes as Mr. Trump warned last week the coronavirus crisis will likely "get worse before it gets better" and acknowledged school districts in hot spots may have to delay reopening for a few weeks.
Still, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention issued guidance Thursday for how best to safely open schools for students.

The guidance calls for schools to follow social distancing, recommend students and staff wear face coverings, and keep students in defined groups to reduce contact with others, among other guidelines.

But the CDC did not provide a benchmark for school administrators on when they should move to close a school in the event of an uptick in coronavirus infections, which Gottlieb said was "unfortunate."
"In the setting of uncertainty and the lack of specific guidance for how to keep schools open, I think more parents are going to err on the side of caution," he said.
"That's why it's very important to get specificity out of what the hard metrics are that the CDC didn't do in its guidance."

Gottlieb said school districts should think about positivity rates in their community, local spread and testing capacity to guide decision-making on whether to keep a school open or shift fully to online learning.
A positivity rate between 5% to 10%, he said, is "starting to get iffy," while above 10% is the "threshold where you really want to think carefully about closing the school districts."

"That is a sign that there is an epidemic underway inside that community," Gottlieb said, adding that it's going to be difficult for parts of Florida, which is an epicenter of the coronavirus epidemic in the U.S., to open their schools for in-person learning next month.
More than 30 states and the District of Columbia are experiencing an uptick in coronavirus infections, with the epicenter of the epidemic currently in the Sun Belt.
But Gottlieb said there are indications cases in some states including Arizona and Texas are beginning to plateau.
While Gottlieb said there are "unmistakable signs" the epidemic is slowing in some states across the Sun Belt, it's "heating up" in others, including South Carolina, Alabama, Indiana and Illinois.
Many governors have instituted mandates requiring people to wear masks when they are in public spaces and halted their phased reopenings in an effort to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus.

Gottlieb said states should consider shutting down bars, limiting the number of people in restaurants, closing movie theaters and other kinds of indoor entertainment venues, and implementing mask mandates to quell the epidemic, steps that allow states to stop short of reverting back to the more stringent restrictions imposed at the start of the pandemic in March.
In addition to states issuing mask mandates, a number of businesses are requiring customers to wear face coverings as well.
McDonald's is among the latest to require face coverings, and the fast food giant joins Walmart, Starbucks and others in implementing their own rules for masks.
Gottlieb said he expects more businesses will implement mask mandates in venues, especially those considered high-risk.

"If we really can manage to keep the epidemic under control heading into the winter until we get to a vaccine or some kind of therapeutic that changes the clinical trajectory of this illness, just with masks that's going to be something relatively simple that we can all do that doesn't really change our lives and allows us to maintain what's really important to us like keeping some businesses open, like getting our kids back to school," he said.
While Mr. Trump has said he will not impose a nationwide mask mandate, he urged Americans last week to wear coverings, saying during a White House press briefing "they have an impact."
Ganduje ya maida martani kan zargin saida otel ɗin Daula - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Gwamnan jihar Kano Dr Abdullahi Umar Ganduje ya ce, gwamnatinsa tana mai da kadarori mallakin gwamnatin jihar da aka yi watsi da su ne don samar da abubuwan more rayuwa wanda wani mataki ne na mai da jihar Kano ɗaya daga cikin manyan birane na duniya.
Hakan na cikin wata sanarwa mai ɗauke da sa hannun daraktan yaɗa labarai na gidan gwamnatin Kano Aminu Yassar.
Sanarwar ta ce maimakon ƙyale kadarori da gwamnati ta kashe maƙudan kuɗaɗe wajen samar dasu, su lalace, zai fi kyautatuwa a mai dasu wuraren amfanin al'umma.
Haka zalika sanarwar ta kuma ce hakan zai taimaka gaya wajen samarwa da gwamnati kuɗaɗen shiga baya ga samar da aikin yi ga ɗimbin matasan jihar.

A baya-bayan nan ne dai ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Kano a tutar jam'iyyar PDP a zaɓen da ya gabata Abba Kabir Yusuf ,ya shigar da ƙara gaban kotu yana zargin matakin da gwamnatin jihar ta ɗauka na mallakawa ƴan kasuwa wasu kadarorin gwamnati.
Ganduje responds to allegations of selling Daula Hotel - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Kano State Governor Dr Abdullahi Umar Ganduje has said his government is reclaiming abandoned state-owned assets for infrastructure which is a step towards making Kano State one of the world's largest cities.
This is contained in a statement signed by Aminu Yassar, Director of Information, Kano State Government House.
The statement said that instead of abandoning assets that the government has spent a lot of money to produce to be wasted, it would be better to own public facilities.
The statement also said that this would help in generating government revenue in addition to creating employment for the state's youth.
Abba Kabir Yusuf, the PDP's candidate for governor of Kano State in the last general election, has recently filed a lawsuit accusing the state government of misappropriating government assets.
Mutum Biyar Sun Rasu, Gidaje 30 Sun Rushe A Kebbi.
Mazauna Bachaka Sun Fara Kaura Zuwa Jamhuriyar Nijer.

Mutane biyar ne su ka rasu tare da rushewar gidaje sama da 30 a garin Bachaka da ke karamar hukumar mulki ta Arewa a cikin Jihar Kebbi a sanadiyyar ambaliyar ruwan sama mai yawan gaske, lamarin da ya fara tilasta wa al'ummar yankin yin kaura zuwa makociyar kasa, Jamhuriyar Nijer.
Hon. Bashar Shafi'u Bachaka shi ne kansila mai wakiltar wannan mazabar ta Bachaka da Sakkwabe.

Ya ce, yanzu haka a duk lokacin da hadari ya taso hankali kowa ya na tashi har sai an dauke ruwan, saboda duk safiya ta Allah a ka yi ruwa, sai ya ci gidaje a sanadiyyar barazanar da wannan geben ya ke yi.

Mai Arewan Bachaka, Alhaji Yakubu Maiyaki, ya yi kira ga a Gwamnatin Jihar Kebbi da ta kawo mu su dauki, saboda yanzu haka a sanadiyyar ruwan sama da yawa mutane da yawa sun rasa matsugunansu da su ka gada shekaru aru-aru.

Bayan wannan kuma yanzu haka azuzuwan firamaren garin tara da makewayi (bandaki) ruwan ya rusa su, kuma ya yi gaba da su babu ko alamarsu, sannan kuma wannan makarantar firamaren ita kadai ce akwai a garin Bachaka da kewaye, wanda idan idan ba a dauki matakin gaggawa ba, garin ya na iya tashi gabadaya.

Honarabul Garba Yeldu (Marasco), Shugaban Karamar Hukumar Mulki ta Arewa, ya nuna alhininsa bisa ga rasuwar wadannan mutanen, inda kuma ya yi alkawarin cewa, karamar hukumar ba za ta yi kasa a gwiwa ba har sai ta ga gwamnatin jihar da kuma hukumar agajin gaggawa sun dauki matakin ceto al'ummar wannan garin.
Ya na mai cewa, gaskiya wannan aikin ya fi karfi matakin karamar hukuma.

Ya cigaba da cewa, yanzu haka ya kai rahoton wannan iftila'in ga hukumar agajin gaggawa ta Jihar Kebbi, wato Kebbi State Emergency Management Agency (KSEMA), inda su ka bukaci a zayyano sunayen magidantan da abin ya shafa.

Wadansu majiyoyi sun labarta wa Wakilin LEADERSHIP A YAU cewa, yanzu haka mutane da yawa daga cikin wadanda su ka rasa gidajensu, sun koma cikin Jamhuriyar Nijar, saboda kasar kusan daya ne, illa dai titi ne kadai ya raba garuruwan, amma akwai alaka ta zamantakewa mai kyau da kuma auratayya.
Five People Dead, 30 Houses Collapsed in Kebbi.
Bachaka Residents have Began Moving To Niger Republic.

Five people have been killed and more than 30 houses destroyed by flood in Bachaka town of Arewa Local Government Area of ​​Kebbi State, due to heavy rainfall. The incidence force the residents to began moving into the neighboring country, Republic of Niger.
Honourable. Bashar Shafi'u Bachaka is the councilor representing this constituencies of Bachaka and Sakkwabe.
He said, currently, whenever there was a storm, everyone would get scared until the rainfall receded. Because whenever the rain falls it destroyed houses due to this river shore threats.

The village head of Arewan Bachaka, Alhaji Yakubu Maiyaki, has appealed to Kebbi State Government to come to our aid, because currently many residents lost their homes for years due to the heavy rains.

After that, the nine primary school classrooms and toilets were destroyed by the floods, and have disappeared without trace, this is the only primary school in Bachaka and its environs, and if emergency measures not taken In the event, the city may be washed away altogether.

Honourable Garba Yeldu (Marasco), Chairman of Arewa Local Government Area, expressed his sorrow over the deaths of this people and promised that the local government would not rest until the state government and the relief agency take immediate action to save the people of this town.
He said the project was indeed beyond the local government
He added that, he had now reported the matter to the Kebbi State Emergency Management Agency (KSEMA), who demanded the names of the victims be forwarded to them.

Sources told LEADERSHIP TODAY that many of those who lost their homes have now have migrated to Republic of Niger, because the countries are very close to each other a separated them, but there are social connections and inter-marriages between them.
Maurice Pretty, injniya kuma mai kera inji, dan cikin zauren shahararru, ya rasu yana da shekaru 81 a duniya.

Birni Kansas, Kan (AP) Maurice Pettu daya daga cikin zuriyar gidan shaharar tseren motoci da ya hada da mahafii Lee da yaya Richard da kuma injiniya na farko da magini da shaharar su ta suka shiga zaurren shararru na NASCA, ya mutu a ranar Asabar.
Shekarunsa 81 da haihuwa.
Iyalan Petty ba su bayyana sanadiyyar mutuwar ta sa ba.
Babu wata sanarwa ta shirye-shiryen janaizarsa
Yayin da sauran 'yan uwansa suka yi fice a irin kwazonsu da kwarewarsu na iya sarrafa stiyarin mota, Maurice Petty kuwa ya samu lakabin "shugaba" ne saboda yadda ya san karfe da kuma sarrafa shi.

Ya taimaki gidansu lashe gasar tsere 198 da kuma gasar fidda zakaru na jerin gasar tsere na NASCA firimi ya kuma kira injinan da gwanayen tuki Halla of famer Buddy Baker, da Jim Paschal, da Hamilton suka hau, suka kai ga nasara da kuma shahara.
"Sarki na daya daga masu basira kera inji da gyaransa a tarihin NASCAR", a cewar shugaba da kuma babban jami'i Jima France.
"Ya samar da karfin da ya taimakawa kamfanin Petty Enterprises tabbatar da dorewar ci gabansa a wasannin tsere.
Yayin da ya yi suna a aikinsa a karkashin mota, Maurice ya taka muhimmiyar rawa a bayan fage da yawa, yana yin abim da ya sani na taimaka wajen kai motocinsa ga nasara"
An haifi Maurice Petty a rarnar 27 ga watan Maris a shekarar 1939, a wani wuri da ake kira Level Crossing, North Carolina.
A lokacin yana karami, ya ka bi mahaifinsa zuwa wurin tsere, sannu a hankali har ya zama kusa a cikim 'yan Lee Petty da suka lashe gasar tsere 54 da kuma gasar zakaru guda uku.
Ya shiga tsere 26 a gasar cin kofin NASCAR daga shrekarun 1960 zuwa 64, a inda ya kai ga matak na 5 har sau biyar a inda ya kai 16 a sma da kuma tser100

Amma cikin sauri ya yanke shawarar ya mayar da hankali kan abinda ke karkashin mota a maimakon abin da ke bayn sitiyari, kuma hakan sai ya kasance shawara mai kyau da zai taimakaw yayansa, wanda zai dogara da karfin injinansa har ya kai ga nasara
Richard, wanda ya ke amsa lakabin "Sarki" ya lashe gasarsa ta farko ta gasar zakarun tare da shuganba yayin da ya yi tuki a gasar Playmouth har zuwa ga gasar shekarar 1964 ta neman suna
Sun kuma sake lashe gasar a shekarar 1967, kai da kai, a shekarar 1970 da kuma 71 , ya kuma sake maimaita wannan nasara kafina shekarar 1970 da ta kawo karshen lamarin,
Nasarorin gasa guda 7 sun kasance a hannun Dale Earnhardt da Jimmie Johnson har zuwa karshen tarihi

Maurice Petty, Hall of Fame engine builder, dies at 81

KANSAS CITY, Kan. (AP) - Maurice Petty, part of a stock car racing dynasty that includes father Lee and brother Richard and the first engine builder to be inducted into the NASCAR Hall of Fame, died Saturday.
He was 81.
Petty's family did not disclose the cause of death.
No funeral arrangements have been announced.
While other family members were acclaimed for their ability behind the wheel, Maurice Petty earned the nickname "The Chief" for his ability to turn a wrench.
He helped his family win 198 races and seven championships in NASCAR's premier series, and he also built engines that carried Hall of Famer Buddy Baker, Jim Paschal and Pete Hamilton to victory.
"The Chief was one of the most talented mechanics in NASCAR history," chairman and chief executive Jim France.
"He provided the power that helped Petty Enterprises define dominance in sports.
While he was known for his work under the hood, Maurice played multiple behind-the-scenes roles, doing what it took to help deliver his cars to victory lane."
Maurice Petty was born March 27, 1939, in Level Cross, North Carolina.
He would tail his father to the track while growing up, and his mechanical know-how soon played an integral part in Lee Petty winning 54 races and three championships.
He made 26 starts in the NASCAR Cup Series from 1960-64, finishing in the top 5 seven times with 16 top-10 runs.

But he quickly decided to focus on what happened under the hood rather than what happened behind the wheel, and that proved to be a good move for his older brother, who would rely on his engines during his period of dominance.
Richard, who would take on the nickname "The King," won his first championship along with The Chief when he drove a Plymouth to the 1964 title.
They won again in 1967, back-to-back titles in 1970 and "71, and added three more before the 1970s drew to an end.
The seven titles remains tied with Dale Earnhardt and Jimmie Johnson for the most in history.
"Maurice Petty was one of the true pioneers in NASCAR who helped build one of NASCAR's dominant teams in Petty Enterprises," Hall of Fame executive director Winston Kelley said in a statement.
"Although the record shows 212 victories, Petty has well over 250 wins to his credit considering all the engines he built for his competitors.
Chief will forever be remember as one of the best to build power plants in NASCAR."
Lee Petty died in 2000 and Maurice Petty's wife of 52 years, Patricia, died in 2014.
He also was the uncle of former driver and broadcaster Kyle Petty and Truck Series crew chief Trent Owens.
"While we have lost one of NASCAR's true, gritty pioneers and heroes, Maurice Petty's legacy and memory will always be remembered, preserved, celebrated and cherished," Kelley said.
"We offer our sincere condolences to the Petty family."
Wasannin gasar motsa jiki na Olympics rukunin matasa an jinkirta shi zuwa shekarar 2026

Wasannin gasar motsa jiki na Olympics da aka sa za a yi a Dakar ta kasara Senegal a shekara mai zuwa, an daga shi zuwa shekarar 2026 saboda bullar annobar cutar Koronabirus, bayan yarjejeniyar da aka cimma tsakanin hukumar shirya gasar ta Olympics ta kasa da kasa (IOC) da kuma kasar Senegal.
Dage wannan wasa na Olympics na farko da za a yi a nahiyar Afrika ya zamo babba cikas ga yawancin matasa 'yan wasan motsa jiki.
Dakar Youth Olympic Games delayed until 2026

The Youth Olympic Games were scheduled to take place in Dakar next year, but they have been moved to 2026 due to the coronavirus pandemic after an agreement between the International Olympic Committee (IOC) and Senegal.
The postponement of the first Olympic event to be held in Africa comes as a setback however for many young athletes.
Najeriya za ta ci tarar jirgin saman da ya shigo da wanda ba ya da takardar shaidar gwajin-cutar-Korona.

Kodinetan Kwamitin Shugaban Kasa na Dakile Cutar Coronavirus, Sani Aliyu, ya bayyana cewa Najeriya ba za ta bar wani dan kasar waje shigowa ba, har sai ya nuna shaidar cewa an yi masa gwaji a kasar sa cewa ba shi dauke da cutar Coronavirus.
Aliyu ya yi wannan jawabi a wurin taron ganawa da manema labarai na Kwamitin Shugaban Kasa mai Dakile Cutar Coronavirus.
An gudanar da taron da manema labarai ne a Abuja a ranar Litinin din nan.

Da ya ke karin bayani kan sabbin ka'idojin da gwamantin Tarayya ta gindaya dangane da bude filayen jirage da za a yi a fara shigowa da fita Najeriya daga ranar 29 Ga Agusta, Aliyu ya ce duk wani fasinjan da zai shigo Najeriya, tilas sai ya nuna takardar shaidar an yi masa gwajin cutar Coronavirus akalla mako guda, wato kwanaki bakwai da yin gwajin, kafin ya shigo Najeriya tukunna.
Duk Wanda Ya Shigo Najeriya Sai Mun Killace Shi Sati Daya
Aliyu ya kara da cewa duk wani fasinjan da ya sauka filin jirgin Najeriya, to kafin a bar shi ya shiga gari, sai an killace shi tsawon kwanaki 7 tukunna.
Dama kuma sai an gamsu da takardar shaidar ba shi dauke da cutar Coronavirus tukunna kafin ma a bar shi ya fita daga filin jirgin.

Abin Damuwa Game da damuwar da ake nunawa cewa sai mai dauke da katin shaidar rashin cutar Coronavirus a jikin sa za a bari ya shigo Najeriya, Aliyu ya ce za a duba lamarin a lokacin da bukatar hakan ta taso.
Ya ce jami'an lafiya ne za su rika kula da fasinjonin da za a killace.
Kuma duk bakon fasinjan da ya ki bari a yi masa gwaji, to za a hada shi da jami'in shige-da-fice domin su dauki matakin da ya dace a kan sa.
Rahotanni sun ce Ministan Sufurin Jiragen Sama Hadi Sirika ya ce Najeriya za ta hana duk wani jirgi sauka, muddin kasar sa ta hana jiragen da suka tashi daga Najeriya sauka a cikin kasar.
Sirika ya ce an yi taro an sanar wa masu kamfanonin sufurin jirage wannan ka'ida.
Akalla fasinjoji 1,280 za su rika sauka Najeriya a kullum daga kasashen waje, a filayen jiragen Lagos da Abuja.
Nigeria to fine airline that brings in anyone without proof of test for Coronavirus.

Coordinator of the Presidential Commission on Coronavirus Infection, Sani Aliyu, has stated that Nigeria will not allow any foreigner to enter the country, unless he proves that he has been tested in his country to be free of Coronavirus.
Aliyu made the remarks at a press conference of the Presidential Commission on Coronavirus Prevention.
The press conference was held in Abuja on Monday.

Elaborating on the new rules set by the Federal Government regarding the opening of airports in Nigeria from August 29, Aliyu said any passenger entering Nigeria must show proof that he was tested for Coronavirus at least one week, seven days before entering Nigeria.
Anyone entering Nigeria must be detained for one week
Aliyu added that any passenger who lands at a Nigerian airport must be locked up for seven days before being allowed to enter the city.
He must be certified not to have coronavirus before being allowed to leave the airport.
On the Concern that only the holder of a coronavirus-negative card will be allowed to enter Nigeria, Aliyu said the matter would be looked into when the need arise.
He said the passengers would be taken care of by health officials.
And any foreign passenger who refuses to be tested, will be handed over to an immigration officer so that appropriate action be taken against him.
According to reports, the Minister of Civil Aviation, Hadi Sirika, has said that Nigeria will ban all flights from the countries that bans flights departing from Nigeria.
Sirika said a meeting had been held to inform airline owners of the regulation.
At least 1,280 passengers will land in Nigeria daily from overseas, at Lagos and Abuja airports.
An Yi Kira Ga Buhari, El-Rufai Da Su Yi Murabus.

Wata kungiya mai fafutukar kare ƴancin dimokradiyya da hakkin bil adama a Najeriya mai suna Concerned Nigerians ta yi kira ga shugaban Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari da gwamnan jihar Kaduna, Malam Nasir El-Rufai da su yi murabus.
A cikin wata sanarwar da kungiyar ta aikewa ƴan jarida a yau Litinin kungiyar ta jaddada muhimmancin kawo karshen kashe-kashen da ake ta fama da su a kudancin jihar Kaduna.
Concerned Nigerians ta yi Allah wadai da abin da ta kira sakaci daga gwamnati.
A cewarta, kashe-kashen da ake ci gaba da yi a Kaduna ba tare da martanin kirki daga gwamnati abin mamaki ne da Allah wadai.
Sanarwar ta kara da cewa "a ganinmu dukannin rayukan ƴan Najeriya na da muhimmanci, ba ma goyon bayan yadda ake ta kashe mutane a Kaduna cikin makonnin da suka gabata".

Kan wannan zancen, Muryar Amurka ta tuntubi mai baiwa shugaban kasar Najeriya shawara kan harkokin yada labarai, Bashir Ahmed kuma ya sheda mana cewa "gwamnati na iya kokarinta domin kawo karshen wadannan matsalolin".
Wadannan maharan ba mu san ko su waye ba, suna iya sanya tufafi domin sajewa da mutanen gari shi ya sa dole sai mun bi a hankali domin yin abin da ya fi dacewa.
Ahmed ya kara da cewa, "kan wadannan hare-haren babban hafsan hafsoshin Najeriya, Tukur Buratai ya je Kaduna domin ganin wadanda lamarin ya shafa".
Wannan sanarwar ta Concerned Nigerians na zuwa ne kwana daya bayan da jaridu suka rawaito cewa an sake kai wani harin a kudancin jihar ta Kaduna wacce ke fama da matsalar hare-hare.
Buhari, El-Rufai Urged To Resign.
An association advancing democratic cause and human rights called Concerned Nigerians has called on President Muhammadu Buhari and Kaduna State Governor Nasir El-Rufai to resign.
In a statement issued to newsmen on Monday, the group stressed the importance of ending the ongoing killings in southern Kaduna State.
Concerned Nigerians condemned what it called negligence on the part of the government.
According to her, the ongoing killings in Kaduna without a positive response from the government are shocking and deplorable.
"In our view, the lives of all Nigerians are important and we do not support the killings in Kaduna in recent weeks," the statement added.
On this matter, Voice Of America contacted the Media Adviser to the President, Bashir Ahmed, and he said, "the government is doing all what can to end these problems".
We do not know who these bandits are, can wear clothes to fit in with the locals so we have to be careful to do and approach the issue with caution.
"Following the attacks, Tukur Buratai, the Chief of Staff of the Nigerian Armed Forces, went to Kaduna to see the victims," Ahmed added.
The Concerned Nigerians announcement comes a day after newspapers reported another attack in the troubled southern state of Kaduna.
Ciwon zuciya: Cin cakulan sau ɗaya a mako na iya rage haɗarin fadawa cikin wannan mummunan matsayi
Wani sabon bincike ya yi nuni na hakika cewa soma wannan dabia na iya zama mai kyau ga tsokar zuciya.
Menene shi? Kuma ta yaya za ta iya rage yiwuwar hadarin kamuwa da ciwon zuciya?
Masu bincike sun gudanar da wasu bincike-bincike da nazari na tsawon sama da shekaru biyar suna duban cututtukan da suka shafi kahon zuciya (CHD).
CHD - wannan kuma ana kiranta da sunan cututtukan zuciya na ischemic - yana da manyan alamomi guda uku: ciwon kirji (angina), bugun zuciya da gazawar zuciya.
Sauran alamun cutar na iya haɗawa da bugun zuciya da kuma rashin numfashi mai ban mamaki.
"Cakuleti na dauke da sinadaran da ke samar da lafiyar zuciya kamar flavonoids, da methylxanthines, da polyphenols da kuma stearic acid wanda ka iya rage kumburi da kuma kara kyastarol mai kyau. "
Kyakkyawan cholesterol, da aka san shi da babban nauyi na lipoprotein (HDL), yana tattara “mummunan” cholesterol - nau'in da ke buɗe jijiyoyin zuciya - kuma ya ɗauke shi zuwa hanta.
A cikin hanta, "mummunan" (low-density lipoprotein) cholesterol yana narkewa sannan kuma ya fita daga jiki a matsayin najasa.
Sai dai, sabon binciken bai yi nazarin girman rabo, ko nau'in cakuletin ko kuma irie-irensu da ya kamata a ji dadinsu ba.
Ba a bayyana ba ko wadanda aka yi binciken a kansu sun ci cakulan mai duhu ne, ko cakuleti mai madara ko mai dauke da kayan marmari na kuma mai dauke da koko.
Sakamakon binciken ya ta'allaka ne akan binciken da aka yi a baya wanda ya tabbatar da cewa shan koko (wanda ake samu a cikin cakuleti) ya na rage barazanar kamuwa da ciwon zuciya.
Masana kimiyya sun yi imani da cewa flavonoids da aka samo a cikin cakulan na rage hawan jini sanna ya kuma inganta aikin jijiyoyin jini.
Aikin jijiyoyin jini yana nufin yadda jini ya ke sadar da iskar oxygen da abubuwan gina jiki a cikin jiki da yadda fitar da abubuwa marasa amfani daga jikin.
Dangane da sabon binciken, ba a bayyana cewa ko abubuwan tafi da rayuwa an fifitasu a cikin sakamakon ba.
Dokta Alice Lichtenstein ta yi tsokaci kan bayanan, tana mai nuna cewa wadanda suka yarda da cin cakulan na iya samun "lafiyar jiki mai nauyi."
Ta kuma kara da cewa za su iya "tsunduma a kai a kai" a ayyukan motsa jiki kuma su zama "wadanda ba sa cikin damuwa."
Ta ci gaba da cewa: "Kowane abu na iya yin tasiri na kashin kansa a lafiyar jijiyoyin da suka shafi zuciya."
Heart attack: Eating chocolate once a week may reduce risk of the deadly condition
New research has pinpointed a certain indulgence may be good for the heart muscle.
What is it? And how would it reduce the chances of a heart attack?
Researchers conducted a meta-analysis spanning five decades looking into coronary heart disease (CHD).
CHD - that also goes by the name of ischaemic heart disease - has three main symptoms: chest pain (angina), heart attacks and heart failure.
Other symptoms of the disease can include heart palpitations and unusual breathlessness.
"Chocolate contains heart-healthy nutrients such as flavonoids, methylxanthines, polyphenols and stearic acid which may reduce inflammation and increase good cholesterol."
Good cholesterol, otherwise known as high-density lipoprotein (HDL), collects "bad" cholesterol - the kind that furs up the heart's arteries - and transports it to the liver.
In the liver, "bad" (low-density lipoprotein) cholesterol is broken down and excreted from the body.
However, the new study doesn't examine portion sizes, or the type of chocolate enjoyed.
It's not clear whether the participants ate dark chocolate, milk chocolate or some other cocoa confectionery.
The findings were based on previous research that concluded that consuming cocoa (found in chocolate) reduced the risk of a heart attack.
It's believed by scientists the flavonoids found in chocolate lower blood pressure and improve vascular function.
Vascular function refers to how effectively the blood delivers oxygen and nutrients throughout the body and carries away waste material.
In regards to the new research, lifestyle factors weren't highlighted in the results.
Dr Alice Lichtenstein commented on the data, suggesting that those who admitted to eating chocolate may be more likely to have "a healthy body weight."
She added that they could "regularly engage" in physical exercise and be "less stressed."
She continued: "Each factor could independently impact on cardiovascular health."

An gudanar da sallar Jumma′a a ginin Hagia Sofia

Dubban mutane ciki har da shugaban kasar Turkiyya Racep Tayyip Erdogan da ya samu rakiyar ministan kudi na kasar da ke zama sirikinsa suka hallarci sallar jumma'ar, albarkacin gwagwarmayar da al'ummar kasar masu kishin addini Islama suka kwashe tsawon lokaci suna yi.
Wannan mataki dai na zuwa ne bayan da wata kotu a birnin ta yanke hukuncin mai da ginin Hagia Sofia zuwa masallaci.
Ra'ayoyi sun banbanta a ciki da wajen kasar tun bayan wannan hukunci.
Tuni hukumar raya ilimi da al'adu ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, UNESCO ta nuna rashin jin dadi kan matakin mayar da wanann ginin tarihi zuwa masallaci.
Friday prayers were held at the Hagia Sofia building.

Thousands of people, including Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, who was accompanied by his son-in-law, the country's finance minister, attended Friday prayers, thanks to the country's long-running struggle by Islamic activists.
The move comes after a court in the city ruled that the Hagia Sofia building should be converted into a mosque.
Opinions have differed inside and outside the country since the ruling.
The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) has already expressed concern over the decision to turn the building into a mosque.
Afrika ta kudu: Prince Ashwell da Marsha Cox tun yi magana kan yadda aka nuna musu wariyar launin fata
A wasu makoni da suka wuce ta bayyana cewa da akwai wasu abubuwan ban kunya da aka boye da kuma ke fitowa fli dangane da nuna wariyar launin fata a wasannin motsa jiki na Afrika ta Kudu.
Da akwai bukatar tattaunawa mai ma'ana da kuma daukar mataki kwakkwara domin samar da yanayin wasannin motsa jikin na kowa da kowa.

Tsohon tauraron Proteas maia tsaron gida a wasan cricket Aswell Prince ya caccaki tsaffin abokan wasansa fararen fata yana mai zarginsu da nuna masa wariyar launin fata ta lakabin da suke yi masa da shi da sauran 'yan wasan bakaken fata sunan "'yann wasan cike gurbi."
Prince ya na mai cewa 'yan wasan Proteas fararen fata na kiran bakakken fata kararada " 'yan wasan ciki gurbi".

Ya kara da cewa abin takaici ne cewa hatta manyan 'yan wasa bakaken fata kamar su Makhaya Ntini da yanzu kuma Kasigo Rababa wadanda suka kai kolowa na shahara a wasan, har yanzu wasu mutane na ci gaba da lika musu wannan suna na kaskanci.

Prince, wanda shine mai horas da 'yan wasa na kungiyuar Cape Cobras Franchise, ya furta wannan ne a wani taron karawa juna sani ta hanyar yanar gizo da Haddiyar Kungiyar Wasanni da kuma kungiyoyin cikin al'umma (UCSBO) ta gudanar a daren Alhamis.
Kungiyar na kokarin fadada tattaunawar da ake yi na wariyar al'umma a wasanni a Afrika ta Kudu wanda ya samo asali a tarihin kasar.
"Kamar yadda na fada a sakonnina a shafukan sada zumunta, ba niyyata ba ce na fitowa in bata sunan mutane ba ne, amma wadannan abubuwan da gaske sun faru...
South Africa: Ashwell Prince and Marsha Cox Speak On Experiences of Discrimination
Over the last few weeks it has become evident that are many skeletons in relation to racial discrimination in South African sport.
Constructive conversations need to be had and action has to be taken in order to forge more inclusive sports.
Former Proteas batting star Ashwell Prince has lashed out at his former white team mates, accusing them of racial bias by labelling him and other black squad members as "quota players."
Prince said that in the Proteas team black players were openly labelled "quota players" by their white teammates.
Adding that it is sad that even when black players such as Makhaya Ntini and now Kagiso Rabada who ascended to the pinnacle of the game, they still have the quota tag attached to them by some people.
Prince, the current coach of the Cape Cobras franchise, made the comments on a webinar hosted by the United Coalition for Sport and Community Based Organisations (UCSCBO) on Thursday night.
The organisation aims to further the raging conversation of historic racial discrimination in South African sports.
"Like I said in my social media outburst, it's not my idea to come and drag people's names through the mud, but these are real incidents...
SULTAN: Abinda muka tattauna da Sarkin musulmi a fadar gwamnati.
Mai martaba Sarkin Musulmi ya ziyarci gwamnan jihar Kaduna Nasir El-Rufai a fadar gwamnatin jihar dake Kaduna ranar litinin.
Duk da cewa sun yi ganawa a asirce ne, gwamnan Kaduna ya bayyana wa manema Labarai cewa sarkin Musulmi ya yi masa ziyarar zumunci ne.
Sarkin Musulmi wana ne domin tun a makarantar Sakandare da muka yi a Zariya, wato Barewa College, yana gaba da mu.
Bugu da kari ya ce ya garzayo Kaduna ne domin shima ya gani kuma ya ji wa kan sa daga bakin gwamnan abubuwan da ke faruwa a jihar.
Sannan kuma ya yaba wa kungiyoyin da basu ga maciji a tsakanin su, suka hadu domin yin sulhu da neman su zauna lafiya a tsakanin su.
A karshe ya yi addu'ar Allah zaunar da jihar Kaduna Lafiya da kasa baki daya.
El-Rufai ya kara da cewa sun tattauna abubuwa da dama da sarkin musulmin sai dai kuma wannan tsakanin su ba na gama gari bane.
Idan ba a manta ba tun a litinin makon jiya ne gwamna El-Rufai ya ke ta karbar baki a fadar gwamnatin jihar.
Baya ga shugaban kungiyar Kiristoci da ya ziyarce shi, tsohon Sarkin Kano kuma aminin sa Sanusi Lamido shima ya ziyarce shi ranar Lahadi.
Gaba dayan su sun yi kira ga mutanen Kaduna da su zauna lafiya da kuma fatan Allah ya kawo karshen rashin zaman lafiya da ake fama da shi a kasar nan.
SULTAN: What we discussed with the Sultan at the Government House.
The Sultan of Sokoto paid a courtesy call on Kaduna State Governor Nasir El-Rufai at the State House, Kaduna on Monday.
Although the meeting was held in secret, the Kaduna governor told reporters that the Sultan had paid him a friendly visit.
The Sultan of Sokoto is my elderly brother because he has been ahead of us during our Secondary school era, that is the Barewa College in Zaria.
He added that he had come to Kaduna to see and hear from the governor what was happening in the state.
He also praised the groups that were not living peacefully among themselves but came together to reconcile and seek to live happily together.
And lastly, he prayed for peace and prosperity in Kaduna State.
El-Rufai added that they had discussed a number of issues with the Sultan but that was personal.
If not forgotten, Governor El-Rufai has been receivingweek a special guest at the State House since last week Monday.
In addition to the president of the Christian Association who visited him, the former Emir of Kano and his friend Sanusi Lamido also visited him on Sunday.
They all called on the people of Kaduna to live in peace and wished for an end to instability in the country.

"Na samu wasu masu saye daga Melbourne da suka zo nan, suna cike da mamakin kusacinsa ga komai da komai, amma kuma yana da wani abu na karkara.
"Ina da mutanen da ke taikaicin rashin sayen wurin, kuma har yanzu da akwai masu sayen da ke ta lalube."

Ya ce yalwataccen rumfar wacce ta kunshi wurin ajiye motoci biyu da kuma wata rumfar da za ta iya ajiye motoci 10-12, wurin ya dace da ajiyar kananan ababen hawa da majanye na da ake makalawa a mota na zuwa nishadi.
Buyers quick to act on coveted Lovely Banks lifestyle property
The bigger is better philosophy clearly rang true for the new owners of a sprawling Lovely Banks property that's just sold for $1.277m.
Buyers seeking a lifestyle address not far from central Geelong lined up to inspect the 1.35ha offering that has garaging for 14 cars, a swimming pool and views over Corio Bay.
Harcourts, North Geelong agent Joe Grgic said 1 Cuddihy Court went under offer within 10 days of hitting the market.
Ocean Grove's restored Broome Cottage up for sale
Homes perfect for self-isolation
"We had multiple offers from different parties," Mr Grgic said.
"It sold to a local guy who is very excited."
The property comes with a two-storey, four-bedroom house that includes a huge ensuite, large enough to accommodate a couch.
The new owners will also enjoy three living areas, a renovated kitchen and an updated outdoor entertainment area overlooking the pool.
"It was the combination of the lifestyle property, being three acres, and it's right there," Mr Grgic said.
"I had some Melbourne buyers come down and they couldn't believe its proximity to everything but yet it had that rural feel.
"I actually have people who missed out and buyers that are still looking."
He said the generous shedding, which includes a double garage and separate shed which can accommodate 10-12 vehicles, was perfect for tradies or storing caravans and trailers.
Majlisar Kano ta musanta zartar da dokar dandatsa - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Majalisar dokokin jihar Kano ta musanta cewa ta zartar da dokar yin dandatsa ga mutanen da aka kamasu da laifin fyade.
Dan majalisa mai wakiltar karamar hukumar Dala Lawan Husaini Chediyar "Yan-Gurasa ne ya bayyana haka yayin zantawa da tashar freedom rediyo.
Ya ce, an dai gabatar da kudirin gaban majalisar a kwanakin baya, sannan sai an ji ra'ayin al'umma kafin a dauki mataki kan lamarin.
Ya kuma ce, majalisar za ta tsattsefe kudirin sosai kafin ta amince da shi.
Dan Majalisar ya kara da cewa masu ruwa da tsaki da suka hada da malamai da sarakuna za su taka rawa wajen tabbatar da wannnan doka .
Kano State House of Assembly denies passing the law on castration - Freedom Radio Nigeria law.
The Kano State House of Assembly has denied that it has passed a law on castrating people convicted of rape.
Member of Parliament representing Dala local Government, Lawan Husaini Chediyar 'Yan-Gurasa made this known in an interview with Freedom Radio.
He said, the bill had been presented in parliament in recent days and public opinion would have to be heard before any action could be taken.
He said the legislature would scrutinize the bill thoroughly before approving it.
The lawmaker added that stakeholders including clerics and chiefs would play a role in enforcing the law.
Wata Kotu a Gurugram ta yi sammacin Kamafanin Alibaba, da Jack Ma a bisa wata kara da wani tsohon ma'aikaci ya yi

Gurugram ranar 26 ga watan Yuli. A wani cigaban kuma, Kamfanin Alibaba da kuma wanda ya kirkiri kamfanin wata kotu a gurugram ta yi sammacinsu bayan da wani tsohon ma'aakacin kamfanin ya yi zargin cewa an kore shi daga aiki saboda ya bijirewa tantacewa da kuma labarin karya na manhajar kamfanin.

An shigar da karar ne a wata Kotu da ke lardin Guragram wacce wani alkali Sonia Sheokand ta bayar aika da takardar sammaci ga Kamafanin Alibaba da kuma Jack Ma da kuma karin wasu su kusan goma sha biyu tare da umartarsu da su bayyana a gabanta aranara 29 ga watan Yuli a cewar rahotanni.
Alkalin ya kuma bukaci amsar tuhumar a rubuce daga kamafanin, a cewar wani rahotoi na kamafani labarai na Reuters.

Parmar wanda a da, yake aiki a ofishin UC Web a Gurugram kafin sallamarsa a watan Oktobar shekarar 2017 ya na neman a biya shi diyyar $268,000 a matsayin diyya, in ji takardun shigar da kara na Kotun.
"Ba za mu yi kasa a gwiwa ba wajan sadaukar da kai ga kasuwar Indiya da kuma jin daɗin ma'aikatanta na gida, kuma manufofinta suna bin dokokin ƙasa.
Ba mu da ikon yin tsokaci kan karar da aka shigar, " UC India ta bayyana a cikin wata sanarwa.

"Shari'ar ta kuma ƙunshi" jerin wasu kalmomin masu iya haifar da rudani "tare da wasu kalmomi irinsu a cikin yaren Hindi da Ingilishi kamar" iyakar Indiya da China "da" Yaƙin Sino-Indiya "wadanda kotun da ke suararon karar ta yi zargin cewa UC Web ne ya yi amfani da su don tantance abubuwan da ke cikin dandamalinta a Indiya, "Reuters ta ruwaito.
A watan da ya gabata, ma’aikatar cikin gida ta dakatar da manhajojin wayar hannu 59 na kasar Sin da suka hada da UC News, UC Browser a cikin rikicin kan iyaka a tsakanin kasashen biyu.
Alibaba, Jack Ma summoned by Gurugram court on former employee's complaint

Gurugram, July 26: In a major development, Alibaba and its founder Jack Ma has been summoned by a Gurugram court after the company's former employee alleged that he was fired for objecting censorship and fake news on company's applications.

The case is filed in Gurugram district court and Civil Judge Sonia Sheokand has issued a summons for Alibaba, Jack Ma and about a dozen others, and has asked them to appear on July 29, as per reports.
The judge has also sought written responses from the company, Reuters reported.
Parmar, who was an employee of the UC Web office in Gurugram until October 2017, is seeking $268,000 in damages, according to court documents.
"We are unwavering in its commitment to the Indian market and the welfare of its local employees, and its policies are in compliance with local laws.
We are unable to comment on ongoing litigation," UC India stated in a statement.

"The lawsuit also contains a "sensitive words list" with key words in Hindi and English like "India-China border" and "Sino-India war" that the court filing alleges were used by UC Web to censor content on its platforms in India," Reuters reported.
Last month, the Home Ministry had banned 59 Chinese mobile apps including UC News, UC Browser amidst border tensions between the two countries.
Makomar wurin zaman dabbar koala a arewacin Brisbane ya fada hannun kotun tsare-tsare

Majalisar ta ce, baya da kasancewar mazaunin mai matukar muhimmanci ne ga dabbar koala, da kurege, da kuma goshawk mai ruwan toka, babbar mahada ce tsakanin hanyoyin zuwa korama Kabejin Tree da kuma mashigar daji na koramar Albany.

Masu haɓaka kadarorin sun yi kira ga ƙin amincewar majalisar a Kotun Tsare-Tsare da Muhalli, suna jayayyar cewa gina wurin ya bi ƙa'idar tsarar birane na shekarar 2014, zai kuma gamsar da tsarin gari da ba a iya cimma sa ba, kuma biyan buƙatar al'umma kuma za a iya "aiwatar da shi ba tare da wani tasirin da ba a za a yarda da shi ba."
Adawa mai ƙarfi na al'umma yana ci gaba kan aniyar da ake da ita na giggina gidaje na zamani.

Masu son gina wurin, yayin da suka dage kan cewa aikin da suke so za su yi ya, ya yi daidai da tsarin habaka birane, suna mai jayayya da cewa za a iya canza tsarin gine-ginen don kaucewa duk wani rashin bin ƙa'idoji maimakon a hana su aikin baki dayansa.
Ci gaban kamar yadda yake a yanzu, ya ƙunshi matakai da yawa, ciki har da gidan mai, cibiyar kula da yara, da kuma gidajen gari 39.
Fiye da mutane 120 ne suka gabatar da ra'ayoyinsu a lokacin sauraron shawarwarin, mafi yawansu suna adawa ne da aikin ginin a ya yiwa wurin girma kuma bai dace da wurin ba.
Shugaban ‘yan adawar BCC Jared Cassidy ya ce majalisar na bukatar siyan karin wasu filayen ne filin don kare dabbar koala.

"[Mai girma Magajin gari] Adrian Schrinner na bukatar dakatar da barnatar da kudaden masu biyan haraji a shari'ar kotun tsara birane, da tafi ya sayi wannan fili don kare namun dajin Brisbane," in ji Cr Cassidy.
"Wannan wuri yana daya daga cikin wurare masu muhimmanci na dazukan da ke kusa da mashigar manyan tsirrai na bakin ruwa kuma gida ne ga babbar al'umar Koala"
Cr Schrinner a wannan makon na mai cewa majalisar na son ganin an kare mazaunin dabbar Koala a garin.
"Mu ba mu yarda cewa wannan shirin giggina gidaje ya dace da wannan wurin ba," Cr Schrinner ya na mai cewa.

"Na fahimci cewa wannan batu na gaban kotu, mu dai fatan abin da muke son gani a matsayin sakamako shine kyakkyawan hukunci wanda zai sa wannan matsuguni na wadannan kananan dabbobi ya zama an kare shi."

Cr Schrinner ya ce taswirar mazaunin koala aiki ne na hadin gwiwa tsakanin majalisa da gwamnatin jihar, inda gwamnatin jihar ke da alhakin cikakken taswirar koala da hukumomin yankin za su yi amfani da ita wajen nazarin takaradu neman izinin yin gina-gine na zamani.
Future of north Brisbane koala habitat site goes to planning court
The council said as well as being critical koala, squirrel glider and grey goshawk habitat, it was a key link between Cabbage Tree Creek and Albany Creek bushland corridors.

The property developers have appealed the council's rejection in the Planning and Environment Court, arguing the development complies with City Plan 2014 legislation, would satisfy an unmet town planning and community need and could "be undertaken without any unacceptable impacts."
Strong community opposition persists over the proposed development.
The developers, while maintaing the proposal is fully compliant with the plan, argue it could be changed to avoid any non-compliance rather than refused.
The development as it stands involves several stages, including a service station, childcare centre and 39 townhouses.
More than 120 public submissions were made during the consultation period, most objecting to the proposal as too big and inappropriate for the site.
BCC opposition leader Jared Cassidy said the council needed to buy the land to protect koalas.
"[Lord mayor] Adrian Schrinner needs to stop wasting ratepayer funds in a developer court battle and buy this land to protect Brisbane's wildlife," Cr Cassidy said.
"This is one of the most significant pieces of habitat in the Mountain to Mangroves Corridor and is home to a large koala community."
Cr Schrinner this week said the council wanted to see the koala habitat on the site protected.
"We didn't believe the proposal was appropriate for the site," Cr Schrinner said.
"This, I understand, is now going through a court process and obviously we hope to see out of that court process a good, positive outcome which will see the habitat preserved."

Cr Schrinner said koala habitat mapping was a joint responsibility between the council and the state government, with the state government responsible for detailed koala mapping used by local authorities for assessing development applications.
An ga wani mai kamun kifi 'ya jefi giwan ruwa da kwalbar giya' a Devon
Wani wanda ya ke fatsa ya jefi wata dabbana ruwa da kwalbar giya a lokacin da dabbar ta katse masa tarunsa, a cewar wata kungiyar agaji.
Wasu hotuna da aka dauka a Hope Nose, kusa da Torquay, na nuna wani mutum ya jifan dabbar ruwan da wani abu daga bakin wata gaba.
Duncan Kenny wanda ya dauki hotunan ya ce, dabbar ruwan ta fito kiwo ne a lokacin da mai kamun kifin ya kurbe abin da ya ke sha a wata kwalba kafin ya jefi dabbar da ita a inda ya same ta a baya.
Mista Kenny ya kira lamarin "tashin hankali da nuna rashin sanin yakamata."

Mutumin yana mai cewa yana tattara shara ne a wurin shakatawa na Devon tare da 'yan kungiyar agaji mai rajin tattalin kare dabbar ruwan, a lokacin da ya ga mutumin ya kai wannan hari a safiyar Lahadi.
"Dabbar ruwan dai ta yi kokarin kaiwa ga fatsar da mutumin ya jefa ne" a na mai cewa.
"Mai kamun kifin da ya kwankwade giyarsa, sai kawai ya jefi dabbar ruwan da ita.
"Kwalbar ta sami dabbar ruwan an bayansa da hakan ta sa ya bi ruwa ya yi tafiyarsa."
Mista Kenny ya na mai cewa "an dai sa a dabbar ruwan tana da aukin jiki, "amma dabbar ta na yin abin da ya ke dabi'arta ne kawai.
"Wannan jifanta da ya yi da kwalba hana ta yin farautarta ya yi" in ji mutumin.
Shirin kula da dabbar ruwan na mai cewa, "wannan ba sabon abu ba ne" dama ta sha samun rahotanni na faruwar irin wannan halin mugunta a baya-bayannan."

A wani sako da ta sa a shafinta na dandalin sada zumunta na Facebook, ta ce masu aikin sa kai sun tattara shara tare da jikankuna 12 a yayin wannan ziyara da suka kai Hope's Nose suna kuma lura da "misalai na halaye marasa kyau."
Dukkannin dabbobin ruwa na karkashin kariyar dokar kula da kuma alkinta dabbar ruwa, kuma ana shawartar mutane da su rika kauce wadannan dabbobin.
Angler 'seen throwing beer bottle at seal' in Devon
An angler threw a beer bottle at a seal when it interfered with his fishing line, a charity has said.
Photos taken at Hope's Nose, near Torquay, appear to show a man hurling a projectile at the creature from a cliff.
Duncan Kenny, who took the pictures, said the grey seal was hunting when the angler emptied the bottle and launched it, hitting the animal on the back.
Mr Kenny called it "appalling and inconsiderate behaviour."
He said he was collecting litter at the Devon beauty spot with members of the Seal Project conservation charity when he witnessed the attack on Sunday morning.
"The seal made an attempt to get the fishing line," he said.
"The angler finished his beer, drained the bottle and threw it at the seal.
"The bottle hit the seal on the back and it swam off."
Mr Kenny said that "fortunately seals are robust creatures," but said the seal was simply doing what was in its nature.
"By throwing a glass bottle at it you are stopping it from hunting," he said.
The Seal Project said it was "not an isolated case" and it had received "numerous reports of this aggressive behaviour recently."
In a Facebook post, it said volunteers had collected 12 bags of rubbish during Sunday's visit to Hope's Nose and observed "multiple examples of antisocial behaviour."
All seals are protected under the Conservation of Seals Act and people are advised to stay away from them.
Coles ya yi watsi da kayan wasan yara ya rungumi littafai a wani sabon gangami saye-sayen kayyaki.
"Mun yi sauraro na hakika, kuma yana daga cikin muhimman abubuwa da suka sa muka tsara wannan shiri", a cewar Ms Ronson.
"Ba ma tunanin cewa mutane za su sake fito da tsaffin littafansu don sake amfani da su - muna tunanin za su so su ajiye kayansu, amma za su sake amfani da su a gudajensu idan suna son yin haka."

Ms Ronson ta ce wannan sabon gangamin wayar da kai an dade ana tunanin yin sa tun kafin bullar cutar COVID - 19, kuma duk da annobar, ta yarda da cewa yanzu lokacin yin wannan gangamin "ya yi daidai" don soma wannan sabon gangami ganin wadatar lokaci da iyayen da ke da na zama tare da iyayensu.

Masu nazartar lamari na nuna damuwarsu kan yadda masu siyayya kantuna ke nuna gazawa wajen damunsu da aka yi na sayen kayayyaki barkatai daga maya-mayan kantuna, amma Ms Ronson ta ce su dai babu a garesu babu alamar gajiyawa dai.
"Mu ba mu soma ganin komai ba daga wannan abin da ake fada ba, amma mun sa ido" ta na mai cewa.
" Mun yi nazarin bayanai masu yawa, na mako-mako,da wata-wata, domin mu tabbatar mun kaddamar da abubuwan da abokanmu cinikanmu za su so" .

Gangamin sayar da kayayyaki na zabi irin hasali ma dai Coles ne ya soma shi a Australia da sunan Little shop wanda ya kadamar a tsakiyar shekarar 2015 tare da a cigaba da maimaita shi, wanda hakan ya samar da wata guguwar ciniki na ban mamaki a lokaci guda a tsakiyar shekara.

Tuni Woolworths ya biyo baya da nasa gangamin da ya kira 'Lion king Ooshiess wanda ya taimakawa manyan kantuna farfado da cinikinsu , kuma a baya-bayan nan wasu jerin kayayyakin kawa na lambu wanda a tsarin za a ba duk wanda ya saya kyautar filawowi da itatuwan magani su shuka.

Sai dai, duk da hashen manazarta na UBS da ke nuna cewa bangaren manya-manya kantunan sayra da kaya na Australia za su samu tashin farashin kayayyaki sakamakon cutar COVID -19 har zuwa karshen shekarar kudi ta 2021. Tasirin sabon tsarin kayan zanbi na sayarwa na Coles ba zai iaya tasiri ba.
Ms Ronson tace masu sayen kayayyaki sai su sa rai da karin wasu nau'in sayar zababbun kayyaki a gangami na gaba wanda hakan zai sa tsarin irin na 'little shop ' zai ja baya.
"Akwai irin wadannan ganganmin sayen zababbun kayayyaki da za su bullo a duniya, mu dai muna dada samun kwarin gwiwra ne daga irin wadannan abuwa daga kasashen waje.
"Ya kamata mu rika yin irin wadannan abiubuwan donmin mu tabbatar da cewa mun daga darajarmiu da kuma tarin maus cinikin da muke da shi
Coles ditches plastic toys for books in new collectibles campaign
"We've really listened, and it was a really key thing in formulating this program," Ms Ronson said.
"We don't think people will want to recycle the books - we think they'll want to keep them, but they can recycle them at home if they wish to."

Ms Ronson said the new campaign had been in the works long before the onset of COVID-19, and despite the pandemic, she believed the timing was "quite good" for a new campaign given the amount of time parents were spending with their children.
Analysts had been concerned shoppers were tiring of the constant collectibles campaigns from major supermarkets, but Ms Ronson said there was no sign of fatigue just yet.
"We're not seeing any of that so far, but we do constantly look out for it," she said.
"We analyse a lot of data, week to week, month to month, to make sure we're launching things that really resonate with the customer base."

Collectible campaigns such as Little Shop were primarily pioneered by Coles in Australia, with the first iteration launching in mid-2018, fuelling one of the supermarket's best-ever single-quarter sales results.

Woolworths has since followed suit with its Lion King Ooshies campaign, which also helped the supermarket supercharge its sales, and most recently, its eco-friendly Discovery Garden promotion, which offered customer free herbs and flowers to plant.

However, with UBS analysts predicting Australia's supermarket sector to have COVID-inflated sales through much of the 2021 financial year, the impact of Coles' new collectibles could be far more muted this time.
Ms Ronson said customers could expect more varied and diverse forms of collectibles campaigns into the future, with promotions such as Little Shop likely to appear less often.
"There's a lot of these collectible-type campaigns to look to around the world, and we're constantly drawing inspiration from overseas," she said.
"We should be doing those sorts of things to make sure we're constantly raising the bar with our own customer base."
Manyan Laifuka Bakwai Da Amurka Ta Aikata Suna Iya Yiwa Tsaron Duniya Barazana.
Halaye marasa da Amurka take aikatawa, babbar barazana ce ga zaman lafiya da tsaron duniya.
Ministan harkokin wajen kasar Cuba Bruno Rodrigurz, ya sha bayyanawa a jerin tarukan manyan jami'ai da aka gudanar domin murnar cika shekaru 75 da kafuwar MDD a watan Satumba cewa.
Gwamnatin Amurka ta aika a kalla munanan laifuka dake iya yin barazana ga tsaron duniya.
Na farko shi ne, tsoma baki a harkokin cikin gidan sauran kasashe da yin barazana ga tsaron siyasar duniya.
Na biyu, kakabawa kasashe takunkumi babu gaira babu dalili, barazana ce ga tsaron tattalin arzikin duniya.
Na uku tseren mallakar makamai shi ma barazana ce ga tsaron ayyukan soja a duniya.
Na hudu, kawo tsaiko a kokarin da ake na rage fitar da hayaki mai gurbata muhalli, da yin barazana ga tsarin muhallin duniya.
Na biyar, yayata akidar babakere da yin barazana ga tsaron muhallin halittu na duniya.
Na shida, aikata kutse ta intanet, da yiwa tsaron muhimman bayanan kasashen duniya barazana.
Sai kuma na bakwai kuma na karshe, yiwa hadin gwiwar kasa da kasa kan yaki da COVID-19 zagon kasa da yiwa tsarin lafiyar duniya barazana.
A duniyar ta yau, zaman lafiya da ci gaba da hadin gwiwar moriyar juna, su ne hanyoyin ci gaba.

Duk wani ra'ayi na son kai, da babakere, da dagawa, da yi wa wasu matsin lamba, da hadin baki da za su kawo cikas ga hadin gwiwar kasa da kasa da illata tsaron duniya, ba za su taba samun gindin zama ba kuma tarihi zai yi Allah wadai da su.
Seven Major Crimes perpetuated By US May Threaten Global Security.
The unscrupulous behavior of the United States poses a serious threat to world peace and security.
Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodrigurz has announced at a series of high-level meetings to celebrate the 75th anniversary of the founding of the United Nations in September.
The U.S. government has committed at least some serious crimes that could threaten international security.
The first is interfering in the internal affairs of other countries and threatening international political security.
Second, imposing sanctions on countries for no apparent reason is a threat to global economic security.
Third, the arms race is also a threat to global military security.
Fourth, delay efforts to reduce emissions, and threaten global ecosystems.
Fifth, the promotion of monopolistic ideology and posing a threat to the protection of the world's ecosystem.
Sixth, cyber-attacks, and threats to the security of sensitive international data.
In today's world, peace and development are mutually beneficial.
