Any ideas of selfishness, tyranny, arrogance, pressure, and co-operation that will jeopardize international cooperation and undermine global security will never take root. History will condemn them.
Wani dan jarida na gidan talbijin ya yabawa wani mai kallo sakamakon lura da yayi na wani dunkulen cutar kansa

TAMPA, Fla. (AP) - Wata mai ba da labarai a talabijin a Florida ta yabawa wani mai kallon mai idanun mikiya saboda lura da wani dunkulewar da ke wuyanta da kuma yi mata wasikar email yana mai cewa ya kamata ta je a duba ta.
Victoria Price wata 'yar jarida ta gidan talbijina na WFLA a Tampa, bayan jin wannan shawara ta ce an duba ta an kuma gano cewa tana da Kansa.
A wani sako da ta aika ta shafinta na sada zumunta na Tuwita ta ce za a yi mata aiki a ranar Litinin a inda za a cire mata kurjin da kuma wasu kaluluwa da sula fito mata.
"Likita ya ce yana yaduwa, amma ba shi da yawa, kuma muna fatan cewa wannan shine aikin da za a yi min na farko kuma na karshe. In ji ta.
Mai kallon a wasikar email din ya aika mata a watan da ya wuce yana mai cewa wannan kumburin na tuna mata irin wanda ita ta yi.
Price 'yar shekara 28 da haihuwa 'yar jarida mai binciken kwakwaf, ta ce a wannan makon taken tashar talbijin da ta ke shine "8 da ke tare da kai"
"Amma sai ga shi a kwanan nan yanayin ya canza, a lokacin da na samu dan kallo a bangarena, kuma ina cike da godiya" in ji Price.
"Ba zan taba mantawa da matar da ta yi wannan sadaukarwar ba ta aika min da wannan wasikar email, babu wata sanayya tsakanina da ita.
Babu abin da ya shafeta da ni, amma ta nuna ta damu.
Yi magana akan kasancewa a bangarenka na hakika, ko? "
TV reporter credits viewer with noticing cancerous lump
TAMPA, Fla. (AP) - A television news reporter in Florida is crediting an eagle-eyed viewer for noticing a lump on her neck and emailing her that she should get it checked out.
Victoria Price, a reporter for WFLA in Tampa, followed the advice and was diagnosed with cancer.
Price tweeted that she is undergoing surgery on Monday to remove the tumor, her thyroid and a couple of lymph nodes.
"Doctor said it's spreading, but not too much, and we're hopeful this will be my first and last procedure," she said.
The viewer emailed Price last month, saying the lump reminded her of one she had had.
Price, 28, an investigative reporter, said this week that her television station's catchphrase is "8 On Your Side."
"But the roles recently reversed when I found a viewer on MY side, and I couldn't be more grateful," Price said.
"I will be forever grateful for the woman who went out of her way to email me, a total stranger.
She had zero obligation to, but she did anyway.
Talk about being on your side, huh?"
TETFUND Ya Shigar Da Makarantu Masu Zaman Kansu Cikin Tallafin Bincike Na N7.5bn

Asusun tallafawa manyan makarantu TETFUND ta ce ta yi gyare-gyare domin shigar da cibiyoyin bincike masu zaman kansu, bangarorin da ba na jihohi ba da cibiyoyin ilimi a cikin asusun bayar da lamuni na dala biliyan 7.5 (NRF) wanda aka kebe domin dalilan bincike.

Sakataren zartarwa na Asusun, Farfesa Elias Bogoro ne ya sanar da hakan a Abuja yayin bikin kaddamar da Kwamitin Aiwatarwa kan hadin gwiwa tsakanin Ma'aikatar Kimiyya da Fasaha ta Tarayya da Asusun Tallafin Ilimi.

A cewarsa, tare da "Asusun Bincike na Kasa (NRF) wanda aka kara zuwa N7.5 biliyan a 2020 daga Naira biliyan 5 da aka amince da shi a cikin 2019, TETFund ya yi gyare-gyare domin hadawa da hukumomin da ba na jihohi ba kuma sun gayyaci cibiyoyin bincike na sirri da makarantun ilimi domin dalilai na bincike "

Shugaban TETFUND ya tunatar da kokarin Ministan Kimiyya da Fasaha, Dakta Ogbonnaya Onu kan hadin gwiwar tare da nuna godiyarsa ga jajircewa da kuma goyon baya da ya bayar domin ci gaban tattalin arzikin kasa.

Babban Sakataren Ma'aikatar Kimiyya da fasaha, Dr. Mohammed Bello Umar ya bayyana cewa, hadin gwiwar da ke tsakanin ma'aikatar da TETFund tana kan hanyar bunkasa tattalin arzikin Najeriya ta hanyar Kimiyya da Fasaha tare da cikakken kudade.
TETFUND Involves Private Schools In N7.5bn Research Fund.
TETFUND says it has made adjustments to include private, non-state-owned research institutes and educational institutions in a $ 7.5 billion National Research Fund set aside for research purposes.

The Executive Secretary of the Fund, Prof. Elias Bogoro, made the announcement in Abuja during the inauguration of the Executive Committee on Cooperation between the Federal Ministry of Science and Technology and the Education Scholarship Fund.

According to him, with the “National Research Fund (NRF) increased to N7.5 billion in 2020 from the N5 billion approved in 2019, TETFund has made adjustments to integrate non-state agencies nor have they invited private research institutes or educational institutions for research purposes"

The Chairman of TETFUND reminded the efforts of the Minister of Science and Technology, Dr. Ogbonnaya Onu on cooperation and thanked him for his commitment and support for the country's economic development.

The Secretary General of the Ministry of Science and Technology, Dr. Mohammed Bello Umar said the partnership between the ministry and TETFund was on track to boost the Nigerian economy through science and technology with full funding.
Magu ya kalubalanci rahoton kwamitin Ayo Salami.

Lauyan dakataccen shugaban hukumar yaki da cin hanci da rashawa ta EFCC Ibrahim Magu ya kalubalanci rahoton da kwamitin Ayo Salami ya fitar da ke baiwa shugaban kasa shawarar cire shi domin yanke masa hukunci kan tuhume-tuhume da ake yi masa.
Lauyan Ibrahim Magu Wahab Shitu ya ce ya zuwa yanzu bai gama tattara bayanan da zai gabatar da su ba, duk kuwa da sauraron korafe-korafe da kwamitin Salami ke yi.
Ya kara da cewa bayan zarge-zarge da ake yi wa dakataccen shugaban hukumar yaki a rashawan, kwamitin basu fito da kofin tuhume-tuhumen da suke yi akan sa ba.
Shittu har ila yau ya kara da cewa, matsayin sa na lauyan Ibrahim Magu bai samu damar ganin takardun tuhume-tuhumen ba da sauran zarge-zargen da ake yi wa Magu ba.
Magu challenged the report of Ayo Salami's committee.

The lawyer for the suspended chairman of the EFCC, Ibrahim Magu, has challenged a report released by the Ayo Salami Commission recommending that he should be removed to answer charges against him and prosecuted.
Wahab Shitu, Ibrahim Magu's lawyer said he had not yet finalized the information to be presented, despite hearing complaints from the Salami committee.
He added that after allegations against the suspended chairman of the anti-corruption commission, the committee had not released a copy of the charges against him.
Shittu also added that his position as Ibrahim Magu's lawyer did not get the chance to see the charges and other allegations against Magu.
Bankin duniya zai baiwa Kano da wasu jihohi bashin kudi - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Bankin Duniya zai bai wa jihar Kano da wasu jihohin kasar nan guda shida bashin kudi da ya kai dala miliyan dari biyar domin bunkasa harkokin karatun ƴaƴa mata.
A cewar bankin na Duniya rancen wanda babu kudin ruwa a cikinsa, za a yi amfani da shine wajen bunkasa karatun mata a matakan sakandire a jihohin guda bakwai.
Hakan na cikin wata sanarwar ce da bankin na Duniya ya fitar yau a Abuja wanda ke cewa, kudin wani bangare ne na kudaden da bankin ke bai wa kasashe masu tasowa domin gudanar da ayyukan raya kasa.
Jihohin da za su amfana da bashin na bankin Duniya don bunkasa karatun ilimi mata sun hada da: Kano da Kebbi da Kaduna da Katsina da Borno da Plateau da kuma Ekiti.
Haka zalika sanarwar ta kara da cewa, kudaden za su kuma taimaka wajen koyar da sana'oin dogaro da kai ga mata da kuma wayar da kan mata kan harkokin kiwon lafiya da sauransu.
World Bank to lend money to Kano and other states - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
The World Bank will provide $ 500 million in loans to Kano State and six other states in the country for the advancement of girls' education.
According to the World Bank, the interest-free loan will be used to promote secondary education for women in the seven states.
This is in a statement issued by the World Bank in Abuja today stating that the funds are part of the Bank's development assistance to developing countries.
The states that will benefit from the World Bank loan for the advancement of women's education include: Kano, Kebbi, Kaduna, Katsina, Borno, Plateau and Ekiti.
The statement added that the funds will also help in the training of women in self-employment and women's health awareness among others.
Ya Yi Garkuwa Da Diyarsa Da Neman Fansar Miliyan Biyu Daga Matarsa A Kano.

Wani magidanci a jihar Kano mai suna Fahad Ali, ya shiga hannun jami'an tsaron ƴan sanda tare da gurfanar da shi a gaban Kotun Majistire da ke sansanin alhazai a bisa zarginsa da sace diyarsa mai shekara hudu a duniya domin neman kudin fansa na naira miliyan biyu daga wajen matarsa uwar yarinyar da ya sace.

Mai shigar da kara ya shaida wa kotun cewa Shamsiyya Mohammed mahaifiyar yarinyar ta kai rahoto caji ofis a raanr 29 ga watan Satumban 2020 inda take shaida cewar an yi garkuwa da ƴarta daga bisani kuma an kirata a waya ana neman ta biya diyyar miliyan biyu gabanin a sako mata diyar ko kuma a kasheta.
Bayan sati biyu da zurfafa bincike, ƴan sanda sun gano cewa mahaifin yarinyar mai suna Fahad Ali shine ya saceta domin neman kudi daga hannun matarsa.
Sai dai Fahad Ali ya musanta zarge-zargen da ake masa a gaban kotun bayan da aka karanto masa zarge-zargen da ake tuhumarsa da su.
Alkalin kotun Sakina Aminu ta umurci a tsare wanda ake zargin a gidan gyara halinka har zuwa ranar 24 ga wannan watan domin ci gaba da sauraro.
He Kidnap his Daughter, and demands 2 million as ransom from his wife in Kano.

A man in Kano State Fahad Ali, has been arrested by the police and charged before the Magistrate's Court situated at Hajj Camp for allegedly abducting his four-year-old daughter for ransom of two million naira from his wife the mother of the abducted girl.

The plaintiff told the court that Shamsiyya Mohammed, the girl's mother, filed a charge at a station on September 29, 2020, she reported that her daughter was abducted and that she was called to pay 2 million ransom before her daughter will be release or she will be killed.
Two weeks after an in-depth investigation, police discovered that the girl's father, Fahad Ali, had abducted her in exchange for money from his wife.
However, Fahad Ali denied the allegations in court after the charges against him were read to him.
The court judge, Sakina Aminu remanded the accused in custody until the 24th of this month for further hearing.
Ya kamata Gwamnoni Su Inganta karatun Tsangaya - Hon. Kakale.

An bukaci Gwamnonin Najeriya musanman wadanda suka fito daga yankin arewa maso yammacin kasar da su samar da kyakkwan tsari na inganta karatun tsangaya ta yadda al'majirai za su samu damar samun ingantaccen karatu da sana'a kana su daina barace-barare tare da gararanba a kantiti.

Bukatar hakan ta fito ne daga bakin Dr Balarabe Shehu kakale dan majalisar tarayya mai wakilitar mazabar Bodinga, Shuni da Tureta daga jihar Sokoto arewa maso yammacin Najeriya , yayin zantawarsa na Muryar Najeriya.

Dr. kakale yace ba daidai bane yadda wasu gwamnoni suka maida wasu almajirai zuwa jiohinsu na asali samakamakon fargabar yaduwar cutar COVID-19, domin yin hakan ya sabawa yancinsu a matsayinsu na ƴan adam.
A addinance, a likitance, ko a hukumance bai kamata a lokacin annoba a rika tafiya da mutane daga wani wuri zuwa wani ba, domin hakan ne ma zai kara yaduwar cutar.
Babban abin takaici ne yadda a ka rika dibar al'majiran a cikin tirela kuma cikin cunkoso, in ji Dr. Balarabe Shehu Kakale.

Ya ce kamata ya yi gwamnoni su yi koyi da wasu gwamnonin da suka ce, za su kula da nasu al'amuran domin suna da ƴanci a matsayinsu na ƴan Najeriya, saboda haka ya kamata a yi dukkan maiyuwa domin inganta rayuwarsu.
karshe ya bukaci gwamnonin Najeriya da su fitar da kyaykywan tsarin karatun tsangaya ta yadda al'majiran za su daina barace-barace akan tinuna.
kazalika ya bukaci gwamnatin tarayya da ta rika ware wasu kuddade a cikin kasafin kudi domin bunkasa ilimin tsangaya kamar dai yadda take ware kudi a fannin ilimin boko.
Governors Should Improve Tsangaya Education - Hon. Kakale.

Nigerian governors, especially those from the north-western part of the country, have been urged to come up with a comprehensive plan to improve stunted education so that students have access to quality education and careers and stop begging and wandering on the streets.

The request was made by Dr Balarabe Shehu Kakale, a Member of the Federal Parliament for Bodinga, Shuni and Tureta constituencies in northwestern Sokoto State, during an interview with Voice Of America.
Dr. Kakale said it was wrong for some governors to return some students to their home states due to fears of the spread of COVID-19, as doing so violates their human rights.
Religiously, medically, or officially, people should not be allowed to move from one place to another during a pandemic, as this would increase the spread of the disease.
It is a tragic that the students were picked up in a open bodied trailer and jam packed jam, said Dr. Balarabe Shehu Kakale.

He said governors should follow the example of other governors who said they would take care of their own affairs because they were free as Nigerians, so everything should be done to improve their lives.
Finally, he called on Nigerian governors to put in place a comprehensive curriculum so that students can stop begging on the street.
He also called on the federal government to allocate more funds in the budget for Tsangaya education, just as it allocates funds for western education.
Za a gudanar da tsaftar muhalli na karshen watan nan - Kabiru Getso - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

Gwamnatin jihar Kano ta bukaci al'ummar jihar da su yi amfani da ranakun juma'a da asabar na karshen wata wajen tsaftace muhallan su musamman a wannan lokaci na damuna a wani mataki na magance matsalar ambaliyar ruwa.

Kwamishinan muhalli na jihar Kano Dr Kabiru Ibrahim Getso ne ya bayyana hakan a yau, ta cikin sanarwa mai dauke da sa hannun mai magana da yawun ma'aikatar Abbas Habib Abbas jim kadan bayan kammala ganawa da masu ruwa da tsaki domin yin shirye shiryen zagayen tsaftar muhalli da za a gudanar a karshen watannan.
Yace, zagayen tsaftar muhalli an dakatar da shi tsawon lokaci sakamakon annobar Corona wadda ta shafi al'amuran rayuwar yau da kullum.

Dr Kabiru Ibrahim Getso ya Kara da cewa sai dai a waccan lokaci gwamanati tayi amfani da damar ta wajen gudanar da feshin maganin kariya daga cutar corona a makarantu da tashoshi da kasuwanni da masallatai da sauran guraren ibada.

Yana Mai cewa a yanzu ma'aikatar muhalli ta shirya gudanar da zagayen tsaftar muhalli a gobe jumaa a wasu daga cikin kasuwannin jihar sai Kuma ranar asabar da za a gudanar da tsaftar titina da sauran unguwanni.
Dr Getso ya bukaci jamaar jihar Kano su bada hadin Kai daga karfe bakwai na safe zuwa goma na safiyar ranakun jumaa da asabar don tsaftace muhallin su.
The monthly Environmental Sanitation exercise will be held later this month - Kabiru Getso - Freedom Radio Nigeria.

The Kano State Government has urged the people of the state to use Fridays and Saturdays at the end of the month to clean up their environment especially during this monsoon season in a bid to address the issue of floods.

The Kano State Commissioner for the Environment, Dr Kabiru Ibrahim Getso, made this known today in a statement signed by the ministry's spokesperson, Abbas Habib Abbas, shortly after concluding a meeting with stakeholders to prepare for the monitoring of the clean-up exercise to be held at the end of this month.
He said the environmental sanitation exercise had been suspended for a long time due to the Corona epidemic which affected daily life.
Dr Kabiru Ibrahim Getso added that at that time, the government had taken advantage of the opportunity to spray anti coronavirus in schools, stations, markets, mosques and other places of worship.
He said the Ministry of Environment was planning to conduct a round of clean-up on Friday in some of the state's markets and on Saturday to clean up the streets and other areas.
Dr Getso urged the people of Kano State to work together from 7am to 10am on Friday and Saturday to clean up their environment.
An takaddama ta faru a motar bus yayin da direba ya fusata a sa-in-sa mai zafin kan takunkumi
A cikin wani gajeren hoton bidiyo wasu fasinjoji da direban a cikin motar bus ta Arriva a Liverpool sun kaure da fada akan amfani da takunkumi.
A na jin Direban Bus din na yiwa wata mata bayanin cewa ba aikinsa bane ya fadawa fasinjojin cewa su sa takunkumi.
Direban Bus din na mai cewa: "Ba fa aikina ba ne in fadawa duk wani wanda ya hau motar nan ya sa takunkumi."
A cewar wani wanda ya aka yi abin a gabansa yana mai cewa: "wani mutum da wata mace dattijuwa da suka soma sa baki da mayar mata da magana sai wata gagarumar hayaniya ta barke"
" Da hayaniyar ta yi yawa direban motar tasowa ya yi daga kujerarsa ya kuma zo ya tambayi me ke faruwa sannan ya fadawa matar cewa ba ta ma iya sa takunkumin ba yadda ya kamata"
"Wannan mata cikin fushi ta sauka daga motar tana mai ikirarin cewa za ta je ta kai karar abin da ya faru"
Wani mai magana da yawun kamfanin Arriva a cewa: "Kariyar lafiyar abokan huldarmu da kuma ma'aikatanmu a kullum shine fifikonmu.
"Yin amfani da kyallen rufe fuska zai cigaba da zama tilas ga kwastominmu a yayin da suke amfani abin hawa na jama'a (an kebance wasu da hakan da ta kama)"

"Muna da tsari karara da kuma alamu na fadakarwa ga kwastomominmu su fahimta kan wannan da kuma duk wasu matakan nisantar juna da cikin motocinmu. Wadannan bayanai na shafukanmu da kuma dandalinmu na sada zumunta"
Ya zama dole a sa kyallen rufe fuska a yayin da mutum ke cikin abin hawa na jama'a tun ranar 15 ga watan Yuni.
Yawan adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar COVID-19 a yanzu a duniya ya kai sama da miliyan 16.3.
Yawan wadanda suka mutu sakamakon kamuwa da cutar ya kai sama da 650,000.
Mutane sama da 9,900,000 ne suka warke daga cutar a fadin duniya.
Amurka ita ke da yawan wadanda suka kamu da cutar COVID -19 a duniya da yawan adadinsu ya zarta miliyan 4.3.
Coronavirus row breaks out on bus as driver gets in fiery exchange over face masks
In the footage passengers and the driver onboard the Arriva bus service in Liverpool clash over the use of face masks.
The bus driver can be heard explaining to a woman that it is not his job to tell passengers to wear face masks.
The bus driver said: "It's not my job to ask everyone who comes on the bus about wearing a mask."
A witness said regarding the incident: "A man and an older woman started ganging up on her and a massive row erupted."
"The bus driver had to get out of his seat and came over to demand what was going on and he told one woman she wasn't even wearing her mask properly."
"That woman then stormed off the bus and said she was going to report the incident."
A spokesperson for Arriva said: "The safety of our customers and employees continues to be our priority.
"The wearing of face coverings continues to be mandatory for customers whilst using public transport (exemptions apply)."
"We have clear guidance and signage for customers in regards to this and all other social distancing measures in place on bus, via social media and our website."
It has been mandatory to wear a face covering when using public transport since June 15.
Worldwide there have been more than 16.3 million COVID-19 cases.
The death toll has reached more than 650,000.
More than 9,900,000 people have recovered from the coronavirus across the globe.
The US has the most COVID-19 cases in the world with more than 4.3 million.
Ba za mu bude makarantu ba a halin yanzu - Minista - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
Gwamnatin tarayya ta ce, har yanzu ba ta tsayar da lokacin da za a bude makarantu kasar nan.
Karamin minstan ilimi Mr Chukwuemeka Nwajuba ne ya bayyana hakan lokacin da ya ke gabatar da jawabi ga kwamitin karta kwana na gwamnatin tarayya kan yaki da cutar corona jiya a Abuja.
Ya ce, har yanzu dai maganar komawa makarantun kasar nan ba a cimma matsaya ba sai dai ana ci gaba da tattara bayani.
A cewar ministan gwamnati tarraya na ci gaba da tattaunawa da masu ruwa da tsaki musamman na manyan makarantun kasar nan don samar da mafita, yana mai cewa.
Wasu manyan makarantu masu zaman kansu suka bukaci da a basu damar ci gaba da karatu sai dai gwamnatin na son tabbatar da adalci ga dalibai baki daya wanda ya sanya bata basu dama ba.
Nwajuba ta cikin jawabin nasa ya bukaci dalibai da su kara hakuri tare da nazartar karatukan da aka yi musu na baya don bunkasa ilimin su.
We will not open schools now - Minister - Freedom Radio Nigeria.
The federal government has said it has not yet set a date for the opening of schools in the country.
The Minister of State for Education, Mr Chukwuemeka Nwajuba, made this known while addressing the Federal Government's Anti-Corona Task Force Committee yesterday in Abuja.
He said the issue of returning to schools in the country had not yet been resolved but information gathering is still going on.
According to the minister, the federal government is in talks with stakeholders, especially the country's tertiary institutions, to find solutions, he said.

Some private high schools have demanded that they be allowed to continue their education but the government wants to ensure justice for all students which has made it impossible to approve their request.
Nwajuba, in his speech urged the students to be more patient and review their previous studies to improve their knowledge.
Wayar hannu ta Google Pixel 4 da ka iya daukar hoton taurarin samaniya ragdadadau

Baya ga karin abin janyo nesa kusa mai ninki 2, abin daukar hoton na biyu ya ba kyamarar Pixel 4 iya ganin hoto cikin tsarin 3D; ta yadda zai dusashe duk wani abu da ke bayan wanda ake dauka hoto a tsarin portrait, wanda hakana ya doke na irin kirar wayar na baya, wanda suka dogara da wata manhaja don samun wannan tagomashi da ake kira "bokeh" a hoto.

Don kara samun amincewar jama da wannan abar daukar hoto, Kamfanin Google ya gayyato Annie Leibovtz wata fitacciyar mai daukar hoto wani zauren taro don ta yiwa jama'a bayanin irirn yadda ta ji dadin aiki da kyamarar wayar hannun ta Pixel4 a watanni 12 da suka wuce.

Tsarin amfani da na'ura mai kwakwalwa na 'machine learning' ya kasance shine alkiblar inganta sabbin wayoyin hannu na Google, kamfanin ya dogara da salon kididdiga da lissafi a daukar hoto na 'computational photography' don inganta kyawun hoto ya fito ragadaddau a matakin HDR+ ta hanyar harhada hotuna guda tara daban-daban a hoto daya.

Wani sabon nau'in inganta hoto ya samar da madannai daban don inganta haske da kuma inuwa wanda hakan zai ba mai daukar hoton damar ganin hoton kafin a nau'in HDR+ fitar da hoto tangararau kum kai tsaye.

Wayar kuma ta dogara kan tsarin na'ura mai kwakwalwa na 'Machine learning' don inganta fitar da fari ya fita tar, baki kuma ya wuluk wanda ingancinsa zai sa kyamarar ta dauki hoton cincirindon taurari cikin duhu dare su kuma fito rangadadau.

Baya ga abin daukar hoto na biyu, wayar Pixel 4 ta zo da sabuwar fasahar soli wani nau'in 'radar chip' wacce mai amfani da wayar zai iya sauya kida, da kashe sanarwa ta sakonni, da kashe kararrawa, da kuma sa wayar a tsit ta motsa hannu kawai.

Duk wata fasahar na'ura mai kwakwalwa da ke gane motsi na cikin wayar, maimakon a intanet, kamar yadda ta inganta aikatau 'Google Assistant' din ta wanda hakan ya nuna yadda hamshakin kamfanin ya mayar da hankali wajen rage dan lokacin karbar umarnin da kuma kare sirrin mai amfani da wayar.

A dagewar da kamfanin Google ya yi na cin gajiyar fasahar 'Machine learning' ya kikiro tare da yada wata sabuwar na'urar daukar murya wacce ta ke iya mayar da sautin murya zuwa rubutu kai tsaye ba tare da ta aika da shi ta intanet ba.
A yanzu dai wannan manhajar a harshen Turanci kadai ya ke, ana sa ran samar da karin wasu harsuna a nan gaba.
Wayar Pixel4 ita ce waya ta farko da ke dauke da jerin wasanin Google Stadia wada ka aka kaddamar 19 ga watan Nuwamba a Amurka ana dakon kaddamar da shi a Australia nan ba da dadewa ba.
Baya ga sabbin wayoyin hannu na Pixel, kamfamin Google ya fito da sabuwar Komfutar tafi-da-gidan 'Pixelbook Go Chromebook' da kuma abin saurare na kunne 'Google Pixel Buds.

Wacce ake sa rai da fitoworta a shekara mai zuwa, amma ban da a kasar Australia, sabon abin kunne na Bluetooth kirar 5.0 na zamani na dauke da adaptive audio' fasahar da abin kunnen ke sarrafa sauti da kansa wajen karawa ko ragewa ba tare da ka taba shi ba la'akari da inda ka ke.
Sabon abin kunne na Bluetooth kirar 5.0 na zamani marsa aiki da igiyar waya, na dauke fasahar zamani da ke karawa da kuma rage sautin abin da ka ke ji da kan sa, dogaro da inda ka ke.

A hannu daya kuma, Kamfanin Google ya sanar da fitar da sabuwar 'Nest Wifi' na'urar mai rarraba hanyoyin sako na intanet kanana wacce ya inganta ta hanyar hadesu domin yin aiki wuri guda don samar da hanyar hawa intanet a cikin gida ba tare da igiya ba.

Ta hanyar amfani da sunan 'Nest' sabuwar na'rar ta ninka tazarar da inda karfin inda sakon zai je fiye da tsohuwar tare da karin abar daukar magana da kuma lasifikar saurare don nau'in ailkatau na Google mai taimakawa wajen yi maka wasu ayyuka a kowacce karamar hanyar sadarwa ta gida.
An kaddamar da na'urar a kasar Australia ranar 5 Nuwanba a kan farashin $399 ko Wi-Fi point da kuma Wi-Fi point akan $549 AUD.

Wannan na'ura da aka sa mata suna 'Google Home Mini ya kuma da samun ingantawa, a bisa sabon farashin $79 sabuwar na'urar 'Nest Mini na inganta karfin sauti tare da inganta sautin Bass tare da kuma abin makalawa a jikin bango.

Haka ma an shirya samarwa da dukkannin sabbin sipikun Google na zamani wani tsarin da za su iya amsawa da kuma yin kira kamar waya tsakanin gida da kuma na'urar a gida ciki har da kiran nu'urar ta 'Mini Nest daga wajen gida ta hanyar amfani da manhajar 'Google home app.
Google Pixel 4 able to photograph Milky Way

Along with adding 2x optical zoom, the second lens allows the Pixel 4 to see in 3D; thus doing a better job of blurring the background in portrait mode than previous Pixel handsets, which relied purely on software to achieve this "bokeh" effect.
To establish the camera's credentials, Google brought legendary portrait photographer Annie Leibovitz on stage to talk about her experience shooting with the Pixel 4 over the past 12 months.
Machine learning is still a strong focus for every aspect of Google's new smartphones, relying on "computational photography" to improve its HDR+ mode by combining up to nine different images.
New dual exposure controls offer separate sliders for brightness and shadows, allowing users to preview HDR+ in real-time.
The phone also relies on machine learning for improved auto white balance and an enhanced Night Sight night mode, which is sensitive enough to capture the Milky Way in the night sky.

Beyond the second camera lens, the Pixel 4 introduces a Soli "radar chip" front sensor which recognises Motion Sense gestures, allowing users to skip music, dismiss timers, snooze alarms or silence their phone with a wave of their hand.

All Motion Sense computations run in the device rather than connecting to the internet, as does the improved Google Assistant, as the tech giant focused on both reducing response times and enhancing user privacy.
Google's continued push to make the most of its machine learning capabilities has also spawned a new voice recorder app which transcribes audio live, without sending data to the internet.
For now the app only supports in English, with more languages to come.
The Pixel 4 will also be the first phone to support the Google Stadia cloud gaming platform, which opens its doors on November 19 in the US but is yet to receive an Australian launch date.
Beyond the new Pixel handsets, Google also unveiled a new Pixelbook Go Chromebook and second-generation Google Pixel Buds.

Arriving next year, but not confirmed for Australia, the new Bluetooth 5.0 smart earbuds are completely wireless and feature adaptive audio which monitors your environment and continually adjusts the sound to provide optimal clarity.
The new Bluetooth 5.0 smart earbuds are completely wireless and adjust the sound to the noise levels around you.

Meanwhile, Google also announced an upgrade to its mesh Wi-Fi home routers in the Nest WiFi, relying on a new separate router combined with several base stations working in unison to improve wireless coverage through the home.
Adopting the Nest name, the new Wi-Fi system doubles the range of its predecessor and adds a built-in microphone and speaker for using Google Assistant on each base station around the home.
It launches in Australia on November 5, for $399 with the router and one Wi-Fi point, or $549 AUD with a second Wi-Fi point.
The Google Home Mini also received an upgrade, with the new $79 Nest Mini improving sound quality - doubling the bass - and adding an integrated wall mount.

All Google smart speakers are set to receive a new intercom feature for communicating between devices in the home, plus the ability to call the Nest Mini from outside the home using the Google Home app.
Shaci-faɗi Ce Cewar Ina Son Takarar Mataimakin Shugaba - Dogara - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
Gwamnatin Bauchi Ce Jagorar Yaɗa Wannan Jita-jitar, In Ji Shi.

Tsohon Kakakin Majalisar Tarayyar Nijeriya, Rt. Hon. Yakubu Dogara ya yi fatali da ƙarerayi da shaguɓe da suke fita daga kafofin zumunta cewar zai tsaya takara a matsayin mataimakin shugaban ƙasa a zaɓe na shekara ta 2023 tare da Jagoran Jam'iyyar APC na Ƙasa, Bola Ahmed Tinubu.
Dogara ya fito ya shaida cewar gwamnatin jihar Bauchi ce ke ingiza wannan jita-jitar domin ɓata mishi suna.
A cewarshi sa, a yanzu haka ya fi maida hankali kan ababen da za su kawo wa ƙasa ci gaba da neman shawo kan matsalolin da suke akwai fiye da wani batun neman mataimakin shugaban ƙasa a halin yanzu.
Ya kuma ce yanzu ba lokacin siyasa ba ne balle a fara faɗin hakan a kansa.

Kamar yadda Dogara ya ke cewa, da farko ya yi niyyar yin watsi da ire-iren waɗannan shaguɓe, amma sai ya fahimci cewar, masu kururuta waɗannan ƙarya da shaci-faɗi sun himmatu akan yayata waɗannan aiyuka nasu, har ma takai waɗansu kafofin yaɗa labarai na haƙiƙa suna koyi da su, a bisa haka ne ya sa ya zame masa wajibi ya fito fili ya ce masu ahir da irin waɗannan jita-jitar.

Dogara, a cikin wani jawabi da jami'in yaɗa labaran sa, Turaki Hassan ya rabawa manema labarai, ya shawarci jama'a da su yi watsi da wadannan ƙarerayi da shaci-faɗi na ƴan-ma-abba, domin kamar yadda ya ce, "Aiyuka ne irin na masu son tada husuma".

Ya ce, "waɗannan shaci-faɗi da hotuna da ake bazawa a dandalin zumunta na yanar gizo, a fahimtar mu, wadansu ƴan-mu-abban gwamnatin jihar Bauchi ne da suke son cusawa jama'a waccan ƙarya na cewar, zan tsaya takarar ofishin mataimakin shugaban ƙasa a zaɓen shekara ta 2023, domin ingiza buƙatar uban gidansu wanda ya ke jin takaicin ficewar Dogara daga jam'iyyar PDP, suke danganta shi da wancan shaguɓe".

Haka kuma jawabin na Dogara ya yi la'akari da cewar, shi kansa gwamna Bala Muhammad na jihar Bauchi ya yi ta yaɗa wannan shaguɓe, kuma ya ci gaba da yayata wannan tatsuniya da ya ke so mutane su haƙiƙance domin su shafawa Dogara baƙin fenti, haɗi da kawar da zuciyoyin jama'a daga sakacinsa na rashin gudanar da mulki yadda ya kamata a jihar Bauchi.

Dogara ya ce danganta waɗannan ƙarerayi na kafofin yaɗa zumunta na yanar gizo a matsayin marasa tushe balle makama, Dogara ya lura da cewar, shekarar zaɓe ta 2023 batune na mai nisan kwana ke gani, saboda haka ba daidai ba ne a halin yanzu ake nuna buƙatar tsayawa takara, domin lokaci ne na fuskantar ire-iren kalubale dake addabar kasa domin magance su.

Dogara ya bayyana cewar, ba shi da wata masaniya na cewa akwai wata jam'iyyar siyasa da a halin yanzu take sayar da takardun neman shiga takarar zabe na shekara ta 2023 balle a ce na dan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa, wanda ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa ne da aka tsayar yake naɗa nasa.

Jawabin ya kuma yi alfahari da cewar, shi dai Yakubu Dogara yana ta sha'aninsa ne na taimakawa wajen gina da daidaituwar daukacin ƴaƴan jam'iyyar APC na jihar Bauchi, don haka ya buƙaci waɗancan masu zuguguta ƙarerayi su barshi ya yi abinda ya dace na gina ƙasa.

Wakilinmu ya nakalto cewa a kwanakin baya ne dai Yakubu Dogara ya fice daga jam'iyyar PDP tare da shiga cikin APC, lamarin da har zuwa yanzu yake ƙara janyo batutuwa da damar gaske musamman ga siyasar jihar Bauchi inda ake ganin kamar wutar rigimar siyasa na ƙara ruruwa a tsakanin gwamna Bala Muhammad da Yakubu Dogara.

Hon. Dogara dai yana daga cikin waɗanda suka yi tsayuwar daka wajen tabbatar da nasarar Sanata Bala a kujerar gwamnan Bauchi, abun mamaki sai kuma tun ba a yi nisa ba suka yi hannun riga tare da kunna fadi ya fadi ta siyasa a tsakaninsu.
It's a rumor that I want to run for vice president - Dogara - Leadership Hausa Newspapers.
The Bauchi State Government is at the fore front in spreading the rumor, he said.

The former Speaker of the House Of Representative in Nigeria, Rt. Hon. Yakubu Dogara has slammed social media allegations that he will run for vice president in the 2023 general election with APC National Leader Bola Ahmed Tinubu.
Dogara came out and declared that the Bauchi State government was instigating the spread of the rumors to tarnish his image.
According to him, it is now more focused on the factors That Will move the country forward and SEEK to overcome its existing problems Than The issue of seeking for a Vice president at present.
He says this is not the time for politics, let alone to talk about it.

According to Dogara, he initially intended to dismiss such allegations, but later realized that the proponents of these lies and slanders were determined to spread their propaganda, to the extent that some media outlets are learning from them, and for this reason it is incumbent upon him to openly come out and warn the perpetrators of such rumors to desist.

Dogara, in a statement distributed to his media by his media officer, Turaki Hassan, advised the public to disregard these allegations and rumors of mischief makers, because as he said, "It's an act of capable of heating the polity".

He said, "These rumors and pictures being posted on social media are, in our understanding, some of the Bauchi State government officials who want to spread the lie that I will run for office. "The vice-president in the 2023 election, in order to push the demand of their boss, who is frustrated with Dogara's departure from the PDP, attributes it to that bias".

Dogara's speech also noted that the Bauchi State Governor, Bala Muhammad himself, had been spreading the rumor and continued to promote it, that he wanted the people to be convinced in tarnishing Dogara's image, and in addition to removing the attention of the people from his negligence of mismanagement of Bauchi State.

Dogara said that linking the allegations to social media was baseless, Dogara noted that the 2023 election year was a long-term issue, so it was not right that the demand was currently being addressed to run for office, because it is time to face the challenges facing the country.

Dogara said he was unaware that any political party was currently selling nomination form for the 2023 presidential election, let alone that of the vice-presidential candidate, besides it is the presidential candidate that appoint his vice his choice.

He continues that, he Yakubu Dogara is now busy assisting in unifying all members of the APC in Bauchi State, and urged those peddling senseless rumors allow him to do his work of nation of nation building.

Our correspondent reports that Yakubu Dogara has recently defected from the PDP and joined the APC, an issue that is still gaining traction, especially in the politics of Bauchi State where it seems that the political crisis is escalating between Governor Bala Muhammad and Yakubu Dogara.

Hon. Dogara was one of those who stood firm in securing the victory of Senator Bala in the Bauchi governorship, and surprisingly within a short time they become apart and started a political feud between them.
Hukumar Alhazan Najeriya Za Ta Fara Karbar Kudin Hajin Badi.
Shugaban Hukumar Zikirullahi Olakunle Hassan ne ya bayyana haka a wani taron manema labarai a Abuja.

Wakiliyar Sashin Hausa Medina Dauda ta halarci taron, kuma ta aiko mana cewa, Shugaban Hukumar Alhazai Barista Zikirullah Olakunle Hassan ya ce hukumar za ta fara karbar Kudin maniyyata aikin Hajjin shekarar 2021 daga ranar 9 ga watan Satumba.
Ahaji Hassan ya kara da cewa hukumar, za ta bude wani sabon shafi na yanar gizo domin saukaka wa maniyyata rajista.

A lokacin da yake karin haske akan batun ko wasu maniyyata da ba su samu tafiya aikin hajjin bana ba za su kar6i kudadensu, Shugaban Hukumar Alhazan ya shawarci maniyyata aikin hajjin na badi da su fara tanadin kudadensu tun yanzu domin yin adashin gata a asusun hukumar.

Wani abinda ya dauki hankali shi ne yadda cutar coronavirus ta sa kasar Saudi Arabiyya ta soke aikin hajjin bana, sannan kuma ta yi karin kudaden haraji a kasar ta Saudiyya, to ko wanan kari zai shafi kudaden da Alhazai za su biya ?

Sai Kwamishina a Hukumar Alhazan Nura Ahmed Yakasai ya ce, abu guda daya da ya tabbata shi ne kasar Saudiyya ta yi kari ne akan haraji kawai, bayan shi abubuwa kamar makwanci da motocin sufuri ba a tabbatar da karin ba tukuna, tunda kowace shekara irin wadannan suna canjawa.
Saboda haka burin hukumar shine a samu sauki saboda duk maniyyaci daga Najeriya ya samu halartar aikin Hajji.
Yanzu dai abin jira a gani shi ne irin nasarar da za a samu wajen gano maganin cutar coronavrus ko na rigakafinta saboda maniyyata su samu damar yin aikin hajjin.
Nigerian Hajj Pilgrims Board To Start Receiving next year's Hajj Payment.
The Chairman of the Commission, Zikirullah Olakunle Hassan, made this known at a press conference in Abuja.

The Hausa Service reporter, Medina Dauda attended the meeting and informed us that the Chairman of the Pilgrims Board, Barrister Zikirullah Olakunle Hassan, said the board would start collecting payment from intending pilgrims for the 2021 Hajj from September 9.
Ahaji Hassan added that the commission would launch a new internet website to make it easier for applicants to register.

Elaborating on whether some of the pilgrims who did not make the hajj this year will receive their money, the chairman of the Hajj Commission advised the pilgrims for next year's hajj to start saving their money now in advance in the commission's special account.

Another concern is that the coronavirus has caused Saudi Arabia to cancel this year's hajj, and then increase taxes in Saudi Arabia, so will this increase affect the money that the pilgrims will have to pay?

The chairman pilgrims board, Nura Ahmed Yakasai said the only thing that was certain was that Saudi Arabia had only increased taxes, although things like accommodation and transport vehicles there was no certainty of increment yet, since they normally changes very year.
Therefore, the aim of the commission is to make it easier for all intending pilgrims from Nigeria to attend the Hajj.
What remains to be seen is the success of the search for a cure for coronavirus or it's vaccinations so that pilgrims can perform the hajj.
An Kashe Jami'anmu Biyu, Mun Kama Mutum 47 - DSS.
Akalla mutum biyu aka ba da rahoton sun rasa rayukansu cikin dakarun hukumar DSS masu fararen kaya, bayan da rikici ya barke tsakanin jami'an tsaron da ƴan kungiyar IPOB.
"Yan tawayen sun bayyana cewa su ma sun rasa mutane 21, bayan haka jami'an tsaron sun kama yara 47 daga cikin "yan kungiyar ta IPOB masu fafukar tabbatar da Biyafara.
Premium Times ta ce wannan lamari ya jawowa mutane zaman dar-dar bayan an aika sojoji da ƴan sanda zuwa yankin da wannan mummunar rigima ta kaure.
Wasu wadanda rikicin ya faru a gaban idanunsu, sun shaidawa ƴan jarida cewa, jami'an tsaro sun rika bi lungu-lungu su na laluben ƴaƴan kungiyar IPOB.
Mai magana da yawun bakin hukumar DSS na kasa, Mista Peter Afunanya ya shaida cewa an kai wa dakarunsu hari ne a garin Emene da ke jihar Enugu.
Peter Afunanya ya dorawa kungiyar IPOB alhakin kai masu harin da ya yi sanadiyyar rasa ma'aikata biyu na hukumar.
Afunaya ya ce haka kawai aka takalesu.
Two of Our Officers Killed, 47 Arrested - DSS.
At least two people have reportedly lost their lives in the Directorate of Security Services DSS, following clashes between security forces and members of the IPOB.
"The rebels claimed to have lost 21 people, after which security forces arrested 47 members of the IPOB the Association advocationg for the actualization of Biafra.
The Premium Times said the incident had left people in a state of shock after troops and police were dispatched to the area the violent clash took place .
Some eyewitnesses told reporters that security forces patrolled all the nooks and crannies of the area in the search for IPOB members.
The spokesman for the Directorate of Security Services DSS, Peter Afunanya said the attack took place in Emene, Enugu State.
Peter Afunanya blamed the IPOB for the attack, which resulted in the loss of two staff of the Directorate.
Afunaya said they were confronted.
Yarjejeniyar tsagaita wuta a gabashin kasar Ukraine wacce yaki ya daidaita za ta soma aiki da tsakar dare.

KYIV, Kasar Ukraine - Sojojin Ukraine da na 'yan tawaye da ke gabashin Ukraine sun soma shirye-shiryen a aiki da wata "cikakkekiyar" yarjejeniyar tsagata wuta da aka shirtya za ta soma aiki a tsakar daren, wani yunkuri ne da jami'ai ke fatan zai kai ga wasu karin matakan samar da zaman lafiya a rikicin da su da ya kai shekara 6.
Shugabannin 'yan tawaye sun ce a ranar Lahadi, sun umarci dakarunsu da su shirya tsagaita wuta, sun kuma kafa dokar haramta amfani da makamai
Sojojin Kasar Ukraine sun ce dakarunsu sun soma shirye-shiryen soma aikin da tsakaita wuta.

Idan ka yi da yarjejeneiyar, hakan zai "samar da hanyar da za ayi aiki da wasu saddarorin" daga cikin yarjejeniiyar da aka kulla a birnin Minsk, ofishin shugaban kasar Ukraine ya ce a farkon a wanna mako. yana mai kiran wannan tsagaita wuta da cewa "babban cigaba"

Kasashen Fransa da Jamus da suka shiga tsakani a 2015, Yarjejeniyar da aka kulla ta shirya sasanta rikicin da ke tsakanin Ukraine da 'ya awaren da kasar Rasha ta ke goyawa baya, rikicin da ya brake a shekarar 2014 bayan da kasar Rasha ta mamaye yankin Crimea da kuma goyawa 'yan tawaye baya.
Rikicin dai ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar mutane sama da 14,000.

Shugabannin kasar Rasha da na Ukaraine duk sun yi san barka da yarjejeniyar tsagaita wutar da aka cimma a wata hira ta wayar tarho da aka yi da su a ranar Lahadi wanda hakan ya nuna muhimmancin aiki da yarjejeniyarda aka cimma a watan Disamba a wani taro a birnin Farisa.

Shugaban Kasar Rasha Vladamir Putiin ya nuna damuwarsa na kiraye-kiraye da Kyiv ta ke yi na a sake duba yarajejeniyoyin da aka yi a MInsk, ya kuma ce shugaban kasar Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskiy " matsayinsa na babu madadi ga yarjejeniyoyin Minsk, ya sake fada wayar da aka yi da shi, toh ya kamata a yi aiki da su sau da kafa. A fadar ta Kremlin ta sanar.

Daga bangarensa kuwa Zelenskiy, jaddada bukatar "sake samun matsayi na zahiri ya yi wadanda za su kai ga sakin 'yan Ukraine da ke hannun 'yan tawayen gabashin Ukraine, da ke cikin yakin Crimea da Rasha ta mamaye da kuma a can cikin Rashan, a cewar ata sanarawa ta da fito daga ofishinsa.

A yarjejeniyar ta shekarar 2015 a na sa rai cewa Ukraine za ta iya mado da ikonta kan bakin iyakokinta da Rasha a wuraren da ke hannun 'yan yawaye ne kawai bayan ta ba su 'yancin cin gashin kansu an kuma gudanar da zabuka na cikin gida.
Yarjejeniyuar dai ta taimaka wajen rage yawan fadace-fadace, Sai dai sojojin Ukraine da kuma na 'yan tawaye sun cigaba da musayar wuta da manya - manyan bindigogin atileri da kuma kanana.

A watan Disamba ne, shuagabanin Kuraine da na Rasha da na Faransan da kuma na Jamus suka hadu a birnin Farisa dona sake wani zagayen tattaunawa, suna masu bayyana goyon bayansu ga yarajejeniyar Minsk da kuma yarda da farfado da matakan yarajejeniyar zaman lafiya.

Zelenskiy wanda ya lashe zaben 2019 bisa alkawarain da ya yi na kawo karshen rikicin na son Ukraine da farako ta samu damar iko da iyakokinta kafin a fara zabn cikin gida, amma fadara Kremlin ta dage kan cewa a yi da yarjejeniyar ba tare da an sake yin bitar ta ba.

An dai cimma sabuwar yarjejeniyar tsagaita wutar ne a ranar Laraba tare da wata 'yan kungiyar tuntubar juna ta Tripartite da ta kunshi wakilan Rasha da Ukraine da kuma Kungiyar Kula da Tsaro da kuma Hadin kan kasasashen Turai, ta kuma samu karbuwa daga jami'an Tarayyara Turai.

A addua'r da ya saba yi duk ranar Lahadi a dandalin St Peters, Papa Roma Francis ya yabawa yarjejeniyar tsagaita wutar da ka kulla, yan mai addu'ar Allah Ya sa su yi aiki da ita "don ta sake gina karfin gwiwa ta kuma assasa ginshikin da zai samar da abin ada ake da bukata, na sasanta juna da a ke bukata da kuma neman zaman jira.″
Cease-fire in war-torn eastern Ukraine to begin at midnight

KYIV, Ukraine -- Ukrainian and rebel forces in war-torn eastern Ukraine have started preparing for a "full and comprehensive" cease-fire scheduled to begin at midnight, a move that officials hope can lead to more steps to resolve the 6-year-old conflict.
Rebel officials said Sunday they have instructed their troops about the cease-fire and issued a decree banning the use of weapons.
Ukraine's military said their forces "have begun preparations" for the ceasefire.
If upheld, it would "pave the way for implementing other clauses" of the Minsk peace deal, the office of Ukraine's president said earlier this week, calling the cease-fire a "breakthrough."

Brokered in 2015 by France and Germany, the Minsk peace plan aimed to resolve the conflict between Ukraine and Russia-backed separatists that flared in 2014 after Russia's annexation of Crimea and its support for the separatists.
The conflict has since killed more than 14,000.
The presidents of Russia and Ukraine both commended the cease-fire deal in a phone call Sunday and underscored the importance of implementing the agreements reached at the December summit in Paris.

Russia President Vladimir Putin expressed concern over Kyiv's calls to revise the Minsk agreements and said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's "position about the non-alternative nature of the Minsk agreements, once again voiced during this call, should translate into real actions," the Kremlin said.

Zelenskiy in turn, stressed the need "for further practical steps" aimed at releasing Ukrainians who are imprisoned by rebels in eastern Ukraine, in the annexed region of Crimea and in Russia, according to a statement by his office.
The 2015 deal envisaged that Ukraine can regain control over its border with Russia in the separatist-held regions only after they are granted broad self-rule and hold local elections.
The accord helped reduce the scope of hostilities, but Ukrainian forces and the rebels have continued to exchange artillery salvos and gunfire.
In December, the leaders of Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany met in Paris for another round of talks, expressing support for the Minsk deal and agreeing to revive the peace process.

Zelenskiy, who won the 2019 election on promises to end the conflict, wanted Ukraine to get control of its border first before local elections, but the Kremlin has insisted the deal should be implemented without revisions.

The new cease-fire deal was reached Wednesday by members of the Tripartite Contact Group that includes representatives of Russia, Ukraine and the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe, and was welcomed by EU officials.

During his traditional Sunday blessing in St. Peter's Square, Pope Francis also commended the cease-fire, adding that it needed to be put into practice ″to rebuild confidence and lay the foundations for a much needed and long awaited reconciliation with the people.″
